item.text: rgyug skud du/ bsru'i bar ma hA gu byayo ga tan/ bod skad du/ gsang
gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad la
ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud rdo rje rtse mo/ o kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
phyag 'tshal lo// de nas rgyal po de rje 'chang// kun mchog srid pa'i dbang phyug
gis// 'khor lo dani brtags byas nus// rnal 'byor can ni mi gsung bzhugs// mgon po chen po
sangs rgyas kun// ma lus thub pa'i skyes mchog gis// rdo rjesams dpa'i rgyal po che// thub pa'i
dbang phyug la gsol 'debs// rnal 'byor tshul chen sgrub byed cing// cho ga sna tshogs yang dag 'byung/
rigs kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor 'byung ba'i/ 'khegral mchog ni bshad du gsol// mgon po khyod ni skal chen te///
de nyid rjes kyis da nyid ldan// rnal 'byor bdag nyid rnal 'byor che// rdo rje chen po byang chub sems// gsungs shig gsung
khyod na bya ba donasems khyod/ gsang ba mkhyen cing dgos bshad mkhyen// rnal 'byor rig pas mchog gyur gsungs/
shig tshul chen po// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo ste// dorje rnal 'byor sna tshogs bdag/ gsang ba'i snying po dkyil
'khor tsho// chos kyi tshul ni sgrub byed pa// rtog pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi// chos kyi don bad kyi yin brjod// 'dir ni
rtog pa ji lta bu// sgrub pa'i don ni ji ltar lags// ci phyir 'don rgyud phyi ma// rgyud den ci yin brjod par bgyi//
phyi'i rgyud dang phyi ma lags// rgyud kyi don ni ji ltar byung// rdo rje'achang dag 'di ci zhig/ drag po'i don ni ji ltar byung// rdo rje'i ba 'di ci zhig/
ci yi phyir na zhi bar brjod/ phyag na rdo rjeci yi phyir// rdo rje gtum po'ang ci zhig lags// ci yi phyiran gtum par brjod// de darje des gsus
pa// ci phyir de rje brjod par bgyi// de rje 'chang zhes gsungs 'di ci// de yi rdo rje ji lta bu// rdo rje 'chang ba rnams ni du// rdo rje rigs kun gang gi lags//
chen po gnas gang zhigan gnas// gis ni rnam pa du yin brjod// ci yi phyin rigs su brjod// rigs bdag rang bzhin 'dicazhig/ ci yi phyir na
sams dpar brjod// rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam pa du// ciyi rdo rjesems dpa' lags// rdo rje rgyal po ci yin brjod// rdo rje chags pa 'di don ci//
rdo rje legs pa ci yin brjod// de rje rin chen ci yi phyir// rdo rje gzi brjid ci yan brjod// tshorgyal mtshan bzhad pa che// gsus shig ci yin brjod pa gsungs// ci yi phyir na rdo rje chos//

donon po yin brjod// rdo rje rgyu'i kher leci// de'iglu ba ci yin pa tsho// rdo rje las dang gnodasbyin che// rdo rje gnod sbyin drag po che// rdo rje srung ba khu tshur che// gsus shig tu yin brjod par
gsus// sems dpa' 'di rnams gang las byung// de bzhin pha dang man gang// dang po gang zhig gleng gzhi dang// dmigs pa'i nan gang zhig lags// gsang pa 'din nga lasu khyud
khyab bdag 'di rnams gang nas byung//thog ma tha ma med 'di// gsang ba'i dbang phyug chen pos gsungs// rab tu dga' nyid rab bzanganyid// rdo rje snying bdag dzilta bur// cayi phyir na
kun tu bzang// de bzhin rdo rje rdo rje 'chang// dang po rigs ni dza ltar byung/ chos kun skyo ba med pa dang// 'byung ba ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' ci yin brjod// ci phyir sang
rgyus brjod par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa ci yin brjod// bcom ldan 'das bcom yin brjod// de bzhin ston pa'i ston pa ci// ci yi phyir na lo shas brjod// shes rab ye shes ci yin brjod//
phyir shes rab brjod par bya// de bzhin shes rab pha rol phyin// tshul ni ci zhig ting 'dzin gang/ bsam gtan rnal 'byor rnal 'byoraci// srid gsum 'jig rten gsum don ci// ci yi phyir yang
khams gsum pa// 'khor ba'i don ni ci zhig yin/ chu ngan 'das pa'i ng ru yin brjod// rtag dang 'jig dang de bzhin dag/ theg pa chen po ci yin brjod//
nam mkha' yang na ci yi phyir// sa nyid kyang ni ci yin brjod// khyung ba chen po gang las 'byung// 'gog pa ci zhig gang gis byed// ci yi phyir na phyag rgyar brjod// mi bsngags su brjod par bya//
tsayi phyir na rig sngags brjod// de bzhin kho nar gzungs sngags rnams// phyag rgya yi ni mtshan nyid gsungs// sngags kyi mtshan nyid brjod par bya// rig sngags kyi ni mtshan nyid gsungs// de bzhin
khor gzungs sngags rnams// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i gnas ni gang// ji ltar bcing ba thub chen po// phyag rgya dag ni 'ching ban// ji ltar rdo rje can kun manyes// rig sngags ji ltar bzlas par bgyi//
thub pa chen po de gsungs shig/ rig sngags dag ni zlos pa// ji ltar yid kyis rdo rje bzlas// dri ba'i tshogs mdor bstan pa'o// o na ci zhig yin par bshad// yi ge hUMn ci yin brjod// ceyi
phyir na yi ge phaT// sAhA zhes pa nga yin brjod// mchod par phyi phyir brjod par bya// de bzhin dam tshig shes nyid kyang// ciyi phyir na dkyil 'khor yin// dkyil 'khor dang por zhugs pa yi// skyes
pa yang na bud med kyis// bya ba gang zhig bya ba ni// gsungs shig gsang ba'i dbang phyug che// thub pa'i dkyil 'khor zhugs pa la// sdom pa ji ltar sbyin par bgyi// de yi srog gi phyir yang ni//
der bar mi bya gang zhig lags// khrus kyi las ni dza ltar bya// de bzhin kho nar phyogs bcas la// bgegs rnams bcing ba dang bcas pa// log 'dren ji ltar bskyed par bgyi// dga' ba chen po ji
lta bu// rab tu gus bcas phyag dag bgyi/ sngos dang ma tog de bzhin du// mar ma mchod sogs ji ltar lags// dkyil 'khor brtag pa ji lta bur// gzhug pa yang ni ji ltar lags// dam tshig/
ci zhig yin par bshad// rdo rje slob ma'i tshog gang// sngon du bsnyen pa ji ltar bgyi// sgrub pa'i don ni ji ltar lags// gsang ba'i rnal 'byor ji lta bu// snyoms 'jug ji lta bu zhig lags// mdun
du dgug pa'i din na ji ltar lags// 'dir ni rjes su chags pa'i ng jilta bu// bcing bar bya ba las ni ji lta bu// 'dren pa rnams nimanyes par ji ltar 'gyur// ji ltar 'dir ni gshigs su/
gsol ba lags// dkyil 'khor mchog ni ji ltar gdeg par bgyi// 'gro ba'i bya ba yang ni ji ltar bgyi// las kyi cho ga'i bya ba ji ltar bgyi// dag bstag po gsang chen ji lta bu// las rnams tha

dad bya ba ji lta bu// phyag rgya phyag rgyu'i lanan ji ltar bgyi// mchod dang mchod pa'i lan ni ji ltar blang// dkyil 'khor gyi ni 'khor lo ji ltar dbyung// 'khor lo'i rnam pa'i bye brag du zhig mchis//
dngos dang dngos med ji ltar spang ba lags// bla ma'i gsang byung 'od zer gsang ba ni// sbyin sreg rnam pa du ru brjod// thab khung ji lta bu zhig lags// sbyin sreg mdor bsdus ji lta bu// las
rnams rnam pa dulubarjod// gsang ba rnams ni rnam pa du// mchog tu gsang ba ji ltar brjod// de nyid ji lta bu zhig lags// phyag rgya nye ba'i phyag rgyagyi// mchod pa'i phyag
sgyuji ltar lags// rigs kyi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// ltar bsgrub bya shani du sgrub// rdorje phra mo ji ltar brjod// bgegs na ji ltar bsal bar gyi// mdor na rig pa 'dzan pa dang// slob dpon
lta bu zhig lags/ dkyil 'khor 'khel dang ldan pa'i// 'khor lo rnam pa du ru brjod// dngos grub mtshan nyid sgrub byed pa'i// sna tshogs rtog pa ji lta bu// thig rnams brtag pa nyid dang ni//
ka dngos grub ji ltar nye bar brjod// dngos grub tshog san ro lta bu// gsang ba kun nas btud pa gsungs// bdag nyid lan deb nga bskur bar// bya ba'i tshig ji lta bu// yang na gzhan dag nyid la ni//
dbang bskur ba na ji ltar lags// ji ltar sems ni bskyed par bgyi// ting 'dzin ji lta bu zhig lags// de nyid rig pa 'di rtag tu// rdo rje ye shes ji lta bu// gzhan yang dgos pa ji lta bu//
spyod pa dzi lta bu zhig lags// gang yang rung ba'i rtags las byung// mang dang ming min shes pa'i mtshan// las 'bras med par byed pa dang// 'dzin par byed par gang las bshad// lus nam/

! mkha' bzhin 'byung ba// gang las byungabar brjod par bya// tsiyi phyir na thar par brjod// rnal 'byor pa don ci yin brjod// rdo rje dbyas na skyod byed pa// rdo rje phra mo'i rnal 'byor gang// gzhan yang
rang gi rigs dag las// rnal 'byor brtul zhugs ji ltar brtsam// mdor na dbang du bya ba dang// de nyid gsang pa gang zhig lags// theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa'i// gsang pa rtog chen las/
gsungs pa// dgong+khapa rnam pa du ma yis// gsang ba gsungs shuge blo gros che// rnal 'byor rnam pa du ru brjod// rdo rjernal 'byor las byung du// ji ltar rtsa ba'irgyud du brjod// gsang ba'i rigs
byang ji lta bu// nga ni rang byung nyid yin te// khams gsum 'jig rten sa 'og dang// sa stangasas bla mya ngan 'das// ji skad bshad pa'i gsang ba gzhan// rdo rje can nyid khyab 'jug rang nyid yin//
nyim zla ba gshin rje drag po nyid// rang nyid skye dgu'i bdag ste pha ma yin// 'gal ba'i tshig na ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// dri ba'i tshogs gnyis pa mdor bstan pa'o////tshas pa
'jig rten gsum lus dbang phyug che// gdong drug tshogs bcas lha'i rigs dkyil 'khor rnams// gzhan yang gza' dang tshogs sogs gang yin pa// da bdag nyid ces ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/
ngan 'dod pa thar pa nga// nga ni dmyal ba'i dmyal ba pa// nganiyi dgas dud 'gro bdag/ tshig de ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// de nas gzhan yang 'dod la chags sems ldan// lta bcas tshog
ldan 'dzin pa'i lta la chags// mu stegs theg dman mngon dga' skye dgu'i rigs// ji ltar 'dod bzhin don rnams rtog byed cing// ji skad bshad pa'i sna tshogs rigs dkyil 'khor// dag
pa'i chos kyi 'byung gnas dgosamishes// rang gi bdod pas mun rtog byed pa/ de la skye dgu'i bdag chen brtsi bas gsungs// mchod 'os chen po mchog dang po/
[Or ]]gzhas/ gsang ba'i gsang mchog mngon bsdus dbye bar gsol// skye dgu'i bdag po'i de kyi 'khor gsang mdun du// dam tshig mchod pas ji ltar mchod par cu// 'dod yon ltar bcas
la par byed pa yis// dngos grub tshogs mchog chen po thob par 'gyur// dman pa'i 'dod las rigs kyi dngos grub 'byung// gal ba'i tshig dag ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// de bzhin b+ha ga ji
ltar rtags ci 'dra/ de la 'jug pa yang ni ji ltar 'gyur// rdzas de dag ni ji ltar rab tu sgrub// 'jig rten gsum na son pa ji ltar 'gyur// de nas 'dod chags zhen pas dngos grub bo//'dod chag/
dag phyir den ji ltar rung// chags bral sdigs pas tshogs dang bral ba la// gsang ba btsun pas sdug dngos ji ltar 'gyur// gtor mas bsod nams mchog thob ji lta bu// skye dgu khasad pas
bsod nams ji lta bu// mnams bas bsod nams 'gyur zhes pa'i// 'gal ba'i tshig dag ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// dga' ba chen po'i bud med bsten pa yis// tsho'adal na sangs rgyas
mchog 'grub la/ mi gtsang 'dod pa bsten pas sangasargyus dang// jorjesems dpa' 'byung pa ji ltar 'gyur// 'di ni brdzun dang mtshungs pa'i bsod nams med// ji ltar btsun ne bsod nams
ldan bar brjod// 'dire nasems can gzhan bsad pa'i bar khyu// 'gal ba'i mi ni jilta rung bar 'gyur// 'khor ba spangs kyang chos min 'gyur ba dang// mya ngan 'das la gzhol ba chos ma
yin// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor gyin rjes 'jug pa// chos min 'gyur zhes ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/ rdzogs dang ser sna sdang ba'i sems ldan pa/ chos min spyodatsang brdzun pa'i tshig la chags/
'dod pa'i 'dod chags bcas pa lhag par rgyal// rigs kyi rnal 'byor las byung ji ltar 'grub// bla med go 'phang dngos grub 'dod pa yis// dag cing rnal 'byor rnal 'byor lhur blang bya//
skyor gcin 'thung dang bshang ba wa pa yis// dag cing mchog gyur rnal 'byor dngos grub 'dod// mi gtsang bshang gci zos shing 'thungs pa yis// yid 'dod dngos grub ji ltar dngos grub 'dod//
bud med bcas par lhan cig chos spyodacing// gnyis ka lhan cig gyur bas dag gtsang mchod// ji ltar bud med lhan cig dkyil 'khor mchod// dngos grub dam pa mchog tu ji ltar 'gyur///
gzhan yang de rje 'gas 'byung kun ldan zhing// mchog tu mi bzad drag po'i las can te//dag cing shin tu sdugal mtho bar 'gro// 'gal ba de ni ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// gzhan yang brdeg dang bsad pa
lhur len zhing// bskrad dang drag po'i las can de dag ni// dag cing shin tu sdug la mtho bar 'gro// 'gal ba de ji ltar rung ba yin// gzhan yang bza' dang btung ba lhur lan cing// snying 'byin pa//
sha bya// yis dag bar 'dod pa nyid// de ni dag cing sdug la mkho bar bgro// 'gal ba de ni ji ltar rung pa yin// gzhan yang nor bu rin chen 'phrog pa yis// sdug cing bstan la
dag cing mthor 'gro dang// gzhan yang nga rgyal ser sna lhur len bas// dag par gyur pa nyid ni 'gal ba yin/ gzhan yang las kyi rig pa byung ba yis// ma dag ba yi las rnams thams
cad bya// 'khrig sogs las kyi the tshogs rnam mang po// las byed pa na ji ltar skyon mi 'gyur// gzhan yang brdzun tshig de bzhin 'khrig pa yis// dag 'dod 'phags pa min pas gsang ba
yi// rgyal ba'i dbang chen 'ded pas bdud rtsi ltar// sdug cade mthor 'go ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/ kye mgon khyod na dag pa'i chos kyi tshogs te khyod ni rtag turnal 'byor 'gyur// kye mgon khyod

ni dgyes chen bdud rtsi 'chang ba dam chos gang nga 'i 'byung gnas te// kye rgyal byed na dri mad nyim bzhin du mi shas kun tu sbyong mdzad pa// khyab byed rgyal ba'i ngang tshul 'jig rten gsum gyi 'dren
chen byang sems dga' kyi// mdor bsdu ba'o/// kun mchog thams cad rig pa ste/ kun mkhyen dri ma gsum spangs pa// byang sems sangs rgyas rgyal che// de bzhin gsheg
tsha pa de nyidan// ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas kyang// phyogs rnams kun tu gzigs mdzad de// thub pas mgon rnams rab btud nas// sangs rgyas kun la 'di skad gsungs/
kyi ma rnam dag ye shes bdag kye ma'o sas rgyas nyer thob pa// kye ma'ogar mkhan 'khor lo 'di// rang gi ye shes 'dri bar byed// rtog pa thams cad kun bsdus pa'i// mchog tu
gsang ba ba shad khar@#// shin tu rnyed dka' dam la gi/ nachen sgrom gyi kha dbye bya// bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi// rgyal mtshan dam pa bslong bar bya//'ani chen zlos gyi kha phye nas// shes rab
kyis na snang bar bya// de nas gsang ba mchog gyur pa// dam pa yang dag bshad par bya// bya ba sgrub pa'i thabs chen po// rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang// gsang ba'i bye brag 'byed byed mi
rnal 'byor dgongs pa rnam par grol// de nyid dam pa shes byed pa// rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang// rdo rje rnal 'byor tshog dang// 'khor 'dzinel 'byor chog ste// mchog tu gsang ba
zhes bya de'i// rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang// dus gsum khyab pa'i bya bar ldan// gsang brnal 'byor kun 'byung zhing// bya ba kun gyi thabs chen gyis// rtog pa thams cad bsdus
pa dang// sus rgyas rnal 'byor tshog r ldan// rdo rje chos ni rab 'jug ba// sku gsum zhes bya gsang chen gyi// rtog pa thoms cad bsdus pa dang// rdo rjernal 'byor tshog ldan// ma rung thams
cad 'dul byed pa// khams gsum rnam rgyal zhes bya yi// rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang// chos kyi rnal 'byor cho gar ldan M// pad+ma gar mkhan skyid byed pa// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya
ba'i// rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang// sbyin pa bzhi dang yang dag ldan// rin chen 'khor le skyed byed cing// byang nub sems dpa' yid ches byed// rtog pa thams cad/
bsdus pa dang// sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs chen po/ saMtshogs gar mkhan skyed byed pa// las kyi rnal 'byor chog yi// rtog pa thams cud bsdus pa dang// de deshes shing dgos pa shes
tshulaMchen mchog ni shes byed cing// mchog gi dang po sas rgyas mchog/ rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa ste// go rims bzhin du 'jug byed pa'o// gcig par sems can bya ba byed///
bya ba chen po mchog zhi ba// chos dang longs spyod mchog gyur pas// sangs rgyas gar mkhan 'khor lo ni// mchog tu ngo mtshar gyur pa 'di// skal ba ji bzhin gsang ji bzhin// ji ltar sam/
can gdul 'gyur bshad// sngon 'gyur 'das pa'i dus su ni// byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin cing// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis// byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na// spro ba chen pos
dmatshar che// dka' ba dpag tu med pa spyad// go rims bzhin du de yis ni// dbang bskur bar du lags thob 'gyur// shes rab chen pos sa mthAr byon// gas kyi dbang ni thob gyur nas//
'og min stug po nyams dga' bar// blo gros chen po zhugs par gyur// bdag ni sangs mchog 'gyur zhes// rnal 'byor pa yis bsams nas ni// bya ba mthar phyin bdag gis ni// sems

can don 'byung thob bya zhes// bya ba de la dgos nas ni// sngon dang phyi mar bde chen mad// chos kyi dga' ba rmadachen po'i// dka' ba spyad par bya snyam ste// byang nub shing drung bzhugs gyur nas//
bya dka'i bya ba kun ldan de// dbugs 'byung rngub pa 'gog pa dang// sams dpa' mad tsang g.yo pa med// lus mi gang yang ma 'gul zho// yan lag skyod par mi byed de// du bas g.yo ba med
chos la// yunarang du ni gnas par 'gyur// phyogs bcu yi nithub dbang po// sas rgyas kun gyis dgos gyur pa// 'di ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub dus// sdug bsngal bya bar rigs pa min//
de bas bdag cag kun lhan cig/ bskul bar bya phyir 'gro snyam du// dgongs nas thams cad rab chas te// stug po ru ni blon bar gyur// khyon nas thub pa thams cad kyis// bskul ba mchog ni mdzad
par 'gyur// oM badzra u ta tingazhes pagi/ 'gig pas sa gol brdabs nas ni// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bsung// phyogs rnams kun tu bltas pa na// sangs rgyas kyi ni rgya mtsho mthong//
thub pas mgon rnams la btud de// bka' stsol zhes na gsol ba btab// mgon chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// gsung gcig gis bka' stsal pa/ sems kyi spyod yul ci 'dra zhes//
rang gi sems ni so sor rtog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung thos nas// rang gi sems la rtog bzhin du// yun ring du ni gnas pa na// sems kyi rnam pa ma mthong ste// yan lag kun gyis rab btudanas//
! @#// zhus pa bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// sems kyi rnam pa ma mthong ste// sems kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu// de nas sas rgyus kun gsungs pa// sams kyi spyod yul shes par
dka' khyod la snying po rab sbyin gyis// phra mo'i bzlas pa rab tu spyod// otsat+tapra ti bi dz+he kA re ma// snying po dag pa blangasan// rang gi sems la rtog bzhin du// thung cig de la gnas/
pan// zla ba'i dkyil 'kher bzhin du mthong// de nas sems 'di su zhig yin// nyon mongs sa bon can nam ci// dge ba'am mi dge ba yi sems// kun gzhi'i sa bon can sems sam// chos
kyi kyi rgyumathun rtogs gyur nas// pha rol phyin pa drug bsten pa// 'di ni sems can dag pa ste// kun nas nyon mos gnas ma yin// yun 'ad du na bsod nams dang// ye shes tshogs chen bsags
pa so// ji ltar zla ba gang ba 'ad// dag cing dang la rnyog ma med// de bzhin tshogs ni rdzogs pa'i phyir// sems 'di zla ba gang dang mtshungs// das pa yod dang med min pa// ji ltar zla ba mtshus
nyid yin// 'on kyang bsod nams ye shes che// rdzogs pa zla ba dang mtshungs bstan// legs byas tshogs ldan rang sems kyi// zla ba'i dkyil 'kher mthong nas ni/ dga' zhing mgu ba skyes nas
kyang// slar yang tsheg ni rang smras pa// bcom ldan mgon po bdag gis ni// nyon mos dri ma kun dag cing// gzung dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i// rang sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong//
sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsus pa// thog mar byung ba'i sems 'di bzung// dang por glo bur nyon mongs rnams// byang chub sems kyis dag par byed// dngos po thams cad rnam spyas pa'i
dag pa yi nas nig po 'dis// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbusaM su na// byang chub kyi na sems la rtogs// oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ud pA da yA mi// sAng po dag pa byas nas ni// sems kyi dbus su rtog pa na//
zla ba'i dbus su yang bla ba'i// dkyil 'khor gnyis pa mthong ban// thub pa rnams la tshig smras pa// dkyil 'khor gnyis pa dag mthong ngo// de nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa// byang chub sems
kyi rang bzhin brtan// brtan par bya ba'i ched du ni// den legs par sgrub par gyis// khyod la snying po sbyin bya ste// blos shing de na bstan par dgongs// a ti badzra/ dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i dbus
gnas pa'i// rdo rje chen po sems byed cing// thang cig so sor brtags pa na// shin tu brtan pa mthong gyur nas// smras pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// dkyil 'khor dbus su rdo rje mthong// zla ba'i

dkyil 'khor gnyis pa yi// dbus na rdo rje dang ldan mthong// de nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa// lha rnams kun gyi rdo rjeche// rdo rje dbyi sa ni bskyed pa yi// shin tu brtan pa 'di skyes shig/ oM badzra A

ke haM// snying po dag pa blangs nas ni// rdo rje'i lus su rnam bsgoms pas// des na sra brtan khong steng med// rdo rje'i sku ni thob gyur nas// smras pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rang bdag rdo rje'i
skur mthong ngo// de nas sangs rgyas kun gsus pa// sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam par sgom// oM ya b+hasarba ta thA ga tas ba a haM// snang pa dag pa blangs nas ni//
sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam bsgoms pas// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i// kun mkhyen ye shes thob par gyur// sangs rgyas kun la rab btud nas// smras pa bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs//
mgon po bdag la byin slob cing// bdag gi byang chub brtan par mdzod// grags chen sangs rgyus thams cad kyis// rdodra dbyings kyi tshig thos nas// mgon rnams thugs kar zhugs par gyur//

@# rdo rjeyi ni rnal 'byor gsungs// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi sa ma be d+hi je rgyu badzrab n+d+ha// grags chen sangs rgyus thams cad kyis// rig sngags chen po brjod pa na// rdo rje dbyas na shin tu brtan//

tho da nyid ye shes mngon sangs rgyas// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad ni// rdo rje thugs ka nas byung ste// chos kyi dbang bskur bzhi pe ya// de tshe thub pa dbang bskur gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' byas pa yi//
byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur ba// 'bras bu byang chub sems ldan gang// rdo rjesams dpa'i dbang bskur yin// bskal pa grangs med gsum dag gi/ spyan dang sbyin pa'i 'bras bzang dang//
mkha' mtshungs ldan chen thob byed pa/ nor bu rin chen dbang bskur yin// bskal pa grang mad gsum du ni// gzhan gyis dka' ba spyad pa dang// brtson 'grus kyis ni 'bras sgrub pa// rdo rje las kyi dbang

dbang bskur yin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying bo dag/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul chen te// nyon mongs 'dam gyi ma gos pa// rdo rje pad+ma' dbang bskur yin// byang chub sems rdzogs rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi//

dbang bskur bzhi po de rnams tshes kyi dbyings// de nas gzhan yang gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba// sas rgyas rang bzhin yon tan dam pa'i tshogs// rdo dzisams dpa'i dbang bskur pas// ngo be nyid kyi sku ru

'dod// rdo rje ches kyi dbang bskur bas// lengs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ru 'dod// de rje ni chen dpad bskur bas// de bzhin mtshan dang dpe byad do// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes che// mkha' mtshungs tshes

nyid snyade po can// rdo rje las kyi dbang bskur bas// sprul pa yi ni skur 'dod do// gas nga ba bzhi yi dbang bskur bas// rdzogs sangs rgyus kyi byang nub thob// de nas ming gi dbang bskur bas// thub de
rnam snang mdzad chen gyur// chos nyid kyi da yang dag rtogs// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs par brtag/ chos kun dngos po med pa ste// mtshan ma med cing gsal byed med// mtshan nyid medacing mkha'
dngamatshus// dmigs pa rnam par spangs pa ste// rang bzhin med cing brjod du med// chos kun tshig gi spyod yul min// gzhan yang gsang bar brtags pa ste// de phyir 'dir na rtogs par brjod//
rtog pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi// chos kyi don 'datso yin brjod// bdag med dngos po yod pa min// chos rnams medatsang rtog pa med// 'on kyang chos nyid yang dag rtogs// tshes dang los spyod rdzogs
khar rtogs// rtogs pa nyams su myong bar brjod// 'di na mtshar nyid du rtogs// chos kun gzugs can min pa dang// gzugs can du yang 'di ru bstan// chos kun tshag
ga spyod yul min// sgra ru yun 'di'i bstan te// de bas ngomatshar chos 'daru// rtog pa rtog pa yin par brjod// ci phyir 'di na ngo mtshar chos// de nyid gsang ba sgrub pa'i phyir// las rnams drug kho

nyid dang ni// gzugs can tshig gi mthu dag dang// 'bras phyir sdom pa'i ngo mtshar te// de phyir 'di ni ngomatshar chos// de phyir 'di ni rtog par brjod// de bas ngo mtshar chos 'di ru// rtog pa 'ba' zhig

rtog pa yin// yang 'dir rtog pa ji lta bu// sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir// byang chub tu ni sems bskyed na// pha rol phyin drug spyod pa dang// bsten pa rtog pa nyid yin no// sgrub pa'i don ni ji lta bu//
gang zag chos las bdag mod dang// gzung dang 'dzin pa spangs pa yi// rab tu dga' ba'i sa sgrub pa// de tshe sgrub pa'i don yin no// caphyir 'di ni rgyud phyi ma// rgyud ni rgyun chags zhes bya ste/

'khor ba rgyud du 'ded pa yin// phyi ma zhes bya pha rol te// rgyud ni rgyun chags zhes bya ste// phyi ma snga ma las byung ba'i// de nyid gsang ba sbas shes ba// rgyud ni phyi mar brjod pa yin// ci phying rgyud dang phyi
ma yin// sa mthar phyin pa'i rgyal ba mchog/ srid pa'i btson ra las rgal yin// yang na gang zhig brgal gyur pa// rgyud ni phyim yin par bshad// rgyud kyi don ni ji ltar byung// sems can kun la
phan pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos longs spyod// sa sa rgyus thugs rjes bskul ba na// rgyud don yang dag byung ba yin//sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs phyung ba'i// chos dang las skyed byung ba
ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen ni// rgyud don yang dag byung ba yin/ doNi 'chang drag 'di ci zhig/ sangs rgyas gzugs kyi ma 'dul ba'i// sems can gdug tshogs de yi phyir// rang gi yi
shes byang chub sems// rdo rje drag por yang dag 'byung// drag po'i donan ltar 'byung// drag po drag po'i mig gis ni// drag po'i khro bo zhes su bstan// drag po'i las ni spyod byed rnams//
chos shing bzlog par bya ba yin// rdo rje'i ba 'di ci zhige/ gdug pa de kun btul nas ni// slar yang zhi bcu yang dag byung// de nyid rgyal po rdo rje 'chang// sems can don gyi thabs ster mdzad//

bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad ni// khro bo' dibang phyug dag tu bstan// de nyid 'o dang drag po dang// phyag na rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che// ya phyirin zhi bar brjod// sna tshogs gzugs can rnal 'byor che//
sems can sman bya 'ba' zhig phyir// nyon mongs gdul la brtser dgongs shing// zhi ba'i don na yang dag byung// phyag na rdo rje ci yi phyir// nyon mongs gdug pa nyes gzhom phyir// byang chub sems
kyirang bzhin bzang// rdo rje phyag na bsnams mdzad pa// de ni phugan rdo rjer brjod// dus gsum bdud rnams de bzhin du// mi mthun phyogs kyis mi shigs pa// byang sems rang bzhin rdo rjen//
da/ sangs rgyus kun kyi bstan pa'i tshogs// de nas sangs rgyus kun dang ldan/ gsang chen rdo rje de lta bu// phyag na rtag tu bsnams pas na// don phyag na rdo rjer brjod//
dordzogatum po'i don ci zhig/ rko rdzogatum po gnod sbyin tsho// rdo rje gnod sbyin shin tu bstan// ngargyalanyon mos zhags pa zla// byang chub sems dpa' rang byung ba// ciyi phyir na gtum por
brjod// gtum gdug drag po chen po ni// rang byung nganyid bon ste// srid pa'i zhags pa gcod byed cing// drug po'i donan gtum po yin// rdo rje khro bo ci yin brjed// gsod dang sked pa drag

po ste// da ni khro bo'i don du brjod// nga ni rdo rjem ltar 'bar// nyon mos phyogs rnams sreg byed yin// rdo rje rdo rje zhes gsus pa// ci phyir dro tshar brjod par bya// sra zhing snying po khang stong med//
gcad dang gzhig par bya ba min// bsreg par bya min 'jig med pas// stong nyid rdo rjer brjod par bya// 'gro drug 'khor le spong byed cing// sdig pa bral bar byed pa yi// byang chub sems gang de
rdo rje// nyon mongs thams cad sel bar byed// rdo rje 'chang zhes gsus 'di ci// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes dang// byang sems brtan pa gang yin pa// de ni rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// de bzhin
gshags pa kun gyi bdag/ de yi rdo rje ji lta bu// rtog pa thams cad dang bral zhing// chos sku 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa// chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid// stong pa nyid ni rdo rjer brjod// gzugs
@sogs chos kyi rang bzhin gang// 'gyur ba med pa'i de bzhin nyid// chos kyi dbyi sa na brtan pa ga nga// de lta bu ni 'di rdo rje// rdo rje rigs kyi don 'dici/ khan 'ang don yod de bzhin nyid//
'gyur ba med cing skya ba med// 'gag mad de khon nyid gang// de lta bu 'di rje yin// don yod 'gyur ba med pa yi// de lta bu yi rigs gyur ba// byang chub sems dpa'i rigs su brjod//
de'i rdo rje'i rigs zhes bya// thog ma tha ma med pa'i chos/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes su brjod// bden zhing slu ba med pa yi// byang chub sems gang da rigs yin// dojo 'chang ba rnams ni
du// phyogs rnams thams cad kun khyab pa// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa na// chos dbyings dang mnyam thug pa med// rdo rje'achang rnams de snyad do// rdo rje'i rigs kun gang gi yin/
chos kyi bdag po bla med pa// rnam par snang mdzad rdzogs sangs rgyas// mgon des yongs su gzung ba de'i// de yi dkyil 'khor yin gsus pa// ston pa gang zhig 'di rnams su'i// rjes su
ston par byed pa gang// de yi spyod lam bya ba rtsi// gsang ba kun tu bsdus pas gsungs// 'di yi ston pa byang chub sems// rjes su ston byed shes rab thabs// phyag rgya rnams ni spyod lam ste//
sngags rnams de ya bya ba yi// rdo rje 'chang gi rigs gang yin// rdo rje 'chang ba de kun gyi// rigs nabyang chub soms yin te// byang chub sems dpa' brtul zhugs bzang// sa sa rgyas kyi yang de
nyid yul// chen po gnas gang zhig na gnas// ches rnams kun la gnas med de// rtsa ba mad soms sred pa la lo// ches rnams thams cad gzugs na len// chos kyi dbyes

ka te spyod yul med// rigs ni rnam pa du yin brjod// rigs ni rnam pa brgyad gsungs te// mdo ru bsdun rnam pa lnga// sangs rgyus rje rje rin chen dang// chos dang las dang rnam pa lnga// piyi phyir na rigs
su brjod// mchog dang dman pa'i phyi brag gis// rigs zhes bya ba de rnam gnyis// sems can lam ngan zhugs pa yi// rigs ni dman pa yin par brjod// lam ngan 'ge ba spangs nas ni// byang chub
sems la 'jug pa chos// de bas rdo rje rigs brjod pa// rigs de yang nilnga pa yin// rigs bdag rang bzhin rang ca zhig/ byang chub sems ni rgyal po che// rdo rje sems dpa' 'jigs pa med//
mgon po chen po rigs kyi bdag// de na rigs kyang lnga pa yin// ci yi phyir na sems dpar brjod// sems dpa' zhes bya rnam gsum ste// byis pa de bzhin mkhas pa dang// de bzhin byang chub sems
dpa' dang// rnam gsum sems pa'i brjed par bya// yang gsungs pa/ ci yi phyir na sams par brjod// sems dpa' ci yin byas pa brjod// sems dpa' mkhas pa nga yi phyir// byang chub sems
[” ]dpa' ci yin brjod// gnas gang zhig tu brjed du ba// de ni de ya sems dpar brjod// chos sam yang na chos min dang// legs byas nyes par byas pa la// mi shes mun pas bsgribs rgyur cing///
chos la nyon mos bdag nyid 'dzin// dmana'ang gtimug rigs can gyur// de lta bu na byis par brjod// nyon mos kun la chags pa dang// de bzhin srid pa n gnas o nga gsum// mi shes mun pa la
chags pa// de 'di'i byis ba'i brjod par bya// sems dpa' mkhas pa gang zhig yin// drim las 'das nyon mo sa spong// rnal 'byor ldan zhing brtul zhugs tshe// mi shes ling tog 'joms byud pa//
du nasems dpa' mkhas par brjod// 'dir ni byang chub sems dpa' gang// chos kyi de nyid rtogs gyuracing// 'khor ba'i gnas nas sang 'gyur te// sems can rnams ni sad byed pa// de ni byang chub
sems dpar brjod// rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam pa du// de la byang chub rnam gsum ste// dman dang mchog dang bar ma 'o// dman pa nyan thos sams yin// bar ma rang rgyal byang chub bo// mchog ni

byang chub sems yin te// de ni mi 'gyur rdo rdo yin// sku gsung thugs rnams bzhag pa gang// byang chub mchog tu brjod par bya// ci phyir rdo rje sems dpa' yin// byang chub mchog gi ye shes gang// de ni

rdo rje nges par brjod// ye shes rdo sde las byung ba// de na rdo rje sems dpar brjod// rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi rgyal// ci yi phyir na sems dpar brjod// rdo rje sems dpa' mgon po che// dga' chen 'dan
chags sam ci// sems can thams cad dgrol ba'i phyir// sems can rnams la chags pa ste// den rdo rje 'dzani rgyal po// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes su bsgrags// byang chub sems kyi 'bras bu ni//
da/ sangs rgyas ye shes bla med gang// de ni rdo rjesems rang bzhin// chos dang las skyed sprul pa'o// rdo rje rgyal po re yin brjod// rdo rje rigs kun rgyal po ste// rdo rje lcags
kyu zhes su brjod// dgug dang dbab pa'i rdo rjen// de na rdo rje rgyal po brjod// bsdu ba ya ni dngos po bzhi// bam ldan 'das kyis gang spyad pa/ sems can dgug pa'i thebs zhes pa// rdo rje rgyal por
yang dge chung// rdo rje chags pa 'di don ci// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byed pa// rjes su chag pa zhes su brjod// rdo rje chags pa bdud chen po// den de rje chags par brjod// sems can sman phyir

bcom ldan gyi// gang tshe byang chub spyod pa spyad// byang chub spyod pa rjes chags pa// rdo rje chags par yang dag 'byung// rdo rje legs pa ci yin brjod/9sa rgyas thams cad mnyes byed cing// legs so
zhes bya rab ster byed// byang chub sems dpa' kun mgu byed// de ni rdo rje legs par brjod// sems can dag pa mgu byed cing// rdo rje 'chang rnams sgrub par byed// sems can mkhas rnams dga'
byed cing// gsang ba 'dzin ba ra sa par byed// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sku'i phyir// bcom ldan 'das 'di tshos rnam drug/ gang gi rin sngon sgrubs pa// rdo rje legs par yang dag byung//

de rje rin chen ceya phyir// byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa gang// mkha' mnyam se chen lta bu ste// rdo rje rin chen skal ba che// de ni rdo rje zhe chen brjod// sems dpa' chen po'i debang bskur te// ]

sems can ku zhu gyi dbang bskur ba// byang nub snying po'i debang bskur gyis// rgyal ba'i sras rnams 'dzin par byed// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyin pa gang// mkha' mtshus rdo rje yang dag byung// de ni rin chen
don yod de// de ni de rje rin chen brjod// ma rig lange tog 'khor ba yi// mi shes mun pa 'joms byed cing// tha pa'i snang ba gzi brjid che// de ni rdo rje gzi brjid do// ci phyir rdo rje rgyal mtshan

yin// rgyu la mtshan sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin// thar ba lam 'gro rgyal mtshan te// chos kyi rgyal mtshan rgyal mtshan che// de ni rdo rje rgyal mtshan brjod// rdo rje bzhad pa ci yin brjod// rnal 'byor chen po
rdo rje bzhad// sas rgyas thams cad bzhud byed cing// byang chub sems dpa' kun dbugs 'byin// de na rdo rdzo bzhi d par brjod// ciya phyir na rdo rje chos// rnal 'byor chen po sangs rgyas chos// sas
rgyas sems can rtogs byed pa// dag pa de bzhin gshegs snying po// den rdo rje chos su brjod// rdo rje rnon po cayon brjod// shes rab rnon po ye shes che// shin tu sdug pa'i nyon mongs gcod// shes

bya'i sgrib pa'i ng gcod pas na// de na rdo rje rnon por brjod// dom rgyu yi denaci zhig/ 'khor lasas rgyas gar byed pas// chos kyi 'khole shin tu brtan// dam chos 'o yi bcud las byung// de ni rdo rje rgyu zhes

bya/ rdo rje zla ba ci yin brjod// sa sa rgyas kun gyi chos chen po// mkha' mtshungs tshig dang bral ba ste// tshig mad tshig las yang dag byung// don jo rdzi sna ba brjod// ci yi phyir na rdo rje las// sems can
smin dang grol ba yi// sas rgyas kun gyi las gang dang// sas rgyas lasan bdag med pa// den rdo rje las zhes bya// rdorjesung ba ci yin brjod// byang chub sems dpa'i srung ba/

[！/ ：]theg pa dman pa sbyong byed cing// rtsa mo nas lta srung byed pa// de na rdo rje srung bar brjod/ derdzoganod sbyin 'di don su// sdig pa thams cad 'ad byed cing// nyon mongs thams cad sa par gcod//
srid pa za byed gnod sbyin che// den rdo rjeganod sbyin brjod// rdo rje khu tshur yin brjod// bden zhing gzhan min de bzhin nyid// 'gyur med dakho na nyid gang// sangs rgyus de bzhin nyid ye shes//

ra/ de ni rdo rje khu tshur brjod// sngon du byang chub sems 'gyur gang// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag byung/ bsdu ba'i de ngos po bzhi po ni// rdo rje rgyal por yang dag byung// sems can smin byed chags pa'o//
byang chub spyod pa legs pa ste// de nyid ces bya dam tshig tshe// byung chub sems las yang dag byung// ston gyi sbyin pa'i spyod gyur gang// de na rdo rje rin chen brjod// sems can kun la mi 'jigs
sbyin// don rdo rje gzi brjid brjod// 'byung po kun la byams pa ni// rdo rje rgyal mtshan yang dag byung// chos kyi sbyin pa bshad pa ste// dbang bskur ba por brtan pa yin// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi
ting 'dzin gang// de chos ni de las byung// nyon mongs gcod byed rdo// rdo rjenon por yang dag byung// mngon shes dang ni mthu la sogs// dan rdo rje rgyu ru brjod// gzus la sogs pa grub pa
ba ni rdorjesmra bar yang dag byung// ye shes chen po ches chen po// dam tshig ces bya'i dga' chen po// ye shesa mngon par rtogs tedag/ rje rjernyes las yang dag byung// brtson 'grus pha rel na rgyal

po rdo rje las su yang dag byung// theg pa dmanapa sbyong byed pa// de phyir rdo rje srung bar brjod// nyon mos srid pa'i gdon chen po// rdo rje gnod spyin yang dag byung// de nyid ye shes mngon byang chub
de nyid rdo rje khu tshur brjod// las kyi dam tshig bzhi po ste// las kyi sems dpa'i bdag nyid chu// las kyi 'khor lo las byung ba/rdo las ni de las byung// gzhan yang/ byang chub sems
na bskyod pa las// rdo rjesams dpa' yang dag byung// rdo rje rang bzhin sems de yang// rnam pa bzhi ru byung ba ste// sgrol ba dang ni grol ba dang// dbugs 'byin mya ngan 'das 'god byed// sems dpa'
rgyal po chags pa che// derje legs par yang dag byung// bsod nams ye shes tshogs nyid las/ rdodzarin chen rab tu bsgrags// bsod nams rang bzhin rin chen de// rnam bzhi ji skad bshad pa
bzhin// ye shes kyi ni tshogs brjod pa// de ni rdo rje chos zhes bya// ye shes rang bzhin chos de yang// rnam pa bzhi'i niyang dag byung// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa nyid// de na rdo rje las su

brjod// brtson 'grus rang bzhin las de yang// rnam pa bzhir niyang dag byung// brtson dang sbyong ba zhes bya dang// so sor rtog dang sgrub pa ste// brtson 'grus de bzhin las bzhi po// de las mthar gyi byung
ba yin// sems dpa' 'di rnams gang las byung// rdo rje sems sogs de bzhin du// byang chub sems las yang dag byung// pha rol phyin drug spyod pa las// rdo rjecan rnams

za byung bar 'dod// de bzhin pha dang ma ni gang// ma ni shes rab pha rol phyin// pha ni thabs la mkhas pa ste// pad+ma las ni sangs rgyas sras//rdo rje can rnams gang las byung// rdo rje rgyal po de bzhin

chags// rdo rje rin chen rgyal mtshan dang// rdo rje chos dang de bzhin no// de rnams shes rab gtso bor bstan// rdo rjesams dpa' rdo rje legs// gzi brjid de bzhin bzhed pa nyid// rgyudang smra ba sems
dpa' che// de rnams thabs las byung ba yin// rdo rje las dang rdo rje srung// gnod sbyin de bzhin khu tshur nyid// shes rab thabs su grags pa ste// bstan pa chen po tshogs bshad// rdo rje'i rigs

rnams kun gyi gtso// rdo rje lcags kyu ma ru bshad// rdo rje rin chen mchog gyur pa// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhi tha// phani rdo rje rgyal po rgyu/ man rdo rje rnon po ste// pad+ma'i rigs chen bzang po yi//
pad 'dzin gang las byung ba'o// rdo rje gzi brjid rin rgyun 'a// spyiratshanam yA na par bstan// ner pu rigs lang po yi// rin chen gang las byung ba'o// pha ni rgyal po rdo rje las// ma ni gnod sbyin
srung ba ste// las kyi rigs nyen bzang po yi// las rnams gang las byung ba'o// dang po gang zhig ci zhe na// dngos kun dang po sa bon te// rdo rje can kun dang po sams// 'dun dang bran dang ting nge
'dzin// rigs rnams kun gyi dang por bshad// yang gleng gzhi ci yin zhe na// rigs bzhi las ni yang dag byung// tshangs pa'i gnas chen dang ldan pa// sAng rdzobadag nyid can rnams kyi/
snying rdzachan po gling ga yin// dmigs pa gang zhig yin zhin// rtog pa mdacing dmigs pa med// dang po'i byang chub sems byung ba'i// pha rol phyin pa mchog drug ni// de yi dmigs pa
yin par bshad// rkyen gang zhin/ rtag tu srid gsum man dga' ba// sems can sdug bsngal gyur bltas nas// ngedang na ldan pa yi// byang chub sems kyi bskul ba'o// gsang ba 'di na gang
du byung// 'og min stug po nyams dga' zhing// stug po'i zhing khams 'jig med pa// donas sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos// rdzogs par longs spyod tshul 'di byung// khyab bdag 'di rnams gang nas
byung// de rje rin chen mchog chen gyi// gzhal yas khang pa yid 'ong zhing// sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos ldan ng// de nas khyab bdag 'di rnams byung// thog ma tha ma med 'dici// gsang ba'i dbang phyug
chen pos gsungs// sems can kun gyi shes pa dang// de bzhin gshags pa'i snying po gang// chos dbyings rdo rje chen po ste// thog ma tha ma med par bshad// rab tu dga' ba nyid 'di ci// bde chen rab

tu grub bya'i phyir// sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med// rdo rjesams dpa' rgyal po cha// rab tu dga' ba nyid ces bshad// rab bzang nyid ni ji lta bu// dngos po kun mchog rdo rjen// byang chub kyi ni sems
dazhes brjod// sangs rgyas skyed byed bzang po yi// rdo rjer ba bzang nyid ces bshad// jo tsha snying bdag ji lta bu// gdul bya 'phags pa'i skyes mchog nyid// de ni rdo rje snying po
brjod// de rnams bdag po rgyal po ni// rdo rje snying pa'i bdag por bshad// ciyi phyir na kun tu bazang// byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ldan pa'i// 'gro ba srid pa'i skye gnas gang// de kun rtag tu

bzang bas na// kun tu bzang por brjod par bya// sde tsho de rje 'chang ba gang// byang chub sems gang de rdo rje// rdo rje gang du rdo rje 'chang// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// rdo rje dodza 'chang bar brjod// dang po'i

ragasan ji ltar byung// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi sa/ grags chen rdzogs par byang chub pa// den dang po'i rigs byung ste// de kho na nyid rig las so// yang n rab tu ma(las pa rnams// bskal
pa grangs med 'a sa nas ni// rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob gang// de ni dang po'arigs byung yin// chos kun skye ba med pa dang// 'byung ba ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// de nyid rtogs shing shes pa yis// chos
rnams thams cad rtog pa med// chos dang gang brag bdag med las// rigs de byung ba nyid du 'dod// chos rnams 'ga' yang skye ba med// chos rnams 'gag par 'gyur ba med// rnam par rtog pa nyer zhi
gang// de nyid sas rgyas rigs chen yin// byang chub sems dpa' mi yin brjod// chos rnams thams cad rtogs pa dang// 'khor ba'i gnas las sadagyur cing// sems can rnams kyis rtogs byed pa//

de na byang chub sems dpar brjod// ci phyir sangs rgyas brjod par bya// de bzhin nyid bden shin tu brtan// de kho na nyid gang rtogs nas// chos kun rtogs pa zhes bya gang// de ni rtogs pas sangs rgyas
brjod// de bzhin gshegs pa su yin brjod// chos kyi de bzhin yang dag gnas// slar yang gzhan du ma 'gyur zhing// de nyid lam niston byed pa// de ni de bzhin bshegs zhes bya// bcom ldan 'das ni
ci yin brjod// las dang nyon mos de bzhin skye// de bzhin nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib// mi mthun phyogs kyi chos rnams gang// de bcom pas na bcom ldan brjod// de yi bcom pa ci yin brjod//
bcom ldan de bzhin bcom par brjod// 'dod pa'i 'dod chags gcod byed cing// nyon mongs 'joms shing pham byed pa// de na de yi bcom par brjod// de bzhizhi ston pa'i ston pa spyi// nyon mongs

bdud sogs gcod byed cing// skye dgu ma lus thabs chen gyis// ngan 'gro srid las skyob byed pa// ston pa'i ston pa'i brjod pa yin// ci yi phyir na ye shes brjod// de nyid shes pas ye shes te// slar yang
chos su rtog ba mno// rtag dang chad pa spong byed cing// 'chi med de bzhin ya shes yin// shes rab ya shas cayin brjod// rnam pa mang po shes byed cing// rtogs pas sdug bsngal las grol byed//
kun nas nyon mongs chos spob// shes rab ye shes zhes su brjod// caphyi'i shes rab brjod par bya// rab sbyor sbyor ba shes 'gyur zhing// khyad par duni rtogs par byed// bden pa de bzhin nyid
shes pa'i// shes rab shes rab ces su bshad// shes rab pha rol phyin donaci// nyan thos rang rgyal phyi rol gyi// shes rab las ni bla mar brjod// de bzhin nyid gzhol pha rol/

phyin// shes rab pha rol phyin zhes bshad// tshul zhes bya don ci yin ng rjod// nan dgag pa'i don chen tu// dngos med dngos po med min pas// gang du dri ma med gyur pa// de ni de yi tshul du brjod/ tipa/
'dzin don 'di ci yin brjod// chos kun dngos po med ces pa'i// mnyam pa nyid du rab gnas pa'i// shes rab can gyis lhag par bstan// sems la dmigs par brjod par bya// ciyi phyir na bsam/
gtan brjod// sdug bsngal thams cad skyed byed cing/ nyon mongs dra la rab 'joms pa'i// shes rab bcas par soms pa ni// srid pa 'joms par byed pa'i mchog/ rnal 'byor don ni ci yin brjod/
chos rgya chen po dam pa dang// zab mo'i mchog tu gyur pa des// kun shes kun rig ldan 'byor pa'i// rnal 'byor du ni brjod par bya// rnal 'byor pa ni ci yin brjod// shes rab kyis ni sa semA
a pa rnal 'byor rnal 'byor don sems[=]shing// sems sun kun gyi don sems gang// de ni rnal 'byor pa don brjod// nga na kun gyi rgyal po che// thams cad rig cing thams cad ster// rdo rje 'chang

chen dang po ste// bde baya ni rgyu 'di yis// de bzhin nga ni 'jig rten gsum// khams gsum rnal 'byor rig pa'i mchog/ de bzhin 'khor ba mya ngan 'das// bde 'gro dang ni ngan 'gro dang// 'dod pa lnga la
las sprod yin// srid gsum 'di yi don zhig/ sems can kun gyi sems gang yin// srid pa gsum du brjod par bya// 'dod dang gzugs dang gzugs med las// 'di ltar thams cad rig pa
mchog bdag med byed pa bo yang chod// chos kyang yod pa ma yin te// dge dang mi dger byed pa yi// bag chags kyis na kun tu basgribs// chos ni thog med dus can te// byed pa po ni yod ma yin//
rtog pas nyams pa ba sems ldan pas// rgyu dang 'bras bur mthong bar 'gyur// kun gzhi sa bon thams cad pa// de na chos kun skyed par byed// bsgos shing bag chags dang ldan pa// de ni srid pa gsum
zhes bya// 'dod pa'i las skyes khams gsum gyi// rgyur na kun gzhi de nyid snang// gzugs dang gzugs med 'gro ba yi/ chos rnams kun gyi gnas kyang yin// chos kun rnam par dag pa'i phyir//

nyes pa kun dang bral ba ste// thog ma med 'byung chos snying po// blo bur dri mas nyon mo ngas 'gyur// ngan khe na chos chen po// ngani chos kyi snying por bshad// de bas nga ni rgyal po// pan srid pa
gsum du bsgrags// 'jig rten gsum ni ci yin brjod// 'dod pa 'jig rtan de bzhin gzugs// gzugs med pa yi skye dgu rnams// 'jig rten gsum po zhes pa de// rang byung dra nyid kho na
yin// 'dod pa zhes bya chos chen te// dag pa btsal bar bya ba'i phyir// gzung 'dzin chos rnams zhes bya bgi/ de bzhin nyid las so sor rtog/ chos kyi dbyings dang dbyer med phyir// ngani
// chos de dag par byed// de bas nga ni rgyal pos// 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag por bstan// ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin gzugs// de bzhin gzugs med rab tu bsgrags// stong
pa nyid dang dbyer med pas// pasnying po'i bdag por bshad// khams gsum pa yi don ci zhig/ 'dod khams de bzhin gzugs khams dang// gzugs med pa ni nyid dag dang// khams gsum
bzang po 'di dgun/ rang byungang nyadi kho na yin// 'di ni khams dang rgyu dang don// khams gsum gyi ni rgyusams pa// stong dang mtshan ma med bshad mi// smon pa med pa nga nyid bstan// 'khor ba'i

donan cozhig yani// byis pa rnams ni kun tu 'byung// de bzhinayang dang yang du 'khor// 'khor ba dag pa'i bdag nyid do// rang byung nyid kho na yin// gang la 'kher pa yod pa yi// chos ni rdul tsam yod ma
yi// yang dag ma yin kun brtags phyir// den thog mtha' med pa yin// med gang de ni stong pa ste// stong pa nyid gang nga nyid do// de bas 'khor ba de nyid ni rdo rje 'chang rgyal
nganyid bsgrags// mya ngan 'dus pa ci yin barjod// gang zhig de bzhin nyid rtog stong// ben bzhi rang bzhin bzang po nyid// mtshan nyidad ngan dengos po gzugs// mtshan ma nyid kyang rnam par spangs//

tshag dang sgra yis gzung bya min// rnam par rtog pa yod ma yin// de bas mya ngan 'das sgra ru// panyid kho na rab shes bya// de yi rtag pa'i don ci zhig/ rtag nyid rtag la 'byung gnas te// rnam par rtog/

pa dang sbrul gdung// rtag pa de nyid kho nani// mya ngan 'das pa'i sgra ru bsgrags// 'jig pa yang ci yin brjod// gang zhig 'khor bar mi 'jug cing// thams cad mi rtag pa nyid dang// sdug bsngal 'byung
'gog byed pa yi// 'jig pa mya ngan 'das sgra yin// dag pa yang ni ciyon brjod// yod pa 'am yin med pa'i ng min// brjod bya rjod byed ma yin min// dug pa mya ngan 'das nyid yin// theg pa
chen po de yin brjod// sangs rgyas thamasacad gshegs gyur cing// theg pa kun las nges rgyal ba// yang dag gyur pasems can ni// theg pa chen po zhes su bstan// mthu dang las rnams
'jug pa dang/ tshogs rnams rnal 'byor ngo mtshar rnams// rgya zhes pa theg chen tu// sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo mtshar mchog/ nam mkha'i don ni ci zhig yin// sa nyid kyang n ci yon brjod//
'byung ba med cing rdzas kyang med// skye ba med cing 'chi ba med// dus gsum dngos po dang bral mchog/ nam mkha' zhes pa'i sgyu ru bstan// yang dang yang du skye ba dang// de bzhin nyon mos kun
bdag nyid// gras med dpag med dang bral ba// de nas nyid brjod par bya// 'byung ba chen po gang las byung// 'gog pa ciyone gang gis byed// ma rig nyon mos la sogs las// 'byung ba chen
po yang dag 'byung// sa bon kun ldan kun gzhin// phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid 'dod// gnas ni yongs su gyur pa dang// kun gzhi sa na mi 'byung zhing// rtog ba thams cad dang bral ba// 'byung ba
chen po 'gog pa yin// rtog chen po'i rgyal po mchog tu gsang zhing sbas pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud rdo rje rtse mo las shin tu gsang ba stug po'i tshogs kyi las thams cad
bsdus ba ste drug pa las/ sems dpa' b.rudrug gi bshad pa zhes bya ba bshad pa'i dang po rdzogs so///ci yaphyilen phyag rgyar brjod// gang gis phyag rgya bcings gyur pa//
nasrogortags gtsug kun dang// 'gro ba sdig can thams cad dang// rtag targyas ni btab par 'gyur// mi phyi'i sngags su brjod par bya// gsang sngags rnams ni 'bod byed cing// gdug pa thams cad
spyod pa 'byed// nyonamos sngags rnams 'joms byed cing// sangs rgyas chos ni spyan 'dren yin// ci phyir zhe na rig sngags brjod/ 'dod chags mun pa rnams 'dul zhing// nyon mongs rnams kyang rnam

ts+tshA par 'bul// ma rig pa ni zlog byed pa// de na rig sngags legs par brjod// gzus sngags rnamAni ci yin brjod// chos rnams kyi ni rten byed cing// srid nga 'i phyogs ni rab 'joms byed// sangs rgyas

chos rnams thob byed cing// dge ba la rten sbyin pa'i ng yin// phyag rgyu yi ni mtshan nyid brjod// sangs rgyas kun dang brtul zhugs ldan// byang chub sems dpa rnams dang ni// rdo rje 'chang ba thams cad

dag/ spyod lam phyag rgyas mtshon par byed// sngags rnams kyi ni mtshan nyid kyang// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs yin te// chos kyi snying po sgrub byed cing// chos kyi dbyings dang yang dag ldan// sngags
kyi mtshan nyid yin par brjod// rig sngags kyin mtshan nyid gsungs/ 'khor bar myong ba'i sdug bsngal dang// 'dod chags la sogs nyes pa'i tshogs// 'gas dang bcas pa zhi byed pa'i// rig sngags
kyi mtshan nyid brjod// de bzhin kho nar gzungs sngags kyi// sangs rgyas chos rnams 'dzin byed cing// chos rnams 'dzin par byed pa dang// dge ba zhes bya 'dzin byed pa// gzungs sngags kyi namtshan/

nyid brjod// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i gnas na gang// ji ltar bcing ba thub chen po// phyag rgya dag na 'ching ba na// ji ltar rdo rjecan kun mnyes// dang po kho nar khrus bya zhing// de bzhin phyogs dag bcug

dang// log 'dren rnams kyang bcing bya ste// gos dag gtsang ma bgo bya zhing// grong dang yul 'khor dag dang ni// grong khyer dang ni grong rdal rnams// de yi dbus su phyag rgya dang// nam yang bcing bar
mi bya ste// lha khang yang n dgon pa'i m// ri bo yin phug dag gam// rnam pa sna tshogs kyis dben zhing// 'du 'dzamed pa'i gnas gtsang ma// der ni skyil krung bca' bar bya// bkra shis skyil krung
nyid bya ste// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' yis// byang chub snying por bcings pa bzhin// der ni mig dag btsum bya zhing// so la so gzhag par bya// mnuganyis dag kyang mnyam bya zhing/

dran pa rtse gcig byas nas kyang// sbyor mdasbyor ba'i sngags bzla zhing// phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya// phyag rgya'i rnam pa de lta bu '/ bcis pas rdo dzacan kun mnyis// rig sngags ji ltar bzla bar bya//
dbang phyug chen po gsang ba gsungs// rig sngags dag ni bzlas pa// ji ltar yid kyis jo rdzobazlos// skyil krung ji lta ba bzhin bya// dran dang yid na ma yes pas// rig sngag/
dag ni bzla bya zhing// sku nyid kyang ni bsam par bya// mchu yis ma yin lces kyang min// dkan nyid kyis kyang ma yin te// lce dang lkog mas kyang ma yin// rtag tu snying kha nas kyang min// shin tu
phra ba'i yid kyis ni// sems na chos nyid nang chud bya// de ltar bzlas pa byas nas ni// yid kyis rdo rje bzlas pa yin// o nang zhig yin par bshad// mchog dang nor ster dpal dang g.yang//
skal bzang rnam pa dang ldan zhing// dam bca' ba dang bkra shis don/ nor bu 'dzin pa'i snyingapo yin// yi ge hU~Mn ciyin brjod// sdug bsngal 'chos shing 'joms par byed// srid pa'i zhags pa
gcod byed cing// gdug pa dngangs shing bsod byed pa'i// hU~Mn mchog tudran ng ra bya// yi ga phaTani ci yin brjod// gdug dang sdug bsngal 'joms byed cing// bde ba dag ni 'gugs par byed// phaT
ni 'joms byed sgra yin te// grogs dang bcas pa 'joms par byed// sa hA zhes pa ci yin brjod// sdig pa thams cad zhi byed cipa// dge ba'i tshogs ni 'phel bar byed// nyes par byas pa
'phrog byed cing// sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms pa'i mchog/ mchod pa ci phyir brjod par bya// mchod par byed pas mchod pa ste// gang du gsad bya mi 'jigs pa'i// dayi mchod pa rnam mang
'gyur// phyi rol gyi ni mchod pa minA// 'di ni sangs rgyus kun gyis mchod// de bzhin dun thob pa'i mchog/ gsang ba'i mchod pa de rnams ni/ 'jigs med rgyal sras rnams kyis ni// sangs rgyas
kun gyi rang bzhin dang// nyid kyi sras kyi mtshungs med pa'i// chog sgrub pa'i gsang ba ni// rtag tu rig pa 'dzin pa'i mchog/ de bzhin dam tshig shes nyid kyang// zhugs pa gang dang gang yin pa//
de ni dam tshug shes ba yin// dam tshig khroms par byed pa yang// dumatshig shes pa yin par brjod// bsal pa grangs med 'das pa yi// byang chub sems dang mtshungs par 'gyur// gsang
ba'i dmatshig la zhugs pa// de yi dam tshig shes par brjod// ciya phyican dkyil 'khor yin// dam pa'i chos kyi bcud snying po// 'byung bas de ni dkyil 'khor brjod// dkyil 'khor
chen po gsang ba che// chos chen shan tu bstan pa'o// dkyil 'khor chog ji lta bu// chog chos dang rnal 'byor te// gusang ba'i thar pa yang dag 'byung// skye ba 'di nyid kho na la/ rab dga' sgrub
par byed pa'i mchog/ dkyil 'khor du na zhugs pa yi// skyes pa'i m yang na bud med kyis// bya ba gang zhig bya bani// gsungs shig gsang ba'i dbang phyug che// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs
'gro dang/ byang chub sems chen bskyed pa dang// de bzhin du ni sgrub pa'i mchog/ gne tu brtan par bya ba yin// thub pa'i dkyil 'khor zhugs pa la// sdom pa ji ltar sbyin par bya// khyod kyi
srog chags gsang mi bya// ma byin par yang blang mi bya/ 'dod pas log par g.yem mi bya// brdzun du yang ni smra mi bya// nyes pa kun gyi rtsa ba yi// ma dag 'thung ba sbyang/
bar bya// bya ba ma yin thams cad dor// mchog tu sems can gadul bar bya// dam pa rnams la rim gro dang// rnal 'byor pa rnams bsnyen bkur bya// rnal 'byor rig par sgrub pa'i phyir// mkhas
pa rnams la brten par bya// lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang// ngag gi yang ni rnam pa bzhi// yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag kyang// cinus par ni bsrung bar bya// slob dpon brnyas par mi bya ste// bla

skyim sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs// sngags dang phyag rgya rnams la yang// nam yang nus par mi bya'o// 'khor le rdordzapad+ma sogs// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya gang yin pa// 'gom pa nyid du mi bya zhing//
bza' bar yang ni mi bya'o// de bzhin dman ma lha ya grib// rkang pa dag gis brtsi mi bya// de yi steng du 'jug mi bya// slar yang gzhag nga ra mi bya'o// lha yi phyag mtshan bzang po dang// lha yi
bzhon pa'i mtshan ma rnams// ma gom zhing brnyas par mi bya ste// sems can la ni gnod mi bya// de yis srog gi phyir yang ni// 'dob mi bya gang zhig yin// 'tsho ba'i srog gi phyir yang ni//
byang chub sems ni dor mi bya// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya ni// nam yang dor bar ma bya 'o// dkon mchog gsum la dad pa yang// rnam pa kun tu gtang mi bya// sdom pa gtang bar mi bya zhing// bdag
wa nyid gdung bar mi bya 'o// khrus kyi las ni ji ltar bya// mi dge bcu na sbas nas su// dge ba bcunasnyen byed cing// 'byung po rnams la phan 'dod pa// nang gi bdag nyid khrus su 'dod// bdag nyid
rab tu dag bya'i phyir// bdag nyid phyag rgyas rgyas gdab phyir// phyag rgya thams cad yang dag bcing// rnal 'byor pa yi khrus su brjod// gsang ba'i mkhas ldan khas len pa'i// chu yi khrus ni bya

ba ste/ las 'di rnam par rtog pa'i khrus// rdo rje slob dpon bdag gis bya// yang na ro gas khrus bya ba// mchog tu ngo mtshar bshad bya ste// dang por bdag nyid go bgo zhing// khro bo yang ni dran par bya/
don kun rab tu sgrub byed pa'i// yig gnyis gom bzang po yani// jordzaganod sbyin drag chen dang// khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ste// oM badzra kI li kI la badzrahU~M phan/ oM tuM/ go cha'o// oM hUM A/

rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi'o// oM a mr-i te hUM phaT/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'o// rdo rje'i gsang sngags 'di de pan// rdo rje 'bar ba'i phyag rgyayis// rdo rje'abar rab bzod dka' bas// bdag nyid dag ni 'bar bar
bya orlu pa glu pa kA ya d+hA pa pra dz+wa la ni swAt+ta// nuyi nang du 'jug pa dang// snyim pa gsum ni blugs pa dang// sangs rgyas kun gyi rigs dag la// rig sngags 'di ni 'don pa yin// rig sngags
mngon par bozlas pa yi// sa yi phung po gsum dag ni// bdag gi stod dang smad dang dbus// rab tu dag byed mchog yin no// o b+huny+tsadza la hU~M/ sangs rgyas thams cad rjes dran pas//
rig sngags thams cad mngon bzlas pa'i// dun phyag rgyakun gyis blang// 'ag sngags 'di ni gsang bar 'dod// phyogs ni ji ltar bcing ba yin// me lha rgyal chen shar
phyogs su// lho yi phyogs su gshin rje dang// nub tu rlung lha nyid dang ni// byang du ru lcagazhom par 'dod// rnal 'byor pa yis gzugs bzhin// phyogs bzhi dag tu nges par bcing// de nas
steng 'og mtshams rnams su// rdo rje nag mos nges par gcod// bgegs bcing ba ni ji ltar lags// rdo rje khu tshurarab 'bar dang// rdordzanyim ltar 'bar dang// rdo rje spun gyi phyag rgyayas// bgeg

bcing ba ni brtan par 'gyur// dga' ba chen po pa lta bu// rab tu gus bcas phyag dag bya// phyag rgya bzhi yis phyogs bzhi ru// lnga pa btsugs pa'i phyag rgya yis// steng du pa'og dang mtshams rnams su//
bstod dang bcas pa'i phyag bya 'o// rdo rje slob dpon skal chen gyis// mchog tu gsang ba'i dam pa yis// brtsegs pa'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du// de bzhin du ni bcing bar bya// mchod pa ji ltar
yin zhen// rig sngags mngon par bzlas mchod dang// phyag rgya bcing ba lhur len dang// rnal 'byor sgom pa mchod pa dang// sgrub pa dag gi mchod pa'o// sbyin sreg las ni jilta bu// lus
kyi las ni rnam gsum dag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang// yid kyi rnam pa gsum dog dang// bsreg bya sbyin sreg mchog yin no// rdo rje rnal 'byor las byung ba'o// de nas rdo rje rig 'dzin gyi// snyang pa
pha0 gsang ba kun bsdus pa'i// shin tu smras pa dam pa'i mchog/ de kho na nyid bshad par bya// rdo rje slob dpon spyod chen ldan// dkyil 'khor gsang bar rab tu zhugs// slob dpon las ni dbang
bskur thob// gosang dang dgongs pa kun shes shing// dpa' zhing brtan la brtson 'grus che// ya du gzhus 'dzin cing gsal bar ldan// dul drang bshes gnyen can dag gis// rdo rje slob
dpon nyid bya'o// dang po srid+de tshogs bar du// zla ba 'am yang n zla ba phyed// yang na lo yi bar du ni// rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad par bya// gal te de nas s rgyas kyi// rig 'dzin grub pa
rnam gsum mo// ste rdo rjecan gyi yin// nam pa gsum du nges pa yin// nor bu rigs can bzang po la// rnal 'byor bzhi po nyid bya 'o// mis pad+ma 'byung ba la// rnal 'byor bzhi ni rab tu sgrug/
pas las kyi rang bzhin bzang// las rnams kun gyi rigs las ni// sbyor ba bzhin yang dag byung// rnam pa bco brgyad dag tu 'gyur// snga dro phyi dro nyi phyod dang// nam gyi gung smad gung la ni//
bya ba chen po kun bya ste// de bzhin sas rgyas rdo rje'i rigs// dang porar zhag rnal bye ches// tshonapos phyogs kun phyag bya ste// rdo rje rnal 'bye chog yis// rdo rjeslob dpon nyid bya 'o// shes

rab chen po sas rgyas kun// yang dang yang du dran bya ste// bdag nyid chen po sangs rgyas kun// rdo rje'i sngags kyis bskul bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza pa pra brtan ya At+manaM nir ta ya mi/
sarba ta thA ga ta badzrasatAa d+haM tiSh+Thasu aM/ shar gyi phyogs su song nas ni// yan lag kun gyis phyag byas te// rdo rje'i gsang sngags 'di yis ni// bdag nyid dbul bar/

po bya ba yin// o sata thA ga tA pU dza a b+hi Ti kA ya A naM nir+ya ta yA mi// sarba ta thA ga ta badzrasat+ta a b+hi Shiny+tsan+taM/ rdordzogasang sngags 'di yis ni// lho phyogs su ni phyag byas te// sas rgyas
dgan thams cad la// bdag ni dbul bar bya ba yin/ de nas nub kyi phyogs suni// sngags 'di yis ni phyag byas te// oM sarba ta thA ga te pU dzapra brtan ya AtAnaM nir+ya tayAmi/ sarba ta thA ga ta

badzrad+harma pra brta ya maM// dag pa'i chos can slob dpon ches// nub phyogs sun phyag byas te// rdo rje'i sngags 'dase bskul bya zhing// bdag nyid rab tu dbul bar bya// o sa ta thA ga ta pu dzakarmaNi A
nonAr ta yA mi// sarba ta thA ga ta badzra karmaku ru hUM// mchod dang dbang bskur lasaldan zhing// byung du chos la sa sbyor bas// byang phyogs sun phyug byas te// bdag nyid rdo rje las su 'gyur//
shar dumachod pa'i las yin te// lho phyogs su ni dbang bskur ba/ nub phyogs sun chos chen po// byung du chos la nges par sbyor// thub pa kun gyi nyi ma 'o// mgon po chen po rab btud nas//

tsha phyogs rnams kun tu sngags 'di yos// phyag ni reb tu btsal bar bya// oM sarbata thA ga ta kA ya bka tsit+ta pra Na me na badzra ban d+hanaM ka ro ma// de nas ji skad bshad pa'i phyag bya po// sas rgyas la
gas sems kyis ni// rab tu gus bcas phyag rgya rnams// myur du bsnyen pa'i sgrub pa yin// phyag byas 'og tu langs nas ni// bdag nyid kyis na las rnams bya// bdag nyid dbul ba bzang
po yi// sangs rgyas kun la dbul byaste// ma lus phyogs bzhugs mchog gyur pa// sas rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol// 'di ltar nye bar zhi ba bdag/ cinas rdo rje nyid gyur mdzod//
dordzo'i rigs kyi mchog dpa// sas rgyas sras bcas thams cad la// rtag tu rnam pa thams cad kyis// bdag nyid dag ni dbul bar bya// rdo rje'i gsang sngags de yis ni// bdag nyide dbul
bar 'gyur ba yin// sangs rgyas sras bcas thams cad na// yang dang yang du rjes dran to// sdig pa la sogs nyon mongs kun// mya ngan 'das par bshags par bya// skye ba 'du 'amagazhan
dag gi/ sdig pa thams cad rnam spangs nas// sas rgyas sras bcas thams cad kyi// bsod nams ye shes tshogs bskyod dang// de bzhin sems can kun gya la// rjes su yi rang bya ba yin/
byang chub mya ngan ma 'da' bar// sas rgyas kun la gsol ba gdab// byang chub sems ni thabs chen gyis// sems can sas rgyas rjes dran bya// shin tu ngo mtshar mchod pa na// cinus par yang
bsgrub par bya// yang na mya ngan 'jus sogs dang// rnal 'byor dge ba sogs pa la// ngo mtshar gyur pa'i mchod pa yis// mchod pa'i sngon dag dbul bar bya// gnas 'di 'am ni gzhan dag na//
lha sogs bdag gir ma byas pa'i// me tog chu skyes thang skyes rnams// thabs chen sangs rgyas thams cad dang// de yi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor nas// thub pa'i dbapo rnams
[r ]la dbul// rdo rje rnal 'byor 'di yis ni// ma tog mchod pas rab mchod cing// phyag rgyarnal 'byor bcas pa yis// phyogs rnams kun tu nges par spro// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu pA dzam
g+has mu dra sbyaraNas ma ya hU~M/ gang dag spos kyi shing bzang po// thub pa'i dbang phyug rnams la dbul// lha yi spes sogs rmad byung ba// phyogs rnams kun tu spro bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta

d+hu pa pu dzame g+ha sa mu dra sa ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ dri yishing rnams bzang po ni// thub pa'i dbang phyug rnams lani//phyag rgyar bcas rab bsal nas ni// phyogs rnams kun tu spro bar bya// oM sarbata/
tshu btog pU dza me g+ha sa mu dras raNas ma ya hUM/ rin chen rang bzhin rgya mtsho dang// rin chen ri bo la sogs mchog/ mchod pa'i sprin spro ba yis// phyogs rnams kun tu dbul bar bya'o/

oM sarba ta thA ga ta ba rlung ga rad+ma a laM kA ra pU dzame g+ha sa mu dra sa ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ rtsad bu jobade ba dga' chen dang// rgod dang sog la sogs pa'i tshogs// phyogs rnams kun tu thams cad nas//

dga' ba'i mchog na spro bar bya// oM sarba ta thAgo tadmyalA s+ya ra tikr-i taso bya a nuta ra pu dzam g+has mudra par Na sa ma ye hU~M/ gos dang rgyanasogs 'byung ba yi// de bzhin dpag bsam shing bzang
po de yi sngags ni brjod bya zhing// sas rgyas kun la dbul bar bya// oM sarma ta bu ga ta a nut+tar bo a lang kar wasta pu dzam g+ha sa mu dra sa maNas ma ye hUM/ na chen bzang po tshor

'bar dang// snang ba'i shing las byung pa dang// zla ba khyim la sogs 'od// phyogs rnams M kun tu spro bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta A lo ke pu dzam g+ha sa mu dra spa ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ sems can kun gyi

sdug bsngal tshe// yang dang yang du rjes dran nas// snying rje bskyed pa'i sbyor ba yis// byang chub sems ni bskyed par bya// byang chub tu nisams bskyed nas// sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir// sangs

kun la dbul bya zhing// phyogs rnams kun tu spro bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzrabo d+hi tsit+ta pu dzam g+ha sa mu dra slar Na sa ma ye hU~M/ sems can kun la bde legs dang// 'byung po kun la byams
pa dang// dud 'gro kun la mi 'jigs sbyin// ngan 'gro thams cad la 'dod dang// byams dang snying rje btang snyoms dang// dga'o ba tshas pa'i rnal 'byor 'byung// rdo rje'i sngags ni brjod bya zhing//
sus rgyas kun la dbul bar bya// osarba tathug taa nut+tanamabra bi hAr pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spyar Nas ma ye hU~M/ sems can thams cad dang la dang ni// nor dang ldan pa grub par shog/

bde ba ma tshang med par shog/ ces pas dbul zhing spro bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga tomahAbadzrad+hA ba dA na pa ra mi tA pU dzamo g+ha sa mu dra sa ra Nas ma ye hU~M/ sems can thams cad byang chub dang// sdom la
rab tu gnas par shog/ rgyags sogs nyes pa chen po rnams// kigyur kun tu sbyo bar bya// o satsata zu ga ta a nut+tar mahAbo d+hi hAr shA la pA ra ma ta pu dzam g+ha sa mu
[a/ ]dra sa ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ 'jigs dang lon sogs sdug bsngal la// sogs pa'i jigs kun zhi gyur cig/ byams dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// chos la bdag med bsgrub par bya// oM
sarba tathA ga tA a nut+tar mahAd+hamaa ba bo d+hi kAn+ti pA ra mi ta pu dzam g+has mu dra sar khas ma ye hU~M// 'khor ba mthar thug bar dun// bdag 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ de bzhin sems can
thams cani// de nyid sgrub pa byed par shog/ oM sarba ta thA ga tasan sA ra pa ri skye ka a nut+tarab rupA ra mi tapA dzame g+ha sa mu dra sba raNas ma ye hU~M/ srog chags kun gyi 'dod chags sogs//

nyonamos chen pe zhabir shig/ sems can thams cad gayeng med cing// bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan par shog/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nut+tang mahAso khya ba hA ra d+ma na pA ra mi ta pu dzam g+ha sa mu dra sba
ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ sangs rgyas ye shes shesab che// sdug bsngal gcod byed bla na med// shes rab sbyor bas dag byed pa'i//sasaasems can dag gyur cig/ oM sarba ta shrI ga ta a nut+tar kye

bskasha dasarbad+harmas man+ta dz+hAnamahA pradz+nyA pA ra mi tapU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spa ra Na sa ma ye hUM// steng gsum gyi ni rdul snyed kyi// bdag nyid kyis ni rnam bsam zhing// mchod pa'i phyir ni rnam bsams nas//

sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya nar tan pu dza me g+ha sa mu dra spar tas ma ye hU~M/ stong gsum gyi na rdul snyed kyi// bdag nyid kyis ni rnam bsam zhing// lce ni de snyed
ldan dang bcas// sas rgyas bsngags pa brjod par bya// oM sarba ta thog ta bAka ni tan pU dza me g+has mu dra spar mas ma ye hUM/ de nas rnal 'byor de nyid kyis// lus dang ngag sems byung ba yi//
mchod pa dag ni bsdus nas su// sangs rgyas kun la dbul ba bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+tanIr tan pu dza me g+ha sa mu dra sar tshas ma ye hUM// grags chen ldan pa'i sas rgyas rnams// ma lus kun
la mchod nas ni// dag ba dag ni bsdus byas nas// sems can don du bsngo bar bya// sangs rgyas thams cad rjes dran nas//sems dpa'i skyil krung bca' bar bya// byams sogs rnal 'byor chen po
rnams// phyogs rnams kun tu spro bar bya// go cha mchog ga yig gnyis kyis// blo ldan bdag nyid go bgo zhing// rigasngags gang zhig mngon 'dod pa'i// rig sngags de ni bzla bar bya// rgyud

chen gsang ba 'di ru ni// rnal 'byor chen pa'i sngags bzlas pa// brgya rtsa bcuru bshad pa yin// yang na nyi shu rtsa gcig go/ tshe ga'i sbyor ba 'phred la ni// thun mong du ni rnam lngar bshad// gang gis
sdig can 'grub 'gyur ba'o// gsang ba'i bzlas pa rnal 'byor che// de bzhin gshegs pa rigs mchog la// bzlas pa 'din mchog yin no// bkra shis skyil krung bcas nas ni// sems kyis
sas rgyas la dmigs nas// blo dang ldan pa bdag nyid ni/rtag tu kun mkhyen sangs rgyas bsam// gtsug tor la sogs mtshan bzang dang// ldan par bdag gis/
lus bsams te// sangs rgyas snyang po nang 'dug cing// nga nyid sangs rgyas zhes su bsam// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las byung ba/gang gis 'khor lo rnam sprul pa// mngon par byang chub chen
po yi// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya// gdul bya'i tshogs na longs spyod pa'i// chos dang los spyod sprul pa'i ng 'grub// gnas na yongs su gyur pa yis// sems ni kun gzhi las byung
min// bsod nams ye shes rab rdzogs phyir// zla ba gang bar rnam par brtag/ zla ba gang ba dri mad pa// snying kha ru na bsgom par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su// rig pa'i yi ge rnam
par sgom// de lta bu yi tshul mchog gis// zla ba phyedan 'grub par 'gyur// mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang// lo gcig ni 'grub par 'gyur// srid skyo ba mi 'gyur ba'i// de srid rnal
'byor chen pos bzlas// lus ni la bar gyur pa na// phyag rgyabacing ba brtsam par bya// bde bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bzlas pa'i// de byang chub mchog bcing bya// yang na chos 'byung shes
pa 'am// shin turmad byung dpal be'u 'o// de nas rdo rje'i rigs bzlas pa// phyagan rdo rjer bdag nyid// byang chub snying po la gnas bdag/ bdag ni phyag na rdo rdzo bstan// zla ba'i dkyilo 'khor
dbus su ni// de rje'i gzugs ni rnam par sgom// gsang chen rdo rje'i dbus su ni// rig pa'i yi ge rnam par sgom// de nas pad+ma'i rigs bzlas pa// pad+ma sems dpa' ru bdag nyid//
bla ba'i dbus su pad+mache// pad+ma'i dbus su yi ge rnams// bde bzhin rin chen rigs bzlas pa// ban chen rgyal po rigs bdag nyid// zla ba'i dbus su rin chen me// na chen dbus su'ang
yi ge rnams// de nas las kyi rigs bzang po/ rnal 'byor don kun sgrub byed la// sangs rgyas snying po rang bdag nyid// rdo rje las su rnam par sgom// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbusasu ni//
rin chen rdo rje rnam par sgom// rin chen rtse mo rdo rje ma// de yi dbus su'ang yi ge rnams// gos lnga yi ni bzlas pa 'ad// gsang ba'i bzlas pa brjod par bya// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste//
bzlas rgyud gsang ba mchog 'dzin pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bzlas pa'o// sangs rgyas bdag nyid bkra shis 'dzin// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'dir// sangs rgyas gzugs su
rnam par sgom// sangs rgyas de yi thugs dbus su// ga pa'i yi ge rnam par sgom// rang gi lus ni bdag med cing// chos dang gang zag stong pa nyid// sangs rgyas de dag gi gzugs ni//
bdag med par ni rnam par bsam// lus ni sangs rgyas zhes brjod pas// sas rgyas de yang yod ma yani/ phung po dang ni skye mchad khams// chos zhes bya ba'i sas rgyas med// gang zag
nyid kyis sas rgyas med// sas rgyas med pa yang ma yin// pha rol phyin drug sa bon te// shes rabs ben sbyong mdzad pa// gnas dang gnas minaskal ldan pa///
de nyid byang chub bdag med 'dzin// de lta bu s ni gsang chen gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bzlas na// myur bar slob dpon chen po yis// rab tu dga' ba 'grub par 'gyur// de nas rdo rje'i
rigs bzlas pa// rdo rjesems dpa' rang bdag nyid// stong gsum gyi na'ajig rten 'dir// rdo rje'i gzugasasu rnam par sgom// rdo rje de yi lte dbus su// rig pa'i yi ga rnam par sgom//

dngos med ces bya rdo rje de// byang chub 'bras bu gdu yin pa'o// gang zhig rdo rje zhes su bshad// gang zhig de nyid 'gyur med pa'i// lus kyi de nyid ces brjod la// gang zhig chos dang chos nyid stob/
[“ ]gzugs la sogs pa'i ches chen po// 'byung ba cha sgra 'dzin pa med// lus n gzugs zhes bya bar brjod// gzugs zhes bya ba yod ma yin// gzugs de yang ni rnam phyel// phra mo'i 'du shes/
rnam par sgom// chashas su ni rnam phye na/ gzugs zhes bya ba yod ma yin// gzugs na stong pa zhes bshad do// 'od de rdo rje zhes byar bstan// gzugs sogs chos rnams thams cad ni//
tsa stong pa nyid na rnam par sgom// de lta bu yi rnal 'byor gyis// rab tu dga' ba bsgrub par bya// de nas rin chen rigs bzlas pa// rdo rje rin chen rigs bdag nyid// stong gsum gyin 'jig
rten 'dir// steng nyid nam mkhar rnam par sgom// de nanam mkhang rnal 'byor ches// rtog pa dang bcas yi ger bsam// chos kun dngos med ces bya ba// stong nyid de bzhin nyid ces brjod//
dngos mdaces bya'i gzugs med de// mkha' mtshus sas rgyas spyod yul lo// gang la gzugs ni yodain pasI/ mag ces bya ba ci yin brjod/ mig de yang ni gang zhig gi/ mig ces/
bya ba yin par brjo/bdag po rgyal po 'di gang zhig/ 'di yi skye ba'ang phalta bu'i/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi 'dus las// mig gi dbang po yang dag byung// mig de la yang gzugs med la// cizhig
byed de yod pa'i ng min// mgan ji lta ba bzhin du// thams cad gzung dang 'dzin pa spangs// bzlas pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// chos chen po yi dbang bskur 'gyur// de nas pad+ma'i rigs bzlas/

pa bslabasams dpa bar ng bdag nyid//stong gsum gyi ming jigarten 'dared/pad+ma'i gzugs su rnam par sgom/pad+mashin tu dag de la//rig pa'i ye shes rnam par sgom// shes rab chen pos pad+made/chos kyi snying bor bsam pa@#/padanuyis ma gos shing/
'dam gyi nyes pas gos ma'agyur// sems can thams cad de bzhin dag/ chos ni gzod nas ma skyes pa// de bzhin gshegs nyid 'di gang zhig/ chos dang chos nyid stong gang yin// gzugs
sogs chos rnams thams cad kyi// chos nyid de bzhin nyid du 'dod// de nas las kyi rigs bzlas pa'i// las kyi rnal 'byor rnam par bsam// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'khor lo 'di// chos dang
losaspyod thob byed yin// gang la chos zhes bya ba med// sangs rgyas kyi ni rnam 'phrul snang// a ma'o sangs rgyas de dag snang// rang gi las kyang sgrub par mdzad// de lta bu yi rnal

'byor gyis// rdo rje slob dpon dka'athubache// tsho'adi nyid la dam pa yi// sangs rgyas nyid ni mchog thob 'gyur// rdo rje'i snying sogs phyag rgya ni// rdo rje'ags la badrag por bshad// rin chen la sog
dbang bskur zhing// dag pa'i mchogani pad mchog 'dzani// sangs rgyas skun chos chen pa// dre rje rnal 'byor nges bstan bya// byang chub mchog ni kun 'dul ba// 'di ni bzlas pa dum par 'ded// de nas

slob dpon rdo rje 'dzin// 'phreng ba nges par bstan par bya// gang du bzlas pa bya ba byed// rnam gnyis rnam gsum nyung ba'ang rung// 'phreng ba sangs rgyas la mdzub bcas// gung mos de rje'i rnal 'byor skyes//
srin lagasteng du rinachen skyes// mthe'u chung gis nipad la phye// las kyi 'phrang bas las byed pa// sorAmo kun gyis bya bar bshad// rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin pa yi// 'di ni gsang ba'i bzlas pa che//
sangs rgyas rnal 'byor bo da// rdo rje can la nu gsha// phyi sol rdor rags dbang po ste// mu tig nor bu rnal 'byor can// pad+ma'i snying po'i 'phrang bani// pad+ma'i rigs rnams kun la bsngags//
yang na kun las mchog gyur pa// bo de6 de srog 'dzin pa// lcags kyi bzlas pa nyis 'gyur te// bangs kyi ya ni bzhir 'gyur ro// ru rag sha ya bye ba gnyis// mu tig gi na brgyar 'gyur ro// dbang
po'i stong ba rnal 'byor te// dal gyi 'bum du 'gyur ba yin// pad+ma'i phyi ba brgya 'gyur brjod// bod tsayi gras med do/ (lag pa g.yon pas phyag rgya bcing// g.yas pa 'phreng ba dang ldan bya//

ltar sngar bshad gsang ba sogs// rmad byung chen po'i bzlas pa bya// ci yi phyir na bzlas pa brjod// dag ba la brtson rgyal 'gyur zhing// rmad byung rnams kyang mthod 'gyur zhing// byang chub spyod pa rgyal 'gyur
zhing// sangs rgyas la pa mngon par 'gyur// bzlas pas skyon las nas ni// phyag rgyudag ni bcing bar bya// sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir// phyogs kun tu n 'dud pa bshad// byang chub sems tshul
thob byed pa'i// mde sogs gsang ba bklag par bya// bsod nams tshogs ni bskyod pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas mchod pa yang dag bya// de nas zas kyi dus su// rnam pa kun tu chang bu sbyin// sus
rgyas rigs pas mngon bsrungs la// bza' ba dag pa dbul ba'akhyu// sas rgyas bdag nyid bza' ba dbul// legs par bgos nas bza' ba dbul// snga dro sdom pa blang bya ste// de nyid nye ba phyed dang
mtshams su// nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du// sangs rgyas rdo phranor bu dang// pad+ma byed pa'i rnal 'byor gang// rnam pa bzhi po de las sbyor// sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs byang chub/
nyin dang mtshan la rnam pa drug/ rdo rje dril bu tshogs slob dpon// rdo rje can rnams de bzhin drug/ zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang ni// byams pa nyin zhag kun la brgyad// chos gsum tshes pa bzhi zhes
pu rnam pa brgyad du bzlas par bya// 'di yi chos chen gasum po la// rtag tusnyoms par 'jug par bya// gsung mchog dkyil 'kher mcheg dang ni// de bzhin las
kun byed pa'o// gang dusdig par mi 'gyur bgi/ thams cad bza' zhing thams cad len// lus nas lhag mar gyur pa sngas// de bzhin dri ma thams cad sang/ nyin re'an kan gsum du//
khrus gsum bya zhing gsang blang ba// gos kyang lan gsum brjobar bya// gtsang gos lan gsum yang ni spyin// sha dang chang btsong la sogs pa// dri na kha yi sgrigs pa dang// 'khrig pa 'dod
dang bsnyen pa dang// sems can 'tsho la dga' mi bya// brtson zhing las mkhas spyod par ldan// sbyin zhing dul la dga' dang gtsang// bya ba byed cing nga ma 9bur// dge legs rgyun ni 'chang bar byed//

kun rdzob don dam rnam pa gnyis// bsrub pa'i sdom pa blang bar bya// khananang du lta yid ches// sngags dang phyag rgyarig sngags dang// gzungs dang lha dang bla ma dang// rdo rje la sogs mtshon cha bzang
lha yi gnas dang yang dag ldan// 'jigs min g.yo dang sgyu can min// ma brtan pa yi blo can min// mya ngan 'das la dga' ba min// blo ldan 'jig rten 'dir mi dga'// de bzhin pha rol dga'i
ba min// lus srog btang snyoms mi bya zhing// bslab pa las ni 'da' mi bya/ skrag ldan nga rgyal ldan pa min// 'jig rten bya ba 'dod mi bya// da lta'i ngo mtshar tshul la ni// rnal 'byor pa yis bsgrub
par bya// skya bsngang zhing brjod chen ldan/ med pa sbyang zhing legs rnyed ldan// dpa' zhing brtan la blo ma gus// sdig pas 'jigs shing kun tu bsdums// rinus ji ltar spro bar bya// klu ba bam
yan lo 'am// nyin zhag gcig la lan gnyis su// de bzhin bla ma blta bar bya// mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang// de lta bu yi tshul gnas shing// phyag rgya rnam pa brgyad bcings nas// rtag tu
'grub par gyur pa yin// brtul zhugs tshas par rdzogs 'gyur nas// rnal 'byeramakha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje'achang ba slob dpon la// sas rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur 'gyur//
rig pa kun bdag rgyal bo ste// dkyil 'khor kun gyi de nyid rig/ rnal 'byor chog de nyid shes// de bzhin lha yi rigs rnams mthong// sdom pa blangs shing rnam par mkhas// rig pa'i slob
dpon dbang bskur 'gyur// lam rnams chen po byed rgyal po// rig pa ldan zhing de nyid shes// phan pa dung na gnod pa shes// lha la sogs pa kun dbang byed// gnod sbyin 'byung po lha dbang sogs//
rig pa'i rgyal po mag gzhug pa// 'di ni chos kyi gru la gnas// sas rgyas mchod pa lags mchod byed// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rgyal po// mdzod 'dzin rtag tu gsang ba 'dzin// 'khor
lo grong khyer chen por gnas// byang chub sems dpa'i tshul 'dzan pa'i// dam chos bcud kyi snying po skyes// snying po 'dzin cing dkyil 'khor mchod// dgongs pa de nyid tshul shes 'di// theg pa
chen po'i tshul don shes// mchod sbyin lhag pa'i mched dam pa// gsang ba yi ni dkyil 'khor bya// rdo rje khra bo'i ting 'dzin gyis// gang zhig gi ni theg pa ru// bgags kun
[r ]sa par 'joms pa yi// gsang sngags drag po brjod par bya// bkra shis sdig pa 'dzems byed pa// bzlas brjod sbyin sreg glog yang// nga ni de rje ma ltar 'ang ra// drag po'i bzod dkaraya shes
'dzan/ dkyil 'khor mchod pa bya ba ni// yo byadayongs su brtag par bya// yang na phyi nas byed pa yis// cirags par ni brtag pa ra bya// dpag tshad las lhag mi bya zhing// khru drug las mi chung ba

min// sgrub pa ba suganyis zhes bya ste// gzhan yang byed pa bcu gnyis so// gal te de ni rgyal por 'gyur// dpag tshad kyi ni khyin tsam bya// sa ngan kun nas bzang po ste// nges pa'i dag dang yang dag ldan//

yang na sgrub pa blon po yin// khu stong yod pa mchog yin no// yang na kun nas bzang ba yi// khru drug pa las chung mi bya// ya ngan ded dpon yin yang rung// ngos bzhi dag dang yang dag ldan// lnga pa las ni chung mi

pa byu yang na gang zhig gzhan dag gam// sgrub pa po dag yin yang rung// bcu pa las ni chung ma bya// zur bzhi dag dang yang dag ldan// rgyacher yang na mi bya'o// yang na sgrub byed slob dpon yin// drug pa bas

nichung mi bya// yang na dpag tshad dang ldan pa'o// yang na yo byad ldan par bya// gal te sgrub byed de rgyal po// rin chen phyi ma rang du bya// rin chen batags las legs bya zhing// shin tu khyad 'phags yid du 'ong//

i nA la sngonapo che// tshon rtsi sngon po rab tu bya// pad+ma rA ga rA game/ tshon rtsi dmar po yang dag ldan/ tshon rtsi sor po mdog bzang po// drim med pa 'od zer ldan// tshon rtsi dkar po ldan pa yi// dkar po

dag ni shel las bya/ dbo zurlu dang btsod mdog ste/ tshon rtse lnga zhes bya bar bshadu// gal te de ni ma 'byor na// rin po che dang bsres pas bya// tshong dpon ya ngan ded dpon rung// chen rtsi dgal rab tu
bya yanagazhan 'ga' zhig yin/ tshon rtsi ga gzhan na dam par sbyar// thal ba yis kyang dus ji bzhin// 'dir ni slob dpon dag gis bya// rin chen phye marayang dag ldan// yang na yo byad dang ldan pa//

gal tasgrub byed de rgyal po// sna tshogs byed pa'i tshad du bya// yang na 'bum dang yang dag ldan// stong las nyung ba'i mi bya'o// spos dang mar me mchod bstod dang// dri yi bum pa nyid dang ni// de bzhin bus gang
gtor m dang// bum pa rnam dang mar me dag/ tshong dpon yang na ded dpon chu// bcu las nyung bar mi bya'o// gzhan 'ga' zhig ni 'od kyang rung// bca' ba dag ni stod phrag bcu// bcu las nyung bar

mi bya 'o// bza' ba dag ni brgya 'am stong// btsulas nyung bar mi bya 'o// g.yos kyi rnam pa kun dang ni// de bzhin dri rnams thams cad kun// rol mo sgrig dang rtsed mo dang// de bzhin phun sum tshogs
pa kun// de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis// de tshemachodapa byas nas su// rinas sa ni khyed rnams cig/ grub par bya phyir brtul zhugs brtsam// rang nyid khrus byas yan lag byugs/ dag cing gtsang ma'i
gos gyon cing// rnam par dben pa'i gnas 'dug ste// sas rgyas thams cad spyan drang bya// ma tog spos snod lag thogs shing// phyogs rnams kun tu phyag bya 'o// sas
ka rgyas ye shes mchog ldan pa// sangs rgyas la sogs kun gshegs shing// gsang ba'i spyanan 'gugs pa yi// rdorje'i phyag rgyabacing bar bya// rdo rje'i sngags dang phyag rgya yis// sangs rgyas thams
cad spyan drad bya// denus gnas na yang dgasgrub// dben zhing kun tu g.yeng ba med// ri bo 'am ni dgon pa 'am// de bzhin phug gi nang dag gam// shing drung gi na gnas dag gam// nubo'i 'gram mam
yang na ngogs// dngos grub gnas su'adu gnas ni// lha rnams myur du gshegs par 'gyur// rdodang gseg ma nus par ldan// thal pa ljan ljin mi gtsang bcas// rtsub cing rtsa ba'i khyab la sogs//

zlade 'dra 'a sa gzhi rnam pa// shin tu bzang zhing 'od bzang snyam// tshad dang ldan zhing gsog ma med// 'dom gang yang n khru gang tsam// dkyil 'khor gnas nasmyung bar bya// grong dang yul 'khor nyid

dag dang// grong khyer dag dang ldeng dang ni// rgyal po'i pho brang rtsod dus dang// dkyil 'khor chen po bya ba min// de 'dra'i sa gzhi bsgrubs nas ni// steng gi char na bsgrub par bya// 'dom gdu yang na phru gad
tsam// skas gdang bzhi dang ldan pa ru// sbyas te de nas gnas kyan// dbus su phur pa gzugs par bya// rdo rje phur bu'i phyag rgya yis// mchod pa'i sa ga'i mdzes par bya// rig pa 'dzin pa byed pas

ma bcag/ bgegs bcing ba yi phyag rgya yis/ khagegs rnams kun tu bcing bar bya// me dang gshin rje chu dang ni// rlung dang dbang po rdo rje phyogs// rdo rje bzod dka' phyag rgya dang// rdo rje'i sngags kyisaspyang
