bar bya// mchod gnas dpag tshad tshad tsam du// bcom ldan s ni yang dag brtsam// gnyis pa 'am ni gsum pa yis// nya la nyes pa mi 'gyur// ci ste 'byor pa med na ni// zla ba gcig sa

rab tu sbyar// bco lnga las ni yang dag brtsam// bcolta lan rdzogs par bya// ciste zla ba phyed tsam du// bcol la ni rnam par byung// ci ste ranges na tshes brgyud nas// bco lnga la ni rdzogs pa bya//

tshes dgu dngan bcu dang ni// bcugasum pa dang bachub zhi pa// bdun pa lnga pa nyid nas ni// nya la nyes pa mi 'gyur ro// ci ste nyin zhag de brtsams nas// de nyid la ni yongs rdzogs bya// rnal 'byor chen po dag
bya'i phyir// rnal 'byor sa gzhi rab tu sgrub// rang nyid khrus byus yan lag byugs// rnam pa sna tshogs gos bgo zhing// rgyana rnams kun gyis rab tu spras// rdo slob dpon rnam par brgyan// gtsang

zhing gtsang ma'i gos dang ldan// gtsang ma'i grogs dang lhan cig tu//sems can kun don yang dag ldan// byang chub sems ni yang dag gzung// bskal pa brgya phrag stong du yang// byin s mngon par brtson byas
kyang// gang thag bzhi po 'a jig rten du/ bsgrubs kyang 'grub pa nyid mi 'gyur// sems ni bskyed par ma gyur dang// dad med 'grub pa mi 'gyur nyid// tshe 'dzin pa nyid dag dang// bka'
ca @#// bsgo ba ni mi byed pa go/ dri yi chu yis legs bskus pa'i// de nas dkyil 'khor gnas de na// dri de nga ldan pa'i nu dag gis// phyogs rnams kun tu chag chag btab// ba yi lci bas/
legs sbyangs te// dri dang bcas pas legs byugs te// de nas gur kum la sogs pa'i// dri dag gtsang mar sbyar bar bya// rdo rjod kyil 'khor phyag rgyayis// dkyil 'khor yang dag byin gyis
brlab// rdo rje spyan gyi phyag rgyayis// pad+ma'i mig can dag gis blta// dkyil 'kher bar dang tha ma ru// sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam// sbyin srog las ni rnam pa bsgyur// rig pa'i dngos grub/

tshel ga la// sbyin srug las ni yang dag brtsam// de bzhin sngags dang phyag rgyu tshogs// de 'dra'i sngags dang phyag rgya'ang min// sngon la bgags rnams gzhom par bya// de nas sbyin srog yang dgakhartsam//
de 'og gsang ba 'a mchod chen gyi// dkyil 'khor kun tu bri bar bya// sbyin sreg rnam pa lnga ru bshad// yang na bcu drug dag tu 'gyur// rang rang gin tshig bzhin// sbyin sreg lasan yang dag brtsam//
lu dgongs pa gang zhig sgrub pa'i phyir// gang zhig mchod pa yang dag nga rtsam// gal te mi nus skal chen gyis// bza' ba dag ni rab tu byu// dri dang bcas pa dang sbyar ba'o// yang na dkar gsum bza'
bar bya// 'di ltar rgyal po rdo rdzo'adzin// byin gyis rlob pa mdzad par 'gyur// bgegs rnams ngos 'dzems yin// slob dpon gyi na las bzang ngo// bgags rnams zlog par byed pa mchog//
0 bcing ba dam pa bshad par bya// rtag tu rdo rje khro bo dang// rdo rjesams dpa'iphyag bya zhing// rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yi/// bgags rnams thams cad dgug par bya// rdo rje zhags pa'i phyog
rgyayas// bgags rnams thamasacad drang bar bya// de rjelas kyi phyag rgyayis/ khagags rnams thams cad kun tu dagug/ sdig pa med kyis ma 'jigs shig/ sems can rnam par 'tsho ba'ang med//

rang gi rnam rtog lus byung bgegs// ma rig las byung ma dge bzhin// rdo rje lcags sgrog phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad bcing par bya// rdo rjer ba'i phyag rgya yis// thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin

bya/ rdo rje gnod sbyin phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad gzir bar bya// rdo rje lug rgyud phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad bkri bar bya//rdo rje bab pa'i phyag rgya yis// bgags rnams thams
cad kun tu dabab// rdo rje bardab pa'i phyag rgya yas// bgegs rnams thams cad brdab par bya// rdo rje 'bar ba'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad spor bar bya// doral gri'i phyag rgya yis// bgog
nas sa thams cad gcad par bya// rdo rjecod pan phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad brdung bar bya// rdo rje 'khor 'kho'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig par bya// rdo rje 'khrul 'khor
phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad btsar bar bya// rdo rje b+hA kyi phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad gtub pa bya// rdo rjemadung thung phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad dgugs par
[7 ]@#// rdo rjesrog byed phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad bsreg par bya// rdo rje 'khor byed phyag rgyayis// bgags rnams thams cadu bskor bar bya// rdo rje srad bu'i phyag
rgyu yis// bgegs rnams thams cad bskyod par bya// de dza blog byed phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad rnam par brlag/ rdo rje 'joms byed phyag rgyayis// bgegs rnams thams cad gzhom//
par bya// rdo rje 'jigs byed phyag rgyayis// bgags rnams thams cad 'jig par byed// rdo rje za byed phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad bza' bar bya// dordzo'acha' byed phyag rgyuyis//
bgegs rnams thams cad bca' bar bya// rdo rje la pa'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad dral bar bya// rdo rje rgyal byed phyag rgyayis// bgegs rnams thams cad bskyal bar bya//
rdo rje slong ba'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad bslu bar bya// rdo rje gsad pa'i phyag rgyayis// bgags rnams thams cad gsad par bya// rdo rje 'tsho byed phyag rgyayis// bgags rnam

thams cad 'tsho bar bya// rdo rje sgrub pa'i phyag rgyayas// bgegs rnams thams cad yang dag sgrub// rdo dza rgyus 'debs phyag rgya yis// gdug pa thams cad rgyas gdab bya// rdo rjerlung gi phyag rgya yis//
bgegs rnams thams cad rlung la bskur// rdo dzachuyi phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad chu la g.yang// rdo rjem ni rab rno bas// bgegs rnams thams cad bsreg par bya// rdordza brgyal byed
phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad brgyal bar bya// rdo rje hU~M mdzad phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad sbyin sreg bya// rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya yis// bgags rnams thams cud gzung
bar bya// rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgyayis// bgegs rnams thamasacad sos gdab bya// rdo rje 'bags pa'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad dbug par bya// rdo rje 'jig byed phyag rgya yis//
bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig par bya// rdo rje baka' bzhin byed pa yis// bkug nas bka' la dgod par bya// rdo rje sdigs mdzub phyag rgya yis// 'gogs rnams thams cad bsdigs
par bya// rdo rje'ags byed phyag rgyayis// bgags rnams thams cad dgas par bya// rdo rje hU~M mdzad phyag rgya yis// bgegs kyi rigs kun gzhom par bya// rdo rje gnod sbyin bzod dka' dang// rdo rje
ma ltar 'bar ba dang// rdo rje'ajigs byed phyag rgya yis// rdo rje rkang pas bsnun par bya// bgags 'joms pa yis phyag rgyu yis// de nas stong gi bgegs gzhom bya// mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i
mchog/ rdo rje chen po'i gsang rgyud las// rdo rje khro bo'i snyoms 'jug bya// brgyud rtsa bculhag pa dang// rdo rje slob dpon gsang ba ni// rgyas ba ru ni yongs su bstan// bgegs la sogs pa gdug
pa kun// chad pa gcad phyir btus pa yin// dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrub bya'i phyir// sbyanasrog las ni yang dag brtsam// rnam pa brgyadang rtsa b.rulhag/ rdo rje slob dpon gsang ba ni// 'di ni gsang
ba'i rgyud chen po// rgyudade las ni rab tu bshad// gsang ba'i sbyin sreg cho gar bcas// gzhan yang dang por rab bshad bya// rnal 'byor chen po gsang ba'i las// sbyin sreg
las ni rgyun mi chad// las rnams thams cad btus pa yis// gsang ba rgyud chen 'di ru ni// sbyin sreg rnam pa nyi shuyis// thams cad bsdus par 'gyur ba yin// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang// mngon
phyed ni las dang ni/ tshospel ba dang dgug pa dang// nor dang khru ni phal ba dang// srung dang srung ba min dang bgags// sdig pa thams cad rab gzhem dang// bcing dang gsad dang drag po dang//
snyachags dang rjes su bcos pa dang// dbang du bya dung gzugs bzang nyid// 'dod dga'i gzugs su snang ba dang// mkha' la 'gro dang dngos grub kyi// rdzas ni grub par bya ba la// sgrub pa'i dkyil

'kher byed pa yi// rdo rje slob dpon gyis de bya// de lta bu yi rnam pa yi// sbyin srog bzang po nyishur bshad// jiltar sbyin sreg chog bzhin// sngon du thab khung bya ba yin// gru bzhi la ni rgyas pa ste//

zlum po la ni zhi ba'o// gang zhig 'gugs par byed pa yi// rdo po'i rnam par yang dug bya// de bzhin pad+ma'i rnam pa bzhin// ma ngon spyod la ni gru gsum ste// sdig pa thams cad rab gzhom phyir// zlum
tsa po rta babs ldan pa yin// rin chen rnam pa rigs rgyas la// tshe 'phel ba dpa' grib pa dang// shin tu dag phyir phyag rgya'i dbyibs// srung la go cha lta bu yin// bcing ba la ni 'obs kyis bskor//
0 gsad la man ba dang ldan nga gi/ ci 'dod gzugs la gang yang rung// mi snang bal gzhu dang ldan// phyogs dang mkha' 'phur la lcags kyu// bka'aphyed phyag rgya sgrub pa dang// dkyil 'khor chen po
sgrub pa la// 'khor lo 'am ni gru bzhi 'o// rdzas dang smanan 'grub ba la// thab khung bud med yan lag mtshungs// yang na thun mong dngos grub kyi// dkyil 'khor yang dag bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor
'khor le ji lta ba// sbyin sreg thab khung de mtshungs 'gyur// rig 'dzin dngos grub bzang ldan zhing// thams cad phun tshogs de ltar 'gyur// 'khor lo sogs la cung zad mthar// sbyin sreg thab rung
bgo bar bya////thab khunganyishu 'o// dkyil 'khor tshog thams cad la// thab khung gang zhig mthong tsam gyis// sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur// thab khung bstan pa bshad par bya//
sngon du thig ni gdab bya zhing// tshon gyis phyogs legs par bri// gru bzhirathig brgyud ces bya ba// dbus kyi 'khor le dbyung bar bya// gru bzhi'i man mnyam pa ste// legs par bgos shing legs bris

pa rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan// sgo khyud rnams kyis legs par spras// sgo bzhi dag dang yang dag ldan// sge'atshabargyad ldan par bya// dra ba zla ba phyed pas spras// rdo rje sgo khyud rdo rjer ldan//

pad+ma'i nags kyi smyug ma dang// 'phreng ba rab tu 'khor ba dang// spyi blugs phyag rgya chen po dang// shar gyi phyogs kyi che ru phyi// rtsegasum zla ba phyed pa dang/ ral gri khyu mchog mdzes rgyal mtshan//
'od bcas bde ba phyag rgya che// lho yi phyogs su bri bar bya// 'khor lo dung dang dbyug to dang// rtababs glang po dang ni phag/ phyag rgyanub tu bri bar bya// mdung thung dril bu ba dan dang//

rmabya de bzhin ra skyes dang// khyim bya 'thab mo la phyogs pa/ byang gi phyogs su bri bar bya// de yi dam tshig 'khor lo la// sangs rgyas phyag rgya yang dag khri// dbus kyi gnas su rtsod pan te// phyi rol rdo rjes

nye bar spyas// rdo rdzo'abar ba 'bar ba yi// rdo rje shar gyi phyogs ma ru// lho ru nor bu sna tshogs pa// nub tupad+ma rdo rje'o// byang du rdo rje hU~M mdzad de// gdug pa thams cad 'ams mdzad pa'o// sas rgyas rdo rje

thabs chen rnams// phyi rol phyag rgya bcu drug tu// thab khung bskos pa gang yin pa// de yi bla re rnam par sgom// me tog shing dang spos sogs kyis// ji bzhin du ni dkyil 'khor mchod// rang nyid khrus chus
yan lag byugs/ sna tshogs gos dang rgyan ldan pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis rab tu spras// dredag bzang po dbang bskur 'gyur// ngane pad 'dzin rgyal po ste// thor tsugs dbus na de bzhin gshegs///
yang nardo rje sems dpa' 'am// rje rjes mas da pa'i dbang skur ldan// bud med sdug dang lhan cig tu// dpung pa dam du bsdums byas te// mtshan ma 'greng bar rab gyur nas// sbyin srog las ni yang
ngag brtsam// e ma'o bde ba bde chen po// 'dod chags bde ba bla na med// rdo rje sems dpa' 'dod chags che// 'jig rten dbang phyug bdag grub mdzod// 'dod chags bde ba rdzog dra gnas // 'dod
pagyi 'dod chags brtag mi bya// bud med khams bkug nas su// 'khrig pa bdunan spang bar bya// mtshan ma langs par rab gyur nas// dbang po nye bar zhi byas te// 'dod chags rjes dran gyur nas/
sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam// mtshan ma phyag mtshan zhes brjod do// lus pa lhag par bya ba yin// rdo can gyi phyag mtshan las// mkhas pas lhag par bcang bar bya// rdo dzacan dang byang sems
kyi bya chub sems ni brtan pa dang// pha rol phyin pa drug gi mtshan// brtse bas rjes chags dngos grub ster// shes rab thabs la dga' ba bstan// rtag tubasten par bya ba yin// mtshan ma langs par
rab gyur nas// lhag par yang ni bstan par bya// mngon 'dod rige ma sdug g.yin// de la rnal 'byor pas 'o bya// lhag pas phyag rgya me gyur nas// dpung pa dam du bsdam par bya// rab tu dga' ba mang
po gang// de nirab dga'i sa ru 'dod// gang la chags par rab brtags pa// yang dang yang du dran par bya// brtse dad byams pas yang dag byugs// khrel yod pa yi gos kyis dgab// tshul khrims brtul
zhugs yang dag byugs// byang chub kyin sims kyis brgyan// de 'drar brtul zhugs ldan pa yi// tshonatsachen po bstan par byu// gzhan yang phyi yi yan lag dag/ gang phyir rdo rje can gyis 'dzin// sbyin
srog las kyi cho ga bzhin// shar du kha bltas sbyin sreg bya// ji skad gzhung las gsus pa bzhin// rdo rje slob dpon gyis de bya// zhi la sangs rgyas byang nub mchog/ rgyas la rdo rje ni chen gyis//
rdo rje'i de khro bo mngon spyod la// lcags kyu yis ni 'gugs par bshad// bcud kyis len la rdo rje'i sman// tshe 'phel de bzhin ma g.yo ba'i// rdo rje sman gyi rgya chen dang// rdo rje rtse mo
nor 'phel la// srubal 'khe le rmug ste// bzlog pa lan rdo rje gzung// g.yon pa lcags sgrog phyag rgya chas// sdig pa gzhom par bya bar bshad// bcing la rdo rje bcing ba ste// gsod la rdodragasod byed

de chags la rdo rje chags pa yis// rjes su bstan pa la yang bshad// dbang la rdo rje dbang gis so// ci 'dod gzugs la sna tshogs te// mkha' la 'gro ba'i dngos grub la// rdo rje'i dngos grub rnam 'phrul

gyis// pad+ma'i sman gyi phyag rgya ches// pas grub pa ya bde mchog yin// dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i grub pa la// rdo rje dkyil 'khor phyag rgyu yis// rig pa kun bdag rgyal bo yis// phyag rgya'i mchog da yongs
su gzung// das grub thams cad sgrub pa la// pad+ma chen po 'i sman mchog gis// lag pa g.yon pas phyag rgya bcung// g.yas pa yis ni sbyin srog zu// rdo rjesna tshogs phyag rgya yis// sprin brag lasal

rgyas gdab bya// g.yon pa b+haM ldan sdigs mdzub ste// g.yas pa mche ba gtsags pa ste/ d mngon spyod kyin phug rgyu yis// rus pa'i phye mas phyogs rnams bcis/oM suM b+ha naM suM b+ha hU~M// gron+tagaMhAn+taM/ shrIts+tshapa
ya groslu pa ya hU~M/ A na ya ho b+ha ga bAn bid rA dza hU~M phaT/ g.yon pa chos 'chad dang ldan zhing// g.yas pa yis ni spyin sreg bya// sas rgyas chos ni snyoms 'jug pas/ dati'i bsregs pas nisdig
pa sreg/ oM sarba pA paM da na badzra ya swAhA/ lag pa g.yon pa rin chen gyur// g.yas pa yis ni sbyin sreg bya// klu bdun yanu rin chen nas// yo byad kun gyis mnyes pa bya// o ma tshur kra ma kA
yisAhA// shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas ni// mnga' bas ma ni rab sbyar te// rnal 'byor pas ni 'bras bsregs na// khyim nu ngas par rgyas par 'gyur// mo badzrapu yaAhA// shin tu mang ba'i/
bud shing gis// ma ni rab tu sbyar byas te// ku sha'i myu gu trel bcas pas// sbyin brag byas n srung don mchog/ o badzra a pra ti ha ta badzrasAhA/ yam shiArA bo nyid dani// de bzhin dur ba'i myu gu

dag/ ma smyugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya yis// bsregs natsho 'phel byed pa mchog/ oM badzra A yu ShisAhA// bud shing tshab rnams kyi ni// rdo rje khro bdag tipe'adzan gyis// thab khung du ni ma sbyar te// rim
rnams kyis dgug par bya// oM badzra A kar ya sAhA// de bzhin sna tshogs thams cad kyis// mkhas pa yis ni ma sbyar te// rtag tu chu skyes sbyin sreg byas// rdo rje'aching bar 'gyur ba yin// o badzra
khan b+ha ya thaM/ de bzhin sbyor ba'i chog yis// mkhas pas yam shing bsreg bya zhing// 'bras bu kha ba'i sbyin sreg byas// skad cig gis ni gsod par 'gyur// oM badzramA ra tshaye hU~M/ de bzhin pa la
sha dmar po// bsregs na dbang du byed par 'gyur// oM badzra rA gan ye hI/ sha pus pas ni sbyin sreg byos// de bzhin chags par byed nga 'a mchog/ oM badzra hUM ka rA ya swAhA// khros pas 'dod pa'i
'bras bsregasan// pa'i drod gzugs na thob par 'gyur// oM badzra kA ma ru pa tshisahA// oM badzra kha ratsha NisAhA// bud shi ron kha ba yis// shin tu khros pas me spar te//

du khros pas rdo rjem tog bsngags// rdo rje bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur// hU~M badzAkaMka la ye sany+tsa// e b+hu ta ba shaM ka rA ya swAhA// dngos grub kun gyi glog bzhin// mkhas pas nayung kar sbyin sreg khyu//
yus kar shin tubakra shis pas// dngos grub sbyin sreg mchog yin no// osarba sid d+ha ye AhA//rig pa 'dzin pa grub bya'i phyir// mkhas pas sAsti ka bsrogabya/ grub pa'i dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis

sbyin sreg rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du// o sid sid d+ha ye swAhA/ dao da la ad+hi pa ta ya s+yAhA// maN+Da la a d+hi pa ta ya hu// o b+ha sAhA/ oM b+hu ba sanA/ oM sA AhA/ oM b+hur b+hu ba sazhu// oMswaste swAhA/
o sAsi nAm sany+tsa/ o sid d+ha pra b+hU ta ye swAhA/ oM sarba du/ kha u pa sha ma na sAhA/ oM badzrasid d+ha ye swAhA/ oM karaka ne pustashan ta ka su/ yi ge pa ni mngon spyod la// yi ge dzayis 'gug

tsha par 'gyur// ya gi paM ni bcing la sbyar// dbang du bya la yi ge shA// yi ga tsun bsdogs la sbyar// gsad pa la yang yi ge hUM// han srungab bzang po la// yi ge hU~Mni bzlog pa la// sa ni sna tshogs

gzugs bsgrub bya// o ni mi snang bstan pa la// ho ni chags dang dgug pa la// u ni gsang ba'i dag pa 'dzan// mngon spyod ldan la yi ga hUM// twaM nirdzu 'phrul sgrub byed pa// lha mo chen po sgrub la A/
oM ni kun la nges par sbyar// yam shang ser po rgyas pa la// zhi ba lan dkar po'o// dbang du bya ba dmar po ste// nag po mngon spyod las la'o// zhi la mar gyis byugs pa ste// rgyas pa lana'i ma bcas/

dbang du bya la lan tshur ldan// tshab pa bcas mngon spyod la// dbye ba rgya chen dag gis ni// spyanasrog las rnams shes par bya// de nyid sbyin srog nyi 'du// rdo rje 'chang gi gsang ba yin// de kho na nyi shu
pa zhes bya ba sbyin sreg gi gsang ba'o////de nas dngos grub thubs chen po// thams cad 'grub 'dod dkyil 'khor du// grub pa'i sbyor ba'i chog yis// dngos grub tshogs kyi sbyor ldan
zhing// de rje yi ni slob dpon che// brtan bcas rigs su yang dag skyes// theg pa chen por yang dag gnas// bsal pags mda mthar thug par// chos kyi shing rta tshul zhon// shes rab thabs dang yang dag
ldan// sems can kun gyi don la brtson// sangs rgyas kun gyis yongs su bzung// slob dpon chen po'i tshul la gnas// mchog tu sa yi mthar phyir pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi rigs su skyes// rdo rjeslob dpon
dka' thub che// bgegs rnams thams cad bsal nas ni// dkyila 'khor gnas su yang dag ldan// sbyin sreg cho ga cus nas kyang// chos sbyin chen po yang dag brtsam// dam chos snying bo bcud las byung//

sangs rgyas mchod pa bla mad pa// byang chub sems pa'i rnam par 'phrul// sa rab thabs kyi tshul thob byed// rgyal chen shes rab chen po dang// thabs kyis rmad byung chos nyid do// bram ze bzhin du rigs
@#// mchog skyes/ byang chub sems dpa'i gsang chen 'dzin// gal te nus na skal chen gyis// gang tshe mchod pa rtsom pa nas// ji srid zin par gyur kyi bar// bza' ba dag ni mi bya'o///

dri dang bcas pa'i legs sbyar ba'i// yang ni dkar gsum bza' bar bya// gang phyir rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// byin gyis rlob pa mdzad par 'gyur// mis bzed ldan nyin mtshan du// bza' ba dag ni mi bya ste//
gang phyi chos kyi rang bzhin zas// tshag par 'gyur bar the tshom med// dkyil 'khor dag ni dag byas shing// dri rnams kun gyis mngon 'dus byas// sngags kyis bsangs pa'i chu yis ni// thams
cad kun nas chag chag gdab// gang tshe mchod par byed pa na// phyogs rnams kun nas phyag bya shing// bshags dang gsol ba gdab nyid drung// mchod pa'i sprin dang rjes yi rang// bdag nyid dbul ba
la sogs pa'i// las rnams rim bzhin khyus nas ni// dkyil 'khor chen po mnyam dbus su// sems dpa'i spyil krung bca' bar bya// dkyil 'khor thams cad bsdus pa yi// skyil krung rnam pa bcu
ru bshad// gsang chen de nyid mchog 'dini// dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod pa'o// dpal dadabakra shis sdigs mdzub byed// de bzhin g.yas kyi phyed krung nyid// phyi rol brkyang dang bzhugs pa'o//

bde bzhin rin chen rang bzhin te// de dag bcu nu rang bzhin bshad// skyil krung brgyadang bcu lhag pa/ gsang ba'i rgyud kyi gsang ba yi// rgyud de las ni rab tu bshad// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas te//
sangs rgyas la dmigs sams kyisani// rgyudang mi rgyu 'jig rten gsum// byams pa chen po rjes dran nas// dung po sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin mchog/ rnal 'byor las ni snyoms 'jug bya// de nas dkyil
'khor rgyal po mchog/ de nas yang na las rgyal po// ting 'dzin lhag pa'i bzang po nas// bcu phrag gcig lhag brgyaru bshad// las thams cad pa gsum du brjod// gsang ba'i rgyud las rab
tu bshad// ting 'dzin sbyor ba med par na// dkyil 'khor brtan par mi 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor sbyor ba med par ni// dngos grub nyid ni 'byung 'gyur// de bas rtag tu 'bad pas na// ting 'dzin dngos
grub dkyil 'khor bya// gal te mchog tugasang ba na// bla med theg pa'i gsang 'dod na// ting 'dzin gsum gyi spyod yul na// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// de nas byadas mas rnam 'phrul du//
so so'i skye bos mi nus so// de rnams kyin ting 'dzin mchog/ sems nyid kyis ni yang dag bya// dang po'i rgyud las bshad pa bzhin// sangs rgyas kun rnam 'phrul bshad// blo ldan byang sems ting
'dzin gyis// bdag nyid rdzu 'phrul chen por bsam// dka' thub snatshogs drag po ni// bdag gis byas pa can dam ga/ 'og min zhes bya gnas yin pa// lha yi gnas ni bsam par bya// sangs rgyus
thams cad 'dus pa yis// dag pa 'dus pa rnam par bsam// dang por sas rgyas phyag byas nas// de nas thub rnams la de bzhin// bka'amanos ji skad bstan pa yi// slar yang skyil krung bca' bar/
mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga// kun tu dga' byed bsam par bya// mtshan nyid thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i// bdag nyid sas rgyas sku dang ni// sas rgyas kun gyis pang/
bskyar ba/ lda ni bdag nyid la bsam pya// rdo rje'i gnas su 'dug bya zhing// rtse mo mthon por bsam par bya// dang po sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dang/ de rje shar du 'dug bya zhing//
sangs rgyas 'khor lo rnam par 'phrul// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang sngo// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor rnam par sprul// rgyal po dang bcas rigs dkyil 'khor// sgo srus sgeg mo la sogs
dang// lha mo drang bcas phyag rgyas// sbyor bas dorjecar dbang bskur// rdo rje las su yang dag bya'o/ bdag nyid kyis ni mkha' duphyis su// sangs rgyas thams cad mos byas te// sas rgyas
kun gyi rang bzhin nyid// dbang bskur bar ni yang dag bya// rdo rjechos 'dzin rgyal po ru// dkyil 'khor bkol brtag par bya// sangs rgyas thams cad dgug bya zhing// rdo rje can rnams mchog gzhug
bya[·]bsgrub pa dang ni dbang du bya// bya ba 'di na mchog yin no// rang gi rigs gang dkyil 'khor du// gnas de lhag par mos par bya// 'khor lo ji bzhin bkod ji bzhin// phyag rgyaji bzhin dbang
byas pa'o// las kyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to////rang nyid khrus byas yan lag phyugs// rgyun dang gos ni sna tshogs ldan// dpung rgyan gdu bu nyid dang ni// de bzhin
ser gdub dbu rgyan btus// gser skudamu tig dang ldan pa'i// lag pa rkang pa de nas skye// lus kun rnam par rgyun 'gyur ba// de bzhin ka sha'i sa lhag pa'i// gos dag bzang po bgegs shing gsang/

yang na chos gos 'dzin pa ste// sangs rgyas phyag rgya rgyal mtshan bzhin// gal te skalas bregs dge slong de// rang zhade'akhyil la mdog sngo ba'i// sku ni sngon po bcang bar bya// yang n rang gi mgo la skyes//
bdag nyid rdo rje sems dang 'a 'am// yang na rdo rje las su bya// rnal 'byor rang bzhin gsang med par// dngos grub bzang po thob mi 'gyur// dkyil 'khor dbus su mnyam pa nu// ci rigs par ni
'dug nas su// shar du la bltas ngas nas ni// khengs pa med cing ma 'khrul bar// rdo rjesnyanus par yongs su bskor// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa// lan cig tu brjod par bya// bstod

pa byas nas rang bdag nyid// dngos grub myur ba yang dag khyu// snying rje chen po sbyor ba yis// bdag gis drang srong bskul bar bya// rdo rje sems dpab sems dpa' che// don yod dbang phyug dam pa ste//
theg pa re mchog skus pa'i mchog/ byang chub sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod// sems dpa' chen po thabs chen po// rdo phra 'khor lo mchod pa che// dngos grub chen po rdzu 'phrulatsho// rdo rjesams

dpa' bdag grub ma da/ de rje maM nga ni yang dag gzung/ phyogs rnams kun tu yang dag bskor// dkyil 'khor rdzogs par blta bya zhing// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rjes dran bya// slar yang skyil mo krung bcas te//
na rang nyid 'khor les sgyur// phyag rgya'atshogs na bci pab la// steng las nyung bar mi bya'o// tha na rdo rje sems dpa' na// denyid phyug rgya yongs su gzung// las
nas tshig ni brjod par bya// bdag ni rdorjesems dpa' ste// dkyil 'khor chen po rab sgrub pa// rdo rje la sogs kun gshegs shig/ bdagan rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje sems dpar padag

grub mdzod// chonachen kha bsgyur dri ldan pa 'di/ srad bu lhag pa grims par bskyil// rdo rje srad bu phyag rgya ches// dkyil 'khor chen po thig gdab bya// 'khor le ji bzhin bkod ji bzhin// ji bzhin gzhung/
gi rjes 'brangs nas// dkyil 'khor 'khor le ji bzhin bri// rdo rje'i thog na yodas su gdab// de nas de yi rang rigu gsang// 'khor le chen po rab tu grub// dkyil 'khor chen po 'a 'khor le ni// go rim
bzhin du bshad par bya// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes byas pa'i// thig bzhi dang na yang dag ldan// dar dang 'phreng bas rnam par brgyun// mtshams kyi cha ni thams cad dang//

sgo yi sgo khyud mtshams sun// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras// phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya// de yi nang gi rim pan// 'kher lo lta bur bri bar bya// rdo rje 'phrang bas yos su bskor/ ka ba brgyadakyis/
nyi bar mdzes// rdo rje ka ba'i mdun gnas pa'i// dkyil 'khor lnga yis rnam par brgyan// ji ltar phyi dang nang gnas pa'i// dkyil 'kher ra re rnam par dbye// dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus nyid du//
dkyil 'khor lnga bris gang yin te// ka ba mchegan brgyad kyis spras// dkyil 'khor bzhi pa yin par bshad// dbus kyi shin tu dbus song nas// chos 'dzin rgyal po chen po ste// rnam par
snang mdzad khyab pa dgache// sangs rgyas gzugs ni dgod par bya// sangs rgyas kyis phyogs kun tu // dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbus su ni// dam tshig mchog rnams bzhi po yang// go rims
bzhin du yang dag dri// rdo rjesams dpa' rgyal po che// mdun rgyab tu na gnas pa yin// rdo rje lcags kyu g.yas phyogs su// nub kyi phyogs su bdud 'joms pa// rdo rje legs pa rgyal po mo//
chos 'dzin chen po dbang dang ldan// chos 'dzin pa ni byung du ste// mdun du rdo rje bsnyems tshul lo// de la de yi snying po gsang// shin tu rtogs par byed pa'i mchog/ sdug bsngal kun las rab grol
byed// bya chub sems ni rab bskul ba// hU~M dzas/ shar phyogs chu yi dkyil 'kher du// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus do ru// mi bskyod pa ni dgod par
bya// de shugs kyi snying pon/ datsam gcod pa sngon 'gro can// tshogs sngon 'gro ba bzang po ste// sdig pa thams cad rab 'joms byed// oM ba kA kra ma ho/ sas rgyas kun gyi gsang ba che//

thub pa skyes mchog mi bskyod pa// glang po phyag rgya la gnas shing// zhi ba'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin// de la snying po 'di yin te// hU~M/ de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rdo rje mchog rnams dgod pa
@#/[.. ]/ni rgyan rnams thams cad kyis smras shing// khros bcas bzhin ni 'dzun ldan pa'i/rdo rje su nad pa dpa'i rgyal po ni// rdo rje lcags kyi bstan pa che// rdo rje 'dod chags/

bdung chen po// rdo rje lags pa rdzu 'phrul che// rdorjerin chen dgod par bya// rdo rjechags pa gang bshad pa// rdo rjechos ni dgod par bya// rdo rje legs par gang bshad pa// rdo rdzolas ni yongs su gzung//

dam tshagi rnam pa bzhi pon/ 'khor los sgyur ba dgod par bya// thams cad sangs rgyas cod pan ldan// 'khor los sgyur bar dbang bskur ba// rdo rjerin chen de bzhin las// pad+masna tshogs dga' chen po// bcom
ldan rnam par snang mdzad kyis// byang chub mchog de yang dag gzung// yan lag 'gyur ba lhag ma rnams// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs dgod// de nas sangs rgyas rigs bzhag ste// jorje'i rigs kyi

snying po la// phyag rgya dang ni snying po bshad// rdo rje'i phyag rgyu yongs su gzung// hU~M dza ho// yi ge lnga sogs bshad pa la// yi ge oM ni yang dag dgod// hedz+hachos dbyings ya gi a// yi ge sa ni
tsha yongs su bsgyur// rdorje shugs kyis ltor song nas// rin chen 'byung ldan dkyil 'khor lo// bcom ldan mchog ni yongs su 'dzin// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rdo rje rin chen la sogs bri// rin
chen gzi brjid rgyal mtshan dang// rin chen so yi rgyan bcas pa// de la de rnams kyi snying po ni// o sa tra ha/ nub kyi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// rdo rjeshugs kyis song nas su// de yi dbus su rdo/

wa rdzas chos// 'od dpag med ni dgod par bya'o// de'i snying po ni hUM// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rdo rje pad+ma la sogs bri// pad+man po de bzhin glu// smra ba pad+ma phyag rgya bcas// de la 'di rnams kyi
snying po ni/ hUM hUM maM raM/ rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/ byang gi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// bcom ldan 'das ni don yod grub// sangs rgyas nyid ni dgod par bya// de'i snying po ni kaM/ de yi phyog
rnams thams cad du// rdo rje la sogs pa bri// thams cad srung ba gnod sbyin// las dang khu tshur shin tu brtan// de la 'di rnams kyi snying po ni// kaM haMshu paM/ dbus kyi 'khor lo'i grwa bzhi ru//

lha mo bzha na yang dag bri// jo rje rin chen de bzhin las// pad+ma lha mo bzhi ru bshad// de la de rnams kyi snying po ni// oM a hUM aM// thams cad kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor chen po las// chu dang po 'o
dkyil 'kher dbus ma rdzogs so/// dkyil 'khor dbus ma rdzogs nas ni// phyag rgya thams da yongs su bri// phyag spyade na byin rlabs pa/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su bzung//
byang chub mchog tu dbus nas mchog/ shis pa shar gyi phyag rgya ste// lho yi phyogs su mchog sbyin no// nub tu chos kyi 'khor le 'dzin// byang du mi 'jigs sbyin zhes bya// don yod grub pas yodra/
su gzung// phyag rgya lhag ma phyag mtshan bcas// de nas rdo rje sams tshogs bri// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po las// rdo rje 'khor lo chen de 'a dbus kyi cha zhes
bya ba rdzogs so///jo rje shugs kyis song nas su// shar phyogs kyan dkyil 'khor la// rdo rje rigs chen nyams dga' ba'i// dkyil 'khor ldan
yang dag khri/ dka ba brgyad ni rdo rje che// dkyil 'khor lnga yis rnam par brgyan// dkyil 'khor bzhi dang ldan pa yi// rdo rje 'khor la yos su dgod// de ya shar gyi dbus su na//
sangs rgyas gzugs can yad dag gi/ ut+pal sngon po 'od chen ldan// khro bcas bzhin ni 'dzum ldan pa'i// drag po 'bar ba'a'aphrad bas khyab// rdo rje ti shin tu ro 'dzin// khro bo rdo rje'i
b+hU lta ba 'dzin// gtum pa thams cad rab 'dul byed// sangs rgyas mdun du rdo rje 'dzin// 'bar ba'i dbus su dgod par bya// de bzhin 'bar dbus pad+ma dang// de bzhin rin chen sna tshogs
mtshan// de nyid ra gyi 'khor lo che// shar gyi man song nas ni// de yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rdodzahU~M mdzad yang dag bri// zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa// phyag rgya brgyud na yos
su'adzazhi// mche ba dgan cung zad gtsigs// khro bcas bzhin ni 'dzum ldan pa'i// lcags kyu rdo rje lcags sgrog dang// zhags pa phyag rgya bzhi ru bshad// mda' dang gzhu ni gnyis su
'dzin// gnyis na yig rgyugs bsdus// des ni rkang pa g.yon pa yis// dbang phyug chen po mnan par bya// g.yas pas lha mo u ma ya// nu ma'i bar du mnan pa ste// g.yon brkyang
0 ba yis legs par gnas// 'bar ba'i 'i phreng bas khyab 'od ldan// sku mdog sngon po drag po ste// sangs rgyas thams cad 'jigs byed pa// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rdo rje
khro bo dgod par bya// thams cad khro bo'i 'bar bas khyab// mche ba dgan dung zad gtsigs// khro po sams dpa' khro rdo rje/ de bzhin khro bo chags pa ste// khro bo lags pa drag po ste//
dbus kyi dkyil 'khor bskor bar bya// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni// bro bo'i rgyal po g.yas phyogs su// khro bo'i bdag nyid chen pos bskor// dbus su khro bo khro gnyer can// de yi phyogs
rnams thams cad du// rdo rje khro bo'i dbang skur ldan/ thams cad bri zhingayang dag dgod// khro gnyeracan gyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// 'an chen khro bo
dgod par bya// khro gnyer nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dang// khro bo bzhad pa'i netu byung// dkyil 'khor dam pa gsum pa ru// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni// khro bo'i bdag nyid chen por bskor//
rdo rje'i sne ni yang dag bri// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// pad+ma'i khro bo dgod par bya// chos dang non po de bzhin rgyu/ bzhad pa khro bo rdzu 'phrul che// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni//
las kyi rigs mchog chan bo la// las kyi rgyal po bdag nyid che// rdo rje dbab pa yang dag bri// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// las kyi khro bo la sogs bri// las kyi gnod sbyin srin/
po dang// bsdu ba'i rdzu 'phrul du tshudache// dkyil 'a khor la phyogs kun tu ten rdorje rigs su bshad/ dkyil 'khor chen po che zhes bya// gsang ba de nyid tshogs
kyi bdag/ de nas kun gyi snying po ni// rdo rigs kun nyoms dga' ba'i yi ga rgyun 'di'i brjod de// drag po ha ha zhes sgrog hU~M// [é]shu zhes sgrog 'jigs par byed// de yi dkyil
'khor rgyal po ni// rdo rje'i gsang ba legs 'dus bya// 'khor lo dkyil 'khor gla rnams su// lha mo bzhin yang dag grwa/khro bo'i sems ma rin chen dang// pad+ma dang na las zhes bya//
kun nas mtshams rnams dag tu ni// phyag rgya dam bcas de dag gzung// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyirgyal po las cha gnyis pa rdzogasaso/// shar phyogs kyi cha'i
dkyil 'khor yang rdzogs so/// dbus kyi dkyil la khor 'khor lo yi// ka ba'i phyi rol dkyil 'khor du// sgeg mo 'bring ba de bzhin glu// gar ma lha mo phyag rgya bcas
ra gyi rdoN+Di rigs nyid la// phyi rol gnas su de bzhin nyid// nyi ma la bskyed bzhi po ni// rdo rje lha mos yongs su gzung// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor sbyor 'byung ba// yi ga shun gnatudagod//
de bzhin sangs rgyas rigs rgyal po// yig rgyun 'dir brjod do// phyag rgya rang gi yan lag 'gyur// rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su gzung// phyag rgya thams cad rab sbyor bas// de dag gas pa
tsa zhing mchog gsad bshad/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las// rdo rje rigs chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs so//
lho yi rin chen dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang// de ru phun tshogs dkyil 'khor gyi// 'khor lo lnga po dgod par bya// de yi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo la//
sangs rgyas gzugs ni dgod par bya// zhi chen chen po rta la bcibs// sangs rgyas nu ma de bzhin gshegs// 'bar ba'i 'phrang bas khyab pa'i sku// 'od zer 'phrang bas kun tu khyung//
na chen 'phreng ba mchog 'dzin pa'i// rgyana rnams thams cad kyis brgyan pa// so yi 'phreng ba rab bzhad cing// so yi 'phreng ba'i phyag rgyar ldan// mthe bo'i rtse mo rgyal mtshan 'dzin//
nyi ma'i dbus nas nigs rgyus che// zla ba lta bu'i bdud rtsi'i sku// rje rin chen skal ba che// rdo rjenyi ma'i rigs mchog go/ de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rin chen sems dpa'

lho ru rin chen phyag mtshan rnams// nub tu pad+ma rdo rje sogs// byang du las kyi rdo rje bsnams// rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha gang dag/ phyi rol thig la yang dag bri/ drag po la sogs lha chen rnams//
rgyu snam bu las ni lus phyed phyung// dbang phyug chen po tshangs pa che// khyab 'jug g.yung drung gzhon nu ni// rigs bcas dpung dang bcas rgyal po// shar gyi dkyil 'khor yang dag bri// 'khyil
pa'i 'od can gtum po dang// sar skya rdo rjesar skya rnamag/ rigs bcas 'khor le yang dag ldan// lho yi phyogs su yang dag bri// myos pa 'phrang ldan rgyal nyid pa// rnam par rgyu la dang
myul byed rnams// rigs bcas dpung dang yang dag ldan// nub kyi cha ru yang dag gi/ kesha gos can ma dang rlung// rdo rje 'a jigs byed la sogs rnams// nub kyi chu las 'og tu ni// byang
gi charu yang dag bri// de bzhin dpung dang bdag por bcas// ma ma 'jig rten rab grags dang// gtso bo 'khor le rnam rol pa// lha min la sogs rdzu 'phrul che// phyi rel 2 khor 'a'i rigs
su bshad// rgyud chen gsang ba zhes bya las// stong phrag bcu ru bshad pa rnams// ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa bri// phyi yi dkyil 'kher gnas bur du// dkyil 'khor bzhi ni bri bar bya// me
tog spos la sogs ldan pa// mchod pa'i lha mo yang dag srid/ ji ltar nus shing bro ba dang// ji ltar mdzes shing rjes su ma su// phriltar rang gi rigs bshad pa// ji ltar mngon par 'dod
pa bri// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po gsang zhing mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las/ phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor mchog tu mdzes pa zhes bya ba rkang pa brgyud pa
rdzogs so////de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po ma lus pa rdzogs so////de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di la sangs rgyus kyi byang nub ma lus pa dgug pa 'di 'byung ngo// 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems dang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dgug pa nyid dang/ phyir mi ldog pa'i/
sa la thabs la mkhas pa chen po 'jug par byed pa nyid dang/ donathamasacad la mngon du phyogs pa dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa dang/ byang chub chen po'i tshogs bsags pa sems
can gyi don la mi slu ba ngang/ theg pa chen po 'di las theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa mi spyod cing 'gyur ba med par 'ching ba nyid dang/ thabs dang/ shes rab dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang//
gzungs dang/ spyod pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa sdud par byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chen po nyid la yang dag par byed pa nyid do// de la ragyi sgor rdo rje lcags kyu chen po

zhes bya ba rdo rje'adzin dgod par bya'o// lhoru na rdo rje zhagrwa pa zhes bya bar ng nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog ces bya ba dang/ byang du rdo rje dril bu zhes bya ba'i rdo rje 'adzin pa chen po dgod par bya'o// dkyil 'khor thoms cad
kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor chen po gsang ba zhes bya ba las/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshul ched du brjod pa las rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po rdzogs so//
de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo yin no// byang chub sems dpa'i tshul thob byed// dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs nas ni// dam tshig mchog chen sems dpa' yis// bskor ba dag ni lan gsum

bya malus gsung ba lta bya zhing// kun tu tshogs nas dga' bar bya// gsang ba chad na dag bya zhing// lhag pa rnam par sbyar bar bya// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi// myur du phyag rgyan bstan bya// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam

dam pa na/ lan cig rgyuni brjod par bya// 'khor lo zur ni yang dag gnas// rdo rje lha mo spyan drang bya// phyi rol dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// sangs rgyas mchod rten spyan drang bya// sgo yi dbus na gang gnas pa//

sgosdus rnams ni spyan drang bya// phyi rol dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// sems dpa' chen po spyan drang bya// de nas sgo rnams thams cad du// lcags kyu la sogs las byas te// phyag rgya bzhi ni yang dag bcing// brgyadang

rtsa brgyad dgabya ba// rdo rje lcags kyu kun tu dgug/ rdordzazhugs pas gzhug par bya// rdo rje lcags sgrog kun tu bcing// rdo rjodril bu dbab par bya// sgo'i bya ba'o// de nas dbus su 'dug byas nas//
rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che// rdodzodabye ba'i phyag rgya yis// sgo rnams thams cad dbye bar bya// so srungs bar du dmigs nas ni// sgo rnams dbye bar bya ba yi// rdo rjesdigs mdzub phyag rgya
yis gdug pa thams cad bsdigs par bya// gang tshamachod pa yang dag rtsom// dzesrid dus kyis rdzogs 'gyur pa// gAnAthams cad dag tun// gdugasposa rnams n dbul bar bya// sngon du sgo
mi las byas te// de nas mchod pa yang dag bya// dang por me tog shing la sogs// sgros dang mar ma phyag rgyud bcas// mtshams kyi dus las sngon du ni// bum pa rdo rje spyan drang bya// jo bum
pa'i phyag rgya yis// ci nus par ni spyan drang bya// bum pa shin tu bzang po mchog/ rin chen sna bdun las byas mdzes// yang n yin chen dang bsres pa'o// rdo rjadri yi chu ldan/ rdodzachu yi sngagA

dang ni rdo rje phyag rgyanu gtsang ma// stong dang rtsa brgyad bzlas byas na// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu ru 'gyur// bum pa'i sngags ni/ oM badzra u da ka hUM/ mi tog gi sngags ni/ oM badzra puShAsh+tsa/ marama'i
sngagasan/oM badzra A le ka hUM/ dri'i sngags ni/ oM badzagan+d+he hU~M/ bdug spos kyi sngags ni/ oM badzra d+hu pa hUM/ spos dang me tog la sogs pa// thams cad phyag rgya ldan par bya//
rdo rje phug rgyu bzung byas nas// rdo rje'i sngags kyis rab tu sbyor// dgos ka'i dus nas brtsams nas ni// khrus kyi cho ga yang drag bu/ lus la dri yis byugs pa
dang// rgyun rnams kun gyis legs par brgyan// rdorje'i shugs kyi sngags dang ni// rdo rdzoshugs kyi phyag rgyas su// 'byung ba dang ni 'jug pa yis// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor nyos mi 'gyur/
snun ma rje rda rami mtshan// sas rgyas phyag rgyal sogs tshegs// sems dpa' thams cad mgomo byas kyang// de rje'i rnal 'byor nyesu mi 'gyur// der ni 'gyod pa med par 'gyur// rdo rje
dril bu dkrol ba yis// chog chad dam lhag kyang rung/ 'grub 'gyur nyes par mi 'gyur// gal te 'di ni tshe gar ldan// kun tu 'jigs par mi bya'o// grub pa'i rnal 'byor go cha yis/
sangs rgyas skyon du 'dzin mi mdzad// rdo rje sams dang 'phug rgya zhes// dkyil 'khor mched phyir 'jug par bya'o// zhugs nas dkyil 'kher dbus su ni// rdo rje dag ni dgug par bya// rdo rje
lcags kyu kun bgyis nas// sor mo yis ni dgug par bya// de nyid rdo rje lcags kyu yis// rgyud las dgug pa nyid du gsungs// de bzhin rje rje rigs chen la// rdo rje lcags kyu yang dag bcing//
cin chen lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis// rin po che ni dgug par bya// pad+ma lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ni// pad+ma'i rin chen dgala bshad// las kyi lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis// las kyi rigs chen dgug
par bya// rdo rje chen po'i lcags kyu bcing// sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bya// dkyil 'khor lcags kyu'i phyag rgyayis// dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang byu// phyi rol rdo rje lcags kyu
bcing// phyi rol rje rje rigs spyan drang// bkra shis rdo rje'i lcags kyu yis// byang chub sems dpa'i spyan drang bya// byang phyogs lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis// dkyil 'khor pa rnams spyan drang

rin chen lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis// rdo rje 'dzin pa spyan drang bya// snying po'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis// phyagan rdo rje spyan drang bya// rdo rje lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis// kun la nyishu rtsa
gcig bzlas// bsnyems tshul sdugs kyi phyag rgya yis// rnam snang yang dag spyan drang bya// sangs rgyas lcags kyu'i sbyor pa yis// de bzhin kho nar sangs rgyas rnams// dam tshig lcags
kyu'i phyag rgya yis// dam tshig sems dpa'i spyan drang bya// dgug pa'i sbyor ba byas nas ni// mtshan rgya rtsa brgyad gdon par bya// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad rdzogs nas ni// mchod pa'i sprin
rnams yang dag sgrub// bdag nyid dbul ba la sogs pa gi/ jisnyad bshad pa'i brtul zhugs spyad// bshags dang gsol gdab mchod pa dang// bdag nyid dbul ba la sogs rnams//
bdag gi bya ba rdzogs nas ni// phyag rgya bcing ba ya nga brtsam// brgya'am yang na stong dag gam// brgya phrag brgyan bsdus pa yis// phyag rgya'i tshigs ni bcing byas nas// dkyil 'kher dag
kha/ @#// ni'i grub par 'gyur// de nas dkyil 'khor las byas te// ji srid skya rengs shar gyur pa'i/ de srid phyag rgya yang dag bcing// nges par dngos grub ster bar bya//
de nas las te phyag rgya bcas// dkyil 'khor phyi la byung nas ni// gdug pa la sogs kun bsdogs te// dkyil 'khor mchod phyir 'jug par[S]// rang gis khrus byas lus dris byugs//
ji ltar 'tsham pa'i rgyan gos ldan// shin tu mdzes pa'i gos gyon zhing// 'phreng ldan kha ni drazhim pas// rdo rje gar gyi sbyor ba yis// me tog spyi bor bzhag byas te// chos pa'i rdo rja dga'
ba yis// zhugs nas mgon la dab btud cing// de nyid 'dod chags rjes chags dang// de nyid bskul ba'i phyag rgya yis// dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba// sangs rgyas kun na de
bskul bar bya// skyon dang bral zhing brtag pa ste// 'dod chags kun la rjes chags pa// mchod 'os chen po rgyal po mo// bcom ldan de nyid bdag grub mdzod// de nas dam tshig mchog gi/
a7 phyago rgya cho ga bzhin ba cings nas// rdo rje slob dpon bzhugs nas ni// lcags sgrog phyag rgyu yang dag bcing// de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis// de nyid rdo rje lcags kyu bcing// steng du se gol/

brdabs pa yis/sa pas rgyas thams cad bsku bar bya angs rgyas ba spu ba'i sngags ni dza dza shar gyi sgo ru lag dza// de bzhin lho ru yi ge hUM// nub tu lcags sgrog chen po la// byang du kun tu dbab da ya// rdo rje'i
dkyil 'khor thams cad la// las 'di dag ni yang dag bshad// las ni kun tu rdzogs byas nas// de bzhin ngo mtshar mthong 'gyur ba// mo'i sprul chen po rmad byutshe// sna tshogs brgya dar rtsa
bcu ste// tshob phrul rmad byung chen po rnams// rdodza slob dpon gyis mthong 'gyur// dngos grub bdag nyid chen po kun// dkyil 'khor kun tu 'od bar 'gyur/ rdorjecan dadabyang chub sems//
de bzhin rigs zhinam lta dang// rdo rje dbyisani bdag nyid che// bcom ldan mchog kyang gshegs par 'gyur// rdo rjesams sogs sangs rgyas sras// ngomatshar slob dpon gyis mthod 'gyur//
mchod pa dang gtor ma nyid// ji bzhin cho ga bcas par 'gyur// de bzhin rdzu 'phrul dngos grub bdag/ mthong nas dkyil 'khor bya ba yin// jiltar bkod pa 'khor le dang// ji ltar yo byad
zad pa dang// jaltar brtul zhugs spyod pa bzhin// de bzhin dngos grub thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen dang// sangs rgyas yad dag mthong bar 'gyur// jiltar 'khor
lochen po khyon// 'di ni ngomatshar mchog yin no// ji ltar de rnams bzhugs pa bzhin// de bzhin 'khor lo yongs su gzung// yashis bzang pos khyab pa yi// rmadabyung dam pa thob par
'gyur// dkyil 'khor rmad byung thams cad ni// sa dag brtol nas mthong bar 'gyur// yang na dkyil 'khor bar snang gyi/ nam mkha' la gnas mthong bar 'gyur// ya ngan sangs rgyas kun
ga nga khagi/ sa sa rgyus rgya mtsho mthong bar 'gyur// yan phyogs rnams thams cad du// sangs rgyas sku narab mthong 'gyur// rdorjesams dpa'i gzugs bzhin du//
rdo rje can gyis bdag nyid mthong// yang na gsang ba lnga zhes pa'i// yang nas nigs rgyus mkhas pa'i mchog/ yang na dkyil 'khor gnas de ni// stong phrag gsum ni yongs su bzung// ya ngan
po rjesems gcig tu// dkyil 'khor bdag po zhes bshad do// de yi mtshan mo nyin mo mthong// nyi ma'i 'od kyis kun khyab pa'i// yang na nyi ma 'char ba ste// yang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro//
ma/ dag pa'i zhing na cha thong nas su// sas rgyus rol pa mthong bar 'gyur// 'dus pa shin tu dag pa yi// dbang bskur pa ni mthong bar 'gyur// rmad byung sna tshogs zhes bya ba// rnam 'phrul
ngo tshar 'di mthong 'gyur// rdo rje slob dpon skal chen gyis// dkyil 'khor mchod pa sna tshogs 'gyur// yo byad tshogs par gyur kyang ni// gang zhig bsgribs par gyur pa yis// de bzhin
ngo mtshan nyid mi mthong// rnal 'byor gzhan ni yang dag rtsom// phyag rgya thams cad bcings nas ni/ sdig pa bral ba yang dag bya// rmad byung sna tshogs 'di lta ste// la lar zhugs pa tsam
gyis ni// 'grub pa nyid du gden mi za// dang po'i thun la 'grub par 'gyur// de bzhin la lar mtshan phyed na// gsum pa'ong skya rengs 'char na 'grub// de bzhin la lar nyi shar na// de
ma thag tu mngon 'dod pa'i/ sangs rgyus byang chub mchog 'grub 'gyur// skal ldan thar par 'dod 'gyur na// sa ni dang por 'dod pa ste// rab tu dgakha'is thob nas// gang gis
gnas ma 'gro ba'o// yang rig pa 'dzin nyid dam// de bzhin rdo nyid du 'gyur// ji ltar ma ngen par 'dod par 'grub// sangs rgyas byang chub yongs su 'dzin// mtshamasamad lnga po byed
pa dang// de bzhin sdig pa kun byed pas// gang tshe lan bdun byas nas ni// sgrub pas rnal 'byor 'grub par 'gyur// 'byung ba bzhi las gzugs can min// nam mkha'i gzugs su
rtag tu 'gyur// chos kyi dbyings su 'gyur ba nyid// rdorje'i bka' ni gzhan du min// gang gis lan bdun bsgrubs nas nii// sdig pa dag khanyid 'gyur zhing// nyes par byas pa bsod nams
tshogs// gzhan du 'grub par mi 'gyur te// dad pa med par gnas pa dang// gang tshe the tshom za 'gyur ba// de ni rnal 'byor nyams par 'gyur// byang chub sems ni yongs ma bzung//
sngon du bsnyams pa nyams 'gyur te// rtag tu brtal zhugs nyams par 'gyur// de 'dra' sogs bgegs mang dang/ nga rgyal 'di dag rnam par spangs// sdom pa yongs su ma bzung zhing//
rnal 'byor de nyid tshul shes min// rdo dza slon dpon m brtan 'gyur// 'grub pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro// de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis// gal te sde slob dbon 'gyur// mkhas shing sdom
pa blangs pa dang// byang chub sems ni yongs su bzung// gang tshe 'tsho ba don yod rung// gal te skye ba 'bras bcas 'dod// 'bad pas thams cad nyid kyisan//
rnal 'byor chen po yang dag brtsam// byang chub sems dang ldan gyur nas// rig pa'i sdom pa 'dzin pa yi// de nas rnal 'byor yang dag brtsam// sangs rgyas byang chub rab 'grub 'gyur//

yang zhus pa//rig pa'i rgyud ni rab 'grub phyir sdom pa ji ltar byung bar 'gyi//ji ltar dam tshig bsrung bar bgyi// dam tshig nyams pa ji lta bu// soms can kun gyi don bya'i phyir// byang sems yang dag bskyed nas ni//
zla/ theg pa gzhan la 'dod mi bya// de nas rnal 'byor yang dag brtsam// dkyil 'khor gang na gnas kyang rung// slob dpon gyi ni mdun song ste// zhabs dag la ni btud nas brjod// dga' chen
khyed bdag ston pa bas// slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol// byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bstan pa// mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo// dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol// sdom pa rnams

tsha kyang bdag la stsol// gtso bo dag la sdom pa gsol// slob dpon gyis ni nye bar brtag/ rnam pa kun tu dri bar bya// dam tshig brjod bya gang zhig ni// snod du rung ba de gzhug bya// chu dang slob ma ma
yin yin/ snod dang ldan la sbyin par bya// gal te snod dang ldan par shes// srog dang bdeg pa kun sbyin bya// sngon du dkyil 'khor rab 'jug cing// cho ga bzhin du bcug nas ni// de nas me tog
bcas thal mo// lus btud dga' ba che rnams kyis// bshags pa dang ni gsel ba gdab// rjes su yi nang kun tu bya// rgyud dbang gsang ba las gsung banyid// mchod pa dang bcas yongs
su bgo// byegs rnams kun tu phyag bya zhing// sdom pa chen po blang bar bya/slob dpon la ni rab tu brjod// gtso bo bdag la sdom pa gsol/ dgrub pa'i nyi ma ma lus pa'/ sangs rgyas 'dug
la dgongs su gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ slob dpon dang da du gnas pa la// sangs rgyas rol mo las byung ba/ mi ldeg 'khor lo'abyor par ldan// thar pa chen po'i grong khyer
mchog/ gsang ba chen por 'jug par bgyi// gsang ba rig mthoThams cad du// slob dpon chen po bdag 'jug mdzod// mi ldog pa yi dbang skur ba// skal pa chen po bdag la stsol//
mtshan rnams kun gyis rgyus btab cing// dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan// sangs rgyas sku na yid 'ong ba// slob dpon chen po bdag la sel// dbang bskur ba ni rmad byung tshe// sems can kun
gyi don bgyid phyir// bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon gyur// slob dpon chen po bdag la gsol// gsang ba'i rigs las byung ba yi// rdo rje'i rigs bcas 'khor le ste// rta babs bcas par/
yad dag ldan// slob dpon gyur par shes par bya// dganyid nye bar zhi ba nyid// byang chub sems ni yongs su gzung// gsad ba yin la cer le ru// sde pa dad bcas 'jug par bgyi//
denas slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste// gsang ba chen po rigs dag pa// gsad pa yongs su 'dzin par na// bdag nyid chen po khyed 'ded dam// des
gyad 'tshal zhes brjod par bya// yang slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste// sas rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song// 'di ni sangs rgyas rigs
dag pa'i// dam tshig brtan par gyur pa'o// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yad// blo chen gyis ni gzung bar bgyi// bya chub sems gang de rdo rje// shes rab la bu zhes bshad do// slob dpon
dag kyang gzung bar bya// bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyas// 'di na rdo rje rigs dag pa'i// sdom pa dam tshig yin par gsu ngas// rin chen rigs mchog chen po la// nyin dang mtshan mo lan
gsum du// zang zang mi ba jigs chos dang byams// spyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu spyin// phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum// dam chos khyed kyis gzung bar bya// 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs dag pa'i//
dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsungs// las kyi rigs mchog chen po la// sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni// yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi// mchod pa'i las kyang mi nus bya// de las gzhan/
pa bcu bzhin/ phas pham par rab tu bshad// spang zhing dor bar mi bya ste// rtsa ba'altar zhes bshad do// nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du// nyin re 'de na bzla bar byed//
gang tshe nyams gyur rnal 'byor pa// kha na ma tho sbom por 'gyur// khyod kyis srog chags gsad mi bya// ma byin par yang mi spang ngo// 'dod la log par mi spyad cing// brdzun du smra bar mi bya 'o//
phung krol kun gyi rtsa ba ni// na na rnam par spang bar bya// sems can 'dul phyi ma gtogs pa// bya ba ma yin thams cad sbyang// dam pa nye bar bsten bya zhing// rnal 'byor pa rnams bsnyen
bkur bya// lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang// ngag gi rnam pa bzhi rnams dang// yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ni// ci nus par ni rjes su skyes// theg pa dman la 'dod mi bya// sems can don la
rgyab phyogs min// 'khor ba dag kyang snga ma bya// rtag tu mya ngan 'das mi chags// lha dang lha min gsang ba la// khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya zhing// phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang// mtshan
ma 'gom par mi bya 'o// 'di dag dam tshig yin par bshad// khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar khyu// rjes mthun sdom pa rgya cher ni// gsang ba'i rgyud las rab tu bshad// de nyid kyis kyang brjod
par bya// 'dir ni slob dpon bdag la gson// gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa 3/ de bzhin du mi bgyid par 'tshal// ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams// byang nu gzhun ngas mdzad pa la//
byang chub sems ni bla na med// dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la// tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang// dge ba'i rtsis ni sdud pa dang// sems can
den byed tshul khrims gsum// bdag gis brtan por gzung bar bgyi// sangs rgyas rjes dang dge 'dun te// bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum// deng nas brtsams
te gzung bar bgyi// rdo rje rigs mchogachen po la// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang// yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi// slob dpon dag kyatsagazung bar bgyi// rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi//

dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la// nyin re zhing na dus drug tu// sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab tu sbya'i// byang chub chen po las byung ba// pad+ma'i rigs chen dag pa la// phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum// dam pa'i
ches nagazung bar bgyi// las kyi rigs mchog chen po la// sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni// yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi// mchod pa'i las kyang ma nus bgyi// byang chub sems ni
bla na med// dam pa bdag gis bskyod bgyis nas// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung// ma grol ba ni dgrol bar bgyi// ma brgal ba ni bsgul bar bgyi/
ra dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing// sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod// de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis// tshog bzhin dbang bskur bya// rdo rje slob dpon dbang bskur ba// gsang ba'i rgyud
las rab tu bshad// de lta bu yi che ga yis// rtag pa nyid du spyod pa na// slob dpon rdo rje 'chang chen du// 'a du 'gyur ba the tshom med// rdo rje slob dpon gyi las rdzogs so//

theg pa dman pa spong mi 'gyur// gsang chen rtog pa 'di na// zhugs pa bdag nyid rgyal ba'i sras// thegachen la na gzhol ba rnams// yid ches par ni 'gyur ba ste// gsang ba yi ni phan
yonani// sangs rgyas kyis ni rab tu mkhyen// 'dir ni phan yon mdor bsdus pa// sangs rgyas bde ba thob par 'gyur// yon tan gyi dbang du byas pa'i rgyud rdzogs so/
byed pa po dang skyed byed med// las dang 'bras bu gang las bshad// nga zhes ji skad bshad pa la// nga ni byed po skyod byed dang// ngan skye dgu'i bdag po yin// ngan sna tshogs bdag po ste//
byed po skyed byed mes po yin// yang gsungs pa/ dgapa de bzhin gshegs snying po// sems dpa'i snying bo zhes byar bshad// ngani de bzhin gshegs snying po//
sems can thams cad bdag dang mtshungs// myu ngan 'das bcas sa 'og steng// sakhra 'dzag rten 'dasabs can// ma lus srid pa dag gi gnas// sems tsam du ni rab tu 'jug/ sems
ba can kun gyi sems gang yin// de ni byed po sbyin byed brjod// nga na rgyal bo sems dbang phyug/ phyir nga ni byad por bshad// ji skad gsung ba gzhan las gsungs// nga nyid rang las byung ba
sta tshu ngan 'das bcas sa 'og stang// sa klu srid gsum 'jig rten gsum// gang zhig gnas zhes bya ba'i sems// gnas med las byung gang yin la// snying po de bzhin gshegs dag
pa/ de nyid rang byud nga nyid de// ngani rdo rjecan yad yin// sdug bsngal thams cad sbyangs pa dang// nyes pa kums cad zad pas na/ drung ni byang chub sems rdo rje// nga nyidarang nyid byung ba'o//

ci phyir de nyid ces bshad pa// zab mo'i chos ni ngas rtogs pa// de phyir rang byung nga nyid ni// zhim zhes ni bya ba brjod// ngan zla ba bu kharjod de// nga na chos rnams thams cad kyi// zhi ba kun rtogs par
bshad// de bas zhi ba chen po yis// dran zla ba blo gros che// nga ni gshin rje ste/ ji bzhin chos rnams thamasaN+Dad kyi// ye shes chen po lhag par bshad// de nyid rtogs pa gang yin pa// gshin
rdzong ste gshin rje 'dzin// dbang po ste/ dbang po mig 'phrul zhes bya ba/ 'khor ba las rgal pha rol phyin// ye shes nor ni bsgrubs pa yis// nga na dbang byed dbang po yani// skye dgu ya ni
bdag po ste/ chos rnams kun gyi rnam pa ni// skye ba rtsa nas 'don byed pa// sdug bsngal chen po yongs su shes// de phyir nga ni skye dgu'i bdag/ da bdaganyid na mas po ste// nga yis bdud
rtsi'i chu 'thun gnas // thar pa'i grong khyer chen po ru// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bas// nga nyid kho na mes po yin// ngan 'dod pa'i 'jig rtan yan// ngo bo nyid dad longs spyod rdzogs//
sprul pa'i skur ba 'jug byed// rol chen 'jig rten zhes bya ba// 'ji rten lta ba ston byed yin// srid pa'i 'jig pa las sprul yin// nyon mongs chen po rnam par spras// srid par bshad/

pas// ngan khams gsum pa ru bshad// sa 'og ni/ yang dag de nyid rdo rje che// stong nyid de bzhin nyid ces bshad// ji ltar sa ni 'dzan pas mchog/ de bzhin nga ni chos 'dzin pa//

gzod nas ma skyes 'byung ba med// bdag min bdag med ngan skye dgu'i bdag/ srid pa'i khri shing gis bcings sems can gdungs// da ni grol byed 'khri shing dag byed pa/ rlun/
mtshan ma rnam par bsgoms nas ni// mtshan ma med pa 'dus ma byas// byang sems 'khri shing zhugs pa dag/ 'ther byed de bzhin rlung yin no// ngan dbang phyug chen po ste// rdo rje tshogs
kyi bdag po chen po byed// ngan sa ngas rgyas dbang phyug gzhan ci smos// bdud rtsi chen po thar pa'i grong khyer che// na dbang sgyur dbang phyug mo// nga brtul zhugs zhos bshad do// nga nyan mod+ma
'joms par bshad// ngani rgadang 'chi ba las// des par grol bas tshangs par bshad// 'jig rten gsum gyi lus su ni// zhugs pa zhe sdang gti mug ni// khams gsum 'jig

pa kun// sems 'a sa kun tu byung ba'i rlabs// ngan thugs 'dzin rgyal po ste// des na da ni srid pa'i gnas// ngan 'dod pa ste/ thar pa'i rang bzhin grong khyer che// dgangs pa mtha'
thug nga yis bshad// ngani sems can kun la 'dod// de bas nga ni 'dod par bshad// thar pa pa ste/ da nyid thar zhing sems can kun// so sor ya ngan grol bar byed// des na rang
byudar nyidan// thar pa'i 'dzin pa'i rgyal po yin// ngan dmyal ba ste/nga ni bdag dang chos rnams min// tani chags sdang kun tu bral// nga yis 'chi med las bstan pas// nganangargyal ba'i
dmyal ba pa// nga ni yi dwags te// mngon par 'dod pa nga yis thob// sems can bsgom pa sman par byed// de yis dka' ba'i gnas thob pas// duniyi dgas yang gs skyes//

pa ste// sems can grol ba rjes chags phyir// srid pa gcod phyir zhe sdang dang// gsang mdzod 'dzin pa ser sna can// sa chas can 'dod pas 'dod pa dang// sems can smin byang se/

de bas nga ni gsang ba'i bdag/ yang na byin gyis rlob pa dang// bsnyems bcas sgrig pa ba zhal mnga' ba// tha ni de yi stong gyur nas// gang du gsang bar brjod pa'o//

gtong mi byed// rig pa'i brtul zhugs ldan 'gyur ba// des ni gsang ba ba sgrub 'gyur// drag dang ldan pa'i sems M ldan pa// des ni 'grub par 'gyur bar 'dod// sdug bsngal thums
