ta thA ga ta tsakra sa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pi shA// oM sarbatathA ga ta tsakra hU~M/ o a nud pan no a/ oM a nu ru te yA/ oM a na le A/ oM ni le I/ gor/ zhu/ oM rat+taM
u o sa u raM/ oM a hUM/ a ta laM/ 'om gar ra lA/ o a shane e/ o rgyu thagyi i/ o saN+Da shA ba ripArtsa yo o byur de tsho/ tshosgyu raNi/ o si a
o ma hopra ka o ti kha/ oM a nu kha ga a b+ha khe ga e dzAnang/ tshats+tsadatsa/ o da ra hin ga o b+ha sha dza go b+had+hadz+ha/ oM pu pag menya/ o d+hi/
o har Natha/ o d+hi g+haDa/ oka ba/ o aN cha/ o TakI le ta/[“]o ba le o star ched/ o ba ta ked+ma/ o ba lo ki na/ o ratab/ oM sa ha ra tsir/
e byu ba ni/ i b+hi yu shani/ sol A re tun/ oM a lan ya/ o tAhung/ o bshal/ mo bud tsa/ e ma sha/ o ya ma chu/ oM sarba sa/ o d+hu li
ni ha/ hotha/ tshung/ hAs/ o a/ ba ha/ a'o/ ni gi da 'u/ tar d+hi/ b+hu ba/ sa ya/ ma hi/ kod+ha/ d+ham sha lha ra ya/ yuk+ti/ dar sha na/ h+phas ya//

pham sgaNi/ d+haraN/ oM sarba ta lha gtas bi dzAm snyamu khyer dzagan+d+horAdzakra ya hi tshu phyitshubu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'di// mdo sde gsang dbang las gsungs bas// chos dbyings brtan pa'i
rang bzhin te// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs las byung// bde legs bsgom pa byas dang mtshungs pa med// e ma 'ogs pa chen po gsang ba kun bsdus pa// rnal 'byor rgya cher bsdus pa 'ang mtshungs pa med/
bde ba chen po 'di ni brtan zhing brtan pa'i dngos por 'gyur// dga' ba chen po'i slob dpon dga' chen nyi ma ste// mchod 'os gsang ba'i tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor kun bsdus pa// kun mkhyen
gsung las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor kun bsdus pa// tshogs rgyas rab tu 'phel bar gyur pa gsungs pa yin// rdo rje chen po skal ba ches// gsang ba thams cad rjes su bslab/ de nyid chos ni rnal
'byor che stug po bsdus pa 'jug por bya// brgyudang sum cu rtsa drug lhag/ tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor kun bsdus pa// dri dang rdor tshig yi ge yis// dkyil 'khor gsang ba bslab par bya//
rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor kun bsdus pa// dkyil 'khor gsang ba 'dir ni// de nyid yig rnam dag pagi/ rnal 'byor chen po 'jug par bya// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ rta babs
bzhi ni rnam par brgyan// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dar gyi chun pos rnam par brgyan// rdo rje dbyings sogs sbyor ba yis// sdug po gsang ba shin tu brtan// nganyid gsang ba bslab bya'i
phyir shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bslab// e ma'o dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor kun bsdus pa// rdo rje dbyings sogs sbyor ba yis// mkhas pas yang dag bri
zhing dgod/ gru bzhi mnyam pa'i rim pa ni// de nyid kyi ni nang du bya// dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus kyi char// sangs rgyas gzugs ni dgod par bya// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// mi rigs
par ni yang dag bri// sa bzhi'i rang bzhin dkyil 'khor la// yi ge sum cu rtsa drug dgod// sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun tu // yi ge bcu drug yang dag khri// yig bdudrug rgyal po ni// phyag rgya'i
tshogs dang 'od bcas pa// dkyil 'khor chen po'i logs bzhi ru/ yi go rnams ni yang dag bri// yi ge sum cu sum cu// phyogs rnams kun tu dgod par bya// sangs rgyas thugs ka'i dbus

su ni// yi ga hU~Mnisbyar bar bya// gang zhig sbyor ba'i ming can gyi// sangs rgyas dbus su dgod par bya// rdo rje yi ge rab sbyor byed// shes rab can gyis yi ge rnams// rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin pa yis//

dbus su rdorjodordzabazhi// shar du yi ge sum cubri// yi ge sum cu de bzhin lhor// sum cuphyang gi phyogs cha ru// nub tu sum cu sbyar bar bya// yi ge bcu drug yang dag sbyor// dbus su ba ngas rgyas bzhi

ldan bya// rdordzoganod sbyin rnal 'byor che// rnal 'byor dbang phyug dbang phyug che// dung la ldan 'ajig rten rnon por ldan// dbab pa brtan pa'i tshigs gyur pa// smyo ba las byung rgyal ba che// sas rgyas rnal
'byor 'jug par bya// mu re nyako ta mahA yo rnyapyad ra te nag na/ de nas sbyor ba 'di yis ni// jo rje 'khor lo gzhug par bya// hahahathogasang chen po'i// rtse gsum ral pa gsum 'dzin pa//
rtsachen gzi brjid chen po'i don// rdo rje glig gis yongs su bskor// slob dpon chen pos blta byas nas// yi ge rab tu brjod par bya// jorje'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yis// rje'i 'khor la kun tu spyo//
a A'i rnal 'byor yang ngag gzung// i I dbang phyug chen po'i 'od// u u rnon po 'chang ba rgyu/ dbye[']cig sgra dbyangs rang bsal ba// o so skyabasakhyed rtsigs chen po// dam ashas
rab ston bzang ba// jorje lcags kyu 'di yis kyang// ro dzi'achang bskul bar bya// ji ltar 'khor lo philtar rigs// ji 'os ji ltar rdo rje'i tshogs// de bzhin 'khor lo yongs su dgod// rdo rje
slob dpon dka' thub che// skal ba chen po gsang ba 'di// rdo rje 'khor lo yang dag sbyor// rnam 'phrul de ni rab tu bskor// 'khor lo dbab dang gzhug pa dang// rtog ji bzhin 'jug par bya//
dbyings sogs dkyil 'khor du// rgyas par ji ltar bstan pa bzhin// rigs kyi dkyil 'kher 'khor lo dang// 'khor le dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa// 'khor le'i gnas ni dbang

du 'gyur// chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag ldan// rdo rje'agugs dang skal ldan dang// nges byed rin chen gzi brjid dang// rgyal mtshan bshad pa yang dag ldan// chos dang rnon po gtso bo mchog/ rgyudang gtum
po drag po che// las dngasrung ba gnong sngon grub// sna tshogs sbyor ba yang dag ldan// 'khor lo'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'gyur// de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// rdo po 'khor la kun tu bri// rdo rje 'dzin
kun slob dpon gyis// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni gzhug par bya// bu dang slob ma min pa la// gsang ba'i tshogs chen sbyin mi bya// gzhan du skal ba dang ldan pa// gzhung 'di khyod kyis ci bder byin//

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gus pa nga'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po shin tugasang ba'i rnal 'byor mchog tu gsang ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdo rje rtse mo las/ rdo rje rigs kyi de kho na nyid shin tu gsang
ba'i bshad pa ste le'u bzhi pa rdzogs so///de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bcas pas slar yang de pazhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

de kho na nyid rdo rjesams dpa' la mtshan brgyartsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab par gyur to// rdo rje tshu mdzad rdo rje mchog/ rdo rje mchog 'dzin rdo rje'i mda'// rdo rje khro gnyer rdo rje'i lus// rdo rje 'bar ba la

mtshan che rdo rje gad rgyangs rdo rje'i bdag/ rdo rje snga ste chos mchog 'dzin// rdo rje rgyal mtshan shin tu rno// rdo rje 'khor lo bzlas pa che// las kyi rje ri rdo rje che// rdo rje gnod spyin 'jigs chen po// rdo rje

phyag rgyas chen po// rdo rje khu tshur brtan pa che// rdo rje 'bar ba rdo rje che// las chen po ste mnga' chen po// rdo rje legs pa dga' ba che// rdo rje rgyanan 'phrog byed pa// rdo rje 'od de rgyal mtshan te// rdo rje tshogs

rab dga' ba// rdo rje ba shin tugacod// rdo rje dkyil 'khor rdo rje rig/ rdo rje lcags te sna tshogs che// sna tshogs mtshon chen skye dgu ma dul// ge ma chen po rdo rje sku// rdo rje mche ba 'jigs byed
pa/ rdordzabasngags pa rdo rje/ rdo rje khro bo gzhu chen po// rdo rje lcags kyu mdzod chen po/ zhags pa chen po dbang chen po// rong lcags sgrog 'debs pa che// rdo rjed bab pa 'jigs byed pa// yi ge

dza ste yi ge hUM// yi ga rgyun dam du 'ching// yi ge hoskye yi go d+ha// rdo rje phyag rgya dregs pa mchog/ rdo rjesams dpar khro bo che/ lcags kyu bsdigs med rdo rje khre// rdo rje bdud de bdud kyi mchog/

bdud kyi bdud ni rab 'joms pa// rdo rje dga' ba zhi ba che// rdo rje dka' thub ngashis mdzad pa// rdo rje drag po shin tu gdug/ rdo rje rang dbang rdo rje mdzad// rdo rje 'dod pa khro bo ni// rdo rje sgra ste sgra chen po//
sangs rgyas tshu mdzad yi ge hUM// yi ge phaT sogs dang mnyam pa/yi ga phaT ni 'bar ba'i bka'// yi ge spu h+pha rang bzhinamed// gtsob gsong dang slongan dzad pa// dri med sgrug dang dbugs 'byin
mdzad[：]sangs rgyas sas rgyus khre le che// khro bo rdo rje de bzhin gshegs// 'dod chags las byung de bzhin nyid// rdo rje khro bo khyod phyag 'tshal// mtshan brgyartsa brgyud/
dam pa 'di// nyin re bzhin du lagacig ni// gang zhig 'don par byed pa de// dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur// de dag lani 'jigs pa med// 'phongs dang bran dag nyid mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas
rdo rdzo'adzin bstan pa// dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur// dpa' bo khyod la gsol ba 'debs// gdug pa rnams ni gdul ba dang// de bzhin sems can don bya'i phyir// tshul chen bskyod par
mdzad du gso la// gsang ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud ngo tsha rtse mo zhes bya ba rdzogs so/// rgya gar gyi mkhan po rdo rje slob dpon chen po karma badzra'i zhal snga nas dang/ lo tsa ba dge
slong gzhon nu tshul khrims kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o// bam po bcuganyis pa'o// @#// rgyugar skad du/ sarba ra hasu nA ma tan rAdza/
bod skad du/ thams cad gsang bo zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'byung lnga nyid kyis lnga yi bdag nyid can// mi rnams lus la
nges par mthong ba dag/ rang sems rab tu bsgoms par gyur na ni// dngos der bsgoms pas nges pa ra sangs rgyas 'gyur// rab shes gsang ba dam pa ni// sa sa rgyas shes bla med de// gnyis//
[d, ]med gnyis kyi tshul can te// sas rgyas rtag pa rab tu 'dud// yang dag bdag med las byung zhing// gnyis med ye shes las byung ba// sdug dang mi sdug rnams spangs pa// ci la'ang
phyag ni mi 'tshal to// ma skyes pa ni yang dag bskyod// skyos pa'i 'og tu rtag par ni// sas rgyas skuran sgom pa de// rang ga ye shes mchog phyag 'tshal// rnal 'byor pa dang se mas can
kun ma skyes pa ni yang dag bskyed// skyes pa'i 'og tu rtag par ni// nyon mongs bag chags [”]kyis sun 'byin// lus can rnams na 'khor gyur pa// sdug dang mi snag rnam 'byed yin//
sems gang de nyid sdug bsngal te// sems can rnams kyi lus 'byung ngo// sems de yi ni rgyun nyid kyis// 'gro ba sdug bsngal gnod par 'gyur// rnam par snang mdzad rgyal po mgon//
sangs rgyas thams tsang bsdus gcig du// sa sa rgyus thams cad rtogs gyur pa// sangasargyus 'khor ba sgrol ba po// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// thugs rje'i nyan sa dang yang dag
ldan sgyu yi de nyid mnyam sbyor bas// 'bras bu'i de nyid rnams kyang ston// 'bras bu'i de nyid yang dag zhugs// rgyu yi de nyid mi 'dod do// gang du 'dod pa skyes gyur pa// de nyid 'khor ba'i
bags chags yin// mkhas pa yi ni tshe ga yis// sgom pa ru ni yongs su brtags// gang zhig slar ya nga gcig gyur pa// rnal 'byor pa pa rnal 'byor byung// sangs rgyas rjes dran la/
dmigs gang// chos ni rjes su dmigs pa yi// tshogs gnyis kyi ni sbyor ba yis// rkang gnyis dam pa nyid du 'gyur// b+ha gar ling ga rab gzhag ste// sangs rgyas//
skur ni rnam par sgom// sa ngas rgyas rjes dran rnal 'byor ba// sa sa rgyus sprin ni bsgom par bya// b+ha gar ling ga rab gzhag ste// rdo rje chos ni rnam par sgom// chos ni rjes dran rnal 'byor
pa chos kyi sprin las char rab 'bebs// mtshan ni ling ga zhes bshad do// phyag rgya'i mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi// 'joms pas b+ha ga zhes bshad do// nyon mongs 'joms pa'i dam pa yin//
sems can kun gyi dngos kun gyi// rang sems chos ni bsdus pa yin// tshes bdag med pa'i sbyor ba yis// bsad na rang nyid 'di bar 'gyur// rang gyi sems nyid rdzogs sangs rgyas// rtogs

tsa par bya ba sems nyid yin// rang gi sems nyid gsad bya ba// de nas nyid kho na gsad par bya// sbyor ba nyid dang yang dag 'brel// gang yang srid pa 'byung ma yin// gang tshe sangs rgyas de tshani//

sbyor lnga sa ngas rgyus bdag ces sgom// ting 'dzin ye shes las byung nga// sangs rgyas nyid phyir mdor bsdus pa// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor med par ni// rnal 'byor pa ni 'tshang mi rgyu// phra mo 'i denges
po ji bzhin mthong// sdug pa'i dngos por de ngazhin te// dngos dang dngos ma da khyad par ni// sgom pa kun du brtags pa yin// dngos po sgom pa'i dngos ma yin// bsgom par bya ba sgom pa min///
dngos be sgom par gyur pa yis// rang gi sems ni yongs su sbyang// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas yul ma yin// sems can yul du 'ang mi 'gyur gyi// rang sems rtogs pa sasangs rgyas te//
sangs rgyas sangs rgyas rtogs pas min// gnyis med sbyor ba 'di la yang// ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes brtag/ rgyu yi de nyid ltar mthong// 'bras bu'i de nyid de nyid yin/ rgyu yi de nyid cung zad med//

'bras bu'i de nyid de bzhin no// de nyid de ni de bzhin shes// de nyidarnal 'byor pa kun spyod// rgyu yis rgyun ni dngos por min// 'bras bu'i dngos por 'bras bus zin/ rgyu de 'bras bu'i dngos por rung//
rang gi sems nas sor snang// ye shes de ni rgyu dngos te// gsang de 'bras bu'i dngos po yin// gsang ba gnyis med spyod pa yis// dayi dngos pos mchog yin no// de nyid de nyid rtogs gyur pa// gsang
de gsang ba'i rnal 'byor pa// gsang ba de rig shes pa ste// mchog ni mchog gi rnal 'byor pa// sdug pa'i ngo bor gang bshad pa// mi sdug pa yang de yi dngos// sdug dang mi sdug gzugs gang yin//
mi mthong don de bzhin gshegs// rnam shes tsam na med pa ru// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor 'byung mi 'gyur// ji ltar ye shes mchog dgo pa// de ltar dag pa de bzhin gshegs// rnam par shes pa rnam pa
bzhi phyag rgya bzhi yi cho ga yis// gsang pa gnyis mang sbyor ba yis// sku gsung thugasani yang dag byung// thugs ni phyag rgya chen po ste// dam tshig phyag rgya kun tu 'gro// chos kyi phyag rgya
gsung gi ste las kyi phyag rgyasku yi yin// rgya yis rgyas btab dngos po ni// gsang bdag gsang ba'i rnal 'byor pa'i// rang rig pa yi ngo be yis// ting 'dzin ye shes
brtags pa yin/ lus ngag sems su rnam rtags pa'i// bya ba rgyud du rnam brtags pa// gsang ba rnam pa gsum du bshad// rdo rje las can sna tshogs bzhin// sangs rgyas lnga yi bdag nyid
ni gsang ba'i ye shes ba med yin// phyag rgya bzhi po gsang ba do// rnal 'byor pa yis las grub byed/ 'byung pa chen po bzhi po yang// phyag rgya bzhi zhes bshad pa yin// phyag bzhi yis ma/
sbyor ba lca mo bzhi dang yang dag sbyor// sa na sbyin zhes bshad pa yin// chu ni mA ma kAzhes bshad// me dang rlung zhes grags pa nadi/ gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma yin// dbang chen sa yi
khams yin te// chu yi khams na chu dkyil 'khor// dman mo yi khams yin te// rlung ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro// dbang chen kha dog ser po ste// gru bzhi pa ste rgyas pa yin// chuya dkyil 'kho
zlum po ste// dkar po'i mdog can zhi ba'i yin// ma yi dkyil 'khor kha reg dma'o/ rgyu gsum dbang gi las rnams la'o// rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu yi dbyibs// nag po'i gdug pa'i
las rnams la// 'byung bache'i bdag las grub pa// las kyi dngos grub yon tan bzhi// las kyi dngos grub dngos grub mchog/ 'khor los sgyur ba rnam pa bzhi// zhi ba la ni spyan gyi tshul//

[o/ ]rgyas pa pad+ma'i sde rje can// dbang la rnam par snang mdzad gnas// rdo rje khro bo mngon spyod la'o// zhi ba dgos ka bya ba yin// de bzhin rgya sa pa snga dro la// gdug pa'i las rnams nyi ma'i gung// dbang

eka la mtshan pheng ba zhi la dkar po spang bar bu// ser por snang ba rgyas pa la// dbang gi las la dmar po ste// gdug pa nag por rab tu myur// ting 'dzan ya shas lamkhas pa 'an rab ng ga las la ma nge/ dgadug pa nag por rab du par/ ting 'dzani ye shes las ba/ las
kyi sgrub pa dam pa yin// bcom ldan dag pa bsgom bya ste// sangs rgyas kun las mi g.yo gyur// lhags dbus su gsang ba'i bdag/ rdor dbyings na de bzhin gshegs/ dalnga yi bdag gyur
bdag nyid ni// bsgomasan g.yo ba med par 'gyur// snying la gnas pa'i lha mo tsho// rnal 'byor pa yi rnal 'byor bskyed// sangs rgyas thams cad skyong mdzad yum// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad//
'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ste// 'di dag 'jig rten dug gsum yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan dug mi mnga'// rdo rjadabyings ni de bzhin gshegs// chags dang sdong dang rmongs pa rnams// bsgoms/
nas bar s gsum pa yi bdag/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gyur te// sangs rgyas bden pas dug bcomamo// rang sems so sor rtogs pa yis// gti mug sems ni de bzhin gshegs//
rmongs pa nyid ni 'jig rten gyur// sems can kun la blta bar bya// zhe sdang rnams ni de bzhin gshegs// phra mo'i ye shes yang dag bskyed// sdang gyur rdo rje nyid du gyur// sems can thams
cad gzhig par bya// 'dod chags sems ni de bzhin gshegs/ byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed// chags gyur bzang po nyid gyur pa// sangs rgyas thams cad
chags par bya// byams pa'i sems ni de bzhin gshegs// nga rgyal yang dag bskyed nas ni// mdza' bor gyur cing kun nyid gyur// sangs rgyas kun la 'khyud par bya// chags pa'i
lta bos byams pa ste// thugs rje'i chos ni smra ba dang// kun la mi 'jigs sbyin pa dang// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes bya'o// rnal 'byor sbyin las rab dga' ste// tshul khrims ldan las
dri mang 'gyur// bzod pa las ni 'od byed pa// brtson las 'od 'phro can daldan// pas ma gtam las ni sbyang dka' ba// shes rab kyis ni mngon gyur mthong// thabs chen la sa ni ring
du song stobs dang ldan las mi g.yo 'gyur// smon lam gyis ni legs blo ldan// ye shes ldan las chos kyi spun// rgyal ba de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ rang rig bdag nyid bcu gcig
'gyu pha rol phyin pa bcu rnams dang// stobs dang dbang ni rdzogs gyur cing// sa bcu las ni 'das gyur pa// mtshan ma brtan gyur de las ni// rdo rjedu ni rdzogs sangs rgyas// chos kyi bdud rtsi
la bcud len yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi mtha' yas pa// gzungad pa'i dzin pa spangs pa yin// chos kyi bdud rtsi bcud kyis len// rdo rje'i chu ni dag 'thungs pas// rdordzaslob dpon rnal 'byor ba//
gdod nas dag par de 'gyur// gdod nas dag par gnas gyur pa// de nas byang chub sems su 'gyur/ byang chub sems kyi bdag can 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//
rnam par grol ba'i rus kyis g.yogs// byung chub sems ni bla na med// yang dag bskyod gyur rnal 'byor pa// rdo rje soms dpa' snying la 'jug/ sems can khams nAmatha' yas pa'i// mar
gyur dam tshig 'dzin byed pa// do dam tshig gis spyad n// rtag tu dam tshig gnas bar rgyu// khams gsum 'am ni nyams dga' bar// bud med ces bshad ji snyedapa// cho ga bzhin du

kun spyod cing// thugs kyi rdo rje smad ma bya// rdo rje gsum gyi sku la gnas// dam tshig phyag rgya ji snyed pa// rdo rje dam tshig gsum gyis bya// gsung gi rdo tsho smad mi bya// rdo rje sams dpa' las byung
ba'i phyag rgya kun ni bud med bzang// de rnams sten pa'i rnal 'byor pa// phyag rgya thams cad dbang du 'gyur// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad na// bud med ces bya risnyed pa// phyag rgya chen po'i
sbyor ba yis// de dag kun la nye bar spyad// gsang ba mchog gi rnal 'byor pa// ting 'dzin ye shes dam pa yin// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// nga rgyal ma yin rgyu ma yin// rig pa
ma yin sngags rig min// lag pa'i phyag rgya'ang mi bca' 'o// mchod rten gyi ni las mi bya// glegs bam dag kyang bklag mi bya// dkyil 'khoradag ni mi bu zhing// rdo rje mchog gsum
phyag mi btsal// slob dpon smad par mi bya ste// bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// khyod kyis srog chags gsad par bya// brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra bar bya/[– ]/khyod kyis
zla ma byin bang bya zhing// gzhan gyi bud med bstan par bya// sbyin sreg yang na bsam gtan min// lus ngag yid ni mi phyudang// gzhan min sems kyis bya ba ste// 'di gsad pa'i mchog yin/
no sngags rnams thams cad rab tu 'grub// rnal 'byor kun kyang rnam kun tu // de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ sangs rgyas chos nyid bsgom par bya// ma 'dres chos ni bco brgyud
sgyu po sas rgyus chos zhes bshad pa yin// de rnams rtag tu sgom pa ni/ sangs rgyas chos ni sgrub byed yin// bsam gtan bzhi dang gzugs med bzhi// rtag tu thob par byas pa dang/
'gog pa'i snyoms 'jug de yis ni// sas rgyas byang chub rab tu bsgrub// byang chub phyogs mi sum cu bdun// chos su yang dag bshad pa gang// de rnams bsgoms pas dag pa dang//
byang chub sems dpa' 'gre phan yin// 'gro ba rnams la spro ba'i sems// brtan zhing snying po rab bsgoms pa// stong pa'i de nyid las phyung ba// rdo rje ye shes zhes bya bshad// chos bdag
med la yang dag byung// gnyis med ye shes dam pa ste// chos nyid mchog gi yang shes ni// chos kyi dbyings zhes yang dag bshad// 'di ni chos dbyings ye shes te// rdo rje lta bu'i ting
ba0 'dzin skyes// jo rje ye shes rang bzhin mas/// rdo rabyis zhes bya bar bshad// sems kyi smra ba'i sbyor ba yig// phra mo'i ye shes sogs sbyor ba// de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes
ni ma par snang mdzad ces byarab shad// byams pa spo bar sbyor ba yis// sbyor ba stong nga ra byed pa'ikachog/ zag med brtan par gyur pa yis// thugs ni mi bskyod pa zhes bshad/
thugs rje spo ba'i tshul gyis ni// sems can phan 'dogs mdzad pa po/thugs na 'gro don yang dag ldan// rin chen 'byung ldan zhes bshad de// dga' bas spro ba'i sbyor ba yis//
thog chen mchog ni dri ma med// thugs ni 'od gsal dag pani// 'od dpag mdarus de bshad do// btang snyoms spro bar mdzad pa'i shugs// sems can thams cad rtogs mdzad
pa don yod bla mar bya ba ni// don yodagrub par de bshad do// byang chub rang bzhin ye shes mchog/ de 'di'i rdo rje zhes bzhad de// rdo rje ye shes las byung ba// rje rjes sa dpa' re
bshad do// sa sa rgyus thams cad spyan 'dren pa// rdo rje lcags kyu zhes bshad de// doji'i rigasa rnams kun gyi rgyal// rdo rje rgyal por de bshad do// sa rngasargyas thams cad nags khyed
bsaT mnyes par byed pa zhes bshad de/ bdud kyi sbyor ba chags pa che// rdo rje chags par de bshad do// sangs rgyas thams cad manyes khyedacing// legs so zhes pa rab sog
pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' byed pas// rdorje legs par de bshad do/ byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa gang// mkha' mnyam rdo rje las byung ba// don yod
rin chen po de// rdo rjerin chen de bshad do// ma rig bral ba'i ye shesan/ tshogs dag las ni nges par byung// thar pa'i snang ba gzi brjid che// doji mang de bshad po// rnam pa kun gyi
dngos ye shes// thar pa'i lam 'jug thob mdzad gang// chos kyi rgyal mtshan tog chen po// rdo rje dpal du du bshad do/ 'jordza bzhi d pa rnal 'byor// sas rgyas kun 'byung rmad byung ba//
'di ni byang nub sa mas dpa' che// rdo rdzo bzhi d par do bshad do// sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che// saMs rgyas chos ni rtogs mdzad pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos dag pa// rdo
chos su de bshad do// shes rab rnon po theg pa che// nyon mongs thams cad nges gcodamad// shes bya'i sgrib pa gcod pa po// rdo rje rnonapor de bshad do// sangs rgyas rol mo'i 'khor lo
ni chos kyi 'khor lo rab skor bas// sems dpa' chen po theg pa che// rdo rje rgyu zhes de bshad do// shes rab ye shes rang bzhin dag/ gsung gi sgra ni rnam par spangs// 'jam pa'i gsung
tshad ga bag nyidagyur// rdo rjes bar do bshad do// pha rol phyin pa kun gyizhabs// chos rnams thams cad rtogs mdzad pa// sems can kun don sprul pa po// rdo rje las zhes bya bar bshad//
gangs rgyas rjes dran yang dag grub// theg pa dman ba rnam pas shing// byang chub sems la rab zhugs pa// rdoN+Di gung bar de bshad ro/ sdig pa thams cad zad byecing// de bzhin nyon mo sa rnams
sbug lag nyonachos zad pa nyer len bas// rdo rje gnod sbyin debadado/ skugasung thugs kyi rdo rnams// bcing ba ru ni yang dag gyur// de nyid de nyid ye shes te// rdo rje khu tshur zhes bshad
do/dam tshig phyag rgyathams cad ni// rdo rje bsdams las yang dag byung// rdordzogs khu tshur gnyis gyur pa// las kyi phyag rgyuzhes bshad do// nga lamad cing snang ba yod// mtshan ma med cing zhen
med bdag med mnyam nyid ye shes ni// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar bshad// gsang ba'i mnyam par 'byor pa 'dir// yongs la rol phyin rag ba// rnam pa 'dug nyis yang dag byung//
rdo rje pha rol phyin pa'i 'od// byang chub sems ni rab bsgoms pas// pha rol sa sa rgyas nyid son pa// pha rol phyin thob ye shes ni// rdo rje sems mar bshad pa yin// bsdu ba'i dngos po
bzhi rnams ni// shes rab pha rol phyin rdo tshe// chos bzhi gcig tu gyur pa ni// rdzogs rin chen mar bshad do// gsang ba'i ye shes ye shes che/ de nyid pha rol phyin dge ba/ pha rol phyin pa che
las byung// rdo rjechos mar shes par bya// pha rol phyin pa'i dge ba ni// spyor ba'i thabs su rab bstan pa// rdo rje las mar shes par bya// gang phyir de ni rol pa dge/ sgeg mo sbyin pa'i pha rol
phyin/ tshul khrims pha rol phyin dge bas// brgyan pa'i yan lag yid 'ong yin// glu ma bzod pa'i pha rol phyin// ched du brjod pa'i chos brjod pa'o// gar ma brtson
'grus pha rol phyin/ myur du sangs rgyas nyid ster ba'o// bdug pa shes rab pha rol phyin// kun tu khyab par sbos phyir ro// me tog bsam gtan pha rol phyin// 'dod pa'i 'dam gyis ma gos pa'o//
! mar ma smon lam pha rol phyin// phyogs kun snang bar byed pa yin// drin thabs kyi pha rol phyin// dri nganathur sol dag ba yin// sa sa rgyas kun gyi thabs chen po// dbye ba rnam pa bzhi yis gnas//

thams cad 'dod pa'i thabs chen po// rdo rje lcags kyu zhes bshad do// byang chub spyad pa spyod byed pa// rdo rje zhags pa zhes ba shad do// theg pa 'di la brten gyur gang// rdo rje lcags sgrog ces bshad/
da chos rnams thams cad ma skyes shing// gdod nas zhi ba mkha' dang mnyam// de lta'i ga ni rab 'jug pas// rdo rje dril bu zhes bshad do// tshogs gnyis kyi ni sbyor ba yis// sems can kun
gyi don ston pa'i// sems ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yin par bshad// yang dag rjedza rtogs pa ste// 'dzin pa'i sbyor nyid lcags kyu yin// phru bar 'bigs pa mda'
zhes bya dgyes pas legs so zhes bya ba// spros pas rin po che ru bshad// gzi brjid ces bya nyi ma yin// sbrang bas tog tu bshad pa ste// rnam par 'byed pas bzhad par bshad// 'dod chags
dag pa pad+mayin// nyon mongs dgra bcom ral gri ste/ dkyil 'khor sbyor bas 'khor lo yin// gang gis brjod pas smra bar bshad// kun nyidasna tshogs rdo rje yin// gzhig dka'i sbyor ba go ma yi
'jigs pa'i spyod pas mang ba ste// phyag rgya'i sbyor nyid bcing ba yin// dkyil 'khor du ni gang bshad pa// yid kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa yin// gzhal yas khang ni ye shes te// sems kyi brtse
pa du ba yin// phyi yi klu bzhi pa gang yin// tshad kyis mnyam pa nyid gyur pa// byams pa la sogs sems gang yin// thig bzhi zhes ni bshad pa yin// chos kyi sbyor ba rjes dran nyid// gang de
rdo rje thig tu bshad// lta ba kun las rnam grol ba// ye shes thig tu bshad pa yin// tshul khrims tshogs kyi dam pa ni// gang zhig rgyan du bshad pa yin// dad dbang la sogs sems gang yin//
ra ba ltar na yang dag byung// rnam par tharapa bzhi po ni// sgo rnams su ni yang dag bshad// yang dag spong ba bzhi po ni// rta babs rnams dang ka bar byung// dran pa nyer gzhag bzhi po ni// khyams
rnams ban por shes par bya// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi po ni/ na sgo khyud rnam bzhi yin// byang chub yan lag bdun po ni// 'phreng ba me tog chun brgyan pa// 'phags lam yan lag brgyad po ni/ ka ba

brgyad ces bya bar bshad// sgrib pa gnyis las rnam grol zhing// ting 'dzin ye shes kyis brtags pa// lam gyi shes khyad par rnams// rdzayabacas ni yang dag bshad// nyon mongs thams cad rjes gcodacing//
nyonamos 'phrog pas dra ba ste// yang dag gcod cing spyong ba nyid// sel ba'i myong ba la gnas pa// tshogs gnyis kyin sbyor ba nyid// nyon mongs pa yi phyed 'phrog pa// dra ba phyed ces bya
du bar bshadu// rang bzhin 'od gsal gang yin de// byang chub sems ni bla med yin// sems ni don kun byed byed pa// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yin par bshad// shes rab ye shes rang bzhin dag/ rdo rje lha

bu'i ting 'dzin skyas// thar pa'i snang ba gzi brjid che// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yin par bshad// tshon rtsi lngar ni yang dag ces// lta ba lnga yi me tog yin// ye shes lnga ya nges sbyor nyid// sangs rgyas
lnga zhes yang dag bshad// nam mkha' bzhin du bdag med pa// rnam shes ye shes dam pa yin/ ye shes de yi rgyan bshad pa// chags pa'i sems zhes bya bar bshad// chags bral las ni byang chub 'byung/
chags pa'isams las gzhan yin no// dbas chags dang chags bral ba// byang chub sems zhes yang dag bshad// 'jig rten chags dang bral bas 'dul// phyag rgya'i dngos grub chags las byung// ngorani
thabs kyi sgom pa dag/ dngos grub thams cad ster ba yin// ji ltar 'jig rten 'dul 'gyur ba// de ltar rnal 'byor pa yis spyad// jiltar gdul bya dag gyur pa// zhen pa kun tu mchod par 'gyur/
mtshan nyid gang zhig yang dag bshad// mtshan nyid des ni mtshon par 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya yis// rgyas btapa ye shos yin par bshad// phyag rgya bsgoms bas rnal 'byor pa// rtag
tu phyag rgyu'i bdag can 'gyur/ rgyus btab dngos po shes nas nii/ bsgoms na phub rgyas btab par 'gyur// mtshan dang mtshan nyid 'brel ban// shes nas rnal 'byor yang dag spyod// jigyur
mtshan nyid yang dag grub// de bzhin dag pa myur du 'grub// g.yas pa'i cha yi mtshan man// shes rab can ni rab tu bstan/ g.yon gyi mtshan ma jiltar mthong// de yis thugs rje mtshon pa yin/
phyag ni gnyis ka'i mnyam sbyor las/ ti'adzin gnyis su bshad pa yin// zhabs gnyis kyi ni mtshan ma yis// tshogs gnyis dag ni bstan pa yin// sor mo lnga yi mnyam sbyor las//
kyil 'khor lnga yis brgyan pa yin/ sangs rgyas lnga yi mngon byang chub// rim pa bzhin du bstan bya ste// gang zhig khung mo ston pa ni// nam mkha' las ni byung ba mtshon// gang zhig mdzub mo ston
pa ni// des ni dbang chen dkyil 'khor yin// srin lag tuni yang dag bshad// nu yi dkyil 'khor zhes bshad do// gapazhig mthe bong ston pa// de yis mne mtshon pa yin// gang zhig gzuganang
ston pa ni// rlung gi dkyil 'khor nyid du 'gyur// gang zhig lta ba ston pa ni// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug bshad// gang zhig snying kha ston pa ni// de rdzasams mar rjes su dpag/ gang zhig smin

mtshams ston pa ni// jo rinachan ma zhes bya// gang zhig lkog ma ston pa ni// rdo rje chos mar shes par bya// gang zhig spyi ba ston pa ni// rdo rje las mar shes par bya// byang chub lngar mngon byung
glu/ nub pa'i m// yang na ye shes lnga rnams sam//saargyas lnga dang yang dag ldan// dgyil 'khor byang chub yin par bstan// sngon gyi sgrar ni ji skad bshad// mdun du don/

[/ ]dag bstan// sangs rgyas bcom ldan gnyis mi mnga'// rgyu dang 'bras bur ldan 'gyur min// gang phyir thog ma tha ma med// de phyir rtag pa zhes bshad do// rang sems rtogs pas sas rgyas te/ rtog
bar bya ba'ang sems nyid yin// sangs rgyas zhing zhes bshad pa dang// byang chub semaMsu shes par bya// rang bzhin dag pa'i sems can ni// kun tu rig par yang dag bshad// sems can rang bzhin
dag pa ni// byang chub sems su shes par bya// dang por gyur pa snying khar rjebs// bstan pa nyid du 'ang rang nyid 'gyur// sa 'dzin pani ral pa'i dbus// 'od dpag med du mnyam gzhag yin//
tsum nar narjes bshad pa// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rdzogasung// dbang por gnyis ni mnyam sbyor ba// rnam par snang mdzad ces bshad do// bu mo le grangs bcuganyis par// skyes mchog thub
pas gang gsungs nga// pha rol phyin pa bcuganyis su// gsungs kyi gzhan du mi brtagago/ bu mo lo grangs bcudrug par// de bzhin gshegs pas gang gsungs pa// rdo rje sems sogs sems
dpa' yi// sgom pa'i don gyi sgra yin no// lha mo lo grangs nyi shu par// 'khor los sgyur bas ji skad gsungs// mchod pa nyi shu'i bdag nyid can// nyi shu po dang rim bzhinano/ rangagi nus
rang gi las// byung ba'i rang rig yin par bshad// gzhan gyi chung mar gar bstan pa// gzhan sdug gzhan gyi rig pa yin// gcidAng rdo rje zhes bshad pa// rdo rje shes bla med yin//
bshang dung pad+mazhes bshad pa// chos kyi yashes rtog med yin/ yo ngas su gsal bar rnam shes pa// dkyil 'khor thugs kyi dam pa yin/ sku gsung thugs kyi spyod pa yis// 'bad pa yis
ni mchod byed pa// rang gi rdo rje pad+mar ldan// dbang po gnyis las byung ba yi// rang gi khu ba thig le yis// rdo rjesams dpa' mchod par bya// tshogs gnyis kyi ni sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas
thams cad gcig bsdus pa// gnyis med gnyis nyid la brtan pa// thugs rje nyams dang yang dag ldan// dbang po gnyis kyimanyam sbyor bas// rang gyi khu ba mkhas pa yis/ rnal 'byor chen po
byung nas ni// dkyilawaMkhor yang dag byin kyis brlab// dgodadamarab tu smra ba 'am// sangs rgyas rolamo'i gar byed pa// lha mo bzhi yomanyam sbyor bas// rgyudang mi rgyunams kyis rol// gsar
zhing legs par bsgril ba dang// tshad dang ldan zhing mdzes pa yis// shes rab can gyis thig gdab pa// sku gsung thugs ni bsgoms pas so// zur bzhi ba la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes
@#// byas la thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dar dang me tog 'phreng bas brgyan// klu yi mtshams ni thams cad dang// so khyud kyi nang rnams su// rdo rje rin chen sas pas//
phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab po// rdo rje'i thig gis yongs bskor cing/ ka ba brgyad kyis dbar mdzes/ ka ba brgyad kyi na gnas pa'i// dkyil 'khor brgyad par bstan pa dang// klu yi dkyil 'khor

bya ba 'am// khru bcu drug du rab tu brtags// yang na khru ni nyishatsam// nyi ku lnga dang ldan pa yis// khru ni'i shu lnga pa yis// dkyil 'khor yang dag byin gyis brlab// sgo rnams kyi ni dbus ma'i

cha chadagu ni rnam dbye ba// dkyil 'khor sgo ru bsams nas ni// sgo khyud dang ni bya ba yin// sgo khyud dkyil 'khor rnam pa ni// snying po'i dkyil 'khor dang mnyam par// dgu ma ru nyin m bgos te// ga yi
dkyil 'khor dor bar bya// thamar khyams dang ldan pa yi// dkyil 'khor lcas ni brgyan pa dang// kha dog ltadang yang dag ldan// gru bzhi par ni brtag par bya// lta ba lnga po bgrod dka' che// kha dog/

Tha lnga yi de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas lnga dang mnyam sbyor bas// sa ni tshon [”]gyis rab tu bsgyur// dkyil 'khor lnga yi dbus su ni// sa ngas rgyas lnga ni dgod par bya// kha dog lnga dang ti'adzin gyis//
'dod ba'i yon tan lnga yis khyab// shel dang zla ba'i 'od 'dra zhing// sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam snang mdzad// dba' bo'i lta ba de bzhin gshegs// iNAnaM/
la'i 'od 'dra zhing// rdo dzathams cad gcig bsdus pa// mi bskyod ye shes las byung ba// jorje'i lta po de bzhin gshegs// 'dzam bu'i gser gyi 'od 'dra zhing// sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus
sems can kun gyi don du byung// 'bar ba'i lta ba de bzhin gshegs/ dpa' bo chen po pad+ma 'dra// pad+ma rA ga'i nor bu'i 'od// chos kyi yang shes las byung ba// chags pa'i lta ba de bzhin gshegrwa
margad kyin 'od 'dra zhing// sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa// sa sa rgyas kun gcig las byung ba// byams pa'i lta ba de bzhin gshegs// dbus ma'i sa yi gzhi dag pa// nor bu chu shel mdog

'dra ga/ shar phyogs nyid du sngon po che// lho ru sar ro yang dag ldan// nub phyogs der ni dmar po ste// byang du lca dung yang dag ldan// kun tu khyams dang ldan pa la// sgor ni khyams dang bral ba 'o//
gang zhig dbus mas yang dag bshad// sas rgyas ye shes bla med yin// gzhan dag don kun yang dag ldan// ting 'dzin ye shes dam pa yin// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// zla si
dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas sku ni rnam bsgoms la// spyan ni dbus su bsam par bya// bzhin bzang spyan ni yas pa dang// nor bu chu shel mdog 'dra la// mtshan rnams thams cad yod+ma
su rdzogs/ bud med sgyu ma'i mchog 'dzin pa// phug tu 'khor lo bsgom bya ste// khams gsum pa ni dbang byed pa// dngos kun grub byed ye shesan// 'khor lo yid bzhin
[r ]nor bu'i mdog/ nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus rgudapar/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ sangs rgyas sku ni rnam bsgoms la// nam mkha'i rdorje mchog sgomamo// zhal mdzes spyan ni yangs pa dang//
ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ma'i mdog/ mtshan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs// nam mkha'i sgyu ma'i mchog bsam mo// phyag tu ut+pal sngon dmar te// khams gsum pas ni phug byas pa//
sangs rgyas byang chub byed pa'i mchog/ gsang ba'i dngos grub rdo dzacan// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus chud par// bla pa'i dkyil dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas sku ni rnams bsgoms la// rdo ngo
chos mar rnam par bsam// mdzes pa'i zhal la spyan yangs pa// pad+mar ga lta bu'i mdog/ sku mdog dmar po yang dag byung// chags pa'i pad+ma 'dzin sdug pa// mtshan rnams thams
cad yang dag rdzogs// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// phyag tu sku la dmar po ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rab bsgoms pa'o// chos kyi ye shes byed pa mchog/ gsang ba dam tshig
dordzican// mkha' dbyis rdo rje ribus chud par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgoms la// sgrol ma mchog ni bsam par bya// zhal mdzes spyanan
yas pa dang// sna tshogs rgyun gyis rab tu brgyan// kha dog ser po chur bsam zhing// budamadas ma'i srogs bdo ba// phyagatuut+pal dam pa ni/ ser po snang ba bsgom par bya//

rdo rje nyid 'dzin las byung ba// sems can kun gyis phyag byas pa'o// oM ru ru spu ru dzAl ti sid+d+halo tsa ni sarba any+dzasA d+ha ni swAhA/ o A ka ra shAn+tikare g+hazhu rgyu tsa zini glu ta ya sgyu ta ya h+phu Ta Ti ni
swAhA/ o sngaN pa ta ka Te ni le gtsAka Di sAhA/ oM tA re tut+ta re tu re swAhA/ rig pa'i lha mo bzhi'o// sku ni lus kyi ngo bo yis// thugs nisams kyi rnam pa nyid// gsungan dag gi rnam pa
yis// mchod na mchod pa'i bdag nyid 'gyur// sku gsu nga thugs kyi gsang ba ni// mkhas pa yis ni bsrung bya ste// bsrungs na mchog tu gsang ba ni/ rtag par kun tu 'byung bar 'gyur//
dngos po yongs su dag pa ni// mid pas kun tu brtag mi 'byung// rnal 'byor pa yis rnal 'byor thob/ tshogs med yang dag ma mthong ngo// debs gsaba'iyashis 'byung/ rnal 'byor
kun tu 'byung bar 'gyur// shes rab 'ol phyin pa'i skabaso// ting 'dzin ye shes brtags pa yi// chos rnams thams cad rnam dag la// dag nyid du gyurapa// jiltar lcayin khuni/
rang gi 'od kyis rtag tu snang// srid pa yongs su dag pa yang// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor thob byed yin// rdo rje dbyings ni gas nga chen du// gabazhig dbang bskur mkhas pa la// thugs kyigs pa ba'i
rnal 'byor mchog/ mkhas pas de la bshad par bya// thams cad gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so////rgyagar gyi mkhan po pad+ma
kAr barma dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsab dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//@#// rgyagar skad du/ tre lekya bi dza ya/
mahIka rA dza/ bod skad du/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig nA/
bcom ldan 'das ri rab ri'i rtse mo rdo rje dang nor bu rin po che'i rtse mo la khang pa btsugs pa na// byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dum dpa/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ mi
'am ci dang/ 'byung po dang/ sha za dang/ brjod byed dang/ ma mo rnams dang/ bltar rungab dang bltar mi rung ba dum sas rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs
ta/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i dkyil nas babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom
ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ ya nga bcom ldan 'das bdag gis lha chen po la sogs pa sems can ma rungs pa de dag la dam tshig 'dzin du stsal bar 'tshal
na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du bdag la bka' stsal du gsol// de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshig bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rgyal po chen po de bzhin
gshegs pas gsan nas/ phyag na ro la 'di skad ces gsungs so// gnod sbyin khyod shin tu khengs pa/ shin tu khro ba/ shin tu 'thurab/ de ji ltar khyod kyis sems can rnam
kyi don gyi phyir 'di lta bu'i sngags kyi tshig smra/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// de'i phyir na bcom ldan 'das bdag
sems can m lus pa 'dul bar bgyid do// gang gi phyir na bdag gis 'dod pa'i bde pa can rnams dbang du bgyi ba la sogs pas btul nas bla na med pa'i bde ba la 'god par 'tshal lo// sems
can m nus pa rnams gsadapa la sogs pas spungs te/ zhi ba la dgod par 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ phyag na rdo byang chub sems dpa' la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ phyag na
rdo rje legs so legs so// 'jig rten thams cad kyi donakyi phyir dang/ phan pa'i phyir dang/ bde ba'i phyir snyingapo 'di skyes shig/ de nas phyagan rdo rje byang chub sems dpas lha thams cad nas/
mi rnams thams cad kyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa de rnams la bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag sas rgyas la skyabs su des shig/ nga'i bka' yang rjes su skyongs shig
denas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyagan rdo rjes phyag 'tshal nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so// oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hU~M/ grah+magrits+tsahU~M//
grats+tshA pa ya grosgyu la ya hU~M/ A na ya ho b+ha ga bAn badzra hUM phaT/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gsum thams cad gayos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so// 'gul/ rab tu
tsa 'gyil/ gyin tu rab tu 'gul lo// 'phar/ rab tu 'phar/ kun tu rab tu 'phar ro// de nas lha thams cad la sogs pa sems can thams cad bdar yod yod nas bcom ldan 'das ga la der lcag

te/ kho ra khor yug dang kho ra khor yug chen po'i ri la sogs pa tshunanadakyigling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dusems can thams cad kyis gang// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gling
bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po la gzigs nas 'ji skad gsungs so// grogs po rnams sangs rgyas la sogs pa la skyabs su 'gro bar khas long zhig/ nga'i bka' yang

rdzas su skyongs shig/ de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor chen po thams cad bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes skrag ste 'jar yong yodanas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabasu dong ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das
la= lha chen po'i lha dang/ mthu bo che dang/ tshangs pa rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i sems can 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'diltar byin che zhing bdag cag 'ches
pa 'di su lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'dibastan pa'i phyir gas su bcad pa 'di blangs te gsungs go/ sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ sas rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs/
tshan bzang po kun gyi bdag/ sangs rgyas thams cad nyidabaskyod 'di// phyag na rdo rje gnod sbyin che// ma rus 'tshol la dbang ba ste// gang ming brjod pa de yis// sangs rgyus pa yang thob par
'gyur/ de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen pos yang gsungs pa/ kyi kyi lha dag sangs rgyas la skyabs su deng la pa'i bka' bzhin du'ang gyis shig/ rdo rje 'bar ba gcig tu 'bar bar gyur
pa 'dis khyed thams cad gtan bsregs par gyur tar/ de nas lha chen po la sogs pa rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras so// khyod ni gnod sbyin/ nged ni lha bas na nged kyis gnod sbyin gyi bka' rjes
su skyong bar mi nus so// de nas phyag na rdo rjes 'di thos nas khros te/ bcom ldan bdag la 'di ga ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'dus rnams kyis bdag ma lus pa thams cad
'dul bar dbang bskur te bskos so// debs na gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bka' stsal na lha chen po 'di'adul bar 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha chen po la
'doskad ces gsungs so// sems can chen po khas long zhig/ 'dis khyod gsad da re/ donas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum thams cad kyi dbang po rnams/
kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcoldan 'das gnod spyin ma rungs pa 'di'i bka' bzhin byed pa bdag cag ma lags so// de nas lha chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la
phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje l 'di skad ces smras so// kye gnod spyin ngan thams cad kyi dbang po chen po/ byed pa po/ 'joms pa po/ skye dgu'i bdag po tshangs pa'o//
gtogasa'adod// dbang phyugachen po'o// de nas phu nu rdo byang chub sems dpa' chen po khros nas 'di skad gsungs so// khyodan lus srul po/ misha za ba/ ma rus pa/ drag shul gyi las
byed pas na gtum po ste/ sha za'i lus bsal ba na jiltar tshangs pa dang// gtogs 'dod dang/ dbang phyug chen po yin/ tshangs pa zhes bya ba ni mi 'gyur ba// gtogs 'dod ces bya ba ni thar

pa'o dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang po ste// sems can thams cad kyi dbang po de nga yin pas 'dul nus so// de nas dbang phyug chen po lha chen po khros nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ 'jigs rung ba chen po'i gzugs khros pa chen po'i gdamos bgad nas/ 'jigs pa chen po byed pa/ 'bar ba chen po gtong ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams
g+ha cad mtha' med par gzugs sna tshogs su byas/ 'bar ba chen po'i grub pa/ mimatshus pa/ dzodang/ mdung rtse gsum pa dang/ 'khor lo dang/ shaka ti dang/ ba cen dang/ mi mtshungs pa'i
mtshon 'debs shing gtong ba rnams kyi tshogs dang/ 'byuba'i tshogs dang bcas par kun bstan to// bdud dang bgegs byed pa dang/ mtha' dang chu med pa'i gzugs snatshogs su sprul/ khro bo rab tu

mi bzod pa ma rus pa'i tshogs chen po dang lhan cig tu btu 'thab cing shin tu 'gyed ba/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan mo'i mun nag tu byas// 'bar ba chen po'i phung pos klongs ti rab tu snang bar dus

so/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'achang ba chen po cung zad dumachab 'i thog ma gtsigs pa/ smin ma'i mtshams kyi khro gnyer gyi rlabs bskyod pa/ mig g.yon pa cher bgrad de/ rdorje'i lta ba khro ba dang

bcas bas zab mo'i tshig gis shigs pa/ snying po mchog 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// hUM/ de nas hU~M zhes bya ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
khams kun sgra dus gang nas/ g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so// 'khrol/ ragatu'akhrol/ kun tu rab tu ba grol lo// de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha'i tshogs thams cad
bcom ldan 'das la skyab tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa skyagatugasol zhes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su dong ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ phyagan rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsungs so/

gang 'di lta bu'i sngags kyi tshig smrakhani khyod rab tu mi bkrus so// de nas phyag na rdotshos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshalas/ yang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba 'di gsungs so//

oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hU~M/ grargyu grin+tAhU~M/ grosgyu pa ya grosgyupa ya hU~M/ A na ya ho b+ha ga bAn badzra hUM phaT/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis lha chen po la sogs pa lha'i bdag po thams cad 'khor
dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjegan ba doramago rkang bzlog ste/ ri la ri'i rtse mo'i dkyil 'khor chen por btsud nas brlams bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs g.yon pas
mnan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ phyag na rdo rje khyod kyis 'a de 'dra bar sems can 'dul bar
byed pa legs so legs so/// de bas na thul la dbugs phyung zhog/ de nas phyag na [“] byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de dag gi don gyi phyir rdo rjes bcings pa 'di gsungs so//

mi o badzra dran+ti mo b+ha ba rak+Sha saN+Danas hA/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis lha chen po la sogs pa lha de dag dran pa rnyed do// gnas bcom ldan 'das kyis ga de dag la 'di skad gsungs so// glog
po dag sems can chen po 'di'i bka' bzhin byed par khas long zhig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ de dag thams cad mgrin gcig tu bdag cag mchid kyis 'tshal lo zhes gsol to// de nas phyag na rdo jibyang

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yang rang gyi snying po 'di gsungs so// hUM Tak+ki ho/ de nas 'di brjod pa tsam gyis lha la sogs pa thams cad dbang du byas te/ bcom ldan 'das phyagan rdo rje la phyag 'tshalanas mtshi
thabam blags te ro bton nas skyabs su dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das la skyab tu gsol/ dbadag cag khyod kyi bka' nyanan ji ltar bgyi ba stsal du gsol zhes so// des phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa'/
sams dpa' chen pos de rnams la gsungs pa/ grogs po dag byang chub kyi sems dang/ sdom pa gzung bar khas long zhig/ dudag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis sangs rgyas

bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyid cing byang chub tu sems bskyod par 'tshal lo// de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yang de rnams ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor du btsud
nas sdom pa gzung du bcug ste byang chub kyi sems brtan par byas pa/ sims can thams cad bde ba stsol/ phyag na rdo rje badag che dang// 'dod pa smad par mi bya'o// 'di ni gsang ba yin no// de nas/
bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag sdom pa 'dzin du bcu gnas dam tshig byin pa ni/ oM badzras ma ya a b+hi rU b.rI ga ya sat+ma kA man hUM phaT/ de nas de dag gis smras pa/ 'di ni bdud kyis smras pas na bdag
cagami nyan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas de dag la khyed cag gis 'di la mkhas shig ces gsungs pa dang// de dag gis gsol pa/ ji ltar 'dod chags dang brel ba nis dus
rgyas kyi byang chub bo zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye grogs po dag ngani ji ltar 'dul bzhin byed pa ste/ de nyid kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na
'byin te jiltar bde ba la mi chags pa dang/ sdug bsngal la 'dod chags pa ji lta bu s pa 'jig rten 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i chos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'chad par mdzad de/ dri dag/

ka/ sbyang ba'i phyir 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun tu bzang po byang chub sems dpag cin kyang 'dod chags dang bral bar ma byed cig ces bka' stsal to// de nas phyag na rdo rjes yang gsungs pa// oM badzra

sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsam nga ra ga ya sats+tshakA naM hU~M phaT/ de nas de dag gis ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin shog gsol to// de nas yang phugan rdo rjes lag rdo rje byon te/ rdo rje dbang

bskur ba 'di byin no// go 'dzaa b+hiDolus cha ta thA ga ta badzad+harod tA badz+dzapA Ni hU~Mgang hag/ de nas rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba byin pa ni/ 'di ltaste/ dbang phyug chen po ni rdo rje rigs

! sngagos mchog go mash+tsa bo che ni rdo rjesgyu ma'o// tshangs pa ni rje rje mi smra ba'o// sgra gzhon nun rdo rje dril bu'o// dbang po ni rdo rje'athab ma ste/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi dbang ngo

lA thams cad rig pa'i blon po chen por dgaMng bskur ro// de nas bar snang la rgyu ba rnams rdo rje mang gis dbang bskur ba byin pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ni rdo rje 'khyil ba'o// zla ban rdo rje

khong do// be con rtse mo ni rdo rje be conano// skya slongani rdo rje su sleng ste/ ngo rnams ni rje khro bor dbang bskur go/ de nas nam mkha' la rgyu ba'i lha rnams de rdzaming gis dbang bskur ba byin pa ni/

'di lta ste// chang gis myos pa ni rdo rje sun po'o// cha byed ni rdo rje'i phreng ba'o/ rgyal ba'i rdo rjedabang go/ rgyu la pa skyed pa na rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba ste/ de dag la sogs pa ni tshogs kyi ba dag
bor dbang bskur ro// de nas sa pa rnams rdo mi de gis dbang bskur ba byin pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ mdzad skyon rordzogru shing do/ rlung ni rlung ngo// man rdo rjema'o ku be ra ni rdo rje'ajigs bu ste/
de dag la sogs pa ni rdo rdzolo nyar dbang bskur ro// de nas sa 'ogo na gnas pa'i lha'i dbang po thams cad rdzomang gis dbang bskur ba byin pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ phagazhi'i la'o// gshin rjeni
rdodran g po'o// sa'i spyi bo ni'i zinam 'drenano/ kha ru tshani rje ste/ de dag la gos pa ni rje bran du dbang bskur ro// de nas 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po rnams kyis lha mo thams cad kyi lag tu

rdo rje byin te rdo rjes dbang bskur nas/ rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba byon pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ nyomongs pa ni dzi khro ba ma'o// nor can nirdo rdzogasar ma'o// tshangs ma ni rdo rje zhi ba'o// dug mo
rdo rje gzhon nu ma'o dopab ni de khu tshur te/ de dag la sogs pa ni rigs kyi blonamo chen mor dbang bsar 'o/ de nas bar snang la rgyu ba'i ma rnams dbang bskor ba byin pa ni 'di lta ste/ bdud

rtsom ni rdo rje bdud rtsi 'o// 'khrungs ma ni rdo rje sdug gu ma'o// pe com 'chang ma ni rdo rdzob con rtse mo'o// skyo 'phrog ma ni rdo ched 'chings ma ste// de dag la sogs pa ni rdo rje khro mor dbang bskur ro//
[7 ]@#// nas nam mkha' 'argyu ba'i ma rnams dbang bskur ba byin pa ni/ 'di lta ste gsod ma ni rdo rdzogasodamago/ tsha ba ma ni rdo rje za bamo'o/ gos ni rdzabago ba mogo/ dga' mo ni rdo///

kyi dbang mo ste// de dag la sogs pa ni rdo rje tshogs ma mor dbang bskur ro// de nas sa la rgyu ba ba ma rnams dbang bskur ba byin pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ zhi ma ni rdo rje pho nya mo'o// man rdo rje mgyogs ma'o//
man rdo 'bar yo'o/ ku per na ni rdo rje thag gum ste/ do dag la sogs pa ni de yi nyamor dbang bsu 'o// de nas sa 'og na gnas pa'i ma rnams dbang bskur ba byin pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ ga mon

rdo rjegadong ngo// mgo lcags ma ni rdo sngonag molo sna chad ma ni rdo rje myags ma'o// ku mo ni ri rje srin ma ste// de dag la sogs pa ni branamor dbang bskuro// de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa'

chen pos btsud pa dadag thams cad kyis sang rgyas kyi ye shes bskyed nas rdo rje'i dam tshig byin pa'o// oM ba li tod ba li tod badzraA kar ya hU~Mdza/ lha rnams dgug pa'o/ o badzra a kri pi TA ya sam ya

hU~M/ bar snyad la rgyu ba rnams kyi'o// oM badzramA lA gra laM/ 'phreng ba 'chang ba rnams kyi'o// oM badzra pan d+ma haM/ sal rgyu ba rnams kyi'o// oM badzapa ta la b+hacha b+ha lnga hUM phaT/ sa 'og gnas pa

a rnams kyi'o// oM horu ka badzras ma ya sat+ta dut+taM sa ma ya chu pra b+hany+dzatsakra hUM phaT/ ma rnams thams cad kyi'o/ donas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag na rdo rjes phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces
gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can thams cad 'dul ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ma rus pa'i sems can gyi dkyil 'khor de dag la ji ltar 'gyib bka'astsol cig/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis gsungs pa// gang gis sems can de rnams sems can thams cad la phan pa byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i dam tshig
'di nyid la tshud cig/ de nas yang phyagan rdo rjes gsolapa/ bcom ldan 'das mkha' 'gro ma 'a sogs pa 'di dag la nan tan ji ltar bgyi/ rims la sogs pa mi ltar bgyi/ dmyal ba la
sogs pa ngan song gi 'gro ba rnams ltar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bsus pa/ dam tshig dad la nan tan byed du tshacig/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes yang gso la nga/ bcom ldan 'das mi 'di
rnams ji ltar nan tan bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsus pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen por btsud nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du tshud cig/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor
du btsud nas dmatshig gi dkyil 'khor du tshudicig/ dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor du btsud nas las kyi dkyila 'khor du tshud cig/ de nas phyag na rdo rjebyang chub sems dpa' chen kho/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis gsung pa la yi rangs tatshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so// de mas can kutshal phan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs te/ grub pa thams cad byed pa'i mchog/ dkyil 'khor
chen po bshad par bya'o// des yang dag rab bshad pa/ dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul 'dra bar// dkyil 'khor thams ca dathig gdab bo//
de la srad bu bye ba'i chogani/ 'di lta ste/ gsar zhing legs par byas pa dang// tshad ma bzang po'i srad bu yis// shes rab can gyis sradabro ba/ 'jig rten gsum rgyal dran zhing ngo// de yi dbus su
gdub pa ni// sang lde phur pa brtan par ro// del srad bu bre gsungs pa/ grodabu nyis bltab kyis bya ste/ bcu drug ru bgo bar bya// thams cad duni rim gsum mchog/ kho ra khor yug rigs
dag kyang phur bu yis ni de bzhinano// de yi nang dubya ba ni// srad bu rim bdun ldan par te// tshon saradrizhig ldan pa yis// tshig rnams kyang ni gdab par bya// de yi dbus su gzhag pa ni//
ba shin tu bkrabs pa'i nas phul bzhi'o// de yi srung du mgon po ste// sa ngas rgyas gzugs brnyanagazhag par bu/ langs rgyas thod pa khor thams cad du/ bya chub brgyad rim bzhin bar// bri 'am yang
dug gzhag par bya// mtshonas lnga mchog rnams kyis so// sangs rgyas spyanas de ru ni// phyag na rdo de bzhin no// bri 'am gzhag par bya ba ni/ rdo rje zhes pa 'dul ba'o// de yi zhabs ni g.yon pa
yis dbang phyug chen po mnan par bya'o// g.yas pa'i zhabs kyis btsir ba ni// nyon mongs ma yin lha mo'o/ 'dod drug spyod pa'i lha rnams kyang// srid bu rim bdun bar dag tu// bri 'am yang na gzhag
par bya rje shugs kyis 'gos nas su// phyi rgol byung nas de ru yang// gling rnams pa'i yang bri bar bya// dbyibs da chog ji bzhin du/ grwa yi ri mo legs par dgod// gling rnams kyi dbus thams
cad du/ 'jig rten ji bzhin sogs par bya// tshas pa la sogs de bzhin rnams// de ru 'jig rten dbang po dgod// kho pakhor yug pa'i ri dang/ gling rnams kyi yang bar dag tu// phyi yi rdo rje rigs

rnams kyi// dkyil 'khor yang dag bri bar bya// sgo srus bri bar bya ba yang// rdorje sgo bzhi de dag tu// rdo rje skyo ba zhags pa dang// sgrog dang dril bu de bzhin no// kho ra khor yug ri yi ni/ phyi rol
dmyal ba brgyud rnams so// gnam dal dpa mind dag dang// mkha' 'grom dang don drag rnams// gzhug gam yang na bri bar bya// chos min can ni gzhig phyir ro/ de yi phyi rol du dgod pa// gtor ma sna

tshogs mchoga rnams so/ dang nas dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga 'byung ste/ de la thog ma nyid du slob dpon gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas 'jug pa ni gtsa ngams gos gtsang ma bgos la/

sa la thag gu dmar po thogasanas rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag sgrubacings la/ de'i steng du dri zhim po'i ma tog gzhag nas snying bo 'di brjod la zhugs shig/ oM badzra pra titsA maM hahahahahi/ danas pus mo g.yas pa'i

lha nga sa la btsugs nas du ru ka'i bdug pa'i m ci bdog pas gsol to// rdo rje 'dzin ma mdzub mo gnyis skyo ba dang du byas la snying po 'di brjod do// zhi zhu nu gra gra ba'i che ba ri Ni badzra ma ya bi b+ho de ya sAhA/ mingashu
rtsa gcig bzlas na de las mtshan s 'byung ba ni ba spyagayo ba la sogs pa dang// sa g.yo ba 'ag/ prazhim po 'am/ 'od bar mthong ba'o// de nas phuganango 'i spyi bor ma tog
[F ]gtor cig/ de nas slob ma gzhug ste/ de thog ma nyid du bkrus nas slob ma gos gtsang ma bskyon te/ gsum la skyabs su btang ba dang/ bsgrub pa'i sdom pa la so sor gnas par byas nas/ da nas byung
chub kyi sems skad cig/ de nas gdong ras kyis g.yogs nas mgo gtsug tor du byas te/ rdo 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings la chug cig bcug nas me tog gtor to/ de nas gang la babs pa de ni
de'i lta'o// da nas gdong bcings pa bkrol nas rang gi rig pa'i lha ston l/ de la mchod cing slob dpon la'ang phyi'adod pa'i yon phul nas/ de rang gi rig pa 'am sngags bzlas te phyag rgyu 'ang bsi
po 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal pa rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ 'jig rtenagasum gyi 'khor lo zhes bya pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'o// de nas rdordzo'i dkyil 'khor 'byung
ste rdo rje 'a phreng ba mnyam ldan pas// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor brtag par gyu 'jug par bya ba de bzhin te// las kyang de dang 'dra bar bya'o/ dkyil 'khor de ru zhugs nas ni// de bzhin rdo

wa gsor bar bya// 'jig rten gsum rgyal rab bslabs nas// rdo rje mchogani bsgrub par bya// de la rdo rje sgrub pa'i cho ga ni lag pa gnyis rdo rje'i phyag rgya'adzin pas rdordzobazung nas ji sri da du 'gul bar srid bzlas
so/ nga phyin chad rdo rje des las thams cad byed do// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'byung sa// dkyil 'khor chen po kun bris nas// mtshan ma thams cad bstan par bya//

'jug pa rdo rje dril bu dang// rdo rje 'dzin mchog phyag rgyas so// de la rdo rje dril bu'i phyag ni 'di yin no// rdo 'dzan mo kun byas nas// rdorje kun tu brtag bya ba// g.yas par bzhag nas g.yon pa yis//
dril bu gsil nas 'jug par bya// btsud nas sun dril bu de// mnyam par bzhag pas gsal bar bya// slob dpon gyur cig dam tshig kyang// rtag tu srungs shis brjod par bya// ji ltar dril bu'i sgra 'di'i//

de yi mi rtag pa ru gsungs// de ltar khyod la byin nani// rdo rje chen po shes bya 'dis/// nges par srog par 'gyur ba ni// de ste rdo rje 'dzin dang dang// skyabs gsum brtul zhugs de bzhin te// ji ltar
byang chub sems 'dod rnams// khyod kyis de tsho ngas gyurana'o// de la 'di ni dam tshig gi sngags so// o han sa ma ya hU~M phaT/ de nas de bzhin du 'dug la/ de nas rdo rje'i chu 'di blud do//
denas gdang bcings pa bal nas cho ga bzhin du bya'o// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro/ dadi nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ de bzhin dkyil 'khor bris nas su// cha lugs mang po gzhug par
rgya btsud nas las rnams thams cad kyang'// slob dpon gyis ni de bzhin bslab// de nas las kyi rab tu myur ba 'di'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thab gru bzhir byas la/ mngar po'i yam shing
lam bus la/ mngar po'i ma tog dang 'bras bu rnams sbyang rtsi dang mar la sngags te/ bla gos g.yas su gzar la ku sha'i bam po la 'dug ste/ rdo rje'i tshig tu bzlas shing//
zhi ba dang/ rgyas pa dang/ dbang dubya ba la sogs pa zhi ba'i las rnams la lag pa g.yon pas bdag gi phyag rgyabacings la/ g.yas pas bsregs na de dag 'grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan

'das kyi rgyab tu thab zur gsum du kha ba'i rim pa rnon po'i yathapashing dang/ 'dab ma dang/ me tog dang/ yal ga dang/ rtse mo dang/ sdong bu dang/ 'bras bu'ang de dang 'dra bar rang gi khrag gis bsus
nas snyan makhrang po la 'dug ste/ bla gos g.yon du gza la khros pa'i tshe mig gis bzlas shing g.yon pas bsregs na dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ bcing ba dang

rgyas gdab pa dang/ gzhom pa dang/ btsir ba dang/ bsal ba dang/ myos par bya ba dang/ gtan 'tsho ba la sogs pa las drag po rnams rab tu 'grub par 'gyur ro// danas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
dgug pa dang/ dam tshig gis bcing ba dang/ dbang du bya ba la sogs pa grub pa thams cad kyi las ni bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas su rtsa 'jam po bting ba la 'dug nas/ stod g.yogs s myuram

ltar ba gos te/ ting nga'adzin gyis bzlas shing 'khor lo lta bu'i thab tu du ba med pa'i mdag ma la til dang 'bras la sogs pa nas 'bras g.yas g.yon gyis srog go/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon du rdo rje lta
ba/ bu'i thab byas la stod g.yogs kyis yan lag thams cad bcings la rlod stan 'jam po la 'dug nas/ yam shing thams cad 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'dzings pa'i mi la lag pa g.yas pa rdo rje dang bcas pa rdo
khu tshur gyi phyag rgya bcings nas/ lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur 'dzin pas gzar bu bzung nas 'dzum zhing dga' bar byas te/ rdo rje tshig gis zlos shade ro thams cad bsregasan/ rdo 'dzin pa
dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ dbang du bya ba lasogapa dam pa 'grub pa'i sbyin srog gi tshog 'o// 'jig rtan gsum las rnam par rgyal pa rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ dkyil
'khor thams cad kyi choga'o// de nas yo byad bshad par bya'o zhes nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga thams cad mthong nas sgrub bo//
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs sam// dam tshig smras par gyur pa'i// phyag na rdo rje 'grub pa// gsang ba yang dag mi shes pas// bcom ldan sems dpa' 'dod pa'i/

chags dang rdo rje de nyid de// de la rtags par ma gyur na// phyag na rdo rje pa 'grub bo// de bas yang dag ma mthong bas// dkyil 'khor du ni grub ma gsungs// yang dag ma mthong grub pa ni// the tshom
can gyis ma 'grub nge// bar du 'jigs pa rnyed nas su// nad kyis kyang ni 'jigs par byed// gdon yang de la brtson par 'gyur// shi nas du 'bod du ltung ngo// de ltar dkyil 'khor thams cad du
chug la nad dang gdon la sogs pa ston cig/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ga ra gyi kha dog rasal bri bar bya ste/ de'i thad 'khor kun tu byang chub sems dpa' brgyadabri bani/ 'di//
ltaste/ g.yas phyogs su ni'aphags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po dang/ 'jam dpal dang/ sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o// g.yon phyogs sun rdo rje khu tshur dang/ byams pa dang/

nam mkha'i mdzod do// stong du nam mkha'i snying po'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi 'og tun phyag na rdo rje ste/ dodzashu zhes bya ba'i phyag na rdo rje dang bcas pa lag pa gnyis kyis bcing ngo// lag pa gnyis po gzhan
la// g.yas ba'i rdo rdzogasor// g.yon pas na mi tog gi gzhu dang mda' lta bsams pa/ sku mdogani ut+pal sngon po lta bu/ yid tsam 'dzum la mche ba chung zad gtsigs pa/ khro ba dang bcas pas bzhad
pa'i shal/ phyir brkyang bskum du gnas pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs g.yon pas lha chemapo'i 'gram pa g.yon par mnan/ zhabs g.yas pa bskum pas u ma'i nu mar btsar to/ stong g.yo
khru bos yan lag g.yogs pa/ ko chen gyi smad g.yogs can/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbu rgyan du thogs pa'o/ de nas tshes zhag gcig nas mgobartsams te tshes bcoltar m/ zla bar ram/

le'i bar du nyin re bzhin brgya stong bzlas/ gos dkar po gtsang ma ba gos la/ bdag gi khyim du gnas shing khas gtsang ma yid bzhin du zos ta bzlasan/ de nas zla ba gcig len pa dang/ zla ba dang pos ni rno zhes
[s/ ]bya bas phyi rol gyi las rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro/ gnyis kyis na las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// gsum gyis ni bcom ldan 'das rmi lam du ston cing 'dus pa dang ma 'ongs pa thams cad ston to//

bzhes na si mas can thams cad dgug pa dang dbang du bya bar nus so// zla ba lngasan yid bzhin du snang ba dang mi snang bar 'gyur ro// zla ba drug gis nici 'dod pa thams cad kyi gzugasu 'gyur ro// zla ba bdun

gyis ni bdag gi lus sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ phyagan rdo rjer ston cing cho'aphrul thams cad kyang ston to// zla ba brgyad kyis ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lha la
sogs pa dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ dbang du spyod cing las su bsgo'o/ zla ba dgusani byang chub sems dpa' rnams thams cad dgag pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ bcing ba dang/

dbang du byed do/ zla ba bcus ni sa bcu thob par 'gyur ro// zla ba bcugacig gis ni bcu gcig pa sangs rgyas kyis thob bo// zla ba bcu gnyis pas ni rdo rdzo'adzin par 'gyur ro// danas sgrub pa bstan te//

ras la rdo rje hUM zhes pa de bzhin du bris la/ de'i tha 'khor thams cad du mthu chen po la sogs pa la/ klu ba ru Na'i mtha'i bar du bcom ldan 'das la skor zhing pus mo btsugs pa bris la/ de nas de bzhin du

ba glas pa'i jidzahU~M zhes pa ni phyag rgyagrangs med par bzlas te/ bla ba'i mtha'i bar du tshes nyi shu dgu'i mtshan thal byung bzlas na nang par thams cad 'ong ngo/ 'os nas kyang dbang du 'gyur te thams cad bsgo ba bzhin du
byed do nas sgrub pa gzhan 'byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bris nas gser gyi mdangs kyi lha mo la sogs pa thams cad rang rang gi nga la sgo nga nas gar yod pa I bab 'dzings pa ni

gzugs gu dri'o// donas de bzhin du zla ba gcig gi mtshan thal byung du zlos shig/ de nas nang par kun lhags te/ de bzhin du gar dag gis sgrub pa po la mchod do// 'di ni rtog pa 'dir bris pa sa na du bsams nas

pas mi 'jigs par bya'o// de nas dbang du 'byung/ rtag tu las thams cang byed pa'i g.yog mor 'gyur ro// de nas cho ga gzhan te/ ngos la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bris la/ nganam ri ngan du brgyab na nga pa brdzus

nanub ma la dojo'adzin pa thob ste/ ci 'dod pa grub pa'i mchog kyang thob bo// gzhan yang sgrub pa drug na rdo rje'i man sngara' khul zlos shig/ de nas dgos pa kun bcom ldan 'dakyis mdzad po/ da ga tshe/

sngar ci'aded par yam shi thams cad kyi sbyin srog gis 'gacig gi bar du bsags na thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas rdo rje hUMzhes pa bris pa de'ispyan star 'gacig gi ba gangs ri klo ga[1/1 ]do nub
tha mar bcom ldan 'das rang gis ci'adod pa'i mchog stsol bar 'gyuro// bcom ldan 'angs de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar rdo rje zhes pa'i phyag rgya bcings 'a de bzhin ga par 'akyi bar shes// ka
[R]nas phyag rgya 'grub par 'gyur ro// grub pa des na dgug pa dang/ dbang du bya ba dang/ gzhug pa dad drang ba dang/ lta ba dang/ dbab pa dang/ stan 'pho ba la so las [']'a sa phanags kyi gdub 26

rdzu shes pa mdzad do// de nas cho ga gzhan te/ rig pas dbang bskur bar bya bar 'dod na dri'am/ 'jib las phyag na rdorje'i ma lugs byas la phyug gnyis brkyang sku rdo rja 'dzin to// de zla ba ra gyi tshes gcig nas/
brtsams te/ tshes bcolta'i bar du marab zhi khri brgyad kyis khrus shig/ de nas tha mar mtshan thal byung bzlas so// de nas nang par gzugs de bzhad de/ de nas rig pa thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur//

de nas sgrub pa gzhan 'byung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chalugs dra ram/ 'jib la de bzhin du phyag brkyang ba rdo rje 'dzin par byas la/ de'i zhabs kyi bar du spyos rgyas bkris nas// da phyin chad yid

bzhin du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas sgrub pa gzhan te/ ras la bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje phyag bzhi par byas la/ de'i phyag g.yas par pad+mo/ g.yon par ro ga par jo rje hUM zhes pa/ g.yon par

mda' dang gzhu/ de nas de'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas pa'i mjug tu zhag gsum sbyang ba byas te mtshan thal byung bzlas na/ de'i nang par de dang 'dra ba'i gzugs su 'gyur te/ ngos92par gnas shing mi dga' ba dang/
sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba dang// thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur re// de nas dkyil 'khor sgrub pa 'byung ste// dkyil 'khor mthong bas lci ba gsum gyis khrus byas/ dus gsum du gos brjes la/

rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya pasis nas brgyad stong dus gsum du nyin bdun bzlas na// de nas phyagan rdo rjeslob dpan gyi gzugs su byas nas rmi lam du thams cad smra'o// de nas dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i tshig gzhan 'byung ste//
thA/ @#// dkyil 'khor chen po mthong bas zla ba gcig gi bar du de bzhin du dus gsum du khrus byas nas dus gsum du gos sa/ dus gsum du ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'kher byas te/ rno lcags ]

kha kyi mtshon chas der rdo rje bris la/ de la lta zhing rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyabacings te/ brgyad brgyabazlasan zla ba gcig gi mthar bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo// de nas tshosgrub pa 'byung ste/ rdo rjes sam/

rtsig pa 'a/ shing leb la bris nas/ de la mchod pa byas te rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung la/ lo gcig tshun chad rdo rje'am 'bar gyi bar du zlos shig/ 'bar ba des na nam mo kha' la 'gro ba dang/ lo bcudrug
lon pa'i lus phyag na rdo rje dang mtshungs pa'i gzugs dang/ stobs dang/ mdog tu gyur te/ 'dod pa'i las spyod thams cad dang ldan pa/ bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad thob pa la bsgyur ro// mi'i lo

stong phrag brgyar 'gyur ro// de nas ral gri sgrub pa 'byung ste/ ro rje khu tshur gyis ral gri bzung la lo gcig gi bar du bzlos na rig 'dzin thams cad kyi bdag po rig 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de nas 'khor losgrub pa/

'byung ste/ 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bris la lcagos kyi 'khor la thogs nas/ nam rdo rjer gyur cing slar yang 'khor lor gyur kyi bar du bzlasaso// de nas de thogs pas na rig 'dzin thams cad kyi 'khor lo bskor

[– bar 'gyur ro// de nas kro ba tang sgrub par 'dod pas phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar gser gyi kyo ba tang byas te lag pa g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung la/ grub pa rnam gsum du gyurakyi bar du bzlas la dros pa/
za tsam gyis khamasacad kun 'gugs nus pa'i gyuro// dudapa byung ba tsam gyis thams cad dab du byed par 'gyur ro// 'bar bas ni thams cad 'gugs nus pa dang/ dbang du bya nus shing rig 'dzin gyi rgyal

bor gyur ro// de nas lha lasogs pa 'gugs pa 'byung ste/ lha chen po la sogs pa lha rnams gang yang rung bo rma lugs rkang pa g.yon pas mnan la rdo rje hU~M zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings te/ bsdigs shing

zla ba gcig gi mtha'i bar bzlasan lha thams cad lhags te/ las thams cad byed pa'i g.yog tu 'gyuro// klu dbang du bya bar 'dod na klu'i mtshoralta baman chadachu'i nang du bcug la lo gcig tshun chad klu tha

cad rang gi gzugs su ston cing lag thams cad byed pa'i g.yog tu gyur kyi bar du bzlas so// gnod spyin dbang du bye bar 'dod pas gnod spyin gang la gnas pa'i gnas der rdo rje rgu zhes pa'i phyag rgya bcis gnod
smyon de dag lcags te bka' ci stsal ces smra ba'i bar bzlas so// de phyin chad bko' thams cad byed pa'i g.yog 'gyura'o// de nas ma rnams thams cad dag bdud bar 'dod pas ma'i gnas su song nas khro
mo'aing khar rdog pas mnan la zla ba gcig lon gyi bar du bzlas/ tshes wi shu dgu la 'jigs su rung ba'i sgra chen po 'byin par byed do// de nas rab ng du gyunas bka' bzhin byed pa'i g.yog mor 'gyur
te thag ba la khyer nas mtho ris su'akhrid do// slar yang khrid de 'ongs nas tshogs kyi bdag por bcug cing de dag gis mchod de/ gyonamakhyugadon thams cad dang/ 'dod pa thams cad dang chung
@#// thams cad 'gug go/ 'di lta bu'i rnal 'byor yang star te/ rnal 'byor gang gis khro bo 'jig rten du'ang 'gro shing phyir yang 'ong ngo/ de la sus kyang cung zad kyang byed mi nus so//

dia 25la chen mo sgrub par 'dod pa des phyag na rdorje'i spyan sngar bzlas pa ni phyagan rdordzo'i sku las lha mo'i lus mthong gi bar du ste/ de las ma 'gul ces bsgo'o// de phyin chad don thams cad ster bar 'gyur te

( sangs rgyas pa'i stor ba'i bar du'o// de nas mtshod byings ma dbang du bya bar 'dod na/ de nas phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar yi go 'phrang bar byas la/ 'phrangapa'i yi ge bkod cing mthar phyin pa'i bar du bklagu
te/ nyin re zhing dus gsum du las byas la/ de nas brgyadastong bzlasan bla bgacig len pa dang mtsho dbyangs ma mthong ngo// de phyin chad thogs ba med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten
pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gtsug lag thams cad dang/ bshes gnyen can du bya ba thams cad dang/ bzo thams cad kyang ma bslabs par des rang tshusha so// de nas lig bu mig dang/ gur kum
dang/ ldong ros dang/ babla rnams la sgrub pa 'byung ste/ lig bu mig blangs la/ 'jom pa'i seng du bzha gnas lag pas mnan tagrub pa rnam gsum byung gi bar du bak+khas so// gcig gis ni mi snang
bar 'gyur ro// gnyis pas ni gzugasamang por 'gyur ro// gsum pas ni gnas gongamar 'dzig po nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gur kum lo sogs pa bzung ste/ 'dzom pa'i bu gar bcug

'a/ la rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas mnan nas 'dod pa thams cad kyi bdag po dang/ rig 'dzin dang/ thams cad du 'gro ba dang/ tshal steng du thub par 'gyur ro// de nas sa la b+hartsika sgrub pa khyung ste/ gnas/
gang na sA la b+hany+tsika ri mor bris pa 'am/ gzugs su byas pa de'i 'jog pa la sor mo bzhag ste/ zla ba gcig gi bar du zlos shig/ de nas zla ba gcig mthar mtshan thog thog zlos shig/ de nas nang
bar rang gi gzugs su bstan nas 'dod pa thams cang sbyin pa'i chung mar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin m sgrub par 'dod pas gnod sbyin ma gangan 'dug pa'i gnas der 'dug la rang gi gzugs su 'ongs kyi bar

dubazlas na de la 'dod pa thams cad ster ba'i bran mo ra 'gyur ro// de nas na za mo sgrub par 'dod pas phyag dar phudabo mas btang ste/ lag pa g.yon pas rang gi mtshan ma de bzung 'a g.yas pas gzegs ma bgreg

pa ni phyag dar gyi phung po de las jitsam du sha za mo gdong mangs gzugs mi lcag po 'ongs te rang gi gzugs su gnas so// de 'ang de bzhin du bunamor 'gyu'o nus ci bgyi sgrub par 'dod pas nyin zhag gcig

snub byas la/ chos lI gu la brgyad stongakhazlus te/ da nas zla ba gcig slong mo la za'i ngo grangs med par bzlas te/ zla ba gcig lon pa dang nub gsum smyung nas mtshan thog thago bzlas so// de nas nang par
su'agyi leng nas des mi 'jigs par byas te/ de nas de rangs 'grub go de phyin cad 'dod pa thams cad 'abulakha'i g.yog tu 'gyur te/ mtho ris kyi lha mo'i 'gruci 'bul lo/ de yang skyal zhing slar yang
'gug go/ 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar gyi thams cad kyang skya'o/ khagazhan gyi nor thams cad kyang phrogs nas 'bul// de nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs bya bar 'dod pas dpes

grub mad pa gang yin pa des zla ba drug gi bar du nyin zhag bcubcu zhing spyad pa snga ma rjes la slong mo'i kha zas la sogs pa nas rlung bzo ba'i bar bu'o// de nas mjug tu mtshan thal byung bzlas nA nang par sangs rgyas

pa'i ng sbyin par 'gyur ro// de nas nyin re zhing bco brgyad kyi bar du sngon gyi spyad pa rnamu byas la/ de'i mjug tu mtshan thal byung bzlas nanang par las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba ni smyo las thang cig brjod pas kyang ngo//
de nas ro langs sgrub pa 'byung ste/ ma smras ma nyams pa'i mi ro byang la logs par bkrus nas byug pas legs par byugs te/ me tog gi 'phrang bas btags nas rkang pa g.yon pas mnan la dbugs byung gi

bar du bzlas na de ltangs langs pa dang/ de zhon na thams cad du 'gro zhing tshe'ang lo stong phrag brgyar 'gyur ro// de nas ro las kyi grub pa mchog sgrub pa 'byung ste/ ma skyes ma nyams pa'i mi ro blangs nas de

bzhin du rab tu brgyan pa khyen tu langs shing yang 'chol ba'i bar du bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur 'gyur ro// de phrag pa la byer na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsal ba'i rig 'dzin 'jig rten gyi kham

rab 'byams thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba dang/ tsherang bskal par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsus so// de nas ma bsgrubs kyang dkyil 'khor mthong ba nyid kyis las su 'gyur bani/

sa'adi lta ste/ thang cig brjod pas ni bdag dang/ gzhan dang/ grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ rgyal po la sogs pa srung bar 'gyur ro// mtshams bcad pa la sogs pa na brtan par blta bas mtshams bcad pa de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyang ma 'da' nagazhan ltacasmos/ sa'i dkyil 'khor dang/ nam mkha' dang/ phyogs bcings pa'i ng lta ba des so// dbab pa na rig pa dang ma rig pas ral gri dang ma long dang
snod dang/ mthe bong dang/ shing ljon pa dang/ byis pa dang/ cha lugs dang/ gzhu dang/ mda' dang/ rdo rje la sogs pa dbab pa'i phyag rgyu gos kyis g.yogs la bcings te/ gu gul gyi gdug pas

nga gdon zhi bar bya ba ni hU~M zhes pas so// hU~M zhes pa'i phyag rgyas ni sems can thams cad 'phungs par byed do// rdo rje lcags sgrog gi phyag rgyas ni byed ma'i gdon las thar par 'gyur ro// saru ka rdo rje'i phung

rgyabastan pas ma byad mas bsad pa las slar gso bar bya'o// rdo rje'i phyag rgyu bzung bas skra las bzung ste bslas pas ni dug mnyan pa dang/ dug bslang ba dang/ dug zhi bar byang dang/ dug spo ba dang/ dug

gzhig par bya ba dang/ dug gis shi ba las gso bar bya'o// rdo rje hU~M zhes pa gcig gis so// gtor dbyung ba ni zangs kyi ril ba nus bkang la/ rdo rje hUM zhes pa'i mdzub mo dang gu gul gyis bdug pa bya

ta bzlas na gal te gter yod na ni chu de lhud do// des med nan 'khyil lo// de nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i hUM zhes pa bzlas te blang ngo// snang ba dgug pa na dong ka'i ljon pa'i yam shing
shu// gis ma dus te/ zho dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mar gyis ra dzake sha taka'i ma tog la bskos nas stong phrag brgya bsregs na snang ba thob bo// 'og gi gnas su rdo rje 'og gi phyag rgyas

[” ]'khrul 'khor thams cad bcom nas rdo rje hUM zhes pa bzlas te zhugs na de la sus kyang gtsa bar mi 'gyur ro// gtogos 'dod kyi 'khor los kyang ci'ang byed par mi 'gyuro// phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar rdo tshwa 'am/
nor bu ma ra ga ti'am/ pad+ma rA ga 'am/ chu tig gam/ gser ram/ dbyig gam/ gzhan ci'ang rung ba'am/ skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs la lo gcig gi

bar du dus gsum du brgya brgyar bzlas nas/ danas lo gcig lenan brgya 'gyur du 'gyur ro// de skad du brgyar bablasan de snyad gyi bsgyur 'gyur ro// de nas stong du bzlas na'ang stong du 'gyur ro// longs

sbyod dag gapa ni stong phrag brkur bzlas so// dgug pa ni rdo rje kyo ba tang gi phyag rgyas zla ba bzhis khugs so// dbang du bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas so// sems can thams cad gtan 'pho

ba ni deng ji hU~M zhes pa'i phyag rgya bcings te stong phrag brgyar bzlas na/ sems can thams cad yid kyis dmigs pa bzhin gtan 'pho'o// nu mnan pa ni rdo rje phyag rgya bcings la chu'i steng du 'gror rung ba'i bar du
bzlas so// ma mnan pa ni thang cig bzlas pas so// letogasrung ba ni rdo rdzobalta bas te/ de la srog chags rnams gang gis kyang gnod par mi 'gyur zhing/ byi ba la sogs pa 'ang 'da' bar mi byed do//

0 rdeg pa sbyong ba mi khre khe'i lta bas te/ gang bltas pa der 'tho'o/ bza' ba dang btung ba thams cad sbyong ba na 'bar ba'i lta bas rang gi snod du 'pho'o// sdig pa dang sprul thams cad med par bya pan thang cig brjod
pas so// gcan gzan thams cad la thar cig bzlas pas med par 'gyur ro// kun po thums cad pham pa ni rdo rje khu tshur bcas pas so// dmag las sgrol ba ni rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas so//
gzhu dang/ mda' dang/ mdung dang/ rgyal mtshan manan nas 'gul gyi bar du bzlas te/ de thekas na dmag thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// zhal chu la ni thams cad gcig brjod pas rtsod pa'i lan/
thebs par 'gyur ro// zhi ba thams cad ni til gyi sbyin sreg gis so// rgyas pa thams cad ni yungs kar gyi spyin sreg gis so// gtan 'pho ba thams cad ni tsher ma'i sbyin sreg gis so// 'tsho ba dang/
gnan dal dang/ sgrilam ngan pa thams nyung gzhil ba ni til dang 'bras kyi sbyin sreg gis so// gzhom pa thamar+yang ni hUM zhes pas so// dgod du gzhug pa dang/ myos par bya batham cad la phaNanyis
bya bas so// thams cad gnyid leg tu gzhug pa na bskum la mig btsums tab bzlas pas thams cad gnyid log par bya ba yin// sems can thams cad rgyas gdab pa ni rdo rje khro bo'i lta bas bltas na

rgyas btab par 'gyur te/ nyin bdun las lhag par mi gson no/ ngag dbrog pa ni rang gi lca sos bzung nas hU~M 'os bya ba'i bar du gyur ba'o// snying drang ba ni rdo rje sor mo'i phyag rgya dbung pa bsnol te/ rang gi man

sa[j ]// khung du klopazhing snying po bzlas nanub bdun tshun chad 'pho bar 'gyur ro// snyingagacad pa ni de blo bas pagacad par bya'o// snying dbye ban rdo rje lcags phur gyis btab ste/ ming nas smos

shing gzugs so// snying skyo ba ni lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rjebs te/ mtshan bdun du btusbyor ba byas pas 'pho bar 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rgya 'di rnams las thar par bya ba bshad de/ des rdzus 'debs pa/

sgro la ni khu tshur dam pas so// ngag dbreg pa la ni rdo rje ngag gi bzlas pas so// su de 'dren pa la ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya snying khar dgrol lo// bcad pa la ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa bsnus nasa'o mas khrus shig phyi ba la

bur du phyung nas rdo dzadris skus shig/ snying spos pa lan rdo rjesnying por thar par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byed ma'i phyag rgya' spro bar 'gyur ro// snying sgrub par 'dod na bud mad kyi snying khar bzlas na po'i snying kha nas sgra

phyi/ thos par 'gyur ro// skyes pa'i snying khar yang de bzhin du bya ste/ snying kha thams cad du'ang de ltar ro// de nas pha rol gyi sems shes pa sgrub par 'dod pas ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa brgyar bzlas na pha rol gyi sems shes

so// sngon gyi gnas shes par bya ba ni rdo rje zhes bzlas pas so// rmi lam mthong bar 'dod pas ni rdo rje hU~M zhes pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas shing bdug pas ka pa cas bdugs de gnyid log na/ de nas bcom

ldan 'das kyis 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar gyi shes pa ston to// tshig sgrub par 'adod pas na rdo rje tshig gi stong phrag brgya bzlosan rdo rje tshig gis rang gi lces smras pa thams cad bden par 'gyur te

00 bas dru pa destsal to// tsho 'phrul ston pa ni rdo rje bzlas pa tshig gis brgyad brgya bzlas na rang gi lus la cho 'phrul du gyur pa ni sa sa rgyas thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ rdo rje 'dzin dang/ lha dang/

klu dang/ gnod sbyin la sogs pa sems can thams cad gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du ston to// rang gi gzugs ci dga' bar bsgyur bar 'dod pas rdo rje tshig gis rdo rdzogs bzlas pa la stong phrag brgya bzlas na gzugs gang

dngo gang 'dod pa de dang/ bdag sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su 'du byed par 'gyur ro// mi snang bar 'dod pas rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rdzobazung la/ rdo rdzobazung bas mi snang bar 'gyur ba desrid kyi bar du bzlas so// potang

bas ni 'grol lo// khri'u la 'dug nas rdo rje lag tu blangs te nam 'phar gyi bar du bzlas so// gdon gyis 'dzin du 'jug na rdo rjezhes pas so// gdon gar byed du 'jug pani hi zhes pas so/ gdon bskyod pa ni ga

cis pas so// gdonagazhom pani phaT ces pas so// gcer bar bya ba ni mi'i skra'i skud pas rang gi dpung ba brtsisan gcor bar 'gyur tu gos brje bar 'gyur ro// snang bar bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig kyi phyag rgya

bsgral bas so// bskad pa ni rdo rje khu tshur gyis 'phang ngo// dgos pa bskyed pa ni mtshan thog thag shachen rang gi khrag gis bskul te srog go/ gzhan gyi bud mod dgug pa na rdo rje bzung nas snying po bzlas shing dgug gam/
