yang n thams cad du khyab pa rgyu zhes ba thams cad bya'o// bud med thams cad dga' bar spyod pa ni rang gi rtags rdo rje bcis pas bzung la nyin bdun dus gsum du langs kyi bar du slob bo// de nas mjug tu nam
phyed bar du bslabs na rtag tu ldang la mi snyoms shing bcud mang la rtags shugs drag por 'gyur ro// bu mo spyad pa ni po bzung nas thams cad du khyab pa tshunas bya ba byas nas spyad do// khud

med thams cad dbang du bya ba ni rdo rje hUMzhes pa'i phyag u0fb1bcings la stong phrag brgya bzlas na bud med thams cad magu bar 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings

ts+tso lastong phrag brgyabazlas na bung ma thams cad mgu bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad dbang du bya bar 'dod na rdo rje khu tshur gyi bcings pas rdo rje 'azung la nam 'gul gyi bar du bzlas so// snang ba la dbang du bya bar

'donganardo rje blangs te rang gi spyi bor bzhag la spyi bor rdo rdzobartan par gyur kyi bar du bzlas so// de nas snang ba'i mdun du 'dug na des snang bar rang gi dbang bskur ba yang stsol to// nor dgug pa ni rin po che'i gtso

bo'i phye mas spyin sreg bya bas so/ char dbab pa ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa stong bzlas pas so// nar gcad pani hUM zhes pa'o// rab bcad pa ni ji gso ra ba'i phyag rgyas so// gdon dgag pa yang phyag rgya de nyid

kyis so// sngon dgag pa ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa bsgyurab zlos pa saso// rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzha gnas me tog dang bdug pas mchod// rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas mnan la rdo rje las kyi bar du bklas lo
ra thog nas sa bskor na ci 'dod pa bzhin du rgyu'i las rnams ston te// rdo rjes bskorabs dus ma gsan par de 'bras bu dang me tog mthong ngo// nam mkha' la me tog gi 'phreng ba chags par bya ba

0 ni dbugs bsdamathal rdo rje khu tshur bcings te gtor na'achags so/// cha lugs bzhad par bya ba ni rdo rje'i phyag rgyus so// gar byed par bya ba ni rdo rje 'dzin mas so// skya bar bya ba ni hU~M zhes pas so//

rgyugapar bya mdo dgug pa'i phyag rgyas so// smin ma 'gul bar bya na rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'dzin pas rdo rje thogs la rang gi smina mtshams su bsgrul bas so// sa g.yo bar bya narkang pa g.yon po brdabs pas so//

ma bskul pa ni rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgyas so// khang pa dgug pa ni rdo rje khros pa'i kyo ba tang gi phyag rgya bcings pas so// sprin med par charedabab pa ni rdo rje hUM zhes bzlas pas so// skad cig tu sprin 'du zhing

ston pa'i rdo rdzobaskor bas so// zla ba dang nyi ma dbab cing bstan pa ni rdo rje 'dra bas pas so// nyi ma dang zla ba mang por bstan na jo rje bzhi nam mkha' la gtor bas so// dmag rnam bzhi bstan na rdo rje bskor

bas so// mtshan mo nyin bar du bya na rdo rje'abar ba bskor bas so// nyin par mtshan mor byan mig btsums la rdo rdzobaskor bas so// thams cad nas rdo rje bstan na brgyabazlas te rdo rje baskor bas so// thams

cad nas byang chub sems dpa' bstanan stong bzlas te ro bskor bas so// phyag na rdo rje thams cad la bstan na stong phrag brgya bzlas te bskor bas so// thams cad nas sangs rgyas bstanan rdo rje la bye ba bzlas so/
'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ rdo rje hU~M zhes bya ba'i rtog pa chen po rdzogs so///de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// phyag na rdo la 'di skad ces gsungs so// ngas kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir gang 'jig rten gsum las rnam

[D ]par rgyal ba rtog pa chepo'i rgyal bo 'di brtson par 'gyur ba la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'di sbyin no// de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas tsog tsog pur 'jug
zla ste mnos pa/ oM badzra bid swAhA/ donas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis stong gsum gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu g.yos/ sems can thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos nas phug 'tshal zhing
dbang du gyur to// de nas phyagan rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal na rdo rje rig pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i
tshul du dkyil 'khor thams cad brtags te/ de'i dbus su nas yul bzhi la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te/ de'i spyan sngar phyag na rdo rje yid kyis kyang tsog tsog bur bzhag go/ de nas de bzhin du gzhug go/
zhugs nas 'di skad du khyod den gnas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid do// de ste dad na de bshad do zhes sgros shige/ des smras pa/ gsus shig ces pa dang/ de nas khyod deng phan chad de bzhin gshegs par
gyur to zhes smyos shig/ des smras pa/ ci'i phyir/ dkyil 'khor mthong ba'i phyir zhes des smos shig/ gang dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa de de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du blta ste/ des sangs rgyas kyi byang

chub kyang tshe 'di nyid dam pa rol la thob par 'gyur ro// zhes smras nas phyag rgya slobs shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal/
nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bshad do// dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris nas bcug la rdo rje'i sgrub pa sgrub// lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje bzung la rangagi phyag rgyasgomamo// rdo rjezhes bya ba 'di ci yin/
snying po skyem pa ste/ rdo rje mig gis bzlas na des de bzhin gshegs pa'i ng tshe 'di 'am gzhon 'a klob par 'gyur ro// rje'i dkyil 'khor lo// thams cad dam tshig chen po'i tshul du byas la 'di
skyes shig/ dad brtan phyag na rdo rjel/ dad bzhin gshegs gas de bzhin no// sems can thams cad mgu b.ru// khyod kyis de ltar brtag par bya// deng nas khyod kyis de ltar ma byas na soms can
ngamul bar ldang bar 'gyur ro// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// yang dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris la bcug nas las rnam bzhi yang bslab po// lus thams cad kyis gtugs te de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas// de nas langs te yan lag lngas phyag byas tasdig pa thams cad bshags so// de nas langs nas thal mo sbyar te pus mo gnyis sa wa gatshugasanas bsod nams thams cad

kyi rjes su yi rang ngo// de nas langs te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs la/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyu brtsis nas phyag 'tshal to/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i tshig gi khadzra
dzod cig des na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ phyag rdordzol phyag bya ba dang/ bkur sti dang/ mchod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa
ga yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mchod pa'i tshog 'o// de nas phugs rje'i rig pa sgrub pa 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor mthongonas sa la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bris
la de'i g.yas su spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po/ g.yon du rdo rje khu tshur rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bya'o// de nas gso sbyin can dus gsum du khrus byed pa/ dus gsum du bkrus pa'i gos gyon
la stong phrag brgyar bzlas so// de'i mjug tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur bcings nas mtshan thal byung bzlas nanang par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gshegs te zhal ston to//
mchog ci 'dod pa stsol te/ sangs rgyas pa'i bar du 'ang stsol to// de nas yang cho ga bzhin tu/ ras la de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i steng du bzhugs par byas la/ de'i spyan sngar phyag na rdo rje thal
mo sbyar du tsog tsog pur 'dug nas// bcom ldan 'das la blta bar bya/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogs su phyag na rdo rje ya gcig gis rdo rje gsor g.yon pa na pad+ma'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon

phyogs su rdo rje khu tshur te khu tshur gnyis kyis rdo rdzobasnams par byas la/ de nas tshes gcig nas brtsams te zla ba gcig de bzhin du bzlas la zla ba tshang nas mtshan thal byung bzlas ma/ de ltar de bzhin
sa gshegs pa byon nas mchogi 'dod pa stsol te// yang chog gzhan ni ngas la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bris la de'i spyan sngar zla ba drug de bzhin du bzlas te/ mjug la nyin mtshan gsum/

du sbyangs te phyag na rdo rje byon nas phyag na rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid byin gyi bar du bzlas so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rtenagyi drung du stong phrag brgya bzlas namajug tu de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo// nam
mkhaM' la bltas te stong phrag brgyabazlas na nam mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ngo// des de la phun sum tshogs pa thams cad nyin gcig bzhin stsol to// sangs rgyas kyi spyan

sngar stong phrag brgyabazlas na mchog 'thob bo// phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgyabazlasan phyag na rdo rjes 'dod pa thams cad rtsol to// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i spyan sngar stong
phrag brgya bzlas na spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos lag nas bzung ste/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten du khrid cing slar yang khrid de 'ong ngo// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i
rgyal po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtogs pa rdzogs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ phyugan rdo rje byang chub sems dpas yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom

ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir snying po gang brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje'i ri ltar mi g.yo ba'ang bskyod cing 'dren
nasems can gzhan lta ci smos ci dgo gang dran pa tsam gyis kyang 'jig pa thams cad rnam par dgrol bar 'gyur ro// gang brjod pa tsam gyis kyang mtshams chod pa thams cad lhag ma ma lus/
par byang bar 'gyur ba dang/ thams cad la srung bar 'gyur ba dang/ phyag na rdo rjes kyang 'dod pa thams cad stsol bar 'gyur pa dang// mchog stsol ba dang/ don thams cad sgrub pa dang/ dgos pa

lca thams cad byed cing rtag par phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ba dang/ gang bslabs pa tsam gyis grub pa thams cad mngon par 'gyur bar la bar gyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'dasakyis/ phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems

@# dpa' sems dpa' chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// phyag na rdo khyod kyis legs par smyos shig/ ngas kyang gzung ngo/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje snyams pa dang bcas pas rdo rje gsor te/ rang gi
snying khar bstod pa'i tshul gyis bzung nas rang gi si lo 'di gsungs so// Tak+ki hUM dza/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu g.yos so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
g.yos rab tugayos/ 'phar rab tu 'bar/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnams bskyod/ rab tu bskyod par gyur to// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyus thams cad kyang ma rung bar gyur to// byang chub

[“]skra sems dpa' sa'i snying por gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis brtan par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i grub pa'i ng sra bar gyur to// bdud dang mi bgrungs pa'i phyogs
sa na/ thams cad kyang brlag par byas so// gdon thams cad bacos bsad bcom ste 'dar pa dpang nas/ bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su dong nas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag skyobs/ bde bar gshegs pa
bdag cag skyobs shig pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de dag la bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje 'di nyid la skyabs su deng zhig dang/ 'di nyid kyis khyed la skyob par byed do// phyagan rdo rje'i snying/
kha nas kun tu 'bar bas bskor bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phreng ba la sogs pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'dzum zhing khro ba/ phyag gnyis kyis me tog gi gzhug 'gengs pa//

phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje hUM zhes pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dod pa'i khro bo phyung nas/ 'jig rtenagyi khams thams cad kyi sems can kun 'dod pa'i khro bos sbyangs nas phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar 'dug ste bka' nod de//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngadzilta ba de bzhin dukhyod kyis kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyis shig ces so// de nas bcem ldan 'das kyis/ phugan rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsungs so//

lag na rdo rje de bas na khyod snying po gang gis sems can 'di dag thams cad brgyal ba dang/ bcos pa dang/ bcom pa kun 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang/ gzhan dag kyang rdo rje'i lus thob par 'gyur ba de smyos shig/

o Tu rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgya 'dis bdag nyid go bgos na/ rdo rje'i lus dang rdo rje'i tshe thob cing srung bar yang 'gyur te/ nam 'tsho'i bar du thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// de nas phyag na rdo rje
byang chub sems dpas rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen bo 'di gsungs so// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor ni// gru bzhi pa de sgo bzhi
pa'o rtababs bzhi dang bcas pa ste// bcu drug chadang ldan par ro// rdo rje'i ra bas mdzes pa ste// grwa dang sgo yizur dag dang// de bzhin rtababs mtshams rnams su// rdo rje rin chen

ts+tso ldan par bya// ba dan 'phreng ba dril gyis brgyan// dang po'i phyi yi dkyil 'khor 'ad// snying po bzlas shing bri bar bya// de yi nang gi 'khor yang// rdo rje srad bu mnyam ldan pa'o// rdo rje'i ka/
ba brgyad ldan zhing// rdo rje'i ka ba mdun gnas su// dkyil 'khor brgyad kyi tshul du ste// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bzhag pa'o// de yi dbus su sems dpa' che// phyag na rdo rje bzhugs par bya// sangs
rgyas rin chen thams cad dag/ dburgyun du nirgyan thogs pa// cung zad tsam du bzhad pa'i zhal// rdo rje snyams par mdzad pa ste// me tog mda' gzhu 'chang ba 'o// de las gzhan pa phyag bzhi pa//
rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs nyid de// khro gnyer bzhad pa'i zhal ngo can// gnyis kyis ma tog gzhu 'gengs shing// gnyis kyis rdo rje hU~M mdzad pa'o// rdo rjecan gyi g.yas phyogs su// rdo

dga' ba bri bar bya// snying khar rdo rje bstan 'dzin cing// 'khyud pa lta bu'i sbyor bas so// phyag na rdo rje'i rgyab tu ni// nusrin rgyal mtshan 'chang ba ste// sems dpa' rdo rje dpal can te// rin chen
ba char par ba tu 'bebs// rdo can gyi g.yon phris pa// rdo rje snyams pa dmar po ste/ dganyis kyis rdo rjesnyams pa 'dzin// sgrig pas mchod cing 'dud pa 'o// dkyil 'khor grwa yi gnas rnams su/

mchod pa'i lha mo bri bar bya// dpyid kyi rdo rje rdo rje'i sprin// ston ka'i sde tsho de rje kha ba go// phyi yi dkyil 'khor grwa dag tu// 'dod pa'i gzugs la sogs pa bri// sgo yi dbung rnams thams cad du// rdo rje
'dod pa'i ko ba sogs// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po der// rdo rje slob dpon nyid rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya bcings la zhugs la 'di skad du smos shig/ sems can kun gyi yid khyab cing// sems can
kun la bde ba stsol// sems can kun gyi phar gyur pa// rdo rjesams dpa' bdag dang 'grub// bak+ki hUM dza/ de nas de skad smras pa dang 'bab par 'gyur te/ de ltar babs pa tsam gyis phyag na

rdo rje'i gzugs mthong ngo// bcom ldan 'das mthong bar bstan pas grub pa thams cad kyang stsol te/ la la ni rdo rje 'dzin/ la la ni 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas slob ma gzhug ste snying po 'i phyag
rgya bcings la/ des 'breng ba bzung nas gos dmar pos yan lag bcos la/ ras dmar pos mig gnyis bkab ste bcu gnas 'di skad ces smos shig/ khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong
ba'i mi mkhas pa su la 'ang gsang ba 'di dag mi bsnyad par byos shig/ 'byung po'i gden dang/ 'phra men la sogs pa'i gdon gyis bas da par gyur ta re/ shi nas kyang dmul bar ltung bar 'gyur ro zhes
bsgo nas gdong khro' cig/ de nas 'di skad ces smyos shig/ gang dbung ba 'di ni bcom ldan 'dus phugan rdo rje ste/ 'di ni dang po'i sems dpa' 'dod pa'i bdag po 'dod pa'i dbang
po kun tu bzang po rdo rje sams dpa' 'o// gang mdunan ba 'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'di'i thugs yin te 'dod pa'i khro bos/ gang g.yas na ba 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi rig pa'i bde ba ste/ rdo rje gab

ts+tso ba zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'o// gang rgyaban pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid chab 'i rgyal mtshan te/ sems dpa' thams cad kyi byams pa slong ba dang nor sbyin pa'o// gang g.yon phyog
na ba 'di ni bdag nyid mi ba'i bdud de// sems can thams cad chags par byed pa'o// gang grwa'i bzhi po 'di rnams ni dus kyi mchod pa ma tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ mar ma dang/ dri'i lha'o// gang

ts+tshA phyi'i grwa'i gnas ni pa de dag ni gzugs la sogs pa 'dod pa'i yon tan no// gang sgo srungs de dag ni mig dang/ 'dod chags pa dang/ mdza' ba dang mi mdza' ba ste/ kyo la tang dang/ zhags pa dang/
zlog dang/ 'babs pa dag ni rgol bar mi 'gyur ro// khyod kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa thams cad kyi bdag po la spyod par m byed cig/ gang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la sa mas can thams cad rnam//
par dag par bya ba'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba 'chad de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mu stegs can gyi rnams 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos des thar pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams chags pa rnams ni
sems can thams cad la chags pas na thar pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdag gi chung mas kyang sems can sdud par byed de/ 'dod chags na byang chub tu bstan pa'o zhes so//
de nas snying po byon cig/ tsaketshu dza/ 'di bsgrubs na bcom ldan 'das soms dpa'i mchog 'grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'dis grub pas na 'dod pa'i khro bo 'grub par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe

na snying po 'di bdag nyid chab ste/ nAk+ki zhis bya ba ni 'dod pa'o// zhes pa ni khro bo'o// danyid dgug pa'i phyir dza zhes bya ba ni 'di khyod kyis bsgrub par bya'o// de nas phyag rgya chen po shes par

slobs shig/ de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgyu bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje'i thugs bslabs nas lag pa gnyis su rdo rje sbyin pa'i snying po ni 'di'o// oM badzrad+ha ra badzra pra tangagyur ya sidad+hi Tak+ki hUM dza/ de nas 'phreng ba

phyag na rdo rje la phul bas de'i mgo la bskonamo// de nas rdo rje ming gi dbang sbyin pa snying po 'dis so// oM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsasam+bukarma shA rad tra e daM badzranAm nam a b+hin+d+ri ti dri ros b+ha bi/ o Tak+ki hUM dza/
denas der 'dug ste phyag rgya chen po bcings nas rdo tshig gis brgyad stong bzlas na/ de nas sa g.yo ste grub pa thams cad lan cig bzlas pas 'grub bo// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la brgya

bzlas na de'i thugs dbang du 'gyur ro// da phyin chad sems can thams cad kyi snying shes pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi snying la dbang byed do// thams cad kyi snying du sdug par 'gyur ro// thams cad kyi brtan
par chags go/ snying thams cad las tshig thos par 'gyur ro// gyur pa dang/ 'gyur ba dang/ dal gyi tshig bden par 'gyur ro// bdag gi snying 'au0f8bsa kyang cho 'phrul
rnam pa bzhi mthong zhing gzhan la'ang ston to// de'i snying las rdo 'byung bar 'gyur// des na sems can thams cad kyis mi sod pa dang/ mi tshugs pa dang/ mi gcod pa dang/ mi phud pa'i rdo rje'i

sgyu lus su 'gyur ro zhes/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa bya ste/ rdo rje'i thugs bstod pa 'i glas bstod do// de phyin chad grub pa thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur
'dod pa thams cad dang gsang ba'i mchod pa thams cad myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas mchod pa thams cad kyis 'dra bar mchod nas/ ji snyid pa'i bras dang/ ro dang/ snyad pa thams cad

kyis tshim par byas nas 'byung ngo// rdo rje 'khor lo chen po'i tshatsho rgyas pa'o/// de nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du rdo rje 'dod pa khro bo la sogs pa'i phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin bris to zhugs nas
mchod pa'i lha rnams kyis gar gyi mchod pas snyim pa ma stongs par byas te/ rdo rjes mas dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rdo rje'i glu'i rdo rje'i bzlas pas 'bum

bzlas so// de nas rdo rje de lci bar 'gyur ro// de nas slar yang bar 'gyuyo// de nas de ltar mtshan gcig thalabyung du bzlas na nang par rdo rje 'dzin tamaM/ rdo rje khro bostong gsum gyi stong chen po'o
'jig rtenagyi khams thams cad kyi bdag po lha'i gzugs dung/ mdog dang/ rgyan dang/ spyan gsum ba la phyag bzhi pa rdo rje 'dod pa'i mdangs dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/ rdo rje 'dzin gyi tshor 'gyur
ro/ rtsomodakyi 'khor gyi rnyog rgyas pa'o////de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor te dkyil 'khor chen po'i srad bus thig btab ste/ donas lha mo rnams bros la/ de'i dbus su bcom

ldan 'das ji lta ba bzhin du gzhag nas 'di skad smos shig/ ho badzrasatA su ra ta hU~M/ de'i spyan sngar rdo rje gzhu 'gengs pa'i gzhu bris te/ de'i phyag rgya ni 'di'o// badzraasha hUM/ g.yas su rdo rje dga'

mgu 'khyud par khya'o// de'i phyag rgya ni 'di'o// badzake li hU~M/ rgyab tu chu srin rgyal mtshan 'chang ba byams ma'i rdo rje bu/ de'i phyag rgya ni 'di'o// badzraa kri ho/ g.yon du rdo rje snyams ma bris te//

rdo rje g.yon du sbyor bar bya/ de'i phyag rgya ni 'di'o// badzra gan+d+hehiyaM de nas grwa dang sgor yang rang gi lha mo bri/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon nyid shin tu chos la rdo rje lag tu thogs bud med kyang bskrun te/ lag pa gnyis

rdo rje khu tshur bcings la/ dpung pa gnyis kyis 'khyud de zhugal 'di skad brjod do// sa ma ya hU~M a haM/ su ra ta hoTak+ki hUMdza/ de nas brjod pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das ston par mdzad de/ phyag rgya thams

cang 'grub pa dang/ dam tshig thams cad 'grub pa'i ng stsol to// de nas slob ma'ang de bzhin du snying po'i rdo rje de nyid kyis btsud nas 'dazhes smos shig// khyod kyis dam tshig 'di las ma 'da' zhig/
mi bde ba ma sbyangs por myur du zhi zhing du 'bod chen por skyes par gyur tar/ de nas dam tshig brjod do// bdag che kun gyi phyag rgya ni/ 'dod pa bsam las yang dag 'byung// de bas khyod/

kyis sdig med pa'i// 'dod dang bsam pa ma gtang zhig 'di ni dam tshig srung ba'i sngags so// o TakI hU~MphaT/ 'dis rdo rje'i chu blud do// gang dngos po gzhan thams cad kyi phyir yang mnas bsgag ste/ re dag

la'ang rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'dzin pas blud do// gang gis 'di las 'das na zla ba phyed kyis snying 'gas so zhes/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje dom tshage chen pos gsungs so// de nas phyag rgya bcing ba bslab bo// de nas de

bzhin du 'byung ngo// shin tu dga' kha do zhes bya ba gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor du bzhin du bris nas nyid kyi sku 'am mtshan ma gzhag go/ der btsud nas las rnam bzhi bslab

! par bya'o// de la dang po nyid du 'dod pa tham stsol bar gyur/ phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya chen po bcings nas rdo rje 'dzin phyag bzhi pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phyang ba la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i

skur bdag nyid mthong ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas so// de phyin chad 'dod pa thams cad nus par 'gyur ro// de nas khro bo'i las bslab ste/ rdo rje yi zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings la bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa tham

cad thangacig bzlas te/ rtswa zhes pas bsdigs na de bzhin gshegs pa'i ng 'gyel bar 'gyur ro// de phyin chad 'gro ba gnas pa thams cad kyang 'gyel nus par 'gyur ro// de nas phyag na rdo rje'i las byung ste/
sems can thams cad 'dod pa dang/ khro beganyis kyis 'dul bar 'dod na/ rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas ma tog la sogs pas mchod pa byas te/ rdo rjathugs kyi phyag rgyabadag gi snying khar bcings la//

phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar rdo rje 'dzin thob pa de srid du bzlas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las byed par 'dod pas/ phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar byang chub tu sems bskyed 'a spyon pa spyin/ tshul
khrims bsrung/ bzod pa bsgom/ brtson 'grus bar ma/ bsam gtan la snyoms par gzhag/ shes rab yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ ci'adod cinus kyis bya zhing rtag tu bzlas pa ni phugan rdo rje'i sku 'am
de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur mthong gi bar du bya'o// de nas sa bcu po'athob ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i las byed pa'i byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ro// las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// [“ ]/

de nas bsgrub pa 'byung ste// dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs par// dam tshig shes pa ma yin dang// slob ma ma yin gzhan rnams la// mi zad snying po 'di mi sbyin// dkyil 'khor mthong bas sgrub pa ni phug na

rdo rje'i spyanepAr stongophrag brgyabazlas na sar bsnyan pa byas par 'gyur ro// de nas ras la bris te/ ras kyi dbus su ni bcom ldan 'dras de bzhin gshegs pa bri// de'i g.yas su phyag na rdo rje phyag bzhi pa'i thugs
ka nas thugs 'byung ba de bzhin du bri/ g.yon du spyanaras gzigs kyi dbang po phyag bzhi pa ste/ gnyis na ni pad+mo'i ting nge 'dzin 'chang/ gnyis kyis ni me tog gi gzhu 'gengs pa kha dog dmar bo/

spyan star de bzhin du rdo rje'adod pa'i khro bo bri'o// stong dunam mkha'i snying po gi grwar mchod ba'i lha rang gi mchod pas bkram pa dang mgo bor ro// danas ras la bris pa'i spyan sngar zla ba bzhir/

dus bzhir stong bzlas shing bsgrubasan/ de nas zla ba tshang ba dang de bzhinagshegs pa'i ng stsol bar 'gyur ro// ras la bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bris la/ sems dpa' chen po dang lha mo'ang

de bzhin du bya'o// de'i spyan sngar zla ba gcig tu kras mad par bzlas gang 'dod pa thams cad thos la bsgrubs te/ de nas zla ba gcig lon pa dang/ phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya chen po bcings 'a/ mtshan thal byung

bzlas na nang par rdo rdzo'adzina'athob bo// ras la bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo dza de bzhin dubris la/ de'i spyon sngar bla bakhyod kyi bar du rtag par bzlas pa mi nyal mi mnal bar bzlas te/ de nas zla ba phyed lon pa dang

mtshan mo tha byung du bzlas na nang par phyag na rdo dang mtshungs pa dang/ 'dod pa'i lengs spyod chen po dang/ bde ba dang/ yid bde ba thams cad kyang 'thob cing thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ras la bcom

ldan 'das khro bo de bzhin du bris la/ de'i spyan sngar jo rdzong shugs kyi phyag rgya bcings te/ stong phrag brgya bzlas na des 'grub par 'gyur te/ bsgo ba bzhin las thams cad byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing tham

cad du'ang khyerazhisar yang khyer te 'ong ngo/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i bde ba thams cad khyer te 'ongs nas de laspyin no// des kulos spyod par nusunalha'i bu mo tham cad ltanyismos/brgya byin yang stsol to//phyag rdo rje 'dzin pa sang rgyas kyis

bsgo bas stsol bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar 'bum bzlasan de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bkug su dbang du byed do// phyag na rdo rje'i spyan star rdo rje thugs kyi phyag rgya bcings nas stong phrag

brgyabazlas na/ de nas phyag na rdo rje nyid kyi dpal gyi lha mo khrid de byon nas sgrub pa po'i mdun du 'dor ro// de nas sgrub pa pos bcom ldan 'das khyod nyid bdag gis grub par 'tshal gyi 'de ci 'tshal zhes/
smyos shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes teci'adod pa'i mchog stsol bar 'gyur/ grub pa thams cad kyang 'grub bo// spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na spyan ras gzigs/
dbang pos mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na dbang stsol bar 'gyur te/ bsam pa thoms cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad do// rdorje gzhog ste de'i mdun

du 'bum bzlas na de nas las thams cad yid bzhin du grub par bye dado// phyag rgya chen po bcis nas 'bum bzlas na phyag na rdo rje 'dzin gyis mchog stsol te// dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas

na rdo ja'adzinam ngon du mthong zhing phyag rgyu'i las kun grub pa'i ng sol bar 'gyur ro// rdo rje lag tu thogs nas 'bum bzlas na rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rdzobazung ba tsamagyis rmi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'khor lo thegs te
'bum bzlas na 'khor le'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// kyo ba btang thogs te 'bum bzlas no btang des thams cad 'gugs nus par 'gyur ro// zhags pa thogs te 'bum bzlas na zhogs pa dus thamA
ka/ dacad drang nus par 'gyura'o// lag pa gnyis rdo rjes brtsis pa bsdams te 'bum bzlas nas mas can thams cad bsing nus par 'gyur ro// rdo rje dbang ba'i phyag rgya bcings
nas 'bum bzlas na gnas pa dang 'gro ba thams cad dbab nus par 'gyur ro// rdorje hUM zhes bya ba'i phyag rgyabs nas 'bum bzlas na hUM zhes bya ba gcig gis gnas pa dang/ 'gro ba thams cad skad cig

tshogis ltungabarakhyed nus par 'gyur ro// lha chen po rkang pa g.yon pas mnan la 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgyabacings nas 'bum bzlas na/ zla ba gcig tshun chad kyis der 'os te dbang
du 'gyur ro// mthu bo che pa g.yon pas mnan ta 'bum bzlas na 'khorale thob ste/ 'khor lo de thogs na 'grub par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa mnan ta'abum bzlas na tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ro//
brgyabyin ka dpagayon pas mnan te 'bum bzlas na rdo rje spyan par 'gyur te/ rdo rje bskor bas cha gcad pa dang/ dbab pa dang/ thang cig gis ni gnam lcags dang ser ba 'bebs [”]so// saM nad
gzhon nu mnan te 'bum bzlas na gzhon num thams cadokyi bdag por 'gyur ro// las thams cad kyang byed par 'gyur ro// nyi ma la bltas te 'bum bzlas na bdud rtsi na tsha sbyin par 'gyur te/

des na lha'i le stong 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// zla ba la 'bar ba'i lta bas mgu bar bltas te stong phrag brgya bzlasan zla ba gnyis su mthong ste/ de phyin chad zla ba dang mtshungs pa'i 'od dang gdangs su 'gyur te/
sems can thams cad kyi mig tu mdzes shing/ sems can thams cad kyi snying du sdug par 'gyur ro// gza' chen po'i gzugs la bltas te 'bum bzlas na de nas be con thob ste/ bcon des

ni 'thabs na dgra las rgyal te nor thams cad 'thob bo// skya gleng gi gnas su song ste 'obum bzlas na skya slong las kun byed do// rkun gyis myos pa mnan te 'bum bzlasan chang gi snod thams cad nam 'tsho'i

bar du mi zad par 'gyur ro// ma d+hu ka ra la bltas te stong phrag brgyabazlas na dbang bskur ba thob par 'gyur ro// rgyal bo la bltas te 'bum bzlas na 'thab mo dang rtsod pa'i g.yul thams cad las rgyal bar
'gyur ro// rgyal ba thob pa mnan te'abum bak+khas na thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// mdzod skyong rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te 'bum bzlas na bza' ba dang btung ba mi zad par 'gyur// 'gro ba/

thams cad kyang 'di la zad par mi nus so// rlung mngon du byas te stong phrag brgya bzlas na rlung gis de dngamathun par 'dod pa thams cad byed par 'gyuro// mo la bltas te 'bum bzlas na mi'i dbus su 'dug/
pa dang/ nyal ba dang/ 'gro na'ang mi 'chig ste/ me'i gzi gyur ci nyin gcig kyang gserasrad re re sbyin no// ngal bso po mnan te 'bum bzlas na gnod sbyin thams cad kyi bdag por gyur nas/
nor thams cad kyang sbyin par 'gyur ro// phag mo mngon du byas te stong phrag brgya bzlas nas la 'dug pa'i gter 'byin no// gshin rje mnan te 'bum bzlas nam 'chi bar 'gyur ro// gnam 'dren pa'i
chalugs la bltas te stong phrag brgya bzlas na de las thams cad pa'i g.yog tu 'gyur ro// klu b.ru Namanan te'abum bzlas na klu thams cad las kun byed pa'i g.yog tu 'gyur
ro// ma'i gnas su song nas stong phrag brgya bzlas na ma thams cad g.yog byed cing don thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// sa la 'dug ste 'bum bzlason sa'i dbang por 'gyur ro// nam mkha' la
bltas te 'bum bzlas na nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i soms can thams cad bskyel ba dang/ dbang byed par 'gyur zhing nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sa'i 'og mngon du byas te stong phrag brgya bzlas na
sa'i 'og na 'khod pa kun la dbang du 'gyur ro// rin po che thogs te 'bum bzlasan stong phrag brgyar 'phel bar 'gyur ro// gser gyi dong tsho la sogs pa 'ang de bzhin no// skyes pa bzung ste
'bum bzlas na stong phrag brgyar 'phel bama'agyur ro// bud med bzung ste stong phrag brgya bzlas na stong phrag brgyar 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rta la zhon ti 'bum bzlas na 'bum du 'phral bar 'gyur ro/
glang po tshel zhon te 'bum bzlas na 'bum du 'al bar 'gyur ro// kha lang la sogs pa phyugs kyi rwaganyis bzung ste 'bum bzlasan stong phrag brgyar 'phel bar 'gyur ro// gos dang rgyan gyi chas
la stong phrag brgyar bzlasan stong phrag brgyar 'phal bar 'gyura'o// dpal mo la bltas te 'bum bzlas na dbang du 'gyur ro// mtsho dbyangs ma la bltas te 'bum bzlas na tsheg rnam par dag par 'gyur/
ro de nas bslangasan cibasangs pa de kun ster bar 'gyur ro// gtsug lag thams cad dang rnam par shes pa thams cad shes par 'gyur ro// grubabyed ma bzung nas 'bum bzlas na 'das pa dang/ da ltar/

dang rnam 'ongs pa kun kyang ston cing ched du ma bsangs par nor sbyin par 'gyur ro// sa la banatsika mnan nas 'bum bzlasan nyin re bzhin yang gsar gyi dong tsho brgyad brgyad ster bar 'gyur ro// gos kyi sgrog

ma la mnan te 'bum bzlas na mi zad par 'gyur ro// gang dang gcig snod mnan te 'bum bzlas na de dang de mi zad par 'gyuro// gnod sbyin gyi cha lugs mnan te 'thum bzlas na gnod sbyin gyis ci dang ci bdod pa
kun sbyin par 'gyur ro// srinapo mnan te 'bum bzlas na de de'i g.yog tu 'gyur ro// 'byung po mnan te 'bum bklas na 'byung po thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro// sha za'i cha lugs bris pa mnan
te'abum bzlas na de de'i g.yog byed par 'gyur ro// de bzhinaduganod sbyin m la sogs pa'i ng sgrub bo// ri la 'dzegs te 'bum bzlasanan ri thams cad dbang du 'gyuro// phyugs kyi lhas su 'dug ste/

'bum bzlasan phyugs thams cad la dbang du 'gyur ro// shing ljon gyi drung du 'bum bzlas na shing ljon pa'i lca rnams mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro// zhing la 'dug ste 'bum bzlasan bza' ba 'bum dang ldan par
'gyur ro// tshong pa dang bcas pa'i grong du 'bum bzlas na nor thams cad ma bslas par thob par 'gyur ro// gnas byin can du 'bum bzlas na thams cad la dbang du 'gyur ro// grong du 'bum bzlasan
zla ba gcig tshunachad kyis grong thob bo// gtsug lag khang du 'bum bzlas nagatsug lag khangana gnas bas nor thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro// lha'i rten du 'bum bzlas na lhas nor
thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro// khang pa stong par 'bum bzlas na sha za thams cad de g.yog tu 'gyur te/ dgos pa thams cad sbyor bar 'gyur ro// snang ba'i gnas su 'bum bzlas na snang ba dbang du

'gyur ro// skyedamos tshal du 'bum bzlas na skye mos tshal gyi me tog dang 'bras bu thams cad rtag tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mtshon 'bum bzlas na mtsho de'i lha la dbang bar 'gyur ro// gter gyi gnas su/
'bum bzlas na gterarang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dgod ci 'bum bzlas na rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur te/ bgad pa tsam gyis las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// khros pas 'bum pazlasan thams cad gtan
'pho bar nus par 'gyuro// ma mi zer bar 'bum bzlasanasems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// zhugs pa'i brtul zhugs kyis 'bum bzlas na tsheg thams cad kyi dbang du 'gyur ro// budamed kyi
'joms par rtagasalatsugs te/ 'bum bzlas na 'dod pa thams cad kyi bdag po dang/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'jom pa la mdzubamo btsugs te 'bum bzlas na de byas pas
gnas pa dang / 'gro ba dang/ thams cad 'dren cing 'gugs pa dang/ gtong ba dang/ 'gyel ba dang/ slong bar 'gyur ro// 'jom par lta zhing 'bum bzlas na budam dathams cad dga'
bar 'gyur ro// 'jom par lig bu mig bcug ste 'thum bzlas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'jom pagur kum bskus te 'bum bzlasan des bskus pas 'dod pa'i gzugs su 'gyur ro// 'jom par/
ba bla bcug ste 'bum bzlas na nam mkha' la 'gro ba 'grub par 'gyur ro/ 'jom par ldong ros bcug ste 'bum bzlas na rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro// ral gri thogs te 'bum bzlas na ral gri can gyi
rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro// 'khor lo thogs lta 'bum bzlas na 'khor lo can gyi rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro// kyo ba btang thogs te 'bum bzlas na kye ba btang des thams cad 'gugs nus par 'gyur ro//

rdo rje gsor nag stong phrag brgya bzlas na rdo rje rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro// phyug rdo rje lag gis bzung nas 'bum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa tham sa cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro// de bzhin
gshegs pa la lag gis bzung ste 'bum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byed pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing 'bum bzlas na sas

rgyas thams cad mthong bas 'grub par 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal zhing 'bum bzlas na phyag na rdo rjes kyang de mchod na gzhan gyis lta ci smos/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs lA

bzung ste 'bum bzlas na ting nge 'dzin thob bo// rdo rje snying po bzung nas 'bum bzlas na nor tham sa cang sbyin par 'gyur ro// rdo rje khu tshur bcangs la rdo rje khu tshur gyi spyan sngar 'bum bzlaso na khu tshur bsdam/
pa tsam gyis las kun byed nus par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gzhon nu la blta zhing 'bum bzlas na nam mkha' la yi ga snang ste thams cad slu ba dang spobs pa thogs pa mad/
par thob par 'gyur ro// sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la bskor cing 'bum bzlas na dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro/ nam mkha'i
mdzod la bltas te 'bum bzlas na nam mkha' la rgyu ba thams dang/ don thams cad dang/ sangs rgyus dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa thams cad kyi bar du ston to// byams pa 'i 'thas
la bzung ste 'bum bzlas na mtho ris kyi 'dod pa'i bde ba thams cad nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor bris nas 'bum bzlas na dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi bdag po slob dpon dang/
yid kyis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor chen por brtags te zhugs nas 'bum bzlas nu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje 'dzin dang bcas par 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rje'i spyan

sngar phyag rgya chen po bcings la dkyi'a 'khor chen ngo ra 'dug ste/ rdo rje'abazlas pa sa stong phrag brgya rdo rje tshig gis bzlas na dngos grub thams cad dang/ phun gsum tshogs pa thams cad dang/ bshes
gnyen thams cad dang/ las thams cad kyang nus par 'gyur ro/ da'adod pa'i bdag po dang/ dbang phyug dang/ byed pa po dang/ 'byin pa dang/ mi zad mi nyams pa dang/ 'dod pa tham sa cad nyams

sumyong zhing/ bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad rnyed cing 'thob ste/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba 'grub pa'i sbyin par 'gyur ba dang derang gi gnyenang bshes gnyen dang grogs thams cad kyis/
kyang mthong ngo// de dag la 'ang 'grub par byed do// bsams pa tsam gyis sgyu ma thams cad ston to/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs kyang ston to// de bzhin gshegs thams cad kyi cho 'phrul
yang ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i ng ston to// skad cig gis gzugs sna tshogs su ston par 'gyur te/ rdo rje 'dzin gyi tshe dang/ stobs dang/ gzugs dang/
na tshod dang/ shes pa jitsam pa dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro zhes/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// dkyil 'khor chen por 'dug ste dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas khro bo'i tshig gis
bcom ldan 'das la lta zhing don gyis 'bum bzlas na dos rdo rje khro bo lta bur bdag gi lus 'gyur ro// hU~M zhes pas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang 'dzin pa dang/ khams gsum gyi dpang po
dang/ spyan gsum pa'i khro bo chen por gyur nas ma lus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtho zhing mchod pa dang/ sems can thams cad grub pa gsol te/ de ltar mi zad mi nyams par 'gyur
ro zhes/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na po rjes gsungs so// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyalab rtogs pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ phyag na rdo rje'i rtog pa'o//
'das la 'phags paspyan ras gzigs dbang po byang chub sems dpa' samaNar chen pos 'di/da cis gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par

rgyal ba rtog pa chen pa'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po 'di stsal to// gang brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon du grub pa dang/ 'jigs pa dang/ gnam dal dang/ 'tshob dang/
nadathams cad 'jigs par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ legs so legs so// spyan
ras gzigs kyi dbang po khyod kyis smos shig/ de nas 'phags pa spyan ras ga sa kyi ga ngo byadzachub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so// A ro lika/ de nas
'di brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lhan cig tu 'dus te/ ri rab ri'i phyi mo r bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der dong nas// bcom ldan 'das 'jags
pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i dkyil 'khor du gyur te zhugs so// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rang gi snyimo'i dkyil 'khor 'di
gsungs so// de nas yang dag par bshad ng// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// 'jig rten gsum rgyal tshul bzhin du// phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de dbus srad bu ma nyam pa ru// gru bzhi
bar ni gdab pa ru// gnyis pa'i grwa ni sgor bstan te// dkyil 'khor mchog ni bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor brgyad kyi tshul du ste// dbus su thig ni bzhi yang khri/ tshon gyi dmar po dag gis//
patshe 'dab brgyad bar@#// de yi snying po'i dbus su ni// 'jig rten mgon po bzhugs bar bya// 'dab ma kun gyi steng rnams su// sangs rgyas cha lugs spyi ngagacu// par mchog/
phyag rgyayis// der ni slob dpon zhugs nas kyang/ dkyil 'khor gnas su 'dug nas ni// rnal 'byor snyoms par 'jug par bya// ji ltar pad+monu rnams dang// nyes pa'i bag chags mang bo yis//
chags par mi 'gyur de bzhin 'dir// 'grol chags pa dag par gyur pa yin/ 'di lan cig brjod nas sgom ste// de nas mdzub mo gnyis kyi kyo ba btang gis kun drangs la pad+mo chen po de spyan ras gzikA

kyi dbang po'i spyan sngar grol lo// de la pad+mo chen po'i kyob btang ni 'di'o// u0f00 ma hA pad+ma [%]dzad+hi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po nyid byon te/ slob dpon la zhal
ston par mdzad nas yan 'od zer yang 'gyodado// nga nas phyag rgya de nyid kyis slob ma gzhug go/ dkar pos g.yogs la gos dkar po bgos lo/ thod dkar pos mgo la gtsug tor u0fb1sa nas bcug
ste tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod nas don ya nga bstan par bya'o// de nas lag pa g.yon par pad+mo byin/ g.ya sa par sngags kyi nor bu bskur la 'di skad smos shig des ngas rgyas thams cad padomi/
dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// rtag pa ru mibartag par bya// khyod ni deng nas spyanaras gzigs// de nas phyag rgya chen po bcing ba dang/ ting 'dzin la sogs pa bslab bo//

da bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po pad+mo zhes bya'o// de nas pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris la// dbus kyi snying bo la 'dug nas de bzhin gshegag/

pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la pad+ma 'dab ma kha 'byed pa'i tshul gyis lta zhing stong phrag brgyabazlas na 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po thob bo// pad+mo'i dkyil 'khoraro// de nas dam tshig

gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor de bzhin du byas la de'i dbus su pad+mo stong bzhag ste/ de nas pad+more re zhing bzang po thang res bcom ldan 'das la pad+mo stong babul lo// de nas slob ma bcug ste dam
tshig brjod de// slob min bu min ma yin te// dam tshig can la dam tshig bstan// 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad ni// dag pa nyid ni pad+ma bzhin// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// nas las
kyi dkyil 'khor de bzhinabris la mchod pa rnam pa bzhis mchodade// sangs rgyas thams cad yid kyis te// phyagan rdo rje'i tshig gas so// lus kyis 'jig rten mgon po ste// nam mkha'i snying po las kyis
so/ las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang pos sgrub pa'i tshig 'digasungs so// ras la bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang po ri rab ri'i rtse mo na rang
gi ting 'dzin du zhugs shing/ de bzhin gshegs pa brgya mtha' kun tu bzhugs par bri/ de nas zla ba yar gyi tshes zhag gcig nas brtsams nas rtag tu thams cad dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rgyun du
bzlas te/ nam pa naras gzigs dbang po'i zhal nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku byung nas sgrub pa po'i pad+mo'i dbus su bzhugs te/ yang de las gzhan pa'i rgyu byung nas sgrub pa po'i dbang bskur ba'i
gnas su brtan par 'gyur gyi bar du bzlas so// de nas spyan ras gzigs kyi sku kun gyur te/ skad cig gcig gis bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su bgro 'ong ldog gi/ sems can thamos cad
kyang mthong ste/ tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// de nas sgrub pa 'byung ste/ 'bum bzlas na sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// nyis 'bum bzlas na mtshams med pa la sogs
pa'i sdig pa thams cad ma lus par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sum 'bum bzlas na bsod nams thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro// de nas dngos grub thams cad dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa la thogs
pa dang// phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang/ bshes gnyen thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rgya chen po bcings te stong phrag brgyabazlas pa'i mjug tumtshan thal byung bzlas na/ de'i
nang par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin nas de'i snying khar zhugs te/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thob bo// yang na kha zhugs na spyan ras gzigs dbang po thob bo// ngo nas ma bsgrubs
kyang las su 'gyur ba ni dang po brjod pas bdag srung ngo// gnyis brjod pas ni gzhan dang/ grong dang/ grong khyer srung ngo// gsum pa brjod pas ni las thams cad byed do// dbab
pa ni tsan dan gyi bdug pas so// gdon thams cad zhi bar bya ba ni hi/ zhes bya bas so// sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba ni rje rje ma tog bzlas te byin no// sems can thams cad mnan pa ris sar
pos so// bud med dbang du bya ba ni sum pa'i me tog la bsngags pas so// chom rkun mnan pa ni yung kar gyi spyin sreg gis so// ri dgas dang bya mnan pa ni yubras kar gtor bas so// sgyu ma
mnan pa rim bya'i chang dus so// rmilam mthong bar bya ba ni dus gsum du bzlas pas so// tshilam ngan pa gzhil ba ni til gyi sbyin sreg gis so// sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba ni khyim M bya'i

[W ]sgro'i sbyin bre ga gis so// bu mo thor bu dang du bya ba ni bu mo'i sku'i sbyin srog gis ngo// yugs sa mo dbang du bya ba ni bud med kyi me tog gi sbyin sreg gis so// bud med thams cad bang du bya ba ni
bud mang kyi ngabang po'i sbyin srag gis so/// 'dod pa thams cad deb du bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das smyan ras gadzigs dbang ngo la mchod pa byas nas nub gsum rangs par bzlas na/ de nas 'dod pa thamA
ha cad rtag tu thob par 'gyur ro// spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i spyan sngar nyin re zhing dus gsum du lan gsum bzlas na/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bla ba gsum gyis re ba ci 'dod pa'i mchog stsol
ba/ bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar bla ba gsum gyi bar du nyin mtshan gsum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pas mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i
rgyal po las/ spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rtog pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' sems da pa'i chen pos 'di
skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po rang gi snying po 'bul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol
'dis sems can thams cad dbang skur ba thob pa la sogs pa bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po byang chub sem
dpal la/ skyes bu chen po smyos shig ces bka' stsal te/ de nas 'dzags pa nam mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rang gi snying po 'ji gsungs so// trib ba Ta Ta haha/
da nas 'di brjod pas nam mkha' la dbang bskur ba thams cad la sogs pa rin po che'i rgyan thams cad dang/ gos dang/ gsar dung/ nor rin po che'i dbyig la sogs pa thams cad kyi char bab
bo bcom ldan 'das kyi sku kun tu rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te bzhugs so// nga nas nam mkha'i snying po byang chub sams dpas dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin
ta/ rdorjerin chen mnyam ldan zhing// grwa brgyad shin tu mnyam par bya// rin chen kun dang ldan par bya// de slob dpon zhugs te rdo rjerin po che'i phyag rgya dbang bskur ba'i gnas
su gzhag la zhugs nas 'di zhes brjod do// re ba thams cad grub pa yi// nam mkha' grub pa mchog yin te// grub cig grubacig sems chen po/ bcom ldan thams cad grub par ro// de nas
bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' byin gyis rlob par mdzad do// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su nam mkha'i snying po'i rgyalugs gzhag la/ de'i thade 'khor kun tu phyag na
rdo rje la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa brgyud gzhag par bya'o// de nas slob ma rdo rje khu tshur gyis gzhug go/ bcug nas 'di skad ces brjod do// sems can kun la phan phyir dang// bsam pa thams cad rdzog

bya'i phyir// don zhes bstan pa gang yin de// byang chub sems ni bstan pa yin// de nas sbyin pa rnam pa bzhi bslab bo// de la dbang bsar ba sbyin pa dang/ nor sbyin pa dang/ zas sbyin pa dang/ chos sbyin pa'o
de la dbang bskur baspyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la'o/ nor sbyin pa ni sems can thams cad la'o// zas sbyin pa ni byol song thams cad la'o// mos sbyin pa ni sems can mi snang ba thams cad la

'o// de nas snying po byin la rin po che thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur te 'di zhes brjod do// u0f00 badzrarad+d+hab+hakAkeng a b+hi Shiny+tsasamA ts+tshapa bya tshu lA bA tsa Ta ha/ de nas rdo

ma/ nor bu'i khu tshur gyis phyag rgya bslab ste/ sngags ni 'di'o// hUM taha/ de nas rje rin po che phyag rgyabartsis te/ sngags ni 'di'i// o bA bA tamu khaM/ de nas mchod pa rnam pa'i bya ste 'byung ngo
dbang thams cad bsku kha'i dkyil 'khera'o// de nas rdo rje ng+gan po che'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ rdo rinapo che dbus su bris la/ lag tunor bu thogs nas rdo rje rin po che las kyi bar du bzlas so/
de nas de bzhin gshegs pa byon tabang bskur bar mdzad do// dbang bskur ba des na thams cad kyi dbang por 'gyur ro// rinapo che'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor te/ nam mkha'i
snying po'i ralugs bris la// sbyan sngar nore dang/ gsar dang/ mu tig dang/ nor bu rin po che la sogs pa gang yang rung ba bzhag la/ de nas de btsud pa thams cad bstanams dmag 'di sbyin
mo sangs rgyus la sogs soms dpa' dag/ gal te nyin re mchod stodran// khyod kyis nor dang don bsags pa// tshe rabs kun tu 'jig par 'gyur// de la 'dimana'i snying po'o// o bA bA
nA NA ya swAhA/ de nas chus dbang bskur ro// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khora'o// las kyi dkyil 'khor bris la de bzhin gshegs pa rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan par bya ste/ de'i dbus su bzhag nas der
btsung de/ de nas las rnam pa lnga bslab pa ni// 'di lta ste/ dbang sbyin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa bya'o// de nas nor sbyin pa ni dge sbyong dang bram ze la sogs pa la ci nus kyis
sbyin no 8nas zas sbyin pan byol song rnams la sbyin no// de nas mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa ni spyod khrid thams cad la sbyin no// de nas chos sbyin pa ni mi snang ba'isems can rnams la
sbyin no// las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas sgrub pa 'byung ste/ ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa// rdo rje rin po tsho'i dbang bskur bas bsku babs te/de'i g.yA
phyogs su 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po bcom ldan 'das la dbang bskur ba'i 'phrang bas dbang bskur ba'o// g.yon phyogs su bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o//

de nas ras la bris pa de'i snga na sngar 'bum bzlas pa'i 'jug tu nyi ma shar bo nas brtsams te/ phyi de nyin gyi nyi ma shar gyi bar du bzlas na/ de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying bo ras la bris pa de
las byunas sgrub pa po de la rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ro// dbang bskur ba de nas de bzhin gshags par 'gyur po// de nas ma bslabs par yang las su 'gyur ba ni 'bum
bzlasaM na don thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar 'obum bzlas na gter chen pornyed do// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na rgyun
[“]Tha ras gzigs dbang pos phun sum tshogs pa thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na rgyal srid thob bo// rdo dzo khu tshur gyi spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na
ni/ nam mkha' la khu tshur bcings pas gseragyi dong tshe 'khyungo// 'jam dpal gzhon nu la bltas te 'bum bzlas na chos kyi nor dang gzungs thob bo// des nor yang sku bar byed do// rdo rje 'khor lo
srin lag gi sor mos mnan te 'bum bzlas na 'khor lo skor bar 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i mdzod kun nas 'khyud de 'bum bzlas pas nam mkha' las nor thams cad dang zas thams cad kyi yo byad
zad mi shes par 'gyur ro// byams pa la bltas te 'bum bzlas na bcol ldan 'das byams pa byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan rnams kyi dbang mchog byin nas slar yang 'ong ngo// de phyin chad 'dod
pa thams cad kyi nor gyi bdag por 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ nam mkha'i snying po'i rtog pa'o// de nas rdorje khu tshur
gyis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'dus pa'i 'khor thams cad bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'disadabus gsol to// bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa
chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po dbul bar bgyi ste/ bdag gis bskal pa stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la rdo rje'i mi rab de bzhin gshegs pa las blangs te/ des 'jig rten gyi khams thams
cad kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi sems can rnams grub pa thams cad grub par byas te/ de'i bskyed pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdzogs kyi bar du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rdorje khu tshur byang chub
sems dpa' chen po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ legs so legs so// rdo rje khu tshur khyod kyis smos shig/ de nas rdo rjekhu tshur gyis stong gsum kyi stong chen po'i
'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu g.yos par byas nas rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so// oM ru tu ru sku g+hom tha/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang//
'dzin dang/ 'khor thams cad ngakhaMcasams ri rab ri'i phyi mo r bcom ldan 'das ga la bdebalhags te/ lag pa gnyis kyis rang gi khu tshur gyi phyag rgya bcingasanas/ de bzhin gshags pa thams

cad kyi byang chub la dmigs shing/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'kher chen por gyur nas bkod do// de nas rdo rje khu tshuragyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyag rgyas btab nas dkyil 'khor
chen po 'di gsungs so// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// rdo rje dkyil 'khor 'dra bani/ ngordzi lu tshur zhes gsungs so// de yi dbus su sems chen po// rdo rje khu
tshur gzhag par bya// rdo rje khu tshur rdo rje bcas// lag pa gnyis ni btsir bar bya// de yi so ni thams cad du// sangs rgyas gzugs rnams gzhug par bya// dngag gi ni gA kun tu / byang chub sems

dpa' kun bri'o// de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir rdo rjeslob dpon gyis rdo rje dang bcas pa'i khu tshur gyi dam tshigagi phyag rgyabacings te zhugs la 'di rjod cig/ tshud Ni/ re tsapa/ nas bcom

bas ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur slob dpon la grub pa gyur/ de la phyag rgya'ang brtan pa 'gyur zhing sus kyadabye bar mi nus so// de nas snying po 'dis bdag gi snying khar dgrol lo// oM badzamukisu/ na
slob ma gzhug pa ste/ rdo rje khu tshu gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rdo rje dang bcas pa/ 'phreng ba dang bcas par bya ste/ de bzhin du ras dam pa pos mig gnyis bkab ste/ de nas 'di zhes brjod do//
dang khyor de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgyas btab pa nichos kyi phyag rgya dang// rdo rje 'dzin gyi rdo rje'i phyag rgyas kyang btab bo// khyod chos dang rdo las gang 'dod/ des smras pa//

gnyis ka lon/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis rdo rje dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i cha lugs blangs nus ba brang ba de'i mgo la bzhag ste/ dgrol ba'i snying po de nyid kyis phyag rgya snying khar dgrol lo//
nas lag tu spyin pa ni lag pa g.yon par rdo rje'o// g.yas par de bzhin gshegs pa'o// de lta de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes zan/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid sbyin no// de ste rdo rje'ozhes
war na de'i lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje phyin la 'di skad sgo zhig/ 'di gnyis ni khyod kyi grub par dmigs la rtag tumachod pa gyis shig/ de nas gdong g.yogs pa bkrol la dkyil 'khor ston 'di smos
shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje rnams// bsdus pa khu tshu shes bya ste// bcisan rdo rje khu tshur bshad// de nas snyipo byin la phyag rgya bcing ba slobs

shig/ dam tshig gi khu tshur zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khoro/ de nas phyugargya'i dkyil 'khor 'byung la dkyil 'khob chen pa'i tshul bzhin du// dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag bri// de yi dus su phyirigs par
sangs rgyas sku lus gzhag par bya// thams cad rgyun gyi brgyan pa yi/ rdorje khu tshur kun 'dzin pa'o// de yi ngos ni thams cad du// phyag rgya bzhi ni bar bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus rnams su///
rdo rje nAchen yang de bzhin// de bzhin rdo rje pad+mo'i dbus// rdo rjergyagram bri bar bya// ga yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// mchod pa rnam bzhi bri bar bya// de nas btsud nas phyug kun// 'di
ba yang ni bslab par bya/ sgrub pa gsang ba dag dang mi/ bskul pa gsang ba bslab par bya/ 'di rnams thams cad kun bris nas// sgrubs shig ces ni brjod par bya// phyag rgya'i dkyil la khor ro//
denas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ de bzhin du mtshan ma bzha gnas 'di zhes brjod do// ci ste dkyil 'khor ma mthong na/ phyag rgyashes pa bstan pa ni// rdo rje rin chen rgyal ba dang/
lcatshogs pas khyod gsod par 'gyuraM/ dam tshig gi dkyil 'khoraro// de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste// dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris la/ bcom ldan 'das rdo slobu tshur gyi spyan sngar phyag//

A rgyu las bslab bo// de la phyag rgya bcings pa ni 'a'o// rdo rdzobacing ba kun byas la// sor mo thams cad dgug bya ste// rdo rje'abebs pa'i phyag rgyudang// rdo rje khu tshur phyag rgya bcing// de nas lag

nya pa'i phyag rgya bcing// dalta bur mi ldan n 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog sgrub pas ni dmatshig nabo ya dag pa'i ye shes kyi snying po thabacig bzlas pas phyag rgya thamasacad bacing bar bya ste/ thams

cad kyi ni yin no// las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi sgrub pa 'byung ste/ 'o ma 'thung zhing rdorjakhutshuragyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcisanas 'bum pazlas na sngar
ba snyan pa byos par 'gyur ro// de nas sa la bri bar bya ste/ ras la bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa rdo rje khu tshur rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa bris la/ phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang bcas pa'i rdo
khu tshurab cings pa rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i dar gyis bcings la// de'i thad 'khor thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang phyag

gnyis ka de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khu tshur du bcing bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin n snyoms par zhugs par bya'o// de nas de'i sman sngar de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshurab si sa la/ stong phrag brgyabazlas pa'i mjug tu zhag bdun sangs nas bdag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gyi skur bsgoms la mtshan thal byung du bzlas so//
nga nas niam phyed nas 'dod kyi las sna tshogs snangabar 'gyur ro// de nas 'dirjod cig/ o 'khrimarihan han satsamar NaphaT/ da nas nang par gyi sa na bcom ldan 'das thams cad byon tolus kun
du 'jug go/ danas de bzhin gshegs pa dgrakhacom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// yang ras kyi tshog 'byung ste/ ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs

pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bris te/ de'i g.yas phyogs su bcom ldan 'das rdordzakhu tshur rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ sku mdog sngo bsangs ut+pal sngon po lta bu/ rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag g.yon
pa'i khu tshur gyis rdo dzi bsnams pa/ g.yas pa mchog sbyin pa ste/ 'i g.yas su bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje'i dam tshig gi khu tshur can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyanapa/ gzhon num dam tshig gi khu
tshur gyis rdorjod m du 'tshir ba medog dmar por bya'o// pa'i thadang rdo rje'i gsal phuram rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ spyan gsum pa/ lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje gsal phur thogs pa'o// bcom ldan

'das kyi g.yon phyogs su spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po thor tshugs kyi dbu rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ pad+modang mchod sprin gyi phyag tu byas la/ de'i g.yon du pad+mochen po'i rdo rje byang chub sems
dpa' rdo'i sde zhes bya ba'o// de'i g.yon du rdo'i dpal mo dang/ ngoN+Di pho nyamolo// rdodzodapal mo ni gser gyi sku mdog go/ dpal gyi gzugs 'chang ba phrugan 'dzin pa'o// jo po khamo ni

y+Ya mdog sngon mo la rdodzakhar ba 'chang ba'o// de nas zla ba yar gyi ngo tshos gcig nas brtsams te/ rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas stong phrag brgya bzlas na/ gzugs kyi ras de las phaT
ces bya ba thos na/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo 'grub par 'gyur te/ da phyin chadanam mkha'i dkyil na spyod cing 'dod pa'i ma snang bar yang 'gyur/ dpag tshad stod duphar yang 'gro zhing
rgyun du'ang 'gro'i// ci'adod pa'i gzugs su 'gyur ro// kun tu 'khyil bas 'khyil ba'i sku can le bcu drug lonapa'i lus su gyur nas 'dod pa'i longs spyodathams cad la ru 'dod pa bzhin longs
spyod par 'gyuparo// rdo khu tshur bcings pas sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa dang/ chad pas gcad pa la sogs pa thams cad nus par 'gyur ro// gzugs bzang po bskal par gnas
shing/ rgab dang ni bar yami 'gyur ro// yang chog gzhan te/ ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bris la// de'i g.yas phyogs su phyagan rdo rje rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa//
sku mdog ut+pal sngon po'i kha dog/ phyag na rdo rjod nga bcas pas rdo rje khu tshur bcings te sbyar la bcom ldan 'das la 'dud par bya/ g.yon phyogs su bcom ldan 'das ma dam tshig gi khu tshur rgyun
thams cad kyis brgyan pa yid tsam 'dud pa/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal ba/ lag pa g.yas pa na a ma'i 'bras bu 'bul ba/ g.yon pa na rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rjer dzin to// de nas ras

la bris pa'i spyan snga zhag gsum skyas la/ gu gul gyi ril bu sran ma tsam du ru ka'i 'bru mar la bsgugs pa brgyad stong du ba med pa'i mdag ma la srog go/ de nas gzugs de 'gul tabcom ldan 'das kyi zhal
nas 'od zer 'byung/ da nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyis mchog stsol ba ni/ rgyal bo 'am/ 'khor lo bskor ba'am/ lha ma yin pa dadang ba 'am/ sa brjod pa 'os

da sa'i 'og brjod pa 'am/ khams brjod pa 'am/ 'dod pa'i khams mi snang ba 'am/ nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// yang sgrub pa gzhan gyi tshog ste/ ras la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur rgyan thams cad

kyis brgyan pa bris la/ de bzhin du rdo rje dang bcas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje khu tshur bcings ba ut+pa la sngon po'i mdog tu byas la/ de'i spyan sngar dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur bcings te/ stong phrag brgya bzlus pa'i
mjug nyin mtshan gsum thal byung bzlas na num phyad nas bcom ldan 'das nyid byon te mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// ras sam/ shing lob bam/ rtsig ngos la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur ngo bzhin du

rdo rjod ng a ma'i 'bras bu thogs par byas te/ de'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgyabazlas na phyag rgya thams cad bcings pa tsam gyis las thams cad gdon mi za bar byed par 'gyur ro// de nas ma bsgrubs pa'i

las rnams 'byung ste dam tshig gi khu tshur bcings nas 'bum bzlas na khu tshur bcis pas mtshakha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/lag pa g.yon pas rdo rje dang bcas pa ni rje khu tshur bcings na phyag na rdo rdzol sogs pa'i gzugs 'byunge bar 'gyur

ba na 'bum bzlas so// lag pa g.yon pas rdo rdzokhu tshur bci sa stong phrag brgya bzlas na khu tshur bcings pa des mi snang ba 'gyur ro// phral na snang bar 'gyur ro// rdo rdzobacing ba'i khu tshur byas la
'bum bzlas khu tshur bcangs pas brtsi ba dang/ res par bya ba dang/ gnyid log par bya ba thams canus par 'gyur ro// nam mkha' la rdo rje khu tshur bcangs te 'bum bzlas na rdo rje khu tshur byabs/
pa tsam gyisanam mkha' la nor dad/ gsar dang/ mu tig dang/ rgyanadang/ rin po che dang/ gos dang/ bzarab dang/ btung ba dang/ mi dang/ rgudang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ myu gu
dang/ yi ge dang/ 'thab cad ng/ ston skyobs dang/ mtshon dang/ glegs bam dang/ rtog pa dang/ mdo sde dang/ sangs rgyas kyi sku la sogs po dngos po gnas pa dang/ 'gro ba ni 6
'dod pa dgug par byed do// g.yas pa rdo rje khu tshurab cas la 'bum bzlas na rdo rje khu tshur bstan pas gnas pa dang/ 'gro ba thams cad dgug pa dang/ 'dren pa dang/ 'gyal bar nus
bar 'gyur ro// khu tshur bsgyurabs thams cad gtan 'bonus par 'gyur ro// g.yas pas rdo khu tshur bcangs la stong phrag brgya bzlas na rdo rje khu tshur byabs pas thams cad las nor dang/ gsar dang/
rgyan dang/ gos dang/ mtshon chadang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu la sogs pa dngos po thams cad 'gug go/ gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ sriding/ ro dang/ rig bya las dam pa thams cad
kyang 'gug go/ bud med kyi num dang/ mngal phyogs dang/ mig dang/ sna dang/ mchu dang/ rnab dang/ mgo dang/ bod+madang/ ska rags dang/ gsang spu la sogs pa dngos po
'a@#// thams cad kyang 'gug go/ bkrol na thar bar 'gyur ro// nyin zhag gcig sbyang la lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu tshur btsas te/ stong phrag brgya bzlas na de phyin chad khu tshur bcangs
pas 'a sa thams cad byed do// de la las rnams ni dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ gci ba dang/ dbang du bya ba dang/ rengs par bya ba dang/ rmugs par bya ba dang/ rgyas gdab pa dang/
gnyid leg pa dang/ bas nga ba dang/ drang ba dang/ bskyel ba dang/ brdabs pa dang/ bsad pa dang/ dbye ba dang/ go bzlog pa dang/ gtan 'pho ba dad/ gso ba dang/ sgyu ma thams
cad bstan pa dang/ dus tshig bsgyur ba dang/ sa la sogs pa g.yo ba dang/ thams cad la dbab pa dang/ dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang/ gar byed pa dang/ gru lan pa dang/ sngon ma byung ba'i
sbyor ba dang/ so so ralung ston pa dang/ 'khrula 'khor thams cad gzhom pa dang/ sgo thams cad dbye ba dang/ gdon thams cad 'jug pa dang/ dug thams cad bslangab dang/ marung
bar bya ba dang/ thams cad spo ba dang/ thams cad kyi phyag rgyu gzhom pa dang/ thams cad 'gebs pa dang/ gas pa sbyar ba dang/ sprul bslad pa dang/ gzung ba dang/ gtong ba dang//
sor ba dang/ char dbab pa dang/ glog dbyung ba dang/ thams cad slar gcad pa dang/ sngan chad med pa'i gos dang/ rgyun dang/ rin po che dang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ skyes pa dang//
bud med dang/ bya dang/ ri dgas dgug pa dang/ gtong ba dang/ gzugs mang po ston pa dang/ mi snang ba dang/ rnam mkha' la 'gro ba bstan pa la sogs pa 'dod pa bzhin las thams cad
byed par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ rdo rje khu tshur gyi rtog pa'o/// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur
gyur pa byang chub sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rang gi snying po 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa 'dir stsal bar bgyi ste/ gang brjod pa tsam gyis
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzod brjod par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis smyos shig ces gsungs so// de nas
'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa/ a ra pa tsan/ de nas 'di brjod ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid los yi ge mnyam pa nyid sems can tham

cad kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i grub pa thob par 'gyur ba bshad do// de nas dkyil 'khor 'byung ba ste/ 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor yar gyi ngo tshes bcu bzhi 'am brtsolnga la bris te/ de'i dbus
kyi lta bar 'jam dpal bzhugs par bya'o// rdo rje ral gri dang glegs bam thogs par byas la/ 'i thad 'khor thams cad du yi ge a ra pa tsa na la sogs pa'i 'phrang ba bri bar bya'o// de nas slob/
dpon gyis rdo rje ral gri dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la zhugs te/ ni ngapany+tsagra/ zhes pa'i yi ge 'di la brjod do// de nas bcom ldan 'dus kyis slob dpon la thogs
ba med pa'i sebs pa'i ng stsol te/ da phyin chad bcom ldan 'das kyis nam mkha' la yi ger bris te thams cad gsung// de bzhin du slob ma bcug ste 'di zhes smyos shig/ deng khyod kyis de bzhin
gshegs pa'i sa thob par 'gyur gyis/ snying po 'di khyed kyis su la'ang ma smra zhig/ de la gsang ba'i yi ge 'di rnams so// a ra pa tsa na zhes bya ba ste/ 'dod pa thams cad thob bo// de ci'i
phyir zhan/ a zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'o// ra zhes bya ba ni chags pa'o// pa zhes bya ba ni den dam pa'o// tsazhes bya ba'i spyod pa'o// na zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin med pa'o// de ltar 'dod pa dang//
chags pa dang/ don dam pa dang/ spyod pa dang/ snang bzhin med pa nyid kyi snying po 'di bsgoms te bsgrubs na 'dod pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dod pa thams
cad kyi snyed yin te/ de bas na snying po 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ rdo rje 'dzin kyang myur du thob par 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rgya bcing ba bsrang ba// spros pa med pa'i mchog ces bya'o//

wis+sa denas ral gri'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ de bzhin du jo rje dkyil 'khor bris la/ de'i dbus su ralagro bzhag ste/ mdun du snying po 'di bsgrubasan/ des 'ajam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bsgrubs par 'gyur

0/ ro dotshoral gri'i dkyil 'khor ro// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ni dkyil 'khor chen pou0f38 tshul bzhin du bri la zhugs nas 'di nas brjod do// a kAn khaM sarba d+hamaN+NaM/ a bya nud pan na tAta/ a zhe bya
bani chos thams cad kyi sgo so thog ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir ro/ zhes nang par langs nas nyin re lan robarjong na mtshams med pa thams cad kyis mi gos so// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas
las kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung sta/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag nas mchod pa rnam pa bzhis mchod pa ni 'dri ba dang/ klog pa dang/ kha ton byed pa dang/ sgom pas
so// las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas sgrub 'dod pas dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ras la bris nas/ yi ge 'phreng ba thams cad brjod de 'di skad du/ chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyi sgrub pa'o zhes
kyang brjod nas/ yi ge 'di 'bum bzlas na spobs pa mi zad par 'jam dpal dang mtshungs pa dang/ nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas ma bsgrubs kyang las su 'gyur ba ni lan cig bzlas
pas sdug bsngal thams cad las grol lo// gnyis khazlas pas mtshams med pa thams cad lhag ma ma lus par zad par 'gyur ro// gsum bzlas pas ting nge 'dzin mngon du 'gyur ro// bzhi
bzlas pas dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ lnga bzlas pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la yi ge 'phrang
dab g.yas phyogs nas a zhes bya ba'i drung dun zhes bya ba phyin gyi bar du bu'o// de nas bskor zhing yi ga 'bum bzlas te/ yig pa'i 'bum rdzogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin g.yag
pa dang/ 'jam dpal dang/ phyag na rdo rjecig car 'grub ste/ nyin re zhing mkhreng bar bstan nas chos bshad de smaragshegs so// tshe 'di nyid las sangs rgyas pa man chad kyang stso 2[']do//
blo'ajig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ 'jam dang la gzhon nu'i rtog pa'o// don bcom ldan 'das la/ rdo rje 'khor le byang chub
sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'a jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir sing po 'ad stsal bar bgyi ste/ gangabarjod pa
tsam gyis dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rdo rje 'khor lo byang chub sems dpa' la bskul lo// de nas rdo rje 'khor lo byang chub sems par sa ngacom
ldan 'das la rang gi snying po phul ba/ o badzatsakra hU~M/ dogs 'di brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyis dkyil 'khor de nyid du zhug/
so/ de nas rdo rje 'khor lo byang chub sems dpas dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do// rdo rje 'khor lo bzhin bris la// rje 'khor la bdag che ba// rang gi lag na phyag rgya thogs// de yid dus su gzhag
[j]par bya de yi thad 'khor thams cad du// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshogs rnams khri// de yasems can chen po rnams// de dag nyid ni legs par bo// de nas blo ldan thogamaru// rdo rje 'khor
las 'jug par bya// zhugs nas snying po 'di bzlas so// dzany+tsats+tsalaMhozhes brjod na// des bcom ldan 'das dgyes te grub pa thams cad du sol to// de bzhin du slob ma banu gnas de nyid du bskyab

par bya'o// rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ rdo rje 'dzin thob par 'gyumalo// rdo rje 'khor lo zhes bya ba'o// rdzo rje 'khor lo'i dbus su rdo rje bri ste//
de bzhin du bzlas na rdo rje 'dzin du 'gyur ro// rdo dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris nas mtshan ma bzhag ste 'di zhes brjod do// rdo rja 'khor lo 'jug pa yis// mthong dang de bzhin
bsgrubs nani// rtog pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// de bas brtags te bsgrub par bya// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor bris pa de nyid do// phyag rgyabashis pa sgrub pa'i phyir//
brtson 'grus brtan pas thams cad kyi// bla na med pas bslab par bya// las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa tsam gyis ma sgrubs par las thams cad byed de/ joltar dga'
ba'i cho ga 'am rtog pa las bshad pa sgrubs shig/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ rdo rje 'khor lo'i rtog pa'o/// de nas bcom ldan
'das la/ nam mkha'i mdzod byang chub sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'a jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i
rgyal po 'dirarang gi snying po stsal bar bgyi ste/ snying po gang brjod pa tsam gyis mchod pa thams cad kyi gnas su 'gyur ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis smyo sa shig ces gsungs so// de nas nam
mkha' mdzod kyis gsungs pa o ga gan saM b+ha ba badzrab tsa ho/ de nas de'i dus bcom ldan 'das kyis dkyil 'khor thams cad la nam mkha'alas mchod bkun 'byung bar byas so// de nas dkyil
lha'akher 'byung ste/ rdo rje 'khor le bzhin du bri// de yi dbus su nor chen to// nam mkha' dang porab zhugs par bya// rgyal ba kun gyis bskor ba bya'o/ dang por slob dpon 'jug pa// mchod
pa kun mchog phyag rgyas so// dkyil 'khor de ru zhugs nas ni// rdo rje thams cad brjod par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khrub ste// de bzhin du slob ma rang bcug nas rdo rje thams cad hU~M
dam tshig gi snying po 'di brjod la phyag rgya'ang slobs shig/ mchod pa thams cad ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// des nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor ste// yid kyis dkyil 'khor bris la der zhugs
a shi// zhugs nas 'di skad rjod cig/ 'di dag thams cad ni nam mkha' nyid de/ bden pa gang gnam mkha' gzugs med pa las gzugs 'byung ba des na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
btsa'/ la mchod pa dang/ yid la 'dod pa'i grub pa thams cad nam mkha' las 'byung bar gyur cig ces byas nas 'dug ste/ rdo rje kun gyi phyag rgya bcings nas 'o bum bzlas na/ dmas nam mkha' lasu ]
mchod pa'i rnam pa thams cad dang/ don thams cad dang/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ rdo 'i dkyil 'khore// dkyil 'khor bris nas btsung de 'di ni khyed kyi dam tshig
go zhes rjod cig 'byung ba kun las nam mkha' ni/ 'byung ba chen po lnga pa'o// nam mkha' lani 'dod pa 'byung// 'dod pa'i mchod pa grub gyur cig/ ces smras nas/[”]'dis khyod kyis de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad mchod cig ces sgo zhig/ ngam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// slob ma nam mkha' la yid kyis dkyil 'khor 'dri'i bcug la/ der slob ma yid kyis mchod pa 'ang slobs shig/
yid kyis 'di skad rjod cig/ nam mkha'i mchod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod de nas nyin razhing byas na 'grub bo// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i
rgyal po las/ nam mkha' mdzod kyi rtog pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'phags pa byams pa byang chub sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po stsol bar bgyi ste/ gang brjod pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad byams pa'i sems/
skye bar 'gyur ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu smos shig ces gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das byams pa byang chub sems dpas rang gi snying po 'di gsungs
so// o me ridza?d+ha tsita tiSh+Tha ho/ de nas 'di brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te bzhugs so// de nas dkyil 'khor 'byung
'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bris pa derakhyams pa gzhag ste/ de bzhin gshags pa bzhi dang/ byang chub sems dpa' bzhi bya ste/ chog bstan pa'i phyag rgyas zhugs la 'di zhes brjod
do badri b+hu ti/ de nas byams pa 'i ting nga 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas slobam de bzhin du dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad du 'jug pa'i tshul gyis btsud do// btsud nas byams pa chen po'i phyag
tshungasab ste/ de nas goms khagon no// bstan pa chen po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas byams pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ byams pas zhugs la byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgrubs shig/
byams pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor du bcug la 'di zhes brjod do// rangasasam yan khros kyang rung// mdze dang snang ba de bzhin te// 'gro las gal ta rgyal 'dod ni/ khyamA
ba chen po sgom par gyis// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor du btsud la 'di bslab bo// sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can thams cad dge bar gyur cig
'byung po thams cad la byams pa dang/ byol song thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sIn no// las kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ khyams pa bsgyoms pas grub pa thams cad 'ded pa 'i sgrub
pas sgrub bo// las rnams kyang yid kyis ci dad pa'i tshog dang byams pas sgrubs shig/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ byams pa'i rtog pa'o//
donas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la rdo rig pa'i dmatshig la sogs pas mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jig rtan gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po

phul ba/ so dri o b+hit+tabadzra shul/ otsiny+tsa hUM tsakra phaT/ oM b+hur rgyu ba sA swAhA/ oM ha nab+hin+da badzrahU~M phaT/ ol la la 'a a b+hi shig+gats+tsha na/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/
dkyil 'khor zlum po'i dkyil 'khor gyi grwa'i srad bu'i dbus su dbang phyug chen po bri daragazhan dag kyang rim gyis thams cad bri ba 'am/ gzhag pa 'am/ mthar ni tshon gyi thig la'ang gzhag
go/ de nas thog mar slob dpon gyis gsalaphu gsum pa'i rtagasakyi phyag rgyabacas la 'dug go/ g.yon logs nas derje'i slob ma'ang bcug ste/ de nas phyag rgya'ang bslab bo/da phyin chad tham cad
bgrub cing 'jig rten thams cad kyi rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro//'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ rig pa'i blon po chen po'i rtog pa'o// nas rdo rje'akhyil ba la

sAn ni/ 'bya// sogs pa rdo rje khro bos 'jig rtenagasum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM a mi rtagaN+Dali kha kha kha ba kro d+ha kA ma la hUM phaT/ oM ma hu

pra ba spo Ta ya shul ekAl dats+tshahan hanAhU~MphaT/ka la pAshA gra Aka tshuphaT/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khol 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bris la/de'i dbus su rdo rje gzhag go/ phyogs bzhirani khro bo rnams de bzhin
dubar chad du byas la dgod de// ri nas slob dpon bdud rtsi'akhyil pa'i phyag rgyar zhugs nas phyag rgya bcing ba bslaba'o// de nas thams cad dgug pa dang/ dbang du bya ba dang/ gtan 'bo ba dang//

srung ba 'grub bo// rdo rje khro bo'i rtog pa'o/// de nas rdo rjesrin po la sogs pa tshogs kyi gtso bos snying po 'di rnams phul lo// o mahAlA 'dra ka mad ga Na de bi ba pa ba ru hU~Mran sarba duSh+Tha na

nAphaT/ oM ma lA d+har tsaka tsal ya hUM/ o d+hu nu ru b+har ba shAku ru sarba satwa nasAhA/ oM dza ya bi dza ya hUM Ta/ de nas dkyil 'khor 'byung sa/ gzhu lta bur dkyil 'khor bris la dor rdo rje gzhag
ge/ g.yas su 'ang gnyis/ g.yon du'ang gnyis so// de nas rdo rje srin po'i phyag rgyas btsud do// de nas phyag rgya bsubs nas rtog paslab pa/ gapadag ba dang drin gzo dang/ lha yi 'khor mthong
ma gtogs par// gzhan rnams de dag thams cad kun/mi dge ba rnams gtan 'phor bya// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog ba chen po'i rgyal po las/ tshogs kyi gcibo'i rtog
de nas rdo rje gtun shing la sogs pa'i pho nyas rang gi snying po smras pa/ o 'a ngag lI hUM/ oM ma snyapa ta hUM/ oM badzra dzul ya sA hA/ oM ba ka za b+hi ra ba de hi ma sa ra bcu hU~M
phaT/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ba ni bde chu dang 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bris te/ dbus su de tshu bzhag nas rdo gtun shing gi phyag rgyas bcug la las 'di bsang bo// mi dge ba'i sems
can thams cad 'athungs shig 'phrogs shig/ srogs shig/ ze zhig/ de nas phyag rgya bcing ba bslab bo// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ pho nya'i
tshogs kyi rtog pa'o//[']de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ rdo rje kyo kha tang la sogs pa bran rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang 'jig rten gsum las

rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo// o bA ra hAdaM da ka Tab ga to d+ha ra sarban khan kha na hUM phaT/ o sajamAr da za hUM phaT/ oM ba ka te ka daMtib+hin hUM phaT/
o ma snyam Ni har ha ra hUM khaN de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor 'di'o// gru gsum par bris la// mngon sum par phyag rgyas zhugs M nas gar gyi phyag rgya bcing ba bslab ste/ gar gyi mchod pas na dbus kyi
rdordzol mchod do// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ ban gyi rtog pa'o/// de nas ma thams cad kyis kutsa'i sgro bton te/ gar gyi mchod pa chen
khos bcom ldan 'das la mchod nas rang rang gi snying po phul lo// de nas rdo rje'i blon po chen mo dag gis smras pa/ oM badzagro rgyur li hUM phaT/ oM badzatsakra dzIwA hUM phaT/ oMn+ti

nAM/ oM badzra mud+d+hihan shin b+hahan hUM phaT/ o ku mA ra ha bi sha h+pha tsati ki ra mya ti nanulA ya sarba duSh+Tha na hUM tha/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'kher gru bzhi pa de'i skor 'khor la sogs pa bri'o/de'i dbus surdo rje khro mo'i

blo mayol/na jo lnga'i gsalaphu chen gazhag go/ dam tshig gi cho ga ni de bzhin no// 'jig rten gsum 'as rnam par rgyal ba'i rtag pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo rnams kyi rtog pa'o//

de nas rdo rje khro mo rnams kyis rang gi snying po smras pa/ oM a mr-i ta hUM phaT/ oM sob kyi d+hi hUM phaT/ oM daNadz+ha ri tshan hUM phaT/ oM yaM ga la hUM NaT/ dkyil 'khor zur brgyad pa bris te/ de'i
dbus su rdo rje gzhag go rtsa bzhir bgos pa rnams la bzhi po rim gyis gzhag sgo/ 'jug pa la sogs pa'i tshog ni de nyid do/[”]'angani khro mo 'i dkyil 'okhor ro// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal
ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ dzrakhro mo rnams kyi rtog pa'o////de nas tshogs ma mo rnams kyis sdus pa/ o khacha ma ra NAn+taM/ o a sha si ba d+ha hir ma ho/ o pA sha sa ma
ya hUM/ oM sarba ra ma Nir te dri ye ho/ de nas dadag gi dkyil 'khor ni zlum po ste// sgo bzhi pa dbus su sa khal srad bu byas te/ thig bzhi btab la rim bzhir bri'o// gzhan yang phyi'i dkyil 'khor
de bzhin du zlum porathig bzhi rim du btab la/ de'i dbus su gnod sbyin gyi gdong bri'i/ dngos bzhir ni rim gyis te/ shar phyogs nas bri ba 'am gzhag par bya'o// sgo bzhir rdo rje'i mdaga gzhug
ma bri ba'am gzhag par bya'o// de'i snying po ni 'di'o// b+hi tsiri Ti b+ho b+ho/ de ltar rig pa 'i blon mo chen mo la sogs pa thams cad du gyis shig/ 'di thadacig bzlas pas thams cad lugs so//

nga nas gdong g.yogs nas lag pa gnyis kyis rkang pa'i mthe bong gzung ste phug 'tshal nas skyil mo krung gis gar byed ci zhugs la dbab bo// bcas nas dam tshig byin cig/ sarba mu 'kha da pa ba de phyib
ra sa ma ya ho/ de nas de bzhin du dam tshig spyin no// glu gar dang/ sil snyan dang/ zas dang/ skom gyis thams cad tshim par byas la dril bus phab pa ste/ de nas dngos grub thams cad dang/
bde ba thams cad dang/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad rnyed nas/ rnal 'byor dang nam mkha' la 'gro ba la sogs pa'i ng thob bo zhes smos shig/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa
chan po'i rgyal ngo 'dus/ rdo rje'i tshigs ma mo'i rtog pa'o////de nas rdo rje pho nya mo rnams kyis smras pa/ oM g+ho oM ka lim ra Ni/ badzrarak+Sha si nyan sa ngan tu ma/ o ba tha Ni tha/ oM

ma pha ka ra bka dra tshuphatsha/dkyil 'khor grwa lnga par bris te/ rdo rdzogru'i dbus su gzhag go/ bzhin rdo rje'i pho nya mo bzhag ste/ dmyo ga de bzhin du bya'o// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen
[; ]'aglu/ dpo'i rgyal po las/ rdo rjepho nyane li rtog pa'o/// de nas rdo dri bran mo rnams kyis smras pa/ o pA ra hi badzra bi dritaM ta ra pa ta la sa ma ya ma nu su ra a li sha

khaka o kA li kA pa lim lad+ha ri Ni ka Da ka Da ma Ta ma Ta bi mA ra ya cham ra Ni dzaM phaT/ oM pu tani u tshur du khA da sa cha nashe kha ya sAhA/ oM ma ka ramu khi bar ha ra hUM/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi la
sgo bzhir bris nas/ de'i dbus su rdo rje bris te/ de bzhin mgar gyis mchod de// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ branamo'i rtog pa'o// de nas
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas/ phyag na rdo rje la 'askad ces gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba 'dzin pa khyod yin no// de bas na rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir ngon yong

cing myur du grub par bya ba'i phyir gang gis sems can thaslu cad dngos grub dam pa bde blag tu thob par 'gyur pa'i phyi ma'i rgyud shed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de mas can 'di rnams ni brtson 'grus kyis 'dul
