de nas gzhan yang gsang ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so// oM sho d+hani shed+ha ya sam+b+ha6 pa yaM sa satre sbyo hUM/ lha'i dbang po gzhon yang 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'o// oM sarba a pA ya bi sho d+ha na

( hU~M phaT/ lha'i dbang po gzhan yang 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o// u0f00 traT/ lha'i dbang po gzhan yang 'di ni ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyong ba'i snying po'o//

lha'i dbang po gzhan yang mdor na dran pa tsam gyis kyang bsod nams chung ba'i soms can rnams ngan song gi rgyud thams cad las bde blag tu rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba ni 'di yin no// mon mo b+ha ga ba te

sa durga te pa ri shod+ha na rA dza ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ arma tasamyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ni/ bi sho d+ha ni bsho d+hani/ sam+b+hapA paM bi sho d+ha nishud+d+ha bihuSh+Tha/ sad+d+hA kam+ma A ba ra Na bi shud+d+hasuhA

oM sarba bid+ya sah+phu A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ya han tshu phaT/ oM sam+b+ha bid hU~M/ oM sam+b+ha bid phaT/ oM sarba bid a/ o saN+Did tAT oM sam+b+ha bed so sos rgyu'id meo sad+ma bang sa/ o sazla bod a/ oM sam+b+ha
bad+ma hU~M/ oM sam+ba bid taT/ o/ o b+ha/ lha'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i gsang ba'i snying po 'di rigs kyi bu ma/
rigs kyi bu mo gang yang rung bas ming tsam yanyan tam/ bcangs sam/ bklags sam/ bris nas kyang mgo bo 'am/ gtsug phud dam/ dpung pa 'am/ mgul du btags te 'chang na tshe 'di nyid

la dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad dam/ dus ma yin par 'chib dang 'brel pa rmi lam gyi rnam pa 'am/ ngan song dang 'brel ba'i mtshan ma de dag thams cad rmi lam tsam du 'ang mi 'byung na/ dkyil 'khor du ji
lta ba bzhin du zhugs la/ zhugs nas kyang dbang bskur la snying po'ang bzlas/ sngags kyi don yang sgom pa gang yin pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de dag la ni sdig pa gang yang bar mi 'gyur/ na song
du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// skyes pa 'am/ budamed dam/ lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod spyin nam/ srin mo 'am/ byol song dam/ yi dgas sam/ sems can dmyal ba la sogs te/ gangayang

rung kha shi ba'i lus dkyil 'khor du bcug ste dbang bskur// sems can dmyal bar skyes na'ang de ma thag tu rnam par thar nas/ lha'i rigs su skyebar 'gyur ro// lha'i rigs der skyes nas kyang de bzhin gshag
pa thams cad kyi chos nyid mngomasum du byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstan bkur la sogs pa'i ng byed/ phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur/ rgyud nges parun du'ang 'gyur/ de bzhin gshikA/
pa'i rigs su'ang skye/ sgrib pa rnams rab tu spangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs sam/ lha'i rigs sam/ gzhan gang yang rung bar bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro// lha'i dbang po 'dor
blabya// na 'jig rten nam 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phan pa dang bde ba thams cad myong bar 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bces ldan 'das la de bzhin du bskor ba byas duphyag

'tshul nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ngan song thams cad kyi dbang du gyur pa rnams la sman pa dang bde bar bgyi ba dang/ cinas kyang sems can de dag ngan song thams cad la rgyab kyis phyogs par
@ bgyi ba dang/ bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bde blag tu rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du bshad du gsol/ cig bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting de 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i gzi

( brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungasaso// sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub sems// bla na med pa rtogs gyur pa// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i yang shas gang// dan dkyil 'khor snying po ra gsungs//

de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du phyi'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// gtsug lag khang dang skye mos tshal// mchod rten lha khang kun dga' sogs// ji bzhin pa yi
rtsachog yis// gnas ni byin gyis brlab pa brtsam// byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas der ni// phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// gru bzhi la sgo bzhi pa// rtababs bzhi dang ldan pa dang// them skas ba'i yi

'thung ba dang/ seng ge ba gang rnams kyis brgyan// dar dang lda ldi do shal 'phreng// dril bu dang ni rje mas brgyan// rdo rje rin chen pad+mo dang// rgya gram pa yi phyag rgyas brgyan// srad bu brgyad dang ldan pa dang/

phyi yi sgo khyung rnams kyis brgyan// dgu yi char ni bgos pa las// sgo dang sgo khyud sum char bya// rdo rjesad bus thig gdab bo// dbus kyi dpyil 'khor thig gdab pa// chos kyi 'khor le 'dra ba la// lte bar
bcas shing phyibs bcu drug/ rim pa gsum dang ldan pa la// rtsibs mi nyis 'gyur nyid dubya// dbus kyi phyogs su kun rig ni// dung dang kurla zla 'dra la// zhal bzhi pa la rdo rje yis// sa dga'i

gdan la bzhugs pa dang/ ting 'dzin phyag rgyur ldan pa dang// rgyana rnams kun gyis brgyan par bri// de yi spyan sngar n gnas od kun// sbyong ba'i rgyaDa po bri bya ste// phyag gnyis ting 'dzin tshul du bsnol//

zla ba rgyus dang pad+ma'i mdog/ rgyan rnams kun gyis legs rdzogs la// rgyal mchog skyes bus gang bar bri// rgyab tu shAkya'i rigs dbod po// gtso bo thub pa bri bar bya// g.yon dang g.yas kyi phyogs chu ni//

rgyal mchog rin chen me tog gnyis// lo tsa nA dang mA ma kI// de bzhin dkar mo sgrol ma rnams// rang gi rigs kyi mtshan ma bzhin// grwa yi phyogs ni kun tu bri// rtsibs kyi nang ni thams cad du/ rdo dza sems
pasogs sems dpa' mchog/ rdzu 'phrul chen po 'i sams dpa' rnams// go rims bzhin du bri bar bya// mkhas pas la spyi la sogs pa// mchod pa grwa yi phyogs su bri// sgo yi phyogs ni thams
[/ ]@#// cad du sgo ba bzhi ni bribabya// rta babs khyams ni thams cad du// byams pa la sogs bribar bya// nyan thos rgyal ba thams cad dang// bzhin rang rgyal gtso bo rnams//

khro bo mngag pa lo nyasogs// bri bya yan mid yang rung// phyi yi dkyil 'khor phyi rol du// gling bzhi po ni bri bar bya// 'dzam bu'i gling du tshangs pa dri/ byang phyogs su ni dbang phyugache// shar dang nub kyi

gling du ni// brgya byin gtogs 'dong thams cad mi/ 'khor dang bcas pa bri bar bya// gzhan dag rnams kyang de bzhin te// lha min dre ba nam mkha' lding// gnod sbyin srin po lte 'bri na/ 'byung bo yi dgas

'dre rnams dang// ka dang grul bum re rnams dang// rgyal po bzhi rnams bri bar bya// gza' dang skar ma rgyu skar dang// khro bo ma rung 'tshob yin// bgegs dang bi nA ya ka rnams// sems can kun la phan byed

pa'i drang srongaskal ba chen po rnams/ da' snga mnam dang bud med dri// de bzhin sring mo rnal 'byor ma// 'byung ba bzhi yi lha chen po// khyim dang de la gnas pa dang// shing dang kun dga'i nags la sogs//

dur khrod grong khyer gnas pa'i rnams// ming dang brda 'am yang na ni// thig le rnams kyang bri bar bya// de nas mkhas pas dkyil 'khor la// bla re rgyal mtshan lhab lhub dang// gdugs dang rnga ma lnga ldi dang//

'phan dang sna tshogs na bzas mchod// gsar las byas pa'i bya rnams ni// brgyad dam bcu drug lhag kyang rung// dbang bskur rin chen chus bkang ba'i// bum pa lnga ni gzhag par bya// mar mo gtor ma bum pa
pa dang// mdzes pa'i bshos rnams ga nag ba ste// bza' ba btung ba sbyar la gas dang// bca' ba sna tshogs gzhag par bya// gnod sbyin srin po'i kha zas su/ gter ma rnam pa sna tshogs ga zhig/

'khyung po dag dang klu dag dang// mi dang mi min de bzhin te// ma tog dri rnams sna tshogs dang// 'o ma mar dang kha rar bcas// rnam rgyal bum pa dri yi chus// rab tu bkang ba gzhag par bya// de nas khrus
la sogs byas la// dri dang 'phrang mchog 'phreng ba can// dri zhim kha bkang mchog mdzes pa// rdo rje 'dzin mas zhugs nas kyang// me tog thogs te sgo phyogs 'dug/ gtso bo rgyal ba sras kyi 'khor

mang po rnams ni spyan drangs te// phyag rgyasngags dang bdag ldan zhing// lcags kyu la sogs rnal 'byor gyis// dzahU~MkhaM he/thugs rje bdag/ tshur gshegs zhes ni nga rjod nas kyang// gsang ba'i bcing
babacas nas nii// mdzub gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul du bya// zhags pa bzhin du sbyar nas kyang// de nyid lcagasasgrog tshul du bya// mthob gnyis nang du bku gnas ni// bskyod pa ru gyur nas dbang
du 'gyur// de nas mtshan ma skyes nas ni/ glog mchod pa gangon sum mthong/ a mchog brtags bsad la sogs pa yi// dbyangs snyan pa yis bstod dang lha rdzas kyi// mchog gi dam pa rnams
kyis legs par mchod// donas 'byung po kun gyi gtor ma bya// sems can bkres shing skom pas gdung pa dang// phyogs na gnas pa rnams la rnam par brtags// dayi gtor ma ji ltar mthun
@#// par bya/ dunas sngags pas bla med byang chub kyi/ gnas su slob ma yongs su smin bya ba// 'gro la phan phyir myur du byang chub bar// de dag byang chub sems mchog bskyad du
gzhug/ de rnams byin brlabs byang chub smon lam gdab// zabacing rgya che ba yi chos bsgrags la// bsrung bar byas nas brtul zhugs sdom gnas pa// rang gi kha nas sngags brjod gzhug par bya//
dar la sogs pas mig gnyis g.yogs nas ni// rdo rje 'dzin ma dpal gyi lag gnyis bya// ma tog rin chen la sogs dbargyan la// yon gyis lag pa bkang sta gzhug par bya// sngags ni 'di
rnams yin no// oM badzra a d+hi tipas hUM// oM badzra sa ma ya hUM/ oM badzra pra bo swA hUM/ a sa me tris ma ma hAs ma ya hU~M/ de nas sngags 'dis ma tog la sogs pa dor bar bya'o// sangs rgyas
dngos grub thob bya'i phyir// bdag la thugs brtsar dgongs nas ni// 'gro la phan phyir gtso chen gyis// dman par dgongs nas bzhes su gsol// o 'dzapra ti ga d+ha/ a pra Ni/ badzra sa ma
ya hU~M ma tog rin chen la sogs gang// bab par gyur pa rigs kyi lha// gtso bo'i rigs de bsgrubs na ni// dngos grub 'gyur te the tshom med// de nas sngags pa mkhas pa yis// sngags 'dis

dam tsheg sbyin par bya// oM badzra sa ma ya hU~M phaT/ oM badzra sa ma ya hUM da ya ma pra be sha drin+taM tiSh+ThahUM/ de nas 'dis dmatshig bsgrag par bya'o// 'di ni khyod kyi myal ba'i chu// dam tshig 'das na sreg par
byed dam tshig bsrungasan dngos grub ni/ rdo bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis 'grub/ cisnyadam tshig 'dus gi/ dam thagatu bkasanas gshegs// rdzo'adzin rgyal khros nas kyang// bdun brgyud rigs ni

rlag par mdzad// de bas rtag tu bu khyod kyis// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i dam tshig dang// sdom pa dang ni bla ma'i bka'// sin tu mos pas bsrung bar bya// khyod kyis srog chags gsad mi bya// ma byin par yang
blang mi bya// brdzun dang 'dod la spyod pa rnams// dngos grub 'dod pas bya ma yin// chang 'di btung bar mi bya zhing// sha la sogs pa bza' mi bya// sems can gnod pasbyor ba// nams

kyang bya ba ma yin te// dkon mchog gsum ni yong mi spang// dus kun tu na byang chub sems// snying po sngags dang phyag rgya dang// lha dang bla ma de bzhin no// sdig la sogs pa gang yin dang// bla ma'i
bka' las 'da' mi bya// lha la phul ba'i rnying pa dang// de yi grib ma 'gom mi bya// phyag rgya'i gzugs la'ang de bzhin te// sngags dang lta la'ang smad mi bya// gdon gyi las sogs bya ma yin//
mu stegs can la'ang smad mi bya// mdor na yid gnyis som nyi the tshom mi bya ste// bdag gi de nyid du ni sngags sogs de bzhin de// mos pa brtan dang ldan pas dam bcas nas// sarba'i drus ji bzhin
dbang bskur te// bum pa la sogs jasnyid mad thogs pas// bcu po rnams kyis dbang bcu ci dgar bskur// de nas lag tu dri'i dang rdo rje byin// 'khor lo la sogs rin chen bdun thogs ga mi dbang dbang
phyug 'khoralo thob pa dang// sdig pa gzhom phyir dbang ni bskur bar bya// sngags sgrub phyir na mos ldan slob ma la// sngags pas bka' ni rab tu bsgo bar bya// des kyang mos pas

spyi bos phyag 'tshal te// mi rta nor yod bla mar dbul bar bya// nor dang gter dang 'bru dang dbyig dang gsor// bzhon dang khyim gdan bu pho bu mo rnams// skyes pa dag dang bud med yang na ni// grong dang

zla grong khyer ngo bzhin ci bzhed rnams// rang gi sems ni rab tu dad pa yis// yon gyi mchog nyid dbul ba nyid du bya// myur du 'grub phyir chos pas bla ma la// mdor na rang gi lus kyang dbul bar bya// tshe 'di'i
bde ba ma lus dang// 'jig rten phyi ma'i bde mchog dang// sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'thob 'gyur na// lha yi bde ba smos ci dgos// sangs rgyas kun dang bla mar mnyam// rdo rje slob dpon 'as na ni//

rtag tu sdug bsngal 'thob 'gyur bas// nyung zad tsam yang ban+tas mi bya// rdo rje spun dang sring mo dang// rdo rje ma rnams nyid la ni// rnal 'byor can gyis brnyas ma yin// rtag tu khon gyis gargyugs ma bya//
dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed dang// bla ma spyod byed ma rungs pa// dam tshig las ni 'das pa dang// de la sogs pa'i gnod byed la// bzod pa bsgom par mi bya ste// de ltar gyur na kun rig gas
gsungs pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// sems can kun la phan pa dang// btsan ldan dangos grub thob par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin
dang lha'i 'jig rten dubacas pa rnams kyi don dang// phan pa dang/ bde ba'i phyir sgrub pa'i cho ga 'di gsungs so// sa la bcom ldan 'das thams cad rig pa de bzhin du bris 'a// g.yas suzhi de/

bzhin gshegs pa ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po/ g.yon phyogs sun shAkya thub pa/ na song thams cad sbyong ba'i 'og tu ni kun spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mdog zla ba lta/

bu phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa'o// shAkya thub pa'i 'og tuni phu gnas do/ de gnyis kyi bar du sman gyi bla mdog sngon bo phyag gcig na 'bras bu a ru ra bstsams// phyag gcig ni mchog sbyin du bya/ rta mgrin/
dang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba ma rungs pa 'joms la brtson pa gnyis ni rang gi lha la brtan par bri// dganyis kyi dbus su letsanA dang/ mA ma kI dang/ gos dkar mo dang/ sgrol ma

rnams rang rang gi mtshan ma phyag na bsnams par bri// de dag gi 'og tu pad+ma'i sdong bu chu dang/ chu srin dang/ nya dang/ rus sbal dang/ sbal pa dkar po dang/ 3khar ba la sogs par bcas pa dang/ chu
las skyes pa'i me tog rnam pa du mas yongs su gang bar bri/ bdug pa dang/ mar me dang/ dri dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ bshos dang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs pa bri/ de'i 'og

du sgrub pa po nyid thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug par bri/ de nas ri mo sku gzugs de mngon par mchod de/ bdag nyid kyis spyan dbye ba bya zhing bden pa la byin gyis brlabs par dmigs par bya'o/
de nas stamtshan ma zhig mthong nan myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro// 'on te ma mthong nanaring mo zhi gnas dngos grub tu 'gyur te/ bshad pa dang ni rje sgra dang// drilakhu'i sgra

[D] dang 'brug sgra dang// dge slong bram ze pho mo dang// 'bras bu mthong n myur du ni// mchog dang bar ma tha ma 'grub// de nas gzugs de gsang sngags dang// phyag rgya mngon par byin brlabs nus// ci bdog
pas mchod pa ra bya// rtag tu mngon sum 'dug nas kyang// 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal gyis// bdag srung la sogs byas nas kyang// bdag gi de nyid bsam nas su// dngos grub mtshamAm byung
bar du// 'bum phrag gsum mam drug 'bum bzlas// de nas dben pa'i gnas su ni// brgyad brgya nyid du tshang bar bya// sngags na 'khrul pa med par bzlas// de nas bzlas pa'i mjug tu ni// dkyil
'khor snga ma bzhin bsams la// mchod pa rgya chen byas nas kyang// mtshan gcig thog thag bzlas par bya// ni sta gtso'am de yi sras// yang n lha rnams mthong gyuran// bsod nams snod la nyi dag
bar/ dngos grub mchog ni gsol bar bya// lta ni dngos grub 'bras bu ni// de la rtag tu dgyes nas stsol// phyag 'tshal dngos grub la sogs byung// dkon mchog gsum dang bla ma la// skal ba re re
phul nas ni// ngo nas rtag tu bdag spyod cing// mdan mkhas pa bdag nyid kyis// blangs nas bdag nyid spyad par bya// sems can kun la phan brtson par// bskal pa du mar gnas par 'gyur//
ci ste dngos grub ma gyur na// las rnams thams cad nus par 'gyur// gnod sbyin skar ma'i gdong la sogs// chad pas bcad cing bka' tsam gyis// zhi ba la sogs las kun ni// bran bzhin//
thams cad byo bar 'gyur// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyigs/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sdig pa bgyis pas sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i
dbang du gyur pa rnams ji ltar sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i sdug bsngal sbyang ba'i slad du bsgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po nyon cig/ sems
can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i sems can sdig pa'i byed pa/ sdig pa chen po byed pa de dag ci nas kyang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal las thabs sla bas grol bar 'gyur ba nyon cig/
de bzhin dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// snga ma bzhin du bum pa la// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas ni// dbang bskur ba ni rab tu brtag/ de nas sdug po kun sbyangs te// dmul ba la sogs sdug bsngal las//

de ni myur du rnam par thar// sdig las rnam grol bdag nyid de// dag par gyur pa'i lha rnams kyi// rigs su skyes par gyur nas kyang// de ni rtag tu sangs rgyas dang// chos bgro ba ni thos par 'gyur// de yi
gzugs brnyan bri ba 'am// gur kum gyis ni ming yang rung// ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal las// sems can rnams ni grol ba'i phyir// sngags mkhan gzhan la phan brtson zhing// snying rje can gyis
dbang bskuro// de nas rnal 'byor can gyis ni// sngags dang phyag rgyas de dbang bskur// lha yi gzugs su brtags nas kyang/ mchod rten dbus su gzhag par bya// rang
gi lha 'am lha gzhan gyi// snying po snying khar bris nas kyang// lha 'drab r ni sems bskyod do// khyim gyi steng du gzhag par bya// de yi ming yang smos nas ni// gur kun bzang pos sngags bris 'a//

sbyo rim gyis 'bum ni tshong tsam du// mchod las ni rab tu bya// sdig can sdig ni zad bya'i phyir// bye ba snyad ni tshong bar bya// de ltar byas na nges par ni// dmyal ba lasani grol bar gyur// yi dbu
byol song sdug bsngal las// grol talha yi gnas su skye// de nas ming yang brjod nas ni// ji skad gsungs pa'i sngags bzla zhing// 'bum phrag stong ngam yanani// brgyuphrag stong du tshang ba dang//
byo ba stod du robabaThas na// lha yi gnas su nges par rgyu// de yi ming nas brjod nas kyang// mkhas pas 'bum phrag brgya'am ni// yang na brgya phrag stong snyad du// sbyin sreg byas par gyur na ni//
dmyal ba chen por gyur pa yi// sdig pa de las thar par 'gyur// jisrid mtshan ma shin tu ni// 'bar ba'i gnas na skyes gyur par// til dang yungs kar 'bras rnams dang// ra yi 'o mar ldan pa
par dang dri yi bskus pa'i yam shing gis// chog bzhin du sbyin sreg bya// de nas de ni nges par yang// lha yi gnas su skyes gyur nas// de yi mtshan ma ston par byed// yang na lha yis mchog tu 'gyur//

yang na phyogs khung nang du ni// ma yi ltas na ston byed cing/ lha yi gnas su skyes pa dang// sdig pa bcom pa'i mtshan mar ni// dkar po nyid dang g.yas su 'bar// gyen du 'bar zhing dri ma mdu// zlam zhing rnam

par mi 'phro la// brtan la grol bzhin dri ma med// yang na mi lha nyid kyis ni// bdag nyid de bzhin ston byed do// zla ba dri med dkar 'dra la// bzhin mdog dkar zhing 'am char 'bar// de ni mtshan ma 'di dag
gis// dmyal ba la sogs rnam grol zhing// sdig pa bcom nas bde 'grorani// skyes pa yin par shes par bya// khru bzhi pa yi tshad du ni// chog bzhin du khung bskos la// rdo rdzomatha' ma bskor ba yi//

'khor lo dbusasu bri bar bya// rigs lnga yi ni phyag rgya rnams// ji bzhin pa yi phyogs su khri// de bzhin sems dpa' rnams dang ni// 'jig rten la/rtsol thogs pa bri/ bya dang bum pa gang ba dang// gtor mas

snod rnams bkang ba dang// brgyad snyad tsam du gzhug pa 'am/ yang na bcu drug snyad du gzhag/ bza' ba dang ni bca' ba'i ba shes// me tog 'phreng sogs de bzhin te// bla ro rgyal mtshan dar la sogs// gdug
mchog rnams kyis legs par brgyan// sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor dam par ni// sbyin sreg rab tu bya ba na// chog shes pas bris nas kyang// lha rnams mang po spyan drangs la// sngags shes pas ni sngags phyag
rgyas/ argaphul bas shes nas kyang// mdor na mchod pa byas nas ni// lha yi sbyor bas rab gnas la// ga pur gur kum la sogs pas// mar dang 'om til bgos la// til dang yungs kar 'bras
rnams dang// dri yi rlus na legs bkang ste// 'bras chan yos dang la du dang// sgrung rtsi ngesha ka rar ldan pa// brgya phrag du mar yongs bzlas la// yam ngashing la ni de bzhin te// rang gi grwa

kyis btab pa'i shing// khong bu nang dugazhag par bya// ro la sngags kyis btab nas kyang// mu mchog gis ni bkrus nas su// bzlas pa'i dri yis byugs par bya// gos dang rgyan gyis klubs nas kyang// sngags
sgo kyis btab pa'i bdug pas bdugs// me tog 'phrang la sogs pas mchod// gtsug phud dpung par de bzhin du// sngags bris nas na gdags par bya// snying kha lkog ma kha phyogs su// sarba bid+yas byin
gyis brlab// dpral ba mdzodapa rnab gnyis// mgo bo gtsug phud dpung pa gnyis// sgra dang skud pa pus mo bol// long bu sna yi rtse mo dang// mig gnyis dang nigasang ba yi// dbang po rnams kyi gnas
la ni de ltar gzhan du yi ge sngags// mchog tu dge ba rnams gzhag go/ de nas ngan song sbyang ba'i phyir// stan dang bcas te thab dbus su// gzhag pa zhing du bya ba yin// de nas sngags 'chang stag
kyisani// btab pa'i gos kyis g.yog par bya// de nas byin za dgab rab sbyar la// ma lce stong gis 'khrigs shing 'bar ba'i lus// zla dkar kun da'i zhi la zhi ba'i lus// mtha' yas pa yi gzugs kyi
h+pha ma bkug la// argadabul bar brtags nas de bzhin du// blo mchog ldan pa'i mdun gzugs so gas gzhag/ de bzhin gshags tshogs de bzhin spyan drangs la// arga la sogs btags te de bzhin du//

bde gshegs gsungs pa'i mchod pa la sogs bya// de nas byin tha la ni brtag bya la// srog byas bakang ste de yang spar ba'i phyir// de nas srog byas bkang ste rim gyis ni// rgyal la sogs la rgya rtsa brgyad/

du brtag/ de nas sbyong ba'i sngags kyi rgyal po la// bgrag par bya ba nyi shu rtsa gcig brtag/ de nas snga na drangs yo byad lan gsum dang/ a la sogs pad+ma'i da kar shal mchod// phyag na rdo rje pad+mazhag
bsnams pa// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugs// zhabs kyi pangs sdig mnanacing// rgyan rnams kun ni rab rdzogs la// rdzogs sangs rgyus kyi dbu rgyan mtho// bsams sam

yang na bris kyang rung// de yi snying pos de bzhin du// brgya phrag stong ngam yang na ni// bye ba'i tshad du sbyin sreg bya/ci yatshan ma la sogs 'byung// de bzhin sdig can rgyud ces bya// de nas thal bar gyur pa dang/
rdo rje bsdu ba'i sngags kyis ni// chog bzhin du bsdu bar bya// thal ba ded nus pa'i rdul// sngags kyis btab pa'i dri chung// ba skyes 'o ma la sogs lngas// sbyong ba'i sngags kyi blo ldan gyis/ 'bum
du bzlas pas brdzis nas ni// ga bur dri dang bskos pa yis// 'jim pa dang ni bsres nas kyang// gzugs su bya ba'am yang na ni// mchod rten gyi ni ltar byas la// gcig gam gnyis sam gsum mam
lnga yang na brgya rtsa brgyad bar du// sngags dang phyag rgyas btab nas su// 'bum phrag gnyis kyi bar du bzlas// de nas mchod rten 'bar gyur tam// yang na gzugs kyis zhal 'dzum mam// dri dang bdug
pa 'od kyang rung// snang ngam yang na dad ldang ngas// lha la sogs pa'i rnam pa ni// sna tshogs par ni snang gyur tam// rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa dang// ma tog la sogs

'dor ba dang// dung dang cha la sogs pa'i sgras// gling bu pi wang la sogs rnams// ciso mtshan ma 'di dag ni// sdig can blos nem mthong na// 'bum gyi phrag ni brgyad stong ngam// ji srid mtshan ma byung
zlobar du// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod nas ni// mnyam par bzhag pas bzlas par bya// de yi mthar ni mkhas pas kyang// mtshan gcig thog thag mi nyal bsgras// de nas de yi sdig pa ni// dag pa nyid

du nges pa ra mthong/ dalha yi lus kyi gzugs gyur la// rang gi rgyud du ngoshes 'gyur// mtshan ma 'di dag shes nas ni/ rnam par mi rtogasams kyis kyang// byams dang snying rjer ldan pa yis// lasa rnamA

zla thams cad byed par 'gyur// yang na mad par gyur na yang// bzlas shing sgom pa'i tshul gyis ni// ming tsam legs par bris nas kyang// mchod rten 'phreng ba bya ba dang// yang na gzugs su bris kyang/
rung sbyin srega mngon par dbang bskur na// gdon mi za bar bde 'gror skye// thal po yungs kar bye ma sogs// rang gi ming smos sngags btab nas// bzlas pa byas te song nas kyang// mtshor 'bab

la pa'i krung du dor// de lta na ni sdog can yang// ngan song las ni thar 'gyur na// dge ba'i mchog ni bskyod pa dang// byang chub sa bon bskyed pa'i bdag/ sangs rgyas 'brasabu'i rgyu ldan pa// sbyin pa'i pha [l]
rol phyin par ldan// tshul khrims rgyud dang rab ldan pa/ bzodapa brtson 'grus mnyam gzhag dang/ shes rab rnams kyis rgya sgom pa'i// 'jig rten bsod nams ldan ci smos// myur du da yi ngan song

ni bcom par gyur te the tshom med// dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyod la// med par lta kha gang yin dang// byang chub lam las rnam logo pas// bstan pa zhe sdang gnod byed cing// sdig pa'i rang bzhin ma mthong

la/ ma dang pha la snying ring zhing// byang chub sems la brten pa dang// 'dod chags bral ba bsad pa rnams// cis lha rnams mod gyur tam// sangs rgyas dge 'dun chos de bzhin sngags dang phyag rgya'i tshig
la sogs// shes rab thabs rnams med na ni// sdig can de dag mi thar zhes// bde gshegs rgyal ba nyid kyis gsungs// da nas brgya byin la sogs lha// pad+ma lta bu'i mig phye nas// legs shes bya bas
mnyes byas te// rab tu mgu nas mchod byas nas// brgya byin gzhan la phan brtson pas// ji skad gsungs pa'i bka' bzhin du// shAkya'i gtso bos bka' stsal pa// bden pa nyid du byas gyur nas// de
nas de na dmyal ba yi// sdug bsngal las ni thar nas kyang/ dga' ldan gnas su sems can kun/ phan phyir bde gshegs 'dra bar skyes// de nas dbang por bcas pa yi// grags chen lha rnams gar

byed cing// mchod pa'i sprin ni mtha' yas pas// de bzhin gshegs la mchod bya'i phyir// lha yi tshogs kyis mdun byas te// tsha 'di nyid la mchod pa'i phyir// byang chub tu yang sems bskyed nas// lha rdzas
@#// rnam pa sna tshogs kyi// ma tog bdug pa byug pa dang// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan 'phan la sogs// rgyan la sogs pa rab mdzes dang// na bza' rin chen char la sogs// dga' ba'i
tshal ni gang bar bya// de nas ya mtshan che gyur te// lha rnams kyis kyang phyag 'tshal nas// dga' ba'i tshal ni yid 'ong ba// kun nas gang bar gyur pa yin// sna tshogs 'byung ba 'di ci lags// bcom

zla ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rdzogs po dag shes par gyis shig/ rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa 'di ni lha'i bu nog bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba de yin no/ mtshams med ba'i dbang du gyur pa 'damyong/
zhing mthong ba chos 'di nyid la bde 'gro'i dbang du gyur pa gang lags pa de ni bcom ldan 'das ngomatshar lags so// bde bar gshegs pa ngomatshar lags so// de nas brgya byin la sogs pa lha'i bu thams
cad kyis mgrin gcig tu tshig 'di skad ces smas so// sangs rgyas 'dra ba'i ston pa mod// chos dang 'dra ba'i dge ba med// dge 'dun 'dra ba'i snod med de// sngags dang 'dra ba'i 'dren pa med//
de nas lha'i bu de dag gis// bcom ldan 'das la 'a diskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyi rlabs kyis dga' ldan gyi lha'i rigs su skyes pa'i lha'i bu de ci 'dra ba zhig/
de'i rdzu 'phrul dang ma ni ji lta bu lags pa/ lha'i bu nor bu drim med pa'i 'od ces bgyi ba de bdag cag lta bar 'tshal lo// danas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha thams cad kyi snying skul bar byed pa zhes

bya ba'i 'od zer gyi 'phreng ba nyid kyi zhabs kyi mthe bong gnyis las phyung ngo// byung nas kyang nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i lus thams cad snang bar byas nas snying khar zhugs te bsul nas yang de nyid

du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas lha'i bu de nyid rab tu dga' bar gyu nas lus kyi 'od zer gyis dpagatshad brgya phrag stong tshunachadakyi nam mkha'i ngos thams cad gsal bar byas te/ lha'i bu stong phrag du ma'i
'khor gyis bskor cing mdun du byas nas/ lha'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos mi snang bar byas te 'ongs nas dga' ba'i tshal thams cad gsal zhing snang bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das dang brgya byin gnyis ma gtogs
pa lha rnams kyi'od zil gyis mnan to// de nas lha'i bu des/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// kyan shAkya mgon bo yi// sangs rgyas mdzad pa ya

mtshan che// gang phyir ngan song lhung ba yi// sems can myur du glog bzhin grol// de nas skad cig ma de nyid kyi rmangashing rta'i 'phang lo tsamakyi pad+mo thams cad rin po che las byas pa/ dpag tshad brgya phrag stong

du dri'i ngad ldang ba// lha'i glu snyan pa'i sgra grag pa/ ya mtshan du ma yang dag par ston pa/ lha rdzas kyi glu dang/ gar dang/ brdung ba dang/ gling bu dang/ dra dang/ kor ko rnams kyi sgra snyan
pa 'byin pa zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sdur byung ste/ de mthong nas kyang shin tu ya mtshan skyes te 'di skad ces smras so// dang zhin gshegs pa'i tshesan bsam mi khyab// sngags kyi yon tan sna
@#// tshogs bsam mi khyab// khya chub rten pa rnams kyang bsam mi khyab// tshangs spong tshul khrims dri med sku bsam yas// de nas lha'i bu de dag gis blta bar 'dod nas/ yang bcom/
ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ lha'i bu de dang po'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams blta bar 'tshal lo//bcom ldan 'dasabalta bar 'tshal lo// bde bar gshegs pa blta bar 'tshal lo// de nas bcom

ldan 'das kyis yang mthe bong gnyis nas 'od zer phyung ste/ 'od zer dris med pa des lha'i 'khor de dag kun snang bar byas te bskul nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas nor bu dri ma mad pa'i 'od ces bya ba de
la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i bris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das dang brgyanyin gnyis kyi gdan ma gtogs par dga' ba'i tshal thams cad g.yes par byas te/ lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba
nubyas shing/ bskor ba byas nas yang 'di skad ces gsol to// kyan 'o sa ngas rgyas rnams kyi ni// sngags kyi byin rlabs ya mtshan me// gang phyir mtshams med ltung ba yi// sems can lha gnas myur du
sgyus de nas lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba la sogs pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das lanor bu dang/ gser dang/ dngul dang/ shul dang/ sa dong/ gdu bu dang/ dpung rgyan dang
sAn tshal sogs pa rgyan gyi khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs du ma dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ 'phan dang/ lda ldi dang/ rdam la sogs pa yo byad kyi khyad par sna tshogs pa dang/ song gi gdan/
dang [(]gzims chadang/ pho brang dang/ gzhal med khadadang/ khang bu btsugs pa la sogs pa gnas kyi khyad par sna tshogs pa dang/ ma tog dang spos la sogs pa mchod pa'i khyad par sna tshogs pa/
dung rang gi lus dang/ ngag dang/ sams rnams kyang phul te/ ba lang dang/ rta dang/ so nga ga dang/ stag dang/ smra'u dang/ rgo ba dang/ thug re dang/ ma hadang/ bong bu dang//
jamo dang/ chu srin dang/ phag dang/ ra dang/ glong dang/ ba dang/ 'dod pa'i ba bzhon la sogs pa bzhon pa'i khyad par du ma'ang phul nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'kher rnams
kyang mngon par mchod// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgyabyin gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams kyang mngon par mchod de legs so zhes bya ba gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang brgya byin gnyis 'a ba ma dang

bsti stang du byas te rdzug 'tshal nas de bzhin du song ngo// de nas brgyabyin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur to/ bcom ldan 'das la yang dang yang du 'degs so zhes bya bas
bstod cing mngod de/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du ma 'ongs pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams 'chad ba dang klog pa la spro bar bgyi ba'i smad du/ de bzhin
pa'i sems can rnams kyi rna lam du thos par 'gyur gyi/ sems can ma rabs rnams kyis ni ma yin no// pha rol tu phyin pa bcu la mos pa'i sems can rnams kyi rna lam du nye
bar 'gro bar 'gyur gyi/ sems can phal pa ma rabs kyis ni ma yin no// sems can bsam pa nges pa rnams dang/ phyir mi ldog pa'i yon tan mang po la mngon par 'dod pa'i sems can rnams kyi/
lam du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ mdor na thams cad mkhyen pa'i ya ngeshes la brten pa'i sags can rnams kyi rna lam du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha'i bu de dag
yang dag par dga' ba skyes nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cagan snod du gyur pa'o// bde bar gshegs pa bdag cagan rtsod du gyur pa ste/ gang gi slad du bdag cag gis nga bzhin/

wA gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bgyi ba'i mtshan brjod pa 'di bcom ldan 'dus pad+ma'i zhal nyid nus thos
pas// bdag cag ni ngan song gyis 'jigs par mi 'gyur// dus ma lags par 'chi bas 'jigs par mi 'gyur/ 'chi ba dang/ ltung ba dang/ rnam par 'thor ba dang/ rnam par 'jig pa la
sogs pas 'jigs par mi 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni gdon ma 'tshal bar sangs rgyas nyid 'grub pa'i snod du gyur pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das brtag pa'i rgyal po 'dis sams
can rnams kyi don bgyid pa gang lags pa'i skyes bu dam pa de dag gi 'bras bu nicir 'gyu/ rnam par smin pa ni cir 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po de dag ni/
skyes bu dam pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du blta bar bya sta/ lha'i dbang po gang gi phyir 'jig rten pha rol tu song nas mtshams med pa la so gas pa'i sems
can dmyal ba chen por skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu spong bar byed pa dang/ byang chub la gdon mi za bar Nan par byed pa dang// byang chub sems dpa'i sa phyir mi
ldog pa la rab tu 'jog pa'i phyir te/ lha'i dbang po dpa'o na khyod kyis lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes pa'i don byas pa bzhin no//
lha'i dbang po de ltar gzhan yang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'i sems can de dag ciso so'i skyo bo yin snyam sa mas sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'gas so//
bde bar gshegs pa ma 'a gas so// lha'i dbang po sems can de dag ni skyes bu dam pa chen po gzhan la phan 'dogs pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang phyag bya ba/ mchod pa/

rjod pa/ bsti stang du bya ba/ phrag la bskur bar bya ba yin na/ lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams dang/ rgya 'a po tshan/
po bzhi dang/ phyogs skyong ba bcudang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang/ gnod spyin chen po nor bu bzang po dang/ nor bu bzang ngo chen ngo la sogs pa byang chub sem

dpa'i sa la rab zhu gnas pa rnams dang/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang/ bsnyen dga' bo gnyis dang/ 'phrog ma bu lnga brgyas bskor ba rnams dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po pAny+tsi ka dang/ partsika

! chan po la sogs pa dang/ gang gzhan dgekyang rgya chazhing rgya che ba'i lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ dri za dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye
chen po dang/ 'byung po dang/ yi dwags dang/ 'dri dang/ rims dang/ gdon dang/ dug dang/ skar ma la sogs pa thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gso la to// bcom ldan 'das
bdag cag 'dus shing tshogs pa thams cad kyis skyes bu dam pa chen po de'i rkang pa gnyis mgo bos blang bar bgyi'o// mdor na rtag par rgyun du dus thams cad du bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ snga bar
bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gang du brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pas 'chang dam/ klog gam/ gzhan la rgya cher ya nga dag par 'chad par 'gyur ram/ gdugs dang
rgyul mtshan dang/ ba dan la sogs pas mchod par 'gyur ram/ rgyal rigs sam/ bram ze'i rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan yang rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po'i
bu mo 'am/ rgyal po'i btsun mo 'am/ rgyal po'i 'khor pho 'am/ rgyal po'i 'khor mo 'am/ gang su'ang rung bas 'chang zhing klog pa dang/ gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par 'chad cing ston nga ni
bar du bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'dus shing tshogs pa thams cad de'i bran du gyur pa lags so// rang gi skyo bo dang/ gnyin gyi skya bo dang/ grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/
ljongs dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/ dus dus su char dbab par bgyi/ 'bru la sogs pa bskyed par bgyi/ skye bo mang po la phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du bsgrub
par bgyi// rol gyi phrum mang po gzhom par gyi/ sems can ma rungs pa gnod cing 'tshe ba pos de la mi phan pa'i sems bskyed pa gang yin pa de dag bgabar bgyi ba'i rgyud du bsgrub par bgyi/[”]/
marungs par bgyi/ de la bdud kyi las kyang bgyi/ gnod par bgyi ba la'ang nye bar gnas par bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das mdor na ma 'ong pa'i sems can rnams la brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di ni sangs rgyas
kyi mdzad pa lta bur gnas pa lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis bu bzhin du bskyang bar bgyi'o// lha'i dbang po khyod kyis ji ltar smras pa de de bzhin te/ brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di ni de
bzhin du blta bar bya'o// lha'i dbang po lags kyis/ 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i sems can sdig pa'i chos la kun tu spyod pa/ sems can dmyal ba'i dbang du gyur pa/ 'khor ba mi gtsang ba'i
deng du bying ba'i sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i phyir yun ring por bag yod par byos la sgrubs shig///bam po gnyis pa//
de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus brtago pa'i rgyal po brtag pa phyi ma 'di ba shad do// dpa' kho gdan las bzhengs nas mi

( byas shing rdo rje gsor nas kyang// shAkya'i dbang po dgyes mdzad pa// thub pa'i gtso la phyag 'tshal nas// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs//

nas ngan song thams cad las rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba rang gi snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs gnas phyung ngo// o sadz+dzapA pa da han badzra hUMphaT/ oM sam+bapA pa ba sho d+ha na badzra hUM phaT/ os rje karma A ba ra

paNani basmi ku ru hUMphaT/ o ts+tsha ba nu ga ya A ba ra NA ni hUM phaT/ oM d+hu bi sho d+ha ya A ba ra Nani hUM phaT/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ d+ha ka rlu ka/ hanas/ sarba a bA ra Nani hUM phaT/ oM suM sa ra sa ra pra sa

rapra sa ra A ba ra tsani hUM phaT/ oM hU~Ma har sam+b+haA ba ra Na ni hUM phaT/ oM hU~M phaT sam+b+haa ba ra tsani spyi Ta ya hUM phaT/ oM hUM ta shrI tasam+b+ha A ba ra NAni hUMphaT/ o tuT taT sadz+dzaa ba ra Nani hUM/ o n+da

rtsin+dasarbaa ba ra Nani hUM phaT/ oM li dra ba bi dra ba sadz+dza A pA ya tat+ta Nani hUM phaT/ oM da dang hasawan ra ka ga tihit+taM hUM phaT/ oM pa tsa pa tsasat+tha pra tag te hahUM phaT/ oM ma tho ma tha sam+ba tir+ya ga gi ti ha tuMbaT/

[j]nga nas de dag rnams kyi yo byad bshad do// oM sam+ba pA paM bi sho d+han d+ha ma d+hamarlu pa ya hU~M phaT/ oM sam+b+ha durga ti bi sho d+han pu ba lo ki hU~M phaT/ oM sam+b+haA ba ra Nabi sho d+ha ni dz+nyA na A lo ka kA ri hU~M phaT/ oM sam+b+ha a

pA ya ga te gan+tA sha na gan d+ha ba ti hUM phaT/ sgo ba rnams kyi sngags la/ oM sam+b+han ra ka ga te gu'u ni hUM phaT/ oM sam+b+ha a pA ya bats+tsha na bi mo tsan hU~M khaM phaT/ oM sam+b+ha a pa yab+han+da na mo tsa na hUM phaT/ oM sazla a pa
ya ga ti ga than ban shun hUM ho phaT/ de nas dkyil 'khor bshad de/ 'khor lo 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la// shin tu mdzes pa'i rtsibs brgyad can// lte bar bcas[q]tshobs rtan ldan// rang gi rim pa

bris nas ni// lto ba'i nang du shAkya yi// bdag po thub pa gzhag par bya// lag na rdo rje stobs chen ni// dpa' bo de yi spyan sngar bri// rgyab tu 'khor los sgyur ba bri// g.yas phyogs rgyal ba'i gtsug
tor la g.yon par rnam par rgyal ba bri// gzi brjid phung po mi yi phyogs// dbang po'i phyogs su gdugs dkar po// rnam par 'thor ba rlung gi phyogs// rnam par 'joms pa na dza 2//
bris nas phyi rol bri ba ste// khru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// seng ge rta babs brgyan par bya// dpa' bos lcags kyu zhags pa dang// lcags sgrog dril bu sAn rnams gzhag/ grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad/
bdug pa la sogs bri bar bya// de nas dri zhim dri la sogs// rang gi lus nibaskus nas kyang// rdo rje 'dzin ma zhugs nas ni// o dzahU~M khaM heb+ha ga ban/ u thimahA kA ru Ni karuM bya ngo
[4 ]u// sa ma ya hUM/ zhes pas lha rnams thams cad spyan drang ngo// de nas gshegs par mos pa bskyed de mchod pa byas nas/ de bzhin du bcug ste dbang bskur na ngan song thams cad las rnam
ba par grol te/ bde 'gromatho ris kyi 'jig rtan dang/ gong nas gong dus rnams su'ang skye bar 'gyur ro// dngos grub thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ sangs rgyas su'ang gdon mi za bar 'grub par
blo 'gyur ro// snga ma bzhin du las thams cad kyang byed cing thams cad la thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// byab pa byas pas ni rims nad thams cad dang/ gdon dang/ dug la sogs pa las thar par 'gyur
ro phyag na rdo rje'i tshu zhes bya bas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// brtag pa gzhan gyi chog thams cad kyang sgrub par 'gyur ro// lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po la sogs pa ngan
song gi rgyud kyi dbang du gyur pa rnams kyi shi ba'i ro 'am/ gzugs brnyan nam/ mi la sogs pa bris te bzlas pa dang/ sbyin sreg dang/ dbang rnams kyis snga ma bzhin du ngan song thams cad las yongs
su grol bar byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyagan rdo rjes seng ge 'i lta stangs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas te phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya dam pa'i
mtshan nyid bshad par bgyi'o// thugs rjes bskul ba'i thugs gsang ba'i// rgyal ba kun gyis byin gyis rlobs// mnyam par gzhag pas dpral bar ni// phyag 'tshal ba yi thal mo sbyar// sangs rgyas
bde gshegs skyes rnams kyi// phyag 'tshal ba yi phyag rgyar bshad// rnal 'byor rig pas mgrin phyogs su// thal mo snyim par sbyar ba ni// rtag tupad+ma'i rigs nyid kyi// pad+ma'i phyag rgya yin par/

bshad/ rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas kyang// snying khar gung mo'i mtha' sbyar ba// rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya 'di/ dam tshig thams cad 'dzin byed pa'o// lag pa g.yon pa'i thalamo gan rkyal du pang du bzhag

la de'i steng du g.yas pa bzhag ste/ mthe bo'i ngos gnyis sgyud la zhi ba'i lta bas lta ba 'dzini de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ste/ dam tshig yin par bshad do// de nyid las

bzlog ste lta log bstsol la mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis gcig la gcig lu gu rgyud kyi tshul du bstsal te snying khar bzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// thal mo rdzogs pa ra sbyar pa

las mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis bsnyams la lhagam rnams brkyang ba 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi agagi phyagargya'o// rdo rje bsdam pa bsdams pa las gung mo gnyis rdo rje 'dra bar bsnyam la mthe bong dang mtho'u

chung gnyis bskyang ba 'di ni phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis de bzhin du byas la mdzub mo gnyis dang srin lag pad+mo 'dra bar bkug pa ni ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong

ba'i rgyal po'i thams cad sbyong ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mdzub mo dang srin lag gnyis rin po che 'dra bar byas pa ni dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o// mthe'u chung dang mthe bong so so ra bsdams la lhagam
rnams brkyang ba ni sdig pa thams cad sreg pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pas de bzhin du bsgyur zhing bya bani lha thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// snyim pa bzed la gyen du 'thor ba ni bdug

pa'i phyag rgyu'o// de sa 'og nas thunaru 'thor ba ni tog gi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mthe bong gnyis gyen du bsnyam go la mdun du 'dzin pa ni marama'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las dung 'dra bar byas pa ni dri'i phyag

lci rgyu'o// de nyid las rab tu brkyang sta 'dzin pa nigator ma'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las gung mo gnyis nang du bcug pa ni a sgra'i phag rgya'o/ rdo brtsis pa las gung mo gnyis bstan tatshigs dang po bcag la sor mo

thams cad brkyang ba'i rnam par 'thor ba'i phyag rgya'o// nyid las mthe bong dang mtho'u chung gnyis bkug pa ni rnam par 'joms pa'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las 'od zer 'bar ba 'dra ba ni gzi brjid phung

po'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las spyi bor bskor ba ni gdugs dkar po'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis las mdzub mo gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis bsgrol te mdud la gyon du bskor ba na 'khor le'i phyag rgya'o//

rda rdzobasdams pa las dung mo gnyis rdo rjer byas la mdzub mo gnyis rin po che lta ngur byas te lhag ma rnams 'od bar 'dra bar byas pa ni rgyal ba'i gtsug gtor gyi phyag rgya// de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis
rdzor byas la sor mo lhag ma rnams bsdams nas rdo rje 'dra bar byas pa ni rnam par rgyal ba'i// g.yas pa mchog sbyin du byas la g.yon pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa na de bzhin gshegs pa'i yin no//

rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang sku rdo rje 'dru ba byas pani rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mdzub mo g.yas pa bkug pani lcags kyu'i 'o// de nyid las ma tog 'dra bar byas pa ni mda'i 'o//
de nyid las slar bkug ste mthe bong gnyis rtse mo sprad pa ni blo gros legs pa'i 'o/de nyid las tshags par ma bcag pa ni rin po che'i'o// de nyid las sor mo las 'od zer 'dra bar 'gyod pa ni gzi
brjid kyi'o// de nyid las spyi bor bzhag pa ni dpal gyi'o// de nyid las mdun du pazhag pa ni bzhad pa'i 'o// de nyid las pad+ma 'dra bar byas pa ni pad+ma'o// de nyid las rtsomo gnyis bkugapani phal

gri'i 'o// de nyid las gdu bu 'dra bar byas pa ni 'khor le'i 'o// de nyid las pa'i 'dab ma 'dra bar byas pa ni lce'i 'o// de nyid las rtse mo yid tsam bkod pa ni rgya gram mo// de nyid las shin tu bkyed
pan srung ba'i 'o// de nyid las rtse mo gnyis slar bkug pa ni gnod sbyin gyi'o// dam du bkug pa ni bsdams pa'i 'o// bsdams pa nyid mdunadu bkug pa ni bdug pa'i 'o// de nyid rgyan du bstod pa ni
'phrang ba'i 'o// mdun du many+dza bong gnyis bsnams te bskor ba ni mar me'i 'o// panyid byug pa ltar byas pa ni dri'i 'o/de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa ni lcags kyu'i go/ de nyid las rtse mo
gnyis sprad pa ni zhags pa'i 'o// de nyid las gcig la gcig mdud pa ni lcags sgrog gi'i/ de nyid las bskyodapa'i mnyes pa'i 'o// sku gzugs kyi cho ga 'ang 'dir de bzhin du byas te cung zad du
na bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugs bri// yang na sku gzugs ni dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bris la ma tog la sogs pas mchod de/ de'i
spyanasdur 'bum tsam zhig sngar bsnyen pa byas nas las thams cad bya'o// de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i tshogs rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dus

las kyi rnam par smin pa gang gis lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bgyi ba de dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi dbang dugyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyagan rdo rje bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i
byin gyi rlabasakyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i dbang po nyon cig/ 'di ni sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa yin te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sa 'di nyid namatha' 'khob pa'i rigs dan du gtogs pa'i
rgyal po lus mi bde ba zhes bya bzhig du gyur te/ des mi shes pa'i dbang gis mi dge ba'i bshes gnyenal brten pas rgyal po 'dod pa'i phyir nang gi pha 'tsho ba dang phral bar gyur pa dang/ ma de'i
mya ngan gyis gzirabs ma 'ad dus las 'das so// lan cig zhig gi rkyen gyis nags tshal stug po gzhan zhig du rtse zhing dga' ba'i phyir nye bar song ngo// de na drang srong dgos pa med par byams
ho/ pa zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ nga mthong ba dang rgyal po ngashin tu ya mtshan skyes nas/ kye ma 'di lta bu sang ge dang/ stag dang/ ri dgas dang/ phag rgod dang/ ba lang dang//
ma he la sogs pa dang/ sbrul dang/ sranamo dang/ bradabu dung sbyang bu mchurangs dang/ sbrul gdug ba can rnams kyis gtsob/ bza' ba dang/ btung ba dang/
bgo ba dang/ longs spyod rnams dang rnam par bral ba// rlung dang grang bas yongs su gdung zhing 'tsho ba don bdag nyidachen po 'di gnas so snyam pa sems kyis brtags nas de'i drung
du nye bar song ste phyin pa dang/ de la 'di skad ces smras so// drang srong chen po khyod ci'i phyir na rlung dang tsha ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis bdag la gnod par byed/ drang srong
gis smras pa/ skyes bu chen po bskal pa brgya stong phrag du mar sgrib pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba 'dus/ sdug bsngal gyi khur bu cung zad tsam zhig blangs nas bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bas 'di ni sdug bsngal ma yin gyi/ skad cig tsam mam yud tsam zhig yul gyi bde ba rjes su myong
bas bskal pa brgyastong phrag du ma mtha' thug pa med par dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rjes su myong bar 'gyur ro// yul gyi bde ba 'dod pa'i phyir pha ma la sogs ba'i da
gsod bar 'gyur na srog chags gzhan lta ci smos te/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun yongs su mi shis pa'i phyir sdig pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// drang song gis smras
pa'i tshig de skad ces thos pa dang shin tu 'jigs skag skyo ste/ sdug bsngal thams cad kyis gzir nas 'di skad ces smras so// sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun
zhes bya ba nga su zhig/ de'i rang bzhin ji lta bu yin pa dka' thub chen po smyos shig dang/ de la kho bo'ang skyabs su 'chi'o// pha ma la gtsas pa dang/ srog chags rnams kyi srog bcang na sdig
pa ji lta bu zhig 'thob par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dga' dun zhes bya ba ci zhig/ du'i rang bzhin ji lta bu yin pa yongs su gsan bsod nams ci 'dra ba zhig yongs su 'thob// pha ma
ma bsad pa dang/ srog chags rnams kyang ma bsad na bsod nams ci'adra ba zhig 'thob// 'bras bu ji lta bu zhig 'thob/ 'dod pa'i longs spyod spangs na bsod nams dang 'bras bu phyi'adra ba zhig
'thob de nas drang srong des de la 'di skadabyes smras so// cis sems can chen po khyod/ nga yi tshig 'di nyan 'dod na/ thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal la/ gus par nyon dang bshad par bya'o// de bzhin
bgyi zhes bsgrubs nas ni/ ci bdog pas ni mtshod byas te/ sangs rgyas spyod yul sangs rgyas kyi// zab mo'i chos nin par gyur// sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs dag la// thos nas kyang na skyabs
ny+tsasu song// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sgrib medachos// rgyal pos thos nas dga' bar gyur// yi dgas byol song dmyal ba rnams// sdig pa kun gyi 'bras bu ste// yul spyod pa dang srog chags
[rnams / gsod cing shin tu mi bzad dang// pha ma gtsos pa'i rgya las byung// bskal pa du mar rab sdug bsngal// dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa// mgon mad skyabs kyang mad pa ste// thos nas
mya ngan zug rdu yis// rang gi yid la gdungs pa na// dziltar rlung gis mar me bzhin/ ri nyid du ni dus las 'das// las kyi rnam smin de yis ni// dga' dang ldan pa'i lhar skyes na// brgya byin lha yi
dbang po yis// blon po gzugs dang ldan pa la// lha rnams kun dad yid mthun zhing// rab dga' bde dang ldan par skyes// bde ba'i mchog ni myong gyur nas// ngan song du yang ltung bar 'gyur// donas

da ltar lha dbang po// khyod kyi mthus kyang de nyidani// dga' ldan gnas ni dgar ba'i mchog/ bde mang kun gyi gnas su skyes// lha yi dbang po nyon cig dang// gang gi tshe byung ba de'i dus na byung ba'i
drang srong du gyur pa de ni gzhan yin par khyod kyis shes par mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nying ngo// de'i phar

gyur pa gang yin pa da ni gzhan yin par khyod kyis shes par mi bya ste/ lha'i dbang po de'i tshe de'i dus na khyod de'i par gyur to// ma gang yin pa de gzhan yin par mi blta ste/ de'i tshe de'i dusan sha tsi ka nyid
yin no// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gang yin pa de ni gzhan yin par mi blta'o// lha'i 'khor 'di dag nyid yin no/// de nas brgyabyin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams yid rab
tumagu zhing rangs te/ bsgyu'i bu ga nas spu rnams las shing rgyal ba rgyal ba zhes skad chen por bos nas/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjel ming bcu pa 'dis mngon par
bstod de gsol ba btab bo// ko Ta ko Ta kA/ ko NA/ koT/ ko 'a bkaM raka/ ko la kAko la ba ko la ko lA ba/ ko las tha a ti zhes byas nas/ brgya byin la sogs lha mchog rnams
sems can kun la phan pa dang// tshodang nad med sprul ba'i phyir// mgon po khyod la gsol ba 'debs// bcom ldan 'das tshe thung ba dang skal ba chung ba rnams kyi don dang/ phan pa dang/ bde/
ba dang/ tshabasring ba'islad du bshad du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag po bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha'i 'khor mang po de dag la
gzigs nas legs so zhes bya bas mgu bar byas te/ tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams gang khyed kyis 'di lta bu'i spobs pa yang dag pa yang dag par bskyod ba na legs so legs so// legs par bsgyu

shing bshad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyagan rdo rjes sems can thams cad kyi tshe dpagatumud pas khyab par 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ tshe dang/
bsod nams dang/ ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med par 'phel ba zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo// o phu skya pa smyo mahA pu N+ya/ a pa ri

mi ta a yur pu N+ya dzAmasaM b+ha ro pa tsi te ka ri NisAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu ngan song thams cad rab tu zhi ste/ sems can dmyal ba dang/ byol song
dang/ yi dgas rnan sa su skyes pa'i sems can thams cad grol bar bdag nyid kyis yang dag par shes so// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu snang bar byas te/ snang bar byas nas kyang sangs
rgyas kyi mdzad pa rnam pa bcuganyis kyi tshul du byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi chos kyi yi ge de nyid du zhugs par gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dpag tu med
pa'i rdo rje 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshe dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di bshad do// oM a mi te/ a mi ta ud b+ha

pa a mi ta saM b+ha be/ a mi ta bi kAn+te/ a mi ta bi kran+ta/ gA mi ni/ sam+b+ha karma kla sha k+Sha yaM ka ri swAhA// de nas 'di bshad ma thag tu de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi'i//
de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdon mi za bar sgrib pa rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgrib pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i

snying po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo// u0f00 kaM ka ni kaM ka ni ro tsa ni ro tsani/ rdo Ta ni rdo Ta ni/ trAs ni trA sa ni/ pra ti hanapra tihan/ sam+b+ha karma pa raM pa rA Ni sany+dzasatAnAny+tsas/
@#// 'di bshad ma thag tu yang thams cad de bzhin du gyur to// de nas yang bco ldan 'das kyis sgrib pa thamasacad dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa'i rdo jozhes bya ba'i ting nga na la snyoms par

zhugs nas/ de bzhinagshegs pa thams cad kyi sgrib pa rnams ma lus par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo/ o ratsArasne mahAr/ rata saM b+ha ba/ rat+tA ki ra Ni/
rat+namA lA bi shud+d+he sho d+ha ya/ sarba pA pa ni hUM tuT/ nga nas 'di bgadam thag tu bdud kyi gnas thams cad bcom rnam par bcom par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdon mi za bar mi chos sa
pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs ka nas byung ngo// o
a mo g+ha a pra ti ha ta/ sam+b+ha a ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ni/ har nyar hUM phaT/ gsang sngags 'di bshad ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ yang dag par rab tu g.yos
so bskyod/ rab tu bskyod/ yang dag par rab tu bskyod do// bskul/ rab tu bskul/ yang dag par rab tu bskul nas rmad kyi ya mtshan du ma 'jig rten du snang bar gyurato// de nas dkyil
'khor 'di yin te/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ sgo ba rnams dang ldan pa ste// rta babs bzhi dang ldan par bya// lte ba dang ni sgo khyud ldan// de yi dbus su 'khor lo yi// dkyil 'khor dam

05 pa bri bya ste// rtsibs bzhi drag dang ldan pa la// lte ba'i dkyil 'khor ldan par bya// de yi dbus su gtsobo ni// phyag na rdo rje stobs chen po// phyag na rdo dzadril bsnams shing// zla ba rgyas pa'i

zhal 'dzum bri// shar gyi rtsibs kyi stong duni// mgon po ma bskyod bri bar bya// lha ya phyogs su rin chen bri// nub phyogs chu skyes pad+ma la// byang phyogs su ni gdonami za// dpa' bo stobs chen dri
bar bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad na// 'khor los sgyur ba chas pa dang// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mdog 'dra zhing// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa dang/ phyag ni mchog sbyin mi 'jigs pa//

rdo rje'i skyil mo krung bzhugs bri// ga yi phyogs ni thams cad du// da bzhin bdug sogs thams cad bri/ sgo ba dag kyang khros pa la// khro ba'i dbang du gyur pa bri// de nas rnal 'byor can nyid zhugs/
sngags kyis lha rnams spyan drangs te// dzahU~Mtho ho b+ha ga bi badzra a phyis ma ya hUM/ de nas gtso bo byon pa dang/ mdor na mchod pa byas nas kyang// 'chi bdag sbrul gyis 'jigs ldan rnams// 'chi

bdag gzhom phyir gzhug par bya// oM badzes ma ya hUM/ rdo dzi tu rin ti ri bcings la// lag na rin chen thogs te gzhug/ yang na me tog 'phreng ba ste// dan dkyil 'khor nyid du dor// o pratIts+tsa badza hU~M/

de nas mna'i dmatsheg sbyin par bya ste/ o badzra sa ma ya hUM/ de nas 'dis gdong g.yogs dgrol bar bya ste/ oM badzra hA s+ya udag+ha Ta ya hUM/ de nas 'dis bstan par bya sta/ o badzra dri shu ho/ de nas
tadi/ @#// 'dis dpang skur bar bya'o// oM badzra a b+hi Sha hUM/ oM bud+d+ha a b+hi 4ny+tsaoM/ oM rat+na a gyi khel+yAhUM/ oM pad+ma a b+hi Shany+tsaI/ o karma a b+hi ShAny+tsa a/ de nas/

kyi bum pa'i dbang bskur bar bya'o// o badzaka la na a b+hi ShAny+tsa hUM/ oM bud+d+ha ka la yog a b+hi Shany+tsa oM/ o raka la sha a b+hi ShAny+tsatwaM/ oM pad+ma ka la sha a b+hi Shany+tsa hU~M/ o ka ka la yag

a b+hi Shany+tsa a/ de nas 'phrang ba'i dbang bskur bar bya'o// oM rat+tamA la a b+hi Shany+tsahUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ oM badzra pat+'a a ba laM ba na a b+he khaut+taM/ o badzra mu tu a b+hi ShalcahUM/ oM bud+d+ha mi tA a d+hi

khany+tsa oM/ oM rat+namu tu a b+hi ShAny+tsa hU~M/ oM pad+ma mu tA a b+hi lcagI/ oM kamamu tu a rgyu zhany+tsa a/ oM badzan ma a b+hi Shany+tsa hUM/ oMnA dId+hi/a/ oM badzau0f38ma a b+hi Shany+tsa hU~Ma/ o

badzra tsakra a b+hi Shany+tsa/ hUM hUM/ oM badzratsakra a d+hi pa tisiM/ a b+hi Shany+tsahU~M hU~M hU~M/ o o o/ ts+tsha hUM/ hIhi/hA/ aaa/ oM badza?d+ha ra Ni a b+hi Shany+tsAhUM/ o ta thA ga ta d+ha ra Ni a

b+hi Shany+tsa oM/ oM rata d+hu ra Ni a b+hi'/ hU~M/ oM pad+ma d+hAr Ni a b+hi ShawagI/ o kAmarU ra Ni a b+hi Sha2ny+tsa/ a/ oM sam+b+ha tathA ga ta gu rgya a b+hi Shany+tsa o/ o rodzra gur+ya a b+hi Shany+tsahUM/ o rat+tagu phyaa b+hi

ny+tsat+taM/ o pad+ma gu rtse a b+hi ShalcahU~M/ o kArnagu rgya a b+hi ShA/ a/ o prayA pa ya sa ma yog a b+hi Shany+tsa hUM a/ de ltar dbang bskur nas tshobasring ba'i rig pa 'di sbyin par bya'o// oM hUM badzra A yu
bahU~Ma/ de'i sgrub pa na 'di yin te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i tshe zla ba'i 'od can zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag gnyis mi 'jigs pa dang mchog sbyin du
mdzad pa las bdud rtsi 'dzag pa bri'o// de'i 'og tu sgrub pa po'i lag pa thal mo brkyang la gdong gyen du bcom ldan 'das la lta bar bris la mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod de/ de'i spyan sngar 'bum

bzlas par bya'o// de nas rma ban ba dang mchod pa chen po byas tapa dmar ser gyi mar snod gsarapar bcug la rdo rje g.yon pas mnan te/ bcom ldan 'das rab tusamAyashing mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o//
de nas dri ma mnam zhing sngon ma byung ba'i dri'i ngad ldang la rlangs pa 'am/ du ba 'am/ ma byung ngam/ 'od zer ram/ ma sgron nam/ 'od byung ngam/ de la sogs pa'i mtshan ma byungan mar do 'am/ mar
gsar ram/ til mar ram/ mu'am/ 'o ma 'am/ zho 'am/ chang ngam/ khrag gam/ zhag gam/ klad pa 'am/ sha 'am/ gang yang rung ba la rab tu smras te/ nang pa' sngar srung ba lasog

pa byas nas bdag nyid sbyangs te 'khrungs sam bros na/ mtshan ma ji lta ba bzhin du byung na ni nam zla ba dang nyi ma mo da kyi bar du tshe ring zhing rdo rje dang mtshungs par 'gyur te/ tha mas ni tha ma 'grub pas 'di
la the tshom ni mang ngo// mtshan ma byung na'ang 'jig rten na nadamad/ ljob skyon/ lus la skra dkar dang gnyer ma med par 'gyur ro// lus brtan zhing tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro// gzhan ya nga
bzlas pa byas ba tsam gyis zhi ba dang/ rgyas pa dang/ dbal sogs pa'i las rnams brtag mi dgos par gyur te the tshom med do// dada chen s rgyal po chen po
kha bzhis/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang saMms can thams cad kyi don dang/ phan pa dang/ bde ba'i
slad du rang rang gi snying po bshad par 'tshal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal du gso la/ rdo rje 'dzin pa bka' stsal du gsol/ rgyal po chen po rnams legs kyis shod/
cig dang/ ngas kyang rjes su yi rang zhing byin gyis brlab par bya'o// de nas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bus bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang zhing rjes su yi rang sta byin gyis brlabs pas rang
gi snyid po 'di bshad do/ o ba/ de nas dri za'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung gis kyang rang gi snying po 'di bshad do/ o de nas grul bum gyi rgyal po 'phags skyes ngo sa kyang rang kyi
snying po 'di bshad do// o pa de nas klu'i rgyal po mig mi bzang gyis kyang rang gi snying po 'di bshad do// o 2 de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ bru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa//
rtswa dkyil 'khor lhas ni brgyan pa ste// de yi dbus su gtso bo ni// phyagan rdo rje'agying bcas bri// de yi g.yon gyi phyogs su na/ rnam thos bu dga'i lag pa na// brtson ne'u la thogs pa dang//
rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang// sgrom nang sang ga'i gdan la bzhugs// gser mdog gzi can ldan par bri// mkhas pas bum pa bzang la sogs// rin chen chu bo 'bar bar bri// mdun du/
yul 'khor srung nyid ni// pi wang len pa brtson pa dang// mdzes shing kha dog ljang khu ste// rkyen rnams kun gyis brgyan par bri// g.yas phyogs dpa' bo lus 'phags po/// ral gri lag na
thogs pa bri// nub phyogs su ni mig mi bzang// rdo rje zhags pa 'dzin pa'i mchog/ sbrul mgo bdun gyis bskor ba la// mig kyang dmar zhing shin tu 'bar// sgo yi phyogs ni thams cad du//

sgo ba rnams kyang de bzhin no// de nas/ rdorje'i phyag rgya zhes bya bas// sngags mkhan bdag nyid zhugs nas kyang// bcom ldan 'das ni spyan drangs te/ de nas rgyal po spyan drang ngo/ spyan drangs nas ni
mkhas pas mchod// chog bzhin du an dbul// de nas sngags mkhas sngags 'di dang// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya 'dis// slob ma rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dang/ bram ze la sogs de bzhin
ma togarin chen thogs te zhugs// oM badzra sa ma ya hUM/ de nas me tog gam rin po che 'dis 'dor bar bya'o// oM badzapu tits+tsa ma ho ha ta ma/ gang la bab pa'i rgyal po ni// de nyid du 'grub
gzhan du mad// de nas grwa la bzhag pa yi// bum pa bzhis ni dbang bskur te// dang po phyagan rdo rje yi// phyag rgyas dbang ni bskur bar bya// de la sogs pa go rims kyis// dkyil 'khor nyid
du dbang bskur na// rgyal po ma yin rgyal por 'gyur/ rgyal po yin na chobar 'gyur// 'dzam bu gling dbang dpal dang ldan// gling bzhi pa la dbang ba'i mchog/
ka lan bzhir dbang ni bskur ba dang// lan bzhi'i gzhug par byas na ni// de la rdo rje'adzin rgyal bdag/ bu sdug bzhin du bskyang bar bya// bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi// bran dang g.yog tu bcas
@pa dang// pho brang dang ni 'khor bcas pas// rgyal po rtag tu bskyang bar bgyi// de gnod gzhan gyi phru ma dang// de yi nad dang 'chi bdag gi/ 'jigs dang mu ge la sogs pa'i// gnod pa rnams
ni gzhom par bgyi// rnam thos bus ni rgyas par bgyi// yul 'khor srung gis zhi bar bgyi// phyugs dang gnyon bcas dus min pa'i/ 'chi bdag lus 'phags po yis 'joms// mig mi
lcabazang gis bkra shis shing// mu ge la sogs rnam par 'joms// mdor na bdag gi de yi ni// re dud bsam pa kun bgyi ste// sta nges pa ma lags na/ phyag na rdo rje la 'khus 'gyur/
de nas phyogs skyong ba rnams kyis// bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis kyang sems can thams cad la
phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du/ rang rang gi snying po rnams dbul bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'jig rten skyong ba rnams legs so legs so// legs kyis phul cig
de nas 'byung po rnams kyi bdag po dbang ldan la sogs pas rang rang gi snying po rnams phul ba/ o/ o I/ oM a/ o ya/ oMr/ tshe ba/ o ya/ oM ku/ oM a/ o bra//
denas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la// mgon po dbus su de bzhin gzhag/ phyogs skyong rang gi phyogs gnas su// gzhag byaspyan sngar nyi ma dang// phag
gi gakhrugs dang gnyis gzhag ste// sgo ba rnams kyang de bzhin no// de nas spyan drangs de kun la// mchod pa kun kyis mchod par bya// de nas bdag nyid zhugs nas kyang// slob ma rnams ni
gzhug bya zhing// phyogs skyongarangagi sngags btab pa'i// bum pa rnams kyis dbang bskur ro// de nas phan par 'dod pa yis// bsgrub phyir snying po sbyin par bya// phyogs skyong rang gi phyogs
gnas rnams// brtag mi dgos par 'grub par 'gyur// de nas de dag mgu nas 'di sgod ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang rgyal rigs kyi spyi bo nas dbang bskur zhing/ rgyal po'i dkyil
'khor 'dir zhugs te dbang bskur ba thob pa 'am/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis rtag par dus thams cad du bsrung ba dang//
bskyab pa dang/ sba bar bgyi'o/ pha rol gyi brum kun gazhom par bgyi// dus dus su char pa bab par bgyi/ 'bru dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu rnams bskyed bar bgyi'o/// de nas
chos kyi rgyal po chen po gshin rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rgyal po chen po de'i tshe bsring bar
bgyi'o// dus ma lags par 'chi ba brgyad po so sor dgag par bgyi'o// srin po rnams kyi bdag po chen po ni ri tis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis
kyang rgyal po dang/ rgyal po'i bu dang/ bram ze dang/ rgyal rigs dang/ mi 'am/ gzhan gang yang rung ba dag la nad dang/ yi dgas dang/ 'dres mi 'jigs par bgyi/ srin po la sogs
pas 'jigs par mi bgyi/ dus ma lags pa'i 'chi bdag gis 'jigs par mi bgyi ste/ dus thams cad du bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o/// ren klu'i rgyal po
chen po ba ru chas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang rtag par dus thams cad du rgyal po de dang yul thams cad so sor bskyab par bgyi/ kun tu bsrung bar bgyi//
'bru rnams bskyed par bgyi/ klu'i nyes pa rnams mi 'byung bar bgyi/ thog dang sa ra ba rnams mi dbab par bgyi/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba rnams so sor dgag par bgyi'o// n gnas
rlung gi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems can chen po de la dus thams cad du rlung gi 'jigs pa mi 'byung bar bgyi/ dus ma lags pa'i rlung mi 'byung
bar bgyi// 'bru dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu thams cad bskyod par bgyi/ 'jigs pa thams cad so sor dgag par bgyi'o/// de nas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po chen po ku be ras/
bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po tshi shu rtsa brgyad dang lhan gcig tu mchis te stobs dang ldan pas
sems can chen po de la dus thams cad du 'jigs pa thams cad so sor dgag par gyi/ nor dang 'bru thams cad legs par 'byor par bgyi/ rang gi skya bo dang/ yongs kyi skya bo dang//
yul dad/ gnas dang/ bran dang/ snag gi gnyan dang/ rus kyi gnyen dang/ grogs dang/ bu dang/ bu mo dang/ chungam la sogs pa bsrung bar bgyi/ glang dang/ ba lang dang/
bong bu dang/ dra mo dang/ lug dang/ ma he dang/ ba glang dang/ rta dang/ ra la sogs pa la'ang bsrung bar bgyi'o// dunas 'byung po thams cad kyi bdag po dbang byad kyis kyang
bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rgyal po de dang/ rgyal po de dag gi bu dang/ rgyal rigs dang/ bram ze rnams 'di dang pha rol
tu bskyab pa dang/ phan gdags pa dang/ yongs su bskyab pa dang/ zhi ba dang/ bkra shis pa dang/ chad pa spang ba dang/ mtshon cha spang ba dang/ dug gzhil ba dang/ dug gzhon pa dang/

dra ba rnams bra bar bgyi/ dgos pa thams cad la nye bar gnas par bgyi/ dgos pa dang dgos pa ma lags pa rnams kyi mtshan ma 'bar bstan par bgyi/ dge ba dang mi dge ba thams cad rmi
lam du 'ang bsgo bar bgyi/ sgrub pa'i ng bgags ma mchis par bgyi/ dngos grub thams cad stsal bar bgyi'o/// de nas yang nam mkha' lding gi bdag ngo nam mkha' laspyod
pa rnams kyis kyang/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang dus thams cad du rgyal po de dang/ rgyal po'i bu dang/ rgyal po'i
blon po dang/ bram ze dang/ rgyal rigs rnams 'jigs pa thams cad las bdag nyid 'khor thams cad dang bcas par mchis la bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ sba bar bgyi/ mchog
thams cad rab tu bstabs par bgyi/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi/ dus thams cad du phyi bzhin du 'brang bar bgyi'o////denas sa 'og gi bdag po phag chen pos//
bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang mi'i bdag po de dang mi'i bdag po'i bu dang/ yang na lan gnyis su byung ba las/ lan gnyis su

rje'u rigs dang/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyib mo dad pa rnams kyi dus thams cad du don thams cad grub par bgyi'o/!'phags dang/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan yang 'gos kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa rnams 'ja' dad pa
jigs pa thams cad las dus thams cad du 'ang bsrung bar bgyi'o// bdag nyid kyang yongs su bskyab par bgyi'o///bdag nyid kyang yongs su bskyab par bgyi'o//dan/gab brtsalan/ de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis
kyis kyang 'dri skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi sngags kyi snying po rnams 'bul bar 'tshal na/ de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis
byin gyis brlab par gsol/ legs so lags so// ngas byin gyis brlabs kyis/ gza' chen po rnams shod nug///de nas nyi ma la sogs pa gzu'achen po rnams kyi
bcom ldan 'angs la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// o/ o so/ o aM/ oM bu/ oM bri/ o shu/ oM sa/ ur/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad do//
dbus su ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjenyid 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugs su bri'o// ngos rnams su phyag rgya chen po bzhi bri'o// pa wa sangs ni mdun du 'a// zla ba rgyab tu

bri bar bya// g.yas su phur bu bri bya shing// g.yon nga ra gza' lhag bri bar bya// me yi phyogs su mig dmar dang/ rlung gyi phyogs su nyi ma ste// dbang ldan phyogs su spen pa'o/[”]/srin po 'a phyogs su
@#/ sgra gcan bri// dkyil 'khor phyi rol khor yug tu// rgyus thams cad bri bar bya// sgo sgor de bzhin sgo ba rnams// khros pa'i yid du bri bar bya// rdo rje'adzin
du mas zhugs nas// rdo lcags kyu la sogs pas// thams cad kyang ni sbyin drang ngo// de nas slob ma rnams zhugs te// oM badzahan hUM phaT/ oM badzra gra has ma ya hU~M phaT/ oM badzra grwa/

rdo nyapra tits+tsaMs ma ye hUM/ de nas gza' brgyud sngags btab pa'i// bum pa brgyad kyis dbang bskur ro// de nas rdo rje'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur te// gza' rnams thams cad bsgrubo nga ra bya'o// de nas
gza' chen po de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gza' chen po brgyad kyis kyang rgyal po chen po de dang/ rgyal po 'bu la
rtswa gtogs par dus thams cad du de bzhin du thams cad bgyi'o// de nas rgyu skar dang/ skad cig dang/ yud tsam dang/ thang cig dang/ dus dang/ zla tshigs dang/ sbyor ba dang/ khyim dang
dus sbyor dang/ mchod la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang dus thams cad du

shA sems can chen po de dag gi bka' mi gcog ste/ dpon po bzhin du bskyang bar bgyi'o/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ldong dang/ rgyal po dang/ pho brang dang 'khor dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang khor
gyi gnas thams cad so ge bskyang bar bgyi'o// 'jigs pa chen po 'byung ba'i tshibang dus bdag cag mchod na gdon mi 'tshal bar 'jigs pa mi 'byung/// de nas klu chen po brgyud
kyis phud ces bya ba'i sgras bcom ldan 'das de mnyes par byas pa 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang de dag thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po 'di dbul lo// klu chen po
rnams legs kyis gsang ba'i snying po rnams phul cig/ de nas de dag mgu nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ o phu/ o pa/ o wA/ o pA/ o pa/
o pha/ o pa/ o pa/ danas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad do// pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad la// kha dog dkar po bri bar bya// de yi dbus su gtso bo ni// phyag na rdo rje rab gnas
pa sbrul mgomatha' yas gdengs pa yis// ltos 'gro chen po bsdigs pa bri// mtha' yas 'jog po de bzhin du// kardo Ta dang u li ka/ nor rgyas bu dang dung skyong dang// pad+ma nu lha de
bzhin du// mdor na 'dab ma re re la// de dag sbrul mgo 'bar ba bri// sprulamago bdun bdun chung ma yis// mgul nas 'khyud dang bcas pa bri// bum pa brgyad dang gtor ma dang// bshes
mdzes pa dang 'byung po yi// mar dang 'o ma sbrang rtsir bcas// byas pa rnams ni gzhag par bya// de nas rdo rje bdag nyid zhugs// sbrul mgos sbrul mgo can rnams dgug/ phud ces bya dang lhan cig
phywa 'i hozhes brjod do// de nas bu ni rgyal po dang// rgyal rigs thams cad rab bcug nas// dug gi nyes skyon gsal ba'i phyir// phung byas bya ba'i dbang bskur
ro// de nas ming tsam brjod pas kyang// klu gnas de dag thams cad 'grub// de nas de dag kun mgu nas// bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal to// spyan star thal mo sbyar 'khod nas// smon lem
sbyo/ rab tu 'debs par gyur// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mngon par dga' ba rnams gal te dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa rnams la bslus par gyur na// de'i tshe bcom
ldan 'das nyid la bslus par gyur cig/ de'i tshe bdag cag gi gnas bya mas bsregs pa gyur cika/ rdo rje kun tu 'bar bas bdag cag gi mgo bkasapar gyur cig/ rtag par dus thams cad du semA

A da nas sgrub pa bshad de/ lha rdzas 'od 'phrang dkar po yi// dbu la sbrul mgo bzhis bskor ba'i// rdo rje 'dzin gtso bsams nas su// thud ces bya ba 'bum thabs la// de nas dug rlas phud ces [']

phyin na/ sbrul mgo'i phyag rgyas smos ci dgos// de nas lha chen po rnams kyi bdag po 'jigs par byed pa chen po bud med chen mo brgyad kyis bskor bas// bcom ldan 'das

kyis de legs par byin gyis brlabs tu gsol/ 'jigs par byed pa chen po 'gas so legs so// rab tu 'jigs par byed pa bdag nyid dang/ lha'i bud med thams cad kyi snying po rnams shod/

po rtsibs brgyad pa// bris nas dbus su rdo rje'adzin// khro chen 'jig rten gsum las ni// rnam rgyal zhes bya gzhag par bya// de yi zhabs drung 'jigs byed pa'i/ bdag po chen po khros pa ni
'jigs byad ma dang bcas par bri// rtsibs kyi nang ni thams cad du// gzhan yang 'jigs byed brgyad po ni// bud med rnams dang ldan pa la// khros pa'i bzhin dngapa nga khros pas/ cibade bar ni
dri bar bya// 'dir ni sgo sgord bzhin du// sgo ba shin tu khros ldan bri// de nas lcags kyu la sogs pas// bkug sta mgo yi thod pa ni// khragagis bkang ste mchod nas kyang// 'changagator ma

pa tshad gyur la// rgyu zhes bya ba dran byadwacing// shu 'am yang na chang mchogal sa// thod pa bkang sta dbul bar bya// de nas 'jigs byed ma rungs 'joms// mgunas rab tu grub gyur nas// ci 'dod
