gsod////de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha chen po rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal na rang gi brtag pa bshad par 'tshal gyis// bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse bar dgongs te byin gyis brlab par gsol// de nas tsha sa pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyis rang gi snying po
[; ]@#/ rnams bshad do// oM so/ o b+ha/ o ru/ iT li/ o// o ga/ oM bri/ o ka/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris
la dbus su 'jig rten gsum 'dul ba// de yi mdun du dpa' bo ni// dbang phyug rtse gsum lag thogs bri// rgyab tu tshangs pa bri bya ste/ g.yon par lagan 'khor lo thogs// g.yas par dbang

po rang gi ni// phyag rgya'i mtshan ma lag thogs bri// rang gi dkyil 'khor chung ma rnams// 'dir yang sgo ba de bzhin te// bya dang bum pa gang ba gzhug/ dkyil 'khor gyi na phyi rol du// stobs bzang la chog/
mthu chen thogs// de nas zhugs nas lha rnams ni// mkhas pas kun nas dgug par bya// dza/ hU~M baM ho/ lha thams cad// dkyil 'khor dam par gzhug par mdzod// de nas 'ongs par mthong ba

dang duga'ab chun pos mchod par bya// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yi// phyag rgyas slob ma rnams gzhug ste/ o pra titsAdAmahA satwaM badzad+ha ra a dzA ya hU~M ha ha ha ha/ me tog tshe ga bzhin du dor// mig dbye
nas ni bstan par bya// de nas sngags kyis btab pa yi// bum pa'i rgyus ni dbang bskur ro// dazhes lha rnams gad dga' ba'i// dngos grub rabi tu sbyin par bya// 'bum gcig gam ni 'bum gzhig
sam dang po bstan pa byas nas kyang// dbang phyug la sogs lha mchog rnams// de dag grub pas bsgrub bya sta// mtshan gcig la sogs gnas sam// phyag na rdo rje'i pho brang dam// yang na de/
[8/ ]bzhin gshegs pa 'am// ring bsre' ldan pa'i mchod rten du// lha rnams thams cad cho ga bzhin// sgrub pas rtag tabasgrub byas na// nam phyed na ni lha bzhengs nas// khyod kyi 'dod pa gang yin pa/
ci bder spyin bya yis// bzang pos myur du soms te smyos// gang phyir mchog ni khyod la spyin/ de nas sngags shes dngos grub phyir// lta la mchog ni gsol ba gdab// lha rdzas khu ba
bro btung dang// mi snang ba dang mkha' 'gro dang// ril bu rjes dang rgyal sogs// yid 'dod tshad med gsol ba gdab// danas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pas/ bcom ldan
'das la phyag 'tshalanas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'a jig rten dang 'jig rten 'as 'das pa 'a dekyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa gang lagos pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das ngo dag
cag lha thams cad kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ngo// mtho ris kyi lam bstan par bgyi'o// bde 'gro' lam bstan par bgyi'o// ngan song ma lags pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o//sgrib pa mamakyi
ba'i lam bstan par bgyi'o//ban pa'i lam bstan bar bgyi'o// rnam ba dbenapa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o// khub lamabastan par bgyi'o// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o// dam pa'i chos kyi lam bstan/
par bgyi'o// bde 'gro'i lam bstan par bgyi'o// spong ba'i lam bstan par bgyi'o// nyon mongs med pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/
nga 'a/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid du 'grub pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o// rdo 'dzin pa nyid du 'grub pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o// dus thams cad du 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung ba dang//

[Dr ]bslab pa dang/ sba bar bgyi'o// bdag nyid kyi bu bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// de'i pha rol gyi dgro kun gzhom par bgyi'o// grong dang/ grong 'dab dang/ ljongs dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang/
dang rgyal srid rnams bsrung bar bgyi'o// yul dang/ phyogs dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong 'khor rnams bsrung bar bgyi'o// rgyal srid kyang stsal bar bgyi'o// rgyal srid lo pa rnams na rgyal srid rgyas
par bgyi'o// gling gcig pa dang/ gling gnyis pa dang/ gsum pa dang/ bzhi pa dang/ bde 'gro dang/ mi'i gnas dang/ sa'i 'og dang/ 'khor los sgyur ba rnams stsal bar bgyi'o// mdor na
brgya byin nyid dang/ tshangs pa nyid dang/ gtogs 'dod nyid dang/ dbang phyug chen po nyid kyang stsal bar bgyi'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje nyid kyis 'khor gyi dkyil
'khor la kun tu gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad pa dang/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag g.yos/ yad dgo pan g.yos// 'gul/ yang dag par 'gul/ 'bar/ rab tu babar/ yang dag par
rab tu 'bar/ dgod/ rab tu dgod/ yang dag par rab tu dgod/ rtse rab tu rtse/ yang dag par rab tu rtsa zhing rmad kyi ya mtshan du ma 'jig rten du yang dag par rab tusnang bar gyur to//
[ri/ ]nas tshes pa la sogs pa lha'i tshogs rnams shin tu rnam par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang nubasams/
dpa' rnams ni rgyu ma mchis par mdzum pa ma mdzad na/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du 'jug pa mdzad pa 'i rgyu gang lags lung bstan du gsol// de nas bcom ldan

'das phyag na rdo rjes lha rnams kyis gsol ba'i tshig gsan nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams sngon gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bshad pa'i 'chi bdag zhi bar byed pa'i rig pa
dang/ dus ma yin pa'i 'chi bdag 'joms par byed pa'i rig sngags gzi brjid chen po gang yin pa thos sam/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha
chen po de dag yang dag par rab tumagu ste ba spu langs nas legs so zhes bya ba 'di dag gsol to// bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/ rdo rje 'dzin pa lags so lugs ste/ gang gi spyod
du tshathung ba'i sems can rnams tshobasring bar bgyi ba dang/ dus ma lags pa'i ba chi bdag gis nyes pa rnams gang yin dus ma lags pa 'chi ba las rnam par grol bar bgyi ba dang/ na song du skyes
pa rnams dran song gi rgyud thams cad las can s kyang rnam par grol bar bgyi ba dang/ 'khor ba'i 'jigs bas skrag ba'i sems can rnams bde blag tu 'khor ba la rgyabakyis phyogs par bgyis nas/ myur du
bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ gzi brjid chen po'i stobs dang mthu chen po'i rig pa bshad du gso la/
dug de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis gsol ba'i tshig gsan nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/

@ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo/ o pa lcapu N+ya/ mdza pu N+ya a pa ri mi ta A yu/ pu ts+tsadzAn saM b+hA ro pa tsi te sA shu/ snying po'i rig pa'o// o d+hI sAhA/ nye ba'i snying po'i rig pa'o// oM hUM swAhA/
nyatha'i snying po'i rig pa 'o// oM hUM swAhA/ snying po yang dag par bskul ba'i rig pa'o// o TaM swAhA/ snying po dam pa'o/ oM swAhA/ gsang ba'i snying po'o// de nus de dag gi dkyil 'khor/
bshad do/ dkyil 'khor rtsibs bzhi par byas la/ de'i dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dang/ bsod nams dang/ yegs kyi tshogs dang/ gzi brjid tshadamud pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba gzhag

ste= hUM zhes bya ba'i snying po'o/ de'i spyanasdar na phyag na rdo rje sta/ b+hi zhes bya ba'i snying po'o// g.yon par ni khro be sa/ kr-i zhes bya ba'i snying po'o// g.yas par ni nam mkha'i snying po ste/ hUM

zhes bya bo'i snying po'o//rgyab tuni'aphags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ste/ b+hi zhes bya ba'i snying po'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la rig pa/
rnams bri'o// bum pa lnga dang brgyad 'khor les sgyur ba'i sngags kyis btang la gzhag go/ bdug pa la sogs pa las thams cad pa'i khro bo'i sngags kyis btab pa dang/ mchod dra la sogs pa gzhag
ste/ sgo ba thams cad kyang de bzhin no// de naso sdagasa mkhan bdag nyid zhugs la/ bde bar gshegs pa dam pa sras dang 'bangs su bcas shing 'khor gyis bskor te rig pa dang lhan cig spyan drang ngo//
de nas bdag nyid dbang bskur te skyil mo krung bcas nas 'dug la stod phrag brgya bzlas la/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ rdo rje 'dzin pa 'am/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug kyang rung ste/
mngon sum du na thong nas de 'dod pa'i mcho ga so sor thob par 'gyur ro// ciste mnyam par ma bzhag na de'i tsha yid kyi las thams cad nus par 'gyur ro// de nas rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phug rgya brtsis
la/ oM badzrad+ha ra/ ra d+har/ pad+mad+har/ b+hi shA d+har/ tathA ga tas ma ya/ mA ka ma/ tathA ga ta sa ma ya d+ha ra kong hUM/ zhes nga rgyal bskyod la slob ma rnams gshug par bya'o// de nas

'dis ma tog dor bar bya'o// oM sam+b+ha ta thA ga ta pra tits+tsha ho sa ma ya hUM/ de nas 'phrang ba de nyid kyis mgo la bcings la dbang bskur bar bya'o// oM saN+Ta ta thA ga a phyi luny+tsa d+ha ra AdzA pa ya hU~M hU~M/ oM badzra

a b+hi dzany+tsa hUM hUM/ oM rat+na a b+hi Shany+tsatwaM/ oM pad+ma a b+hi Na/ hU~M hU~M// okam+ma a b+hi 2/ hU~M a/ de nas dam tshig dang bka' dbang bskur bar bya'o// de nas dam tshig ni/ dkon mchog gsum dang
byang chub sems// bla ma dam pa rnams ma spang// srog chags rnams n gan da mi bya// ma byin par yang mi byung zhing// brdzun du smra bar bya ma yin// pha rol bud mang spyang mi bya//

ka bla ma smad par mi bya ste/ dang yi grib ma mi bkol zhing// slob dpon m yin mi gzung la// rdo rje slob dpon mtshan mi brjod// sngags dang phug rgya mi smad de// lha rnams la lta smos ci dgos/ ci su glen pa/
smad na ni// nad kyis nges par 'chi bar 'gyur// rnyed dang lha yi grib ma dang// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa pa// phyagargya yi ge'i mtshan ma rnams// gom pas bgom par mi bya'o// glen pas
dkon mchog gsum sogs dwang// sangs rgyas bstan la gnod byed dang// bla ma smod par brtson pa rnams// mkhas pas bsgrims te gsad par bya// ngos min ldan dang sdig spyod dang// rtag tu samA
can gnod brtson dang/ dam tshig ldang rnams snying brtse ba'i// sngags mkhan gyis ni sngags kyis gsad// 'jungs pa rnams kyis nor blangs la// sems can 'phongs la sbyin par bya// bla ma 'a
ni mchod pa dang// de ltar dam tshig sgrub pa dang// dkyil 'khor phyir dang dam tshig can// phan phyir rgyal ba'i sras rnams la// mchod phyir mi yi dbang po dang// phyug po rnams kyi nor dablog go/

so mas can rnams la phan spyod pas// rtag tu dam tshig bla ma'i nor// srog chags srog na srung ba'i phyir// brdzun du yang ni smra ba bya// sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyis bu dang/ dam tshig rnams ni srung
ba dang sngags rigs pas ni sgrub pa'i phyir// gzhan gyi bud med bstan par bya// nordzasams dpa'i gnas 'dug nas// thams cad byas shing kun bros kyang// 'grub 'gyur zhes pa ra mi 'gyuran

snying rjer ldan pas smos ci dgos// de nas 'dis bka'i dbang bskur bar bya'o/ da lo sa t+ma ta shug ta a dzA ya de da su mi gra thu badzra su sid d+ha ya/ oM badzra tiSh+ThahU~M/ 'dis rdo rje lag tu byin la las kyi dbang

bskur bar bya'o// oM sam+b+ha kar+NaNi ku ru bud d+hA naM hUM/ de nas bla me bla ma'i phyir// khyod kyi lus mchog sbyin par bya// nor dang dbyig dang 'bru rnams dang// stan dang bzhon pa de bzhin da// bran gyi
marog dang khad pa dang// rgyal po rgyal sred de bzhin te// bu dang bu mo chung ma dang/ ma dang sring mo tsha mo dang// gzhan yang ci bshad thams cad ni// phan par bsams phyir bram r dbul//
de nas byang chub bar du ni// sangs rgyas nyid dang gzhan dag dang// 'jig rten pa yi mthurman rnams// gang 'dod pa dag sgrub 'dod pas// dngos grub rnams ni gsol bar bya// de nas bu la phan
pa 'i phyir// sngags mkhan ser sna med sems dang// dad pas dad pa'i sams ldan la// dngos grub rnams ni sbyin pa ra bya// chos rnams thams cad dngosu med par// sems kyis bsgom pa ra byas
nas kyang// a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam// rang gis sa bon de dbus su// bsams nas dam tshig phyag rgya yang// bsam zhing de bzhin de nyid du// sgrub pa po ni bsgyur bar bya// lha yi
rnal 'byor tshul du bsgyur// de nas rang gyi sa bon dang// phyag rgyas phyag rgyur byin rlab// lta 'og ge rigs ji bzhin du// sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur ro// de nas nga
rgyal bsad nas kyang/ mkhas pa yisan bsgrub byas na// de bzhin gshegs kyang 'grub 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos/// dunas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha chen po rnams kyis/
bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po dang/ rgyal po'i bu dang/ rgyal po'i blon po dang// rgyal rigs dang/ bram ze dang/ rje'u rigs dang/
dmangs rigs dang/ gzhan yang dman zhing kho re chung ba phyag bdar pa dang// mtha' 'khob pa'i rigs ldan gyi skya bo rnams dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po 'dir zhugs na de dag gi rnam par smin pa ji
lta bur 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir nga la zhus pa de ni legs so legs so// lha'i bu rnams dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po
'dir gzhag pa dang/ dbang bskur ba dang/ bris pa dang/ 'drir bcug pa dang/ rjes su yi rangs pa dang/ phyag byas pa dang/ mchod pa rnams kyi 'bras bu dang rnam par smin pa nyon cig/

lha lha'i bu rnams mdor na nga 'a 'ang de'i yon tan bshad par spobs pa med de/ nga'i bsod nams kyi phung po gang yin pa de brgya phrag stong du mar bsgyur kyang grongs su'ang mi chog/ bgrang bar yang mi chog/
dpe ra yang mi bzod de/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung pos kyang mi bzod de// dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'bras bu dang rnam par
smin pa gang lags pa den/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar che'o// rdo rje 'dzin pa ngo mtshar che'o/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis dkyil 'khor la sogs par 'jug par spro'o// bcom ldan
'das rdo rje 'dzin pa sbyo'o/ de nas lha de dag gis de bzhin du phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can bsod nams chung zhing tshe thung
ba dang ngan song gi rgyud dang ldan pa dang/ sems can dmyal ba dang/ yi dwags dang/ byol song rnams su skyes pa dag kyang mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das de dag la bdag cag gis ji ltar bsgrub
par bgyi/ kyi lha'i bu rnams sems can de dag ni dkyil 'khor 'di nyid du chug cig/ chos kyi yi ge'ang zlos su chug cig dang/ des sems can de dag tshe ring bar 'gyur/ bsod nams dang bralaM/

nga rnams bsod nams dang ldan par 'gyur/ ngan song las kyang rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// kya lha'i bu rnams ngan song du skyes zin pa gang yin pa de dag gyi ming la'ang dbang bskur cig/ gzugs brnyan la'ang

dbang bskur bar byos shig/ mchod rten la'ang dbang bskur bar byos shig/ rang gi lha'i sku la'ang dbang bskur bar byos shig/ chung ngu na de dad rigs mthun pa dang/ de'i bu dang/ de dang dus mthun pa dang//
de'i ming 'dzin pa 'am/ bran la 'ang dbang bskur cig dang/ zhag bdun du dkyil 'khor du bcug ste dbang bskuranA/ gdonami za bar zhag bdun gyis ngan song gis sgrib pa las rnam
par grol bar 'gyur ro// lha'i bu rnams de ni ming nas smos te 'bum phrag gnyis sam/ 'bum phrag gsum mam/ 'bum phrag bzhi nas/ 'bum phrag brgya phrag stong gi bar du bzlas pa byas na
mtshams med pa lnga byas pa 'ang rnam pa thar par 'gyuran/ sdig pa chung du byas pa rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos/ lha yi bu rnams zhi ba yi// hom khung tha ma bar ma mchog/ khru gang khru do khru/

ba'i pa'i// blum po nyid du byas nas ni// de yi ming yang yungs kar gyis// brgya phrag stong du bsrag byas na// ngan song kun las rnam par thar// de yi sha dang rus pa dang// sgra dang thal ba la sogs
pas cho ga de dang 'dra bar ni// sbyin srog byas na ngan song yang// kun las rnam par thar par 'gyur// de yi dbus su 'khor lo ni// rtsibs brgyad 'od zer dkar 'bar bri// khor yug rdo tshu

lnga pa/ 'od zer dkar dang ldan par bri// de nas rdo rje rgya gram dang// rdo rje rin chen nu skyes mchog/ de nas sdig pa gzhom pa 'i phyir// sdug rgya sna tshogs gzhag par bya// phyi ma rdo rje rigs rnams kyi//

phyag rgya rnams ni phyi rol bri// gza' dang skar ma'i mtshan ma dang// de ltar 'jig rten skyong ba rnams// gtso bo de tsho lugasama'ang rung// rdo rjecan dang lhan cig gzhag bya dang bum pa bkang ba dad na
tu gtor ma lha ba shes rab dkar gzhag/ mdor na thog na btab nas kyang// chog bzhin du dri bar bya// dkar po'i gros ni bgos nas kyang// sangs rgyas gzugs can mi 'jigs pas// ngan song
rgyung na gnas pa yi// sems can rjes su dran byed cing// sdig pa'i sgrib pa zhi ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kun gyi spyin sregani// mar dang 'o ma sbyang nub/ 'bras yos yungs kar bsus pa dang//
do yi rus pa sha la sogs// yang na mi nas smos te bya// de nas bde 'gror skyes nas kyang/ mkhas pas rgyas pa bya dgos te// khru do pa 'am khru bzhi pa// de ltar mchog ni khru brgyad par// byus
nas hom khung gru bzhi pa// kun tu mu ran ldan par bya// de dbus pad+ma rin chen can// 'od zer ser po ldan par bri// khor yug tu ni rin chen dang// mu phan rnams la chu skyes bro// phyi rol du na rig
lnga yi// so so'i phyag rgya bri bar bya// de ltar phyi yi lha rnams dang// lcags kyu la sogs bri bar bya// gos rnams re ra por bsgyur nas byung// mtho ris gnas pa rjes dran zhing/ de la phan phyi'i
rgyus pa'i phyir// rgyas pa yi ni las byas na// lus can de yi tshe dang dpal// gzi brjid bde ba'i longs spyod 'phal// de nas phan phyir nges par yod// dbang du bya ba'i las byan// hom khung bshu
yi dbyibs 'dra la// khru gang pa 'am khru do nga// khru bzhir byas la de'i dbus su// pad+ma dmar po bris nas kyang// de yi dbus su mda' ba cas pa// gzhu yang de bzhin bri bar bya// khor yug tu
yang mda' bcas pa'i// gzhu ni kha dog dmar por phyi// sngags rdzogs pas na rtag par yang/ 'ol de dang 'dra bar bya// sems can de ya da dran byas te// dmar por
gyur pa'i gos gyon la// ma tog dmar ram pad+ma 'am// 'bras bu dmar ram tshon bskus pa'i// mar dang gur kum bsres pa dang// tsan dan dmar po'i phye ma yis// sbyin sreg byas na lha la sogs
thams cad de yi dbang du 'gyur// de la gdon rnams gzhom pa'i phyir// mngon spyod kyang ni brtsam bya ste/ phyad dang gsum mam khru gsum mam// de ltar dam pa khru dgur bya/ gru gsum pa dang ldan

par ni// dbus su rdo rje rtse dgu pa// rtse gsum pa dang rgya gram pa// rdo rje rnams dang dbyig pa dang// mgo ni rdo rje rtsa gsum dang// dgra sta rtse gcig mukhyud bskor// phyi rol tu yang rim gsum du//
snga ma bzhin du brgyan par bya// bya dang gtor ma bum pa dang// bshos cha rnam pa mang du gzhag/ sha dang khrag gis bkang ba yi// mgo yi thod pa kun tu gzhag/ de yis lus can sdig sogs dang//
bgegs rnams gzhom par bya ba'i phyir// gos nag bgos shing khros nas kyang// 'dzig rten gsum rgyal bdag nyid bsam// de nas de yi sdig bcom lus// bgegs dang phral te ni bad bar// mtho
ris 'jig rten mi yi nang// khams gsum pa ni ci bder spyod// go rims 'di dag nyid kyisan/ tsha'adi'i gnas la'ang bya ba ste// da nas gang gi phyir byas pa// de yi phyir yang de bzhin 'gyur/
gzhan dag kyang n las rnams kun// snga ma ji bzhin de ltar bya// des ni sems can tham cad la 'ang// myur du bde skyid myong bar 'gyur// de nas tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams
yid mgunas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ngan song du ltas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don dang/ phan pa dang/ bder ci slad du brtag pa'i
rgyal po 'di 'dri ba dang// 'dir 'jug pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams bdag cag tshangs pa la yogs ba lha rnams kyis bu bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi// gangargyal po dang//
bon po dang/ rgyal po'i blon po rnams ji ltar gsungs pa'i rjes su sloban de'i rgyal sring 'phal bar bgyi/ yul dang/ phyogs dang/ nang gi skye bo dang/ yongs kyi skye bo dang/ bran la sogs pa bsrung
bar bgyi/ nor dang 'bru rnams mang du 'byor bar bgyi/ budached dang/ skyes pa dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo rnams dang ldan par bgyi/ 'byor pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ lo 'gas pa dang/ zhi ba rnams su

bgyi na/ ji ltar bshad pa la mi rtog par bgyi ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ gang gis brtag pa2rgyal po 'di dad pas rgyal mtshan gyi rtsa mo la btags te grong dang grong khyer du btsugs la/ bdag nyid kyis bsu

ba dang/ glang po che'i snying du bzhag la grong dang grong khyer la sogs pa thams cad bskoran/ nad dang gnod pa thams cad ma mchis par 'gyur la/ sems can chen po de'i drung na bdag cag bran gyi tshul

bdud rtsi zhes// mgo thod gang bar gyur pa rnams// dkyil 'khor du ni mang du gzhag/ de nas slob dpon bdag nyid kyang// mgu nas mgo thod phyag rgyus 'jug/ phyag rgya de dang de yi ni// sha rnams

kun gyis dam tshagi stsol// de nas 'dod ldan rnyed nas ni// tshu zhes bya bas bsgrub par bya// de nas sngags mkhan sgo sgor yang// de nyid dran byad snyan par byed// de ni nges par dngos grub ste// yud tsam
'jig rten gsum dbang 'gyur// dkyil 'khor dun tshigs rnams dang// rang gi lha yi tshogs rnams la// rgyud las 'byung ba'i dam tshig brjod// de nas mchod de las nas kyang// tshogs nyin
rdo tshu sams dpa' yi// tshul du gnas nas 'byung bar bya// de nas slob ma bsdus nas nii// lag na rin chen thogs te gzhug/ oM badzra kro d+hu sa ma ya hU~M/ oM badzra rak+Sha si hU~M phaT/ oM badzra

kro d+ha a na lArka Tar pra ti hUM phaT/ oM badzakro d+hanan rak+Sha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha pA sha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+has ma ya ni bIr hUM phaT/ oM badzakro d+has ma ya mA ti kra ma d+hI paN/ o badzra ko

d+ha ro tis ma ya a d+hi ny+tsa hUM phaT// 'dis dbang bskur la re bzhin du dbang bskur bar bya'o// de nas de dag gi sgrub pa bshad de// bdag nyid khro bor snyoms shugs la// de nas snying khar nyi ma sog
rang gi ches kyi yi ge las/ 3khros nas yang dang yang 'phro zhing// de gnyis gcig tu bsgom par bya// de nas 'grub 'gyur gzhan du min// khro bo'i rgyal po'i las dngos su// gnod pa yin par
bshad mod kyi// zhi dang dbad dang rgyas pa rnams// de dag byed 'gyur gdon mi za// rdo rje sems dpa'i tang 'dzin gnas// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom byas na// gdug pa sems can 'dzin
byed cing// mdor na dug rims gdon la sogs// de bzhin de dag thams cad ni// thabs la sogs pa sa 'joms byed pa// khros nas snying las 'byung 'gyur bas// gsad pa'i 'das la
bsam par bya// khros par gyur pa'i rgod ma'i de khas// sha dang khrag rnams 'jib byed cing// de dag 'tsho ba 'phrog byed par// bsams na nges par rlag par 'gyur// khro bo
[• ]'jig rten gsum snang mdzad// zla ba 'drab 'i dag bsam zhing// 'od bar 'byung ba mang po yis// khyab par gyur par rnam bsams la// rims dang gdon dang dug la sogs// 'od zer des ni

phyung nas kyang// de yi nad rgas gnod pa rnams// zhi bya'i phyir ni ring du dor// de nas hU~M gi tshig bzhabad la// rdo rje lta bu'i lus bsam shing// hU~M gis 'khor los go char bya// 'od zer chu yis dbang
bskur ro// de nas de yis ming smos shing// bzlas pas tshul bzhin bsam par bya// de nas khung bu gsum la rnam gcig ni// zla ba rgyas shing 'od zer 'phro 'dra la// khru gang tsam mam yang na khru do

mthA pa mi rgyala mchog rnams kyis ni gnyis su bsgyur// de yis sa rnams rnam par spyod byas te// 'khor lo'i dkyilan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi// dbus su rdo rje rtse lngar gyur pa gcig/ 'od zer dkar do 'phrang
bskor gzi can gshag phyag rgya'itshigs rnams thams cad bri bya ste// rigs rgyu la sogs phyag rgyu zur phyin cing/ rgyal po bzhi yi ji bzhin phyag mtshan rnams// phyogs kyi bdag po rnams kyang phyogs
kha phyogs su// lha chen la sogs phyag rgya khyab 'jug dang/ 'khor lo lta bu nyid du bri bar bya// drizhim chus bkangamadog 'od dkar gyur la// dkar pos shin tu dkrigs pa'i bum pa brgyud// dkar gsum

[6] ]gang ba'i gtor ma lha bshos dang// bdug pa ma'am me tog rnams kyang gzhag/ mched pabya ba'i phyir na bla ri dang// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan jam la sogs gzhag/ nang ra ga pur bcas pa 'i dri zhim pa//
tsan dan la sogs pa yis byugs// nibagrwa phyogs bltas te sbyin sug bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan 'dra 'dug bya 'am// yanarnal 'byor ldan zhing nye mas dpa'i ba dan// gos sogs dkar 'byung

ba bkar gyis brgyan// mar gyi sbrang rtsi rom dang// nas kyi thug pa la sogs dang// til mar dang ni til nyid dang// yungs kar dang 'bras yos dang// 'bras chan nas dang gro rnams dang/ rma togazinatu dri zhim

rnams ga pur dang ni bsros nas kyang// tsan dan dkar po sa bsgos pa dang// 'dang bdunam tog 'bras bu rnams// 'o dang ldan pa'i ya mngashing la// de dag khung bu'i khyad par las// rang gi sor gyis gzhal

bya zhing// shu rtsa bzhi yan chung mchog sor bcu drug ni ram skyo// tham bcu gnyis nyid du shes// shin tu chung na sor brgyad de// bur shing zho dang ldan pa la// dri chus bskus pa shes par bya// bud shing

de las byung ba'i ma// sbyar nas dri chus gtor nas ni// pad+ma dkar po zhal 'dra dag/ pad+manor bu ril ba thogs// lag na dbyug pa mchog thogs pa// pad+ma dkar po'i ston steng 'dug da lta'iyaM lha bku gnas
kyang ngaacha blangs te dbul bar ba// dzems zla rgyas dkar po la// bzhugs pa'i 'grolan spyan drangs te// pad+ma dkar po shar phyogs su// bsams nas stong du gzhag par bya// de nas de ltar bsams nas
kyang bsgrub bya rtag tu mdun bzhag ste// de yi nyes pa dras nas ni// shin tu bsrings te sba bar bya/ nang par star ni gtsang 'gyur zhing// shin tu dri zhim lus byugs la// bdud ]
rtsi bzhin bsams sbyin sreg bya// dam tshig 'dzin 'da' bar dka'// lha rdzas bdud rtsi bro lnga 'di// dang por mi lta brtag byas la// khro bo de ni de lus su// spyan drangasanas na bzhugs par bsams//
byA donas dang po khro bo la// bsrag bya lan gsum dbul bar bya// de nas dkon mchog gsum la gsum// de nas ma lta nyid la gsum// de nas rdo rjesams dpal// de nas lha rnams rare la// nga nas
bgegs la sogs la dbul// du yid 'ong ba'i lha yang rung// de nas dang po khro bo yi// sngags kyis yas shing sbyin par bya// de nas gcig tu bsregs nas kyang// bdud rtsi sngags kyis btab nas
lhani de bzhin sbyin sreg byas 'og tu// brgya stosnyad dam yang na ni// brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du ni// khro bo nyid la dbul bar bya// de yang lus la dbang bskur zhing// mnyam par bzhag pas bsud
nas ni// mjug tu mngon par mchod nas ni// lha rnams thams cad gashogs par gsol// 'dis ni zhi ba'i las rnams kyang// 'grub 'gyur 'di la tha tshom med// ci ste dan sdig can nam// gal
te mnyam par m bzhag pas// de tshe dngos grub ma gyuran// stong pa nyid du rnam bsgoms la// de nas de bzhin byas nas ni// gdonami za bar dngos grub 'gyur// zhi ba'i las so//
ldan pa'i nags tshal lam// yang na nags sam rgyal po 'am// rgyal rigs khyim du rgyas pa ni// dga' ba'i gnas kyis bya ba ste// khru do ya ngan zu bzhi pa'i m// de ltar mchog ni khru brgyud de// nu
mchog bar ma rnams las gcig/ rgyas pa'i las ni bya ba yin// mdor na hom khung bu bani// stegs bu brtsegs te dkyil 'khor ni// chung dul na khru brgyad de// bar ma la ni bcu gnyis nyid// mchog 'a/

bcu drug ya dmani// nyi shu rtsa bzhir shes par bya// mu khyud sor brgyad bcu drug gam// sum cu gnyis su bya ba yin// phyi yi 'khor lo de yi phyed// pad+ma rnams kyis brgyan par bya// dkyil 'khor dbus su

rin chen dang// pad+ma sna tshogs brgyan par bya// de yi dbus su bdo ba ni// legs par bltas te phyad kyi// khru bzhi pa 'am khru brgyad pa// yang na dpal bskyod pad+ma 'dra// mdor na 'jib sar ngo yi//
de bzhin khyung mchog brkos nas ni/ gur kum la sogs bskus nas kyang// de yi dbus su bris nas ni// tshon mchog ser pos bskus nas kyang// gser 'od 'dra bar bsgom par bya// de nas tshonani
dmar ser gyis// rin chen pad+ma la sogs pa'i// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'khor yug tu// gnas pa nyid du bri bar bya// rim gnyis yang n rim bzhi 'am// yang na rim pa brgyad ldan par// der ni sgo nga
de dag zhing/ phyag rgya'i gzugs su brtag par bya// bum pa 'a dog gser 'dra zhing dri chus rab tu bkang ba la// rab tu mdzes brgyud bcu gnyis sam// sum sku gnyis sam bcu drug ste// dkri ba'i
su babaskya tshal ba//panasor po la// kha rgyan yal ga me tog can// dri zhim ma tog bdug pa dang// 'phrangab mar me rgyan rnams dang// rgyal mtshan 'phan la sogs pa dang// bla re gdugs rnams ser
pos brgyan// bdag nyid gos dang rgyan rnams dang// me tog la sogs ser pos brgyun/ byang phyogs kha bltas 'dug nas ni// 'jig rten gsum 'dul khro bo yi// nyid kyi rnal 'byor rjes dran

zhing/ lha yi yid bzhin nor rgyal mtshan// khatsam gsar gyi 'od dang 'dra// de bzhin nyi zla ku be ra// gnod sbyin dang ni dzam+b+ha la// gser gyi man ni rab 'babs shing// yid kyi 'dod pa skong mdzad la//

mdor na de yi 'od war gyis// nges par dbang ni bskur bar bsam// de nas rgyal srid 'thob 'gyur na// lus rgyas pa lta smos ci gog/ rgyas par bya phyir de minas// smyos te brgya phrag brgya rtsa brgyad// yang

nadabashin stong phragan// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya// de nas sbyin mag rab bya ste// khyad phyogs su nis nga ga yi// gdan gyi steng na rin chen dang// pad+ma nyi zla gdan stongs na// rdo rje ni chen rinache mchog/

rin chen dpal dang gzi brjid mchog// rdo rdzo bzhi d dang rgyal ba yang// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan nas nii// phyag na mchog sbyin gzhol ba dang// rin chen char yang 'bebs brtson zhing// 'od zer gor 'phro
thams cad kyis// de la shin tu khyab byed bsam// dung dang pa wang cang te'u dang// sil snyan glu dang gar mchog gis// mdor na mchod pa byas nas ni// de yi 'og tulas brtsam mo// khung bu'i khyad

[ri]/ par nyid las kyang// yum shing khyod shing khyad par dbye// mdzub gang khu tshur bcangs khru gang// chud du nyid du bshad pa yin// bar ma khru dor shes par bya// khru bzhi pa ni mchog yin te// ma tog
'bras bur bcas rigs kyi// ya tog ma tog sbrang rtsir gzhug/ 'bru rnams thams cad 'byor pa dang// me tog 'bras bu ser por ldan// mar dang sbrang rtsibasros nas ni// thal mor dpal gyi 'bras
bur ldan me lha gser dang 'dra ba la// phyag bzhi pa ste 'dir de bzhin// pad+ma gdan bzhugs rnam brgyan pa// spyan drangs bsreg bu sbyin sreg bya// de yi lus su khro rgyal po// byin can legs par bcug
nas ni// sngon bzhin dran byed de nal du// sbyin srog yongs su brtag bya sta// 'bum mam nyis 'bum tsam gyis kyang// don ni nges par rab tu 'grub// 'bum phrag brgyas ni rgyal srid dam// longs spyod
phun sum tshogs pa 'grub// de nas mjug tu 'od zer gyis// de la dbang bskur bsrung bar bya// de nas de ni rgyal 'gyur te// phyag na rdo rje'i bka' bzhin no// rgyas pa'i las so// dbang
ni chags pa'i sems kyis kyang// chags pa 'i ting nga 'dzin gyi bya// chags pa bcom ldan rdo rje can// rdo rje chags pa de las byung// khams gsum chags par byed pa'i phyir// pad+ma sems dpa' rtag tu
chags de bas 'dis ni de dag ni// las grub pa na bshad pa yin// chags dang mthun pa'i sa phyogs sam// chags par byed pa'i khyim du shes// btso blag can nam zla mtshan can dag gi/ khyim du
shu@#// chags pa'i las rnams bya ba yin// rdo[Z]chags pa'i gnas kyang rung// phyag na pad+ma'i gnas nyid du// rtag tu rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas// bde chen gyi ni gnas chen dang/
pad+ma ut+pal jid bu dang// ban du ka yi me tog gnas// me tog 'bras bu dmar tshal ni// yid 'o se las ni chags byed pa// der ni stegs bu khru brgyad dam// de ltar bcu gnyis bcu drug rnams//
byas nas de yi dbus su yang// hom khung dkyil 'khor bya ba ni// khru gang yang na khru do 'am// de ltar khrun bzhi par bya// gzhu 'dra ba 'am pad+mo'am// yang na rdo rje 'dra bar bya// mnga' 'dra

zla ba kham 'dra dang// de ltar pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra// yod du mchu yi byed kyi tshad// zhing gi phyed kyi tshad tsam du// hom khung thabu su bgo bar bya// mu khyud songan bzhi par bya// nyis 'gyur ba ni nyis

'gyur bya// tha ma mchog gi khyad par las// yam shing so sor nges par bya// yang na yum shing srog shing na// tshad ni zhi ba'i las su gsungs// shin tu dmar ba'i tsan dan nam// yang na shing dmar gzhan/
yang rung / me tog 'a bus bu dmar po 'am// btsag dang tsan dan rgya skyegs sogs// le brgan rtsi dang gur kum gyis// mdoran bud pa'i shing dang mi/ yam shing la yang bsus nas nI/ yungs kar kho

cadog dmar po dang// btsog gam mtshal ya nga de bzhin du// khas kyi phyi dang yul kar du// skye tsho'abru dang rinatsA dang// til dang dri zhim thig le'i 'bru// la phug yungs rdog de bzhin ste// khrag dang
rdul ni chen po rnams// bsreg bya phyir na bsdus nus kyang// sngar bshad 'bras bu la sogs pa'i// khu bas yang dang yang bskus nas// khro bo'i sngags kyis byin brlabs te// ba ded na las bzhes pa yi//
bshigasam thag pa'i mar gsar dang/ mar dang til mar rnams kyis dgang// ga pur la sogs bsgos nas kyang// bdud rtsis btab ste gzhag par bya// de nas hom khung dmar po la// byu ru'i sdong po
'dra bar yang// bsamasanas spos dmar la sogs dang// gur kum dmar pos byugs par bya// de nas kha dog dmar po yis// stag po nyid du bskur bar bya// gur kum ser pos bsreg pa yi// tshon

gyi ri mo bri ba ni// hom khung nang du pad+ma bri// de yi steng du mda' bcas gzhu// rtag tu hom khung khor yug tu// pad+ma nyid ni bri bar bya// gzhu yi dbus su rdo rje nyid// khor yug tu namada' nyid bri// gzhu ya phyi

rol pad+ma nyid// bris nas de yi steng du mda'// de yi phyi rol rdo rje dang/ lcags kyu mdar bcas gzhu bris la/lho phyogs rgyal mtshan rin chen dang// gzi brjid dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// pad+ma ral gri 'khor lo
rnams nub phyogs nyid du bri bar bya// rdo rjes ba go cha mchog/ byang phyogs su ni bri khabya// grwa rnams su ni sos la sogs// phyag rgyas gzugs su khri bya zhing// me tog dmar po la sogs pas//
shin tu snga ma bzhin mchod de/ dpal lan gos dang 'phreng ba dang// dmar po'i drin bskus nas kyang// rtag tu thub pa nub ltas la// dmar thag ma chad las bya ste// pad+ma dmar po'agadan bsams la//
rab chags phyaganapad+ma bsnams//g.yon du rdo rje chags pa la// g.yas su bde ba chen po ste// bsams na de yi dbus su ni// chu srin rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa gzhag/ rdo rje gzhu dang g.yon
[Or ]'gying ma// ma tog dmar rgyanarab mdzes ma// dri dmar la sogs rab mchod de// mda' dang gzhu thags de bzhin du/ pad+madamarapo dbyig bsnams pa'i// ma yi lhan bkug nas kyang/ dadi yi lus su
kho rgyal po// legs par bcug ste gzhag par bya// 'od zer chags pas bsgyuranas ni// de lus rdo rje lcags kyudang// zhags pa bcings pa sa bkug nas ni// spyi bo zhabs kyi drung du gzhag/ de ltar
bsams te snyoms zhugs pas// las byas pa ni gang yin pa// des na lha yang dbang 'gyur na// mi dang lha min smos ci dgos// las rnams zin par gyur pa dang// chags pa'i sems su byas nas ni// de yi

'od thor spyi bor dgang// dan bsus nas gtang ba bya// de nas rdodza 'dod pa yi// lha rnams mchod de gshegs par gsol// de nas bsrung ba byas nas ni// rdordzogs 'dod pa sa stag tu bzlas// dbang gi 'a sa so//
de nas brgyabyin tsha sogs lha// phyag 'tshal yang dang yang du ni// rin chen gdugs la sogs mdog gi/ mchod pa sna tshogs byas nas spyad// phyag nado rgyal can la// dga' ba'i bsam pas bstod

byed pas rgyas kun ba sa sngar sangs rgyas/ mi shes dris kun com pa// rdordo rje 'dzin rgyal po// rdo rje do rdo rje 'dzin/ de'i sku ste sku tshel// phyag na rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod// rdorje yan lag rdo rje'i mchog/

dordzo'abad ba chen 'bar ba// rdo rji shugs te shugs che ba// rdo rje mtshonacha mtshon chod/ phyaganardo rje phug chen po// rdo rje mda' ste rab 'bigs ba// rdo dzonon ngo sne ba che// che ba'i che ba rgya mtsho che// rdo rdzopad+ma

byang chub che// khyadachub sangs rgyas rab byung ba/ rdo rje rgyachodaNa chen te// rdo rjesgyu ma rnam sbyong ba// rdo rje rgyu ste gnod sbyin che// rdorjod pad+ma rnam sbyong ba// rdo rje khro bo drag po che// rdo rje dgra sdang 'dogs pa'i gtso//

ro sudab thung ba che// rdo rje lcags kyu don yod byed// rdo rje rolas ro langs che/ rdo rje sa na po za ba po// rdo rjeganod sbyin gnon sbyin tshe// rdo rje gdon te gdonami'i mchog/ 'jigs byed dga' byedu drag po
pa rdo rje 'jigs byang sngags byed pa// sgrub dka' sgrub pa legs pa ste// rdo rje legs pa dgyes mdzad pa// rdo rje dga' ba dga' ba che// dga' ba'i rdo rje dbangabyed pa// rdo rje gzi brjed gzi brjid
chi 'bar 'od gshin mthar byed pa// rdo drag po drag po tsho// 'od stag pas na snyag pa che/ nam mkha' dang ni gnyab pa'o/ re ba thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa// rdo rje dbang bsgyur rin chen mchog rdzogs
rgyalamtshan yon tan mchog/ rdoNAyashas yod shas che// rig pa byeba'i tshigs kyis mchod// ha la ha la nag po che// dgra che zhan 'joms pa can// rdorje 'dod pa 'dod pa tshe/ rtogs pa'i dus ngan

sbyong ba skad cigagayo ba'i the tshom gcod// glog khazhin zhal gyi ljags las 'phro// rdo rje me sta drag po 'i zhal// drag po rab snang snang mdzad pa// nyi ma stong gis gdungs pa'i zhal// spyan dmar 'jigs par mdzad
ba po khro bo dum 'od bzhin 'phro// phyag rnams du ma mtshon chab skya// du ma'i zhal la sku yang stong// 'khyil cing rgyan yang 'khyil ba la// sa mas kyi chos pas sku tshe mngal/
rnam par rtog pa ma lus sbyangs// ma rig 'joms pa'i tshangs pa ste// 'dod chags zhe sdang dri mthar mdzad// sgyu ma gtogs 'dod rdo rjecan/ dartsa gsum rtsa gsu ma 'chang 'phrog pa// 'dod chag

ts+tshA zhe sdang gti mug che// srid dang srid mina rnam sbyong ba// zhi zhing dul la dga' ba ste// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas rab rtogs pa// sangs rgyas bdag nyid sangs rgyas sku// rdo rje rab skyes rdo rje sems//
kun tu bzang po cher bzang ba/ mtshan rnams dam pas rnam par brgyan// khams gsum bdag nyid khyab pa po// thams cad rdo rje bdag nyid gtsang/ dgang ga 'di bris pak+Shegs gyur tam// rtag tu de don
'chad byed dam// dran nam nyan par byed kyang rung// phyagan rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa la sogs pa lha dang/ mi dang/
lha ma yin dang/ dri za dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rang ngo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ya nga dag par rdzog
pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa phyogs gcig pa rdzogs so///rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAn ting gats+tsudang/ bod kyi lo
[c tsa ba ban d+he dza ya rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus/ a tsAr+ya rin chen mchog gis skad gsar bcad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa//da/ @#// rgya gar skad du/

sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+han te dzo rA dzomya thA ga tasu a cha te sa mug saM ban+ta s+ya kal ka da sha nA ma/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams
cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa phyogs gcig pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal shAkya seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan
'das lha thams cad kyi mchog dga' ba'i tshal na bzhugs te/ nor bu dang gsar gyi shing lo ma dang/ yal ga dang/ lcag mar bcas pa'i sdong po dang/ shing gel ba dang/ sman dang/ ma rtogaka ma la dang

ma tog ut+pal dang/ ma tog kar ni ka dang// lo tog ba ku la dang/ me tog ti la ka dang/ me tog a sho ka dang/ me tog man dru ra ba dang/ ma tog man dar ba chen po la sogs pa me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pas nye bar mdzes pa

dpag bsam gyi shing rnams kyis yang dag par brgyan pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis rnam par spras pa/ bya'i tshogs sna tshogs skad snyan pa 'byin pa/ rnga dang/ ja mu kun da dang/ gling bu dang/ rnga b+hi ra
la sogs pa'i sgra sgrog pa/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa dang/ lha'i bu rnam pa sna tshogs ba rnams rnam par rtsa ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sams dpa' thams cad kyis kun gyis brlabs
[z]// pa na'o brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha thams cad dang/ rig pa 'dzin pa dang/ lha'i bu mo 'khor bye ba khrag khrig brgyastong phrag brgya stong rnams dang/ gnod sbyin/
la dang = srin po dang/ lha ma yin dang// nam mkha' lding dang/ dri za dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ klu la sogs pa 'khor rnam pa sna tshogs du ma dang/ byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad rnams la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po blo gros spobs pa dang/ blo gros mi g.yo ba dang// blo gros yangs pa dang/

kun tu blo gros dang/ blo gros mtha' yas pa dang/ kun nas legs pa'i blo gros dang/ blo gros ka ga la dang/ blo gros chen po dang/ blo gros lha rdzas dang/ blo gros sna tshogs ba dang/ blo gros ma lus/
pa dang/ kun tu bzang po/ de dag la sogs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge 'dunamatha' yas shing mu med pa rnams kyis bsta stang du byas/ bla mar byas//

mchod cing rjed par bus/ shin tu phul du byung bar byas te/ bakhor gyi tshogs chen po'i dbus su tshapa chen po 'i pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs shid ngan song thams cad yodas su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs so// de ma thag nyid du ngan song gsum gyi rgyud rnam par grol bar byed pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'od zer 'phro ba dang sdud pa du ma'i 'phreng ba rang gi mdzod spu nas phyung ste/
des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu snang bar byas so// kun tu snang bar byas pa des sems can yums cad kyi sams nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba las bkrol te/ yod dag pa no ste so

sor thob pa thob par byas shing dga' ba'i tshal yang kun tu snang bar byas te/ mchod pa'i sprin sna tshogs pa rnams kyis mngon pa'i machod nas lan brgya phrag stod du bskor ba byas te mgo bos phyag 'tshal
nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ran sngar nor bu dri ma med pa'i stang du 'khod de 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma'o sangs rgyas e ma ho sa ngas rgyas chos// e ma ho ste ngas rgyas mdzad pa shin tu 'a gas
gad phyi'i bdag cag ngan song yo ngas su sbyangs// byang chub spyod pa nyid la rab tu bzhag/ de nas lha'i dbang pos bcom ldan 'das 'a 2na brgya phrag stong du bskor ba byas te phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom
ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du sangs rgyas kyi 'od sbar kun tu snang bas ngan song kun las rnam par bkrol nas rnam par grol ba'i lam la rab tu bzhag pa na
bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar che'o/ bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar che'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po 'don ngo mtshar mi ches/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam sa ni
tshad med pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs rnams legs par bsags pa'o// lha'i dbang po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni dpag tu med pa'i yon tan rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa 'o/
dalha'i dbang po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni tshad med pa'i thabs yongs su rdzogs pa'o// lha'i dbang po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni shes rab dang gtumed pa'o//

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyod patshad meng ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan rnams kyis gdul bya'i skya bo tshad med pa rnams snod du gyur par mdzad pa'o// sos rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams na memanyam pa
dang mnyam pa'i ye shes gang yin pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ma mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang yang dag par ldan pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mnyam pa

dang mnyam pa'i smon lam dang yang dag par ldan pa'o// lha'i dbang po de'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis snod ji lta ba de ltar sems can gyi don mdzad pa dang/ gdul bya ji lta ba de ltar sems
can rnams kyi don mdzad pa dang/ mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa yin no zhes shes par bya ba 'di la 'dir the tshom dang/ som nyi dang/ yid gnyidami bya'o// gang de bzhin
gshegs pa rnams kyis 'dul bar mi 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas ma yin no// de nas lha'i dbang po rang gi stan las langs nas/ slar yang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa rgya che zhing cheb byas te phyag 'tshal nas/

bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// be mas can thams cad la phan pa bya ba'i phyir dang/ rjes su brtsi bar bya ba'i phyir dang/ snying rje dang bcas par bya ba'iphyir dang/ brtse ba chen po dang bcas
par bya ba'i phyir dang/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das bdag spobs pa skyed du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bdag stobs pa skyed du gsol/ bcom
ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i rigs 'di nas lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bgyi ba zhig shi 'phos shing dus las 'das nas dgung bdun lon lags na/ bcom ldan 'dras de gang du
skyes shing/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal gang myong bar 'gyur ba de/ bcom ldan 'das lung bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa 'u nga bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa lha'i dbang po de'i dus dang skabs su bab par shes na nyon cika lha'i dbang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni dus lags so/ bde bar gshegs pa 'di ni skabs su
bab pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba de 'di nas shi 'phos nas mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen
por skyes te/ rer le stong phrag bcu gnyis su sdug bsngal drag cing mi bzod pa myong bar 'gyur ro// yang dmyal ba chung ngu rnams su lo stong phrag bcur sdug sngal myong bar 'gyur ro// slar yang
byol song dang yi dgas rnams su skyes te lo stong phrag bcur sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro// slar yang mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo'i gnas su skyes nas 'on pa dang/ rig pa dang/ stugs pa'i
[n ]@#// rang bzhin can rnams su lo stong phrag drug cu myong bar 'gyur ro// sa ra yang lo stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i nad rnag khrag 'dzag pa dang/ mdzad ng phol mig gis gzir ba dang/ skya bo

yi mang pos sbyang pa dang/ yongs kyis sbyangs pa dang/ rigs dman pa 'gyur yid phyug bsngal s thabs rtsa brgyad pa rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur te/ gzhan rnams la'ang gnod pa byed cing las kyi sgrib pa sna tshogs
pa'i ng rgyan 'chad par byed par 'gyur ro// slar yang sdug bsngal brgyud pa gzhan dang gzhan myong bar 'gyur ro// de nas brgya byin la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams de thos nas sngangs shing skrag ste
skyo nas kho ba tu 'gyel to// yang langs nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal rgyud ma de 'das ji ltar thar par 'gyur/ bde bar gshegs pa ji ltar thar par 'gyur
bcom ldan 'das thabs gang gis sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po de las gro' bar 'gyur ba des yongs su skyobs mdzod/ bde bar gshegs pa yongs su skyobs mdzod/ bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis bshad pa 'di ngas kyang bshad kyis nyon cig/ de nas lha'i dbang pos slar yang bcom ldan 'das 'a ma tog man da ra ba dang/

[& ]]man dar ba chen po dang/ me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang/ phyag gdub dang/ dpung rgyan dang/ snyan rgyan dang/ do shal dang/ do la phyud pa la sogs pa rgyan gyi khyad par du
mas mngon par mchod de/ lan brgya stong phrag du mar bskor ba byas shing phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das legs so// bde bar gshegs pa legs so zhes bya ba 'a gas so li tshug gis
mnyas par byas nas bcom ldan 'das lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la phan pa dang bde bar bgyi ba dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams ngan song gsum gyi rgyud las rnam par thar par bgyi ba'i
slad du legs par bshad pa'i don du gsol ba 'debs lags so// de nas slar tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha'i tshogs rnams kyis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das legs so//
bde bar gshegs pa legs so// gang gis ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyis mtshan tsam yang thos pa dang ldan n ngan song gsum gyi lam las rnam par grol zhing mtho ris lha'i 'jig rten nas//
mi'i 'ag rten du skyes nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bgyi ba'i slad du bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lta'i

bu de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'dis byin gyis brlab pa'i don du don yod rdo rje'i byin rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// oM badzra a d+han dz+hAn sa ma
ye hU~M/ de ltar ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas zil gyis mi non pa rdo rje'i byin rlabs kyi byin gyis brlabs nas/ ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de bzhin gsheg
pa'i snying po 'di phyung ngo// e sho d+ha na go d+ha nas rba pA paM bi gots+tshan shur tre sarba karma A ba ra Na bi shud+d+hig/ rig pa 'di gsungs ma thaganyid du sems can thams cad ngan song du me

oM sarba bid sawaa pA ya bo sho d+han dzA na a lo ka kA ri pra Ni d+hi pAr mi tA pU dza hU~MphaT/ mar ma ma'i sngags so// oM sarba bid sarba oM pA ya gan d+ha bi nA sha ni/ badzra gon rgyu u pA ya pA ra mi tA pU dza

baidA sarba a pa ya bats+tshAn mo tsha ni hUM thaM phaT/ rdo rje lcags sgrog gi sngags so/// oM sarba bdu sa chu a pA ya ga ti ga han bi sho d+han hUM ho phaT/ rdo rje'ababs pa'i sngags so// oM ma rdo ya ha ra Na mAhA/ byams

pa'i 'o// oM a mo g+ha a mo g+ha darasha nI hU~M/ mthong ba don yod kyi'o// oM sarba a pA ya dza ha sarba a pA ya ba sho d+ha na b+haM/ ngan song kun 'dren gyi'o// oM sarba sho ka ta mo nir g+ha ta na ma ti hU~M/ mya ngan dang mun

rgyu dra pu leswAhA/ badzangaskyong gi'o// oM dzA li mthAdza le nihU~M/ drab can gyi 'od kyi'o// oM badzra ga hU~M/ rdo rje snying po'i lo// oM a kA ye lu phu/ a kA ya karma A ba ra Nabi sho d+hani sany+tsa/ blo gros mi zad

pa'i 'o// oM pra ti b+hAn pra te lha na ku ce sAhA/ spobs pa bcags pa'i 'o// oM sa man b+ha dri hU~M/ kun tu bzang po'i 'o// bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub 'o mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sngags 'di dag rim pa

! bzhin du brjod do// 'di dag gis rgyud du ji skad gsungs pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i cho ga'i rim pas nyin re zhing snga ba'i dus su bskyod pa'i rim pa sgom bzhin pas lha'i rnal 'byor ting nge 'dzin gsum mchog 'bad
pas bsgoms te/ na so du yos su sbyong ba grub par 'gyur ro// lha'i dbang po gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i gsang ba'i snying po 'di
rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'amo/ gang 'ga' zhig ming tsam nyan pa dang/ 'chad pa dang/ klog pa dang/ bris nas kyang mge 'am/ gtsug phud dam/ dpung pa 'am/ mgul par btags te

'chang bar byeng na/ de'i tsha 'di nyid la dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad dang/ 'chib dang 'bral ba'i rmi 'a ma 'byung ba'am/ danaso ba dang 'bral ba'i mtshan ma de dag thams cad rmilam tsam du'ang mi 'byung po gong

'ga' zhig dkyil 'khor du'ang ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs nas dbang bskur te/ snying po 'dra zlos shing sngags kyi ded sgom par byang na lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de dag lasdig pa gang nyung zad kyang nye bar mi 'gyur zhing na
bod du 'gro ngar mi 'gyur ro// skyes pa dang/ bungamad dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod spyin dang/ srin ngo dang/ byol so da dang/ yi dgas dang/ dmyal ba la sogs pa gang yang rung ba shiba'i lus

rnams dkyil 'khor du bcug ste dbang bskur na/ ri nganu la bar skyes na'ang dem thag nyid du rnam par thar nas lha'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro// lha'i rigs der smos par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi chos nying mngon sum du byed cing phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro// rgyur nges pa can du'ang 'gyur zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su rab tu skyo bar 'gyur ro/ sgrib pa rnams rab tu pa a

nas de ngu zhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs sam/lha'i rigs gam/gzhan du'ang bde ba myong bar 'gyu'o// lha'i dbang po mdor na 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa 'i rngan pa dang bde ba thams cad myong bar gyur
ro/ nga nas lha'i dbang pos/ bcom ldan 'das la snga ma bzhin du bskor ba byas te/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das na mong thams cad kyi dbang du gyur pa rnams la phan pa dang

thubya// bang bar 'gyur ba dang/ ji ltar sems can rnams ngan song thams cad la rgyab kyis phyogs par bgyi ba dang/ bla nam mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bde blag tu rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/

kyi chos bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkyathub pas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i yi shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nasong

thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po gsungs te/ de mgon po shAkya thub pa nyid kyis gsungs pa ni/ dang po ra zhig rnal 'byor bas skyo bos dbon pa'i yid dang rdzog

su mthun pa'i sa phyogs su 'jal zhing shin tu 'bol ba'i stan la 'dug ste/ dri bzang pos maN+Dal byas nas nye bar spyod pa lnga'i mchod pa bya'o// de nas chos thams cad bdag med par bsgoms la/ bdag nyid mi

ge hUM gis rdordzo'abar ba ma nyi mar bsgoms te/ de'i mgrin par yi ge sbi las pad+madang/ de'i stang du 'dab ma'i rtse mor yi ge a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang/ de'i stang du yi ge hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang/ rdo rdzong skye la

thom par bya zhing badzra dzacu zhes bya'o// des rdo rje'i lcen 'gyur zhing sngags zlos pa nus par 'gyur ro/ lag pa gnyis kyi dbus su yi ge a dkar po las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang/ de'i stong du yi ge hUM

la sa rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang de gnyis lag pa'i mthil du thim par byas te/ rdo rje'i lag par 'gyur zhing phyag rgya 'ching bar nus par 'gyur ro// de nas srung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom par bya sto/ o grats+tshAbadzrasam

ya hUM khaM zhes brjod cing khri bo ti ran ti ri bcing bar byas/ ro rdzobasdams pa nang byas nas// mazengong rdo rje dam po yis// khro bes yid kyis dgab bya ba// khre ngo di rin du ri bcing// de nas rdo rje

pyad pa 'i gdan gyis 'dug pas rdo rje ti rin ti ri bcis la rdo rje'aphreng ba'i dbang bskur ba gzung bar bya ste/ oM badzra dz+wa la a na la acha hU~M a b+hi lcahU~M/ zhes pas so// rdo rje bsdams pa las

a na lAn hU~M/ zhes bya ba sgrog cing g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur snying khar bus te/ g.yas ba'i rdo rje khu tshur gsor shing bgags thams cad la bsnunano// de nas rdo ma'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas bgegs

rgya'o// de'i rjes la/ badran tut+tanad+d+hasarba big+haM/ zhes pa'i phyag rgya dang ldan pas bgags thams cad bcing bar bya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa bcings 'al ma thubengaganyis brkyang sku mnyapa la gadrung ba ni rdo rje
