lha yitshog sa' spyan drangs te// sngags shes pas sngags phyag rgya yis// aka la sogs phul nas gi/ mdor bsdus mchod par byas nas su/ lha yi sbyor bas rab gnas la// ga pur gur gum la sobu
bas// maradang gom til bsgos la// til dang nyungs kar 'brasa rnams dang// dri yi nus na legs bkang ste/ 'bras chan spos dang la du ba/ sbrang rtsingag ka rar ldan la// brgya phrag du mar yos
su bzlas// yam shing la yang de bzhin te// rang gi sngags kyis btab pa'i shing// khung bu'i nang du gzhag par bya// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin drung// dri zasogs su gnas pa yi// ro la sngags
kyis btabanas su// chu mchog gis ni bkrus nas ni// sngags bzlas dri yis byugs par bya// gos dang rgyan gyis brgyanabya zhing// sngags kyis btab pa'i bdug pas bdug/ ma tog 'phreng ba
la sogs mchog gtsug phud dpung par de bzhin du// sngags bris nas na gdags par bya// snying kha mgrin pa kha phyogs su/ sarba bid+yas byin gyis brlabs// dpral ba medzod spu nab gnyis//
mgo bo gtsug dpung pa gnyis// rna ba dgu dang pus mo bol// sna yi rtse mo long bu dang/ mig gnyis dang ni gsang ba yi// dbang po rnams kyi gnas dang ni// de ltar gzhan du'ang gnas yi ge/ mchog tu dge

kha de dag bzhag/ de dag ngan song yongs sbyang phyir// stan dang bcas te thab dbus gzhug/ de nas sngags pas sngags kyis ni// mngon par bsngags pa'i gos kyis g.yogs// de nas byin grwa yang dag rab myur
la me lce stong gis dkrigs shing 'bar ba'i lus// zla ba kun da bzhin du zhi ba'i yid// dpag mang kun la mchod yon yongs su brtag/ de bzhin ji ltar gsungs pa'i mchod pa bya// de nas dang po de yisbyin
srogani// rdzogs par byas shing 'bar ba nyid la ni// yongs brtags nas ni rgyal pa las// sogs pa rnams kyi brgyungan lhag pa dang// bsus pa'i brgyan yongs su brtag par bya// de nas sbyong ba'i
sngags kyi rgyal po yang// bgeg bya nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su brtag/ de nas zhal ras dkar po spyan drangs na// yopyad rnams ma mnod yon sogs gsum mchod// dzugan rdo rje pad+ma zhogs pa

bsnams// rgyun rnams thams cad kyis ni rang brgyan cing// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbu rgyanan// bsam par bya zhing yang na khri bar bya// de yi snying po brgya phrag stong la ni// rjesrid bya ba'i dbang
sbyin sreg bya// yang na mtshan ma yang dag byung na ni// de bzhin sdig rgyun spangs par shes par bya// de nas(tha' bar 'gyur brtse ga bzhin// ngo bsdu bas thal ba rus pa bsdu// rdo dza bdud rje ni/
drinu dang/ ba yi rnam lnga dang bcas la// sbyong ba'i sngags ni 'bum bzlas te// gong du byas nas ga pur drir// se ngang legs par bsres byas la// sku gzugs mchod rten lhar bsam zhing/
@#/// lan cig gnyis gsum bzhi lnga 'am/ yang na lan grang brgya rtsa brgyad// sngags dang phyag rgyas byin brlabs la// 'bum phrag gnyis ni bzlas par bya// de nas mchod/
rten 'bar gyur tam// yang na sku gzugs zhal 'dzum mam// drisos ngad ldang 'od snangangam/ lha la sogs pa sna tshogs pa// rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa dang// me tog la sogs 'dor ba/
rang Da dung dad rdza dang gling bu dang/ pi wang la sogs sgra thos 'gyur// gal te lha yi mtshar m de// sdig mang nyid kyis ma mthong ba// de tshe 'bum phrag brgya stong bzlas// ji srid mtshan ma
byung bar du// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod nas ni// mnyam par bzhag pas bzlas par bya// de mthar mo ga shes pa yis// mtshan gcig thog thag mi nyal bzus// de nas de yi sdig ba na/
rnam dag bdag nyid nges par mthong// lci yi lus kyi gzugs dang ni// de yi rgyud du ngo shes 'gyur// mtshan ma 'di dag shes nas su// rnam par mi rtog sems kyis ni/ byams dang snying rje ldan

pa yis// las rnams thams cad rab tu bya// gal te de yang meng rgyuran// de tshe bzlas bsgom tshul gyi bya// de yi ming tsam bris nas su// mchod rten 'phreng ba bya ba dang// sku gzugs kyang na byas nas

! su// rtsin srog dbang bskur byas gyur na// gdon mi za bar de 'gror skye// thal ba nyungakar bye ma sogs// ming spel sngags ni mngon btang nas// rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i muklung dor// de ltar byas na sdig pa
ca/ yin yang ngan song rnams las ni// rnam par thar par gyur nas kyang// dge ba mchog gi sa bon ni// bskyed dang ldan pas sangs rgyas nyid// 'bras bur ya nga dag ldan pa yi// sbyin pa tshul khrigs
bzod pa dang// brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab rgyu// rab tu bsgoms pa'i bsod nams ldan// 'jig rten na song bcom pa ni// 'di ltar lta yang ci zhig smos// 'di la the tshom med pa yin

gang yang dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyud pa dang/ gang yang med pa'i lta ba can dang/ gang byanub kyi lam las rnam par 'das pas bstan pa la zhe sdang gis gnod pa byed pa dang/ sdig pa'i rang nga zhin mi shes
pa pha dang ma la sems mi brtsi ba dang/ byang chub kyi sems la mi brten pa dang/ 'dod chags dang bral ba bsad pa dang/ lha dang/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun dang/ sngags
dang/ phyag rgyu'i tshogs la sogs pa rnams la med pa nyid du lta ba la sogs pa'i sdig pa can rnams la de lta bu'i shes rab can dang thabs mang na grol ba med do zhes pa/ bde bar gshegs pa rgyal ba
rnams kyis gsungs so// de nas brgyabyin la sogs pa sman pad+ma rgyas pa rnams legs so zhes bya bas mnyes par mdzad do// mnyes par mdzad nas mchod pa mdzad do// brgya byin gzhan la
phan par brtson pas kyang ji ltar bka' stsal pa bzhin du byas so// 'bras bu de bzhin du thob par gyur to// dbang ldan du mgrin pa sngon po gang khyu mchog la zhon pa/ sku mdog dkar po phyag bzhi
dpa= g.yas pa'i dang po gnyis pa rdo rje rtsa gsum pa dang mchog sbyin du bcas pa/ g.yon pa'i gcig gis rtse gsum pa 'dzin cing gnyis pas ral gri 'dzin pa/ sbrul gyi
mchod phyir thogs pa can bris te/ o pa shupa ti nI lak+kaNA u ma bri ya swA hA/ zhes pa 'dis so// de nas phyagargya 'di yin te/ lag pa rdo rje khu tshur byas la mthe'u chung mthe bong gis mnan
tasor mo lhag ma rnams rdo rje'i mtshan nyid du byas shing mi nga med dang mdzub mo'i nga ro'i rnam par cung zad mdud par bya'o// 'dini phyugs bdag gi phagargya'o// khyab 'jug ltung la zhon pa/
mdog nag po phyag bzhi pa/ phyag g.yas pa dag na dbyug to dang rdo rje'adzin cing/ g.yon pa dag ni dung dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o// gsar gyi rdordzum khyab 'jug lta bu gser gyi mdog can du

shes par bya'o// rdo rje dril bu rma bu la zhon pa zhal drug pa dmar po g.yas pa dag nashag ti dang rdo rje/ g.yon pa dag na khyim bya dang dril bu 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje gzhon num rdo rje dril bu lta bu/
shes par bya'o// mi smra ba rdo rdzongang pa la zhon pa/ gsor mdog can zhal bzhi pa phyag bzhi pa/ phyag g.yas pa dag na rdo rje dang bgrang 'phreng 'dzin cung/ g.yon pa dag na dbyug to dang spyi
blugs 'dzin pa'o/ rordzazhi ba ma tshangs pa lta burashes par bya'o// rdo rje mtshon chaglang po che dkar po la zhen pa/ phyag g.yon pas rang gi rdo rje'adzan ring/ g.yas pas 'jig rten las
'dus pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa'i// rdo rje khu tshur ma rdo rje mtshon cha ltar shes par bya'o// rdo rdzo'akhyil ba khro bo'ang shing rta la zhen pa/ mdog dmar po/ g.yas pa dang g.yon pa na pad+ma dang
nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje bdud rtsi ma ni ji rdza'akhyil pa khro bo lta bu nyid de// rdo rje 'od zer khro bo dkar po pa la zhon pa/ g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin cing g.yon pas pad+ma dang
zla ba 'dzin pa 'o// rdo rje 'od zeram rdo rje khro khe lta bu 'o// rdo rje dbyug pa khro bo rus sbal la zhon pa/ mdog sngon po/ phyag g.yas na rdo rje'adzin cing/ g.yonapas dbyug pa 'dzin pa'o//

rdo rje mchog ma rdo rje dbyug pa khro bo lta bu 'o// rdo dmar sar khro be glang po che la zhon pa/ mdog dmar po/ phyag g.yas na rdo rje'adzin cing/ g.yon pas mi bzung nas za zhing gnas pa'o// rdo rje sku
rags ma rdo rdzongamasor khro bo lta bu 'o// rdo rje tshogs bdag glang sna glang po che zhen pa can/ phyag g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin cing/ g.yon pas gshol 'dzin cing gnas pa/ mdog dkar po'o//

rdo rje 'dul bu ma rdo rje gungasna lta bu 'o// 'di ni khyad par te/ gang zhe na/ phyag g.yon gyis kha twaM ga 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje 'phrang ba tshogs kyi bdag po mdog ljang khu/ bya ku li ka'i shing rta zhon pa/

phyag g.yas kyis rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yonapas me tog gi 'phrang ba 'dzin pa'o// rdo rjegadanam rdo rje'aphrang ba lta bu 'o// 'di ni khyad par te/ gang zhe na/ phyag g.yon gyis shag tu 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje
dang nga can ne tso'i shing rta non pa// mdog dkar ser/ phyag g.yas pas rdo rje'adzin pa/ g.yon pas chu srin gyi rgyal ma tshan bsnams pa'o// rdo dang sunam rdo rje dbang can lta bu
'di ni khyad par ro// gangazhen/ mdog dmar po'o// rnam rgyal rdo tshugs kyi bdag re gal pa zhon pa/ mdog dkar po'o// phyag g.yas na rdo rje'adzinapa/ g.yon pas ral gri 'dzin pa'o/

rdo rje gdengs pam rnam rgyal rdo rje lta bu 'o// rdo rdzogatun shing po lha rje me tog gi shing rta'i khanga'u zhon pa/ mdog dkar ser/ phyag g.yas pas rdo rje'adzin pa/ g.yon nga sa gtun shing 'dzan palo

rdordzogatun shing pho nya mo rordzogatun shing lta bu ste/ 'di ni khyad par ro// gang zhe na/ g.yon gyis kha TaM ga 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje rlung gi pho namadog sngon po ri dgasazhon pa/ phyag g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin
pa g.yon pas rar 'dzin pa'o// mgyogs pa'i rdo rjes rdo rje rlung gi pho nya lta bu 'o// rdo ma'i pho mo ra sa zhon pa/ mdog dmar po gyen du 'bar ba'i 'od rtse gsum pa 'bar ba'i phyag g.yas
pa dag na rdo rjadang go cha'adzin// g.yon pa dag na dbyug pa dang sbyibags 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje 'bar ba ma rdo rje ma lta bu 'o// rdo rje 'jigs byed pho nya ston po'o las zhon pa/ phyag g.yas
pas rdo rdzo'adzinapa/ g.yon pas rtse gsum 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje gtsigs pa pho nya mo ro= 'jigs byed lta bu ste// 'don khyad par ro// gang zhen g.yon pas zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// ngo rje
[d ]lcags kyu bran klu lhag pa la zhon pa/ sngon po phag gi gdong pa can/ g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o// jo rdzonag po bran mo ro langs kyi zhon pa can/ phyag g.yon/
gyis 'a 'og 'dzin pa/ phyag g.yas kyis rdo rje 'dzin pa mdog nag mo rdo rje log 'dren phran dra ba byi ba zhon pa mdog dkar po glang po che'i gdong pa can/ phyag g.yas dag na rdo rje dang dgra
sta 'dzin pa/ g.yon dag na rtsa gsum dang dbyug pa 'dzin pa// sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa'o// rdo rje sprul mo bran mo mdog sngon mo/ g.yas na rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa phyags ma
'dzin nga/ bra 'a byi ba zhen pa'o// klu rdo rje'i chusrin la zhonapa/ gdengs ka brgyad pa mdog dkar po/ g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa// g.yon pas sku'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje/
chusrinam bran mo chu srin la zhon pa/ mdog dkar mo/ gdengs ka brgyad ga/ g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa// g.yon pas rdo rjes mtshan pa'i chu srin 'dzin pa'o// 'jigs mdog ma ljang
lu g.yas pas rdo rje'adzin cing/ g.yon pas ral gri phe Ta ka 'dzin pa 'o// dpal mo mdog dkar ser/ g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin cing/ g.yon pas pad+ma 'dzin pa'o// dbyangs can
ma ma dog dkar mo/ phyag g.yon pas cha dang/ g.yas pas rdo rje ma'o// bgrod dka' mdog ljang khuseng+ge la zhon pa// phyag g.yas pa dag na rdo rje dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa// g.yon pa ngag
na lde chen dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o// mamo thams cad dang/ drag po 'al sogs pa dang/ chu bdag gi mthar thug pa rnams kyi dang/ gong phyag g.yas su rdo rje gsungs ba des rdo rje
rtse gsum par shes par bya'o// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha thams cad rnam par snang mdzad la mngon du bltas pa 'o// de nas mthun mtshams kyi dus su rdo rje te rinatis

dag par bacings te/ me tog sngon po'i 'phreng ba bzung la dkyil 'khor du 'jug go/ yi ge hU~M bzhi pa brjod cing jo dza rnam par snang mdzad la bskor ba bdun dang/ dung dang dril bu'i sgra bsgrag par bya'o/

dkyil 'kher thams cad kyi yang lhag pa dang nang pa'i nyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i nges par bltas te 'phrang ba bcom ldan 'das la phul nas/ rdo rje'i gar byas la blangs te yi ge hU~Mbazhi ba nyid kyis rang ge
mgo bor bcing ngo// ji ltar rtog bzhin dus nga// gang zhig chad pa yongs su bskang// mkhas pasalhag pa rnams sbyang phyir// rdo rje dril bu kun rtog bya// 'grub 'gyur zhes pa spang mi bya// zhes
gsungs so// de nas 'dug par gyur pa yi// rdo rje slob dpon manyam ga 'ag pas// rdo rje sgo ni bzhi po rnams// yid kyis dbye bar bya ba nyid// o badzra utasgyu Ta ya ba ma ya pra be shAhU~M/ zhes
bya'o phyag rgya'ang 'di yin te// ro khu tshur gnyis gshibs de// mdzub mo gan rkyal yang dag bzung// legs par drag tu rnam par dbye/ sgo dbye ba yi chog yin// tshos pa'o/ /
denas lcags kyu la sogs pas las rnams byas la// rin po che bdun las byas pa'i m// sa las byas pa'i bum pa nag po la sogs pa mang pa/ mgrin pa ring ba/ marlu 'phyang ba/
lto ba che ba/ lha rdzas kyi dri'i chu dang/ rin po che dang/ sman thams cad dang/ 'bru thams cad kyis yongs su rdzogs pa// yal 'dab dang bcas pa/ mgrin pa la gos dam pas legs par

bcings la bsrung ba byas pa/ phyi rol kun tu lha rdzas kyi dri rjes su byugs pa/ me tog gi 'phreng ba btags pa'i rdo rjes snying du mtshan pa/ rdo rje chen pos byin gyis brlabs pa/ khro bo ti rin te ris

yongs su bzung ba'i rdo rjedang me tog gi yal 'dab kyis/ o badzra u da ka hU~M/ zhes bya ba 'di stong rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa'i yi ge hU~Mbazhi pa brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas la/
bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi spyan sngar legs par gzhag go/ 'jug pa'i sgo la mngon par phyogs pa'i phyi rol du bum paganyis pa la yi gi hU~Mbazhi pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa gzhag go/ de'i
chus bdag ched dang slob ma dbang bskur ba bya ste/ gzhug pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas sam bcings pa'i ng ngo// byur de bzhin sa le sbram// dung dang de bzhin nor bu ni// rin chen kun te sing ha
dang// bya glu gar de ba re// sman kun til dang sran ma sha// 'bras dang gro ni lnga pa ste// sman lnga 'bru kun sgos mtshon pa'o// de'i rjes la phyag bzhi la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i sdom pa
[t]@#// 'dzin du bcu gnas / rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gos sngon po la'ang yongs su bzlas te/ sems dpa'i gtsug tor gyis sgo skyong gi gdong bcings pa dang/ rdordzogo chas stod
g.yogs dang/ gtsug tor la sogs pa can gyi slob dpon gyis khro bo yin ti rib me tog sngon po'i 'phrang ba bzung nas/ o badzras ma yaM pra be shA mi/ zhes brjod cing zhugs la/ de bzhin
wA gshegs pa thams cado la gsol ba gdabaste/ bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pas so// de nas rdorje'i chu 'thungs nas bdag nyid 'jug par byas la/ 'phreng ba de dkyil 'khor chen
por dor la rang rang gi mgo la bcings te gdong bcings pa bkrol la/ jilta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor la bltas te/ labadzra/ zhes pa la sogs pas gzhug pa'i phyag rgya dgrol ba'ang byas
la chu'i dbang bskur ba dang/ sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan dang/ dar dpyangs dang/ rdo rjod ng/ 'phrang pa dang/ bdag po la sogs pas dbang bskur ba dgu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sn gnas
bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas blangs pa de kho na nyid dang/ chos dang/ dam tshig dang/ dngos grub dang/ rdo rje brtul zhugs kyang bzung la/ mo tog la sogs pas kyang bdag nyid
legs par mchod de tshigs su bcad palnga pas rjes su gnang ba dang/ yi ge hUM gis gzengs bstod pa dang/ lung bstan pa'i ng smos la/ sur yang byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa
byas la/ ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i bzlas pa yang ste/ hU~M kA ra badza?hU~M/ zhes pa'o// rang gi mtshan brjod par bya yis/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la/ de'i sngags a'i//

rnam pa'i mtha' can gyi rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i bdag nyid dbab bo// badzonyahaM/ zhes bya ba rdorje'i nga rgyal rnam par bsgoms la de rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad du/
bsgoms te/ badzrad+matu a haM/ zhes pa'o// de ltar rdo rje'abebabs pa'i bar gyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la byang gi skor de'i stags a'i rnam pa'i mtha'acan gyi rnam par snang mdzad kyi rdorjodo
dril bu'i bdag nyid dbab pa'o// badzag+han+d+honyahaM/ zhes pa'i bskyal bskyang la/ de badzraA bo sha ko d+honyahaM/ zhes bsgom mo// de lta bu s rdo rjes
bsgrubs pa yin no// de nas yang rdo rje slob dpon gyis sems dpa' rdo dzalcags kyus bcings la gol re gas par gtog pa byed cing sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus par bya ste/

oM badzras mA dzadza/ lci bo ho/ zhes pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig rab tu brjod do// de nas myur du phyag rgya chen po dang rdo rje khro bo'i dam tshig brjod do// de ma thag tumtshan rgya rtsa brgyad pa mchog go/ de nas
rdo rjelcags kyu la sogs pas rang gi sgo nas spyan drangs la bcug ste bcings nas robang du byas l/ ji lta ba bzhin du yi ge rgyu bzhi pas mchod yon phul te/ dpal rnam par snang mdzad la
tu@#// sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams dang/ bskal pa bzang po'i mthar thug pa rnams bsgrubs te rang gi sngags brjod pa jilta bur brjod cing/ dzi/hU~MpaM ho/ sa ma ya
hUM sa ma ya hU~M a haM/ de nas rang gi sngags brjod do// de lta bu s 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas dam tshig gi phyog rgya rnams dbyung ste/ rdo rje 'asu gsang dam pa byung// dam tshage mchog

rnams nyid du grags//khro bo'i bcing ba bla med pa//de rnamasu bcing bar rab bshad bya//lag ngar dedzi kun tu bstsol/mthe'u chung lcags kyu bcing banyid//mdzub mo'agani rab tu brkyang//'jigarten gsum lo rnam rgyal zhes/de bzhin mdzub mo kha
dacing//nor bu nying ni bar ma bskum//bsnyams la dbu ma pad+manyid// gung mo mdzub mo gnyis sdigs mdzub// sdig mdzub gnyis ni rdo rje yang// g.yas pa bkug pa lcags kyu 'o// de dag nyid sbyar yi ge
hU~M/ legs pa'i rnam pa de bzhin yang// mdzub gnyis logs gnas khro gnyer du// snying khar nyi ma mdzub gnyis cha ma// lag pa mgo bor rab tu brkyang// mdzub mo kha ru dgod pa can//
mdzub mo sen mo kun tu rig/ g.yas pa mdzod kyi khu tshur yang// gung mo'i mgo b.rus 'khor lo nyid// kha las rab mchog 'thon pa yi// 'dzub mo dbu ma rdo rje yang// mdzub mo mgrin
pa bskor ba dang// mdzubamo lhag ma mche ba che// rdo rje khu tshur mthe bong bsams// sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams ni rdo rje dbyings su bshad pa bzhin du bya ba 'di lta ste/ rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas
su snying khar yang namathe bong bsnyams// legs par rab bskyang 'phrang ba ma// thal mo sbyar mchog kha nas dbyung// gang las spyi bor thal mo sbyar// rdo rje bsdams pa thur du sbyin// thal mo legs
sbyar gyen du gtor// mthe bong bsnyams te nges par bsdams// rab du btang ba byugs pa yi// mdzub mo gcig ni ba kug pa dang// ma tho bang gis ni mdud pa bcings// mtho bong mdzub mo brjod la

ba bcing// rdo rje khu tshur mchog bsdoms nyid// ces pa'o// snying po'i dkyil 'kheral rdo rje rtse lnga pa rnam par basags la hU~Mgli rnam pa nyid brjod cing phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar bya'o// de nas

phyag rgya'i nges par 'byung ba ste/ rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi phyag rgyani rnam par snang mdzad rdo rjehUM mdzad/ rin chen b+haM mdzadu/ chos kyi tshu dzang/ las kyi yaM mdzad kyi gnas su'ang ngo// de nas rin chen hUM

mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyi sngags rnams 'byung ste/ oM badzrad+hi ku Ti kro d+ha A na ya sarba ratu ni hU~MhApa'i/ oM badzami kro rgyu du ma raya hUM phaT/ oM badzrabi shwa krod+ma ku ru sarba bi shwa ru pa yaM

pa d+ha hU~M phaTA/ phyag rgyagazhana rnams ni sems dpa' rdo rjem nas brtsams par blta'o// nyid kyi phyir rig pa thams cad kyi mchog rnams kyi rnam par rgyal ba'i sngags su bshad ngo/ jo rnga tshu mdzad

dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya bsdu bas yang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hU~M mdzad klog par bya'o// gzhan rnams rdo dzihUM mdzad du 'gyur pa rigs pa'i ng ma yin te/ rgyud thams cad du hU~M mdzad nges par bstan
pa'i ng ma yin no// de'i rjes su de kho na bzhin lce la rdo rje bkod de rim pa bshin dusangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa'i chos kyi yi ge rnams dgod de// de rnamaN kyang/ hU~M yig

sangs rgyas rdo rje can// ti yig rdo rje'i snying po yi// gi yika rnam pa rdo rje'i sde'i// a/ yig rdo rje sna tshogs kyi// hUM sams dpa' rdo rje ma'i// taMrin chen rdo dzama'i// hiThachos kyi rje rjes 'o//
alas kyi rdo rjea'i// pAn+taM// aa zhes bya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa dga' ba chen po la hU~M/ gzugs mdzes pa la hU~M/ rnab bde ba la hU~M/ mchod pa
thams cad la hU~M rab tu dga' ba la hU~M/ dbus su bgrod pa la hU~M/ legs par gzi mchog la hU~M/ dri bzang mchog la hU~M/ a pa hidzahU~M/ a hi hUM hUM/ ha so Ta bi hU~M/ g+haN+Daa / hU~M/

rdodzesgag mo 'a so kho sapa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa rnams kyi'o// de ma thag tu spyi yi ge las snying la sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed pa las kyi phyag rgya btsod ngo// de la khro bo'i khu tshur rnam pa gnyis byas la

g.yon pa'i rdo sen mo g.yas pa sa gzung zhing bsgrung ba byang chub mchog ces bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di nisangs rgyas kyi byang chub rab tu stor ro// gnyis po de dag gis 'gying ba dang bcas pas gsal bar byed pa
ni rdo rje hU~M mdzad rang/ jo dzesems dpa' dang/ sems dpa'i tshim rnams kyi'o// lcag kyu 'dzin par yang dag gnas// mda' gsor ba yi sbyor ba dang// legs so zhes bya snying khar gnas// rdo rje

gnyis nyid dbang bskur ba// rin chen yuM mdzad dang/ rdo rje khro gnyer dang/ khro bo dang/ rin chen rdo rjes rnams kyi'o// snying khar nyi ma rab tu blta// g.yon gnas lag ngar dbyag pa dang// de bzhin 'di
ni yongs su bzlog/ g.yas dang g.yas min rnam par bstsal/ chos kyi b+haM mdzad dang/ rdo chos dang/ chos kyi rdo rjes rnams kyi'i// snying khar nyi ma 'chal gri'o// mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba

nyidi// rdo rdzoganyis ni khar gnas shing// rdo rje'i gar ni bkrel bas ni// 'gram pa spyi gtsug yang dag gnas//las kyi mdzad dang rdo rjal ma dang/ las kyi rdo rje rnams kyi'o// go ma mthe'u chung mche ba
mchog/ lu tshur gnyis ni nges par bcing// rdo rje 'gyings ba'i rab sbyor bas// bsam pa g.yos pas mdud par bya// 'phreng ba brtsis pa kha nas 'byung// gar 'as spyi bor thal mo sbyar// 'og tu 'chang
nga khyen du 'thor/ mthebeng bsams te ngesapar ga 'gres// dri byug pa yi sbyor ba las// mchod pa'i phyag rgya rab tu grags// mdzub mo lcags kyu bcisaM pa yis// mtha'u chung lasani lcags kyulaM//

mkhrig ma mdudapa mchog dag bstsol// rgyab dag kyang ni nges par gshibs// zhes so sbyong rnams kyi phugargya'o// las kyi phyag thams cad kyang gar las 'byung ba yin mo nge nas rnam par snang mdzad la sog
pa rnams kyi bcing bar bya'o// rjesams dpa' dang/ rin chen dang/ chos dang/ las kyi rdo rjem rnams kyi'ang ste/ rdo rjadung po dang/ mthar gnas pa'i skyes pa dang/ bung med kyi gzugs
'dzin pa de rnams kyi bdag nyid chen po gang dang gang gi phyag rgya gang dang gang yin pa rnams bcid ngo// thams cad kyi phyag rgya dam tshig phyag rgya'ang yin te/ g.yen pa de bzhin gshegs

pa'i khu tshur gan rkyal du byas la lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo dang/ mthe bong dag dang/ mthe'u chung nas brtsams te kha phye ba'i thal mo kha sbyar ba'o// 'di ni byams pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// de rnams

kyirig pani star bshad pa nyid de/ de rnams kyi rig pa lcags rnams la dgod do// 'di na de rnams kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'o// yi ga a las rang gi thugs kar sna tshogs rdo rdzobaskyed la/ de rnams 'dribya'i phyir

rjes su 'brangs nas phyag rgya chen po bcings pa ni las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro// rang gi thugs kar rdo rje rtsa lnga pa bsams la bri bya'i rjes su 'brangs pa nyid las de rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing ngo// de nyid kyis

yang rig pa'i thun mong ba'o// mthe'u chung dang mthe bed bcis nas kyang g.yon pa'i sor mo dbus ma gsum pa rtse gsum pa la dbus ma rtsa tsho'ang rdo rje'i phug rgya yongs su bzung zhing rdo rje'i rig pa mchog 'di ni

rdo rje'i dpa' zhes grags so// de nas gzhan na rab bshad bya// sgyu ma rdo rje sogs ming can// rdo rje bsdams pa brtan byas la// g.yon pa rdo rje yang bcings bya// rdo rje khu tshur zhes grags pa// rdo rje'i
rigs rnams kun la 'di// sdotsho rnam gnyis dang yang byas// mtshon ma thams cad bkod pa ni// rdo rje'i rigs ni thams cad kyi// phyag rgya rnams na'ang dgod par bya// mdun dang rgyab gnas 'ab

tu brkyang// mthe bong rgan po 'dzin pa chos// oM gyi rnam pa spyi bor gnas// rdordzashugs kyis rab tu gnas// rig pa'i rgyal po 'am phyag rgyan ngo 'tshogs so/// lag pa'i mdun nyid rab tu brkyang// lag pa'i
mdun yad de ngazhin du// lag pa gnyis kyang khu nur gnas// kha las yongs su bskor ba nyid// ro khro bo'i phyag rgya'i rigs so// g.yon pa'i mthe bong gas gnas kyang// 'phrang ba 'dzin pa des

rgyal nyid// g.yas pa sa nor ni sbyin pa dang/ ral gri'i phyag rgya khu tshur son/ tshogs kyi bdag po chen po'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so// g.yas pas gshol ni bzung ba dang// de bzhin lag pa rab tu brkyang/ g.yas

pa 'bar ba kun tu ston// rdo rje khu tshur rab tu 'dar// pho nya chen po'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so// bsnyams bcas khadam pa rtsa/ byugs pas 'joms pa rab tu sbyor// lag ngar bskum pa sbyar ba dang// rdordzagayas pa

'phrogama'o// branagyi phyag rgya'i tshogs so// de nas a ma la sogs pa ma mo'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya 'byung// g.yon pa rdo rje bsdams pa yis// rtsa gsum mtshan ma bcing bar bya// 'di bcings pa ya nges yang dag

pa'i dngos grub rig pa mchog dang nyid// rdo rje'i rigs rnams thams cad kyi// g.yon pa rdo rje mchog bsrungs pa// chog ji bzhin dam tshig gi/ phyag rgya bcing ba rab bshad bya// 'khor lo thams cad mchog kun

bsdam de bzhin bu yi phyag rgya dang// o yig phyag rgya'ang de bzhin nyid// yi ge rnacan yongs su gzung// phyag rgyamadzes pa can dang ni// 'bar ba yongs su gzung ba nyid// 'od zer bsdus pa kho na yang//
dubyug pa khu tshur bzung ba nyid// kha las yongs su bskor ba dang// khro bo'i dem tsheg gdengs ka yis// phyag rgya 'brang ba rdo rje bcas// ming med spyi bor gnas pa nyid// rtsibs can dakyil 'akor
bzhin du bza'// 'od can rtsibs can dam tshig rnams// lag ngar bsam zhing kha phyogs dang// rgyab nas so sa su bskor ba nyid// 'od zer 'bar bgrel ba dang// mdun du dul bar gnas pa nyid// pho nya'i dam
tshig rnams so// gnyis mthar zhugs pa rtse mo sbyar// bcings pa nyid dang rab lhang byed// lag par bsnol dang ma bsnol dang// de bzhin stobs ni 'phrog pa'o// bran mo rnams kyi d mchog yin no// ngonas

lha chen po la sogs pa'i lcags rnams la sngags bkod la/ yi ge a las rang gi snying khar de bzhin du rdo rje baskur la de rnams kyi phyag rgya bcings te las kyi phyag rgyur 'gyur ro// rang gi snying khar rdo rje rtse lnga pa

bsgoms la phyag rgyachen po bri ba'i rjes su 'bras kyi bcing bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzadu dang/ bskal pa bzang po nga dang phyi rol rdo rje'i rigs rnams la rdo dzarin po che'i dbang
bskur ma/ dpal rdoN+Nan+taM mdzad la sogs sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ dar dpyangs kyis dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ro// de nas mchod yon phul la mchod pa khya'o// de nas ran nga

che'i rang bzhin gyi bum pa sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can rdo rje la sogs pa rang gi mtshan mas mtshan pa/ rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'isngags bsgyurtsa brgyud bzlas pa rnams phyir dkyil 'khor gyi tshu rel du dgod

par bya'o/ bum pa gang ba rnams dang/ gos zung 'bum dang/ stong phrag bcudang/ stong dang/ rgya'am/ re re la re re 'am thunamo ba 'am/ rnam pa snatshogs pa'i bla re dang/ zur bzhir rnam par bkra ba'i/
ba dan bcings pa'i gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan rnams kyang yi ge oM dang/ dpal rdo rje mdzad yongs su bzlas la/ badzra ra Na khaM/ zhes pa 'dis lha thams cad la nges par dbul lo// me tog

gi shing brgyadang bani 'am/ ljon shing rnams dang/ me tog thams cad la rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa dang/ oM badzra pup+pahU~M/ zhes pas me tog gi phyag rgya mngon par bsngags go/ dri thams cad dang dad zhim

pa rnams dang/ dri ma med pa'i dri bzang po rnams la de kho na bzhin du rdo rjem dang/ o badzra gnad+hahU~M/ zhes pa 'di dri'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas so// ga bur dang/ a ka ru dang/ du ru ka dang/ tsan dan la sogs

pa legs par bsres la/ de kho na bzhin du rdo rjem dang/ o badzad+hA pa hU~M/ zhes pa 'dis bdug pa'i phyag smyudang bcas pas ngo ga por 'bum dang/ stong phrag bcu dang/ stong dang/ brgya'am/ jiltar rnyed
pa la'o// sgron ma 'bum dang/ stong phrag bcu dang/ stong dang/ brgya'am/ sgron ma thams cad sgron ma'i sdong bu 'bar ba dang ldan pa'i skong bu stong dang/ bcu 'am/ ba gcig la de kho na bzhin du me
dad rdo rjem dang/ o badzra A lo ke hU~M/ zhes pa 'di mar me'i phyag rgya dang ldan pas yongs su bzlas la/ oM spa ra Na khaM/ zhes pa rjod cing dbul bar bya'o// gtor ma'i nyabar spyod pa 'bum dang/
[zl ]@#/ stong phrag bcu dang/ stong dang/ brgya 'am/ banu'i grasasam/ bkra shis can dang por bu ste/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bza' ba rnams la de bzhin du rdo dzam yongs su bzlas te/ a kA ro

mu khaMsarba d+harmalaMa du nub partsatad/ tshes pa brjod cing dbul bar bu'o// rol mo bcu dang/ stong dang/ stong phrag bcu dang/ rol mo 'bum yang rung ba la yi ge hUM dang/ rol mo'i phyag rgya rdo dza/ khu tshur dag gi lug

wA pa'i sor mo rnams kyis rol mo'i stang stabs rnam pa bcu bzhi 'di lta ste/ ri wang dang/ gling bu dang/ rdza mu ra dza dang/ rngam kund dang/ 'khar rnga dang/ ji byu ri dang/ rdung Da ha dang rdza kun dza dang/ rnga ti mi
la'i stang stabs so// la mo dang/ zlos gar dang/ gar dang/ rgyan dang/ codapan la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyang yi ge oM gyis mngon par bsngags te'o// de bzhin du dar dbyangs 'phung bar bya

zhing ma tog gi 'phrang ba dang/ rdzayabakyis rnam par brgyanapa dang/ dra ba dang drang phud pas smras pa dang/ rnab phyed pas nye bar mdzes pa dang/ rtarang glang po chadang/ ba'ang dang/ shing rta rnams 'bul te/

brtags pa dang bcas pa yang ngo// rtakhabs nyams dga' ba'i dril bu dang bcas pa rnams kyang/ badz+dza ra NakhaM/ zhes pa 'jis so// oM badzrasatA su saM gra hata/ badzra'ad+d+ham nut+taraM/ badza?d+hamagA ya ngo//

'adzra karmakarob+hA be/ zhes brjod cing gar byos la/ rdo rje stag mo la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa brgyud po rnams kyis khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis dang ldan pa la las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyi dkyil 'khor tham sa cad ma chod par

bya'o rdo rjekhu tshur gnyis bcings nas mdzub mo gnyis rab tu brkyang ba khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis yin no// slar rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du bshad pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcu drug pa rnams kyis kyang legs par mchod/
la khro bo'i rigs thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ sems can thams cad kyi don du dngos grub thams cad 'grub par mdzad du gsol zhes pa'o// de nas phyi rol gyi mchod pa dbul te/ sgrub pa'i
grogs mchog dkyil 'khor du bzhag la/ 'bras yos bcasashing til dang bcas// chub cas zas bcas me tog bcas// sran chan bcas shing snum 'khur 'a// sogs pa'i bza' ba rnams lani//
yang a kA ro mu khaM/ zhes pa la sogs bzlas nas shar phyogs kyi cha nas brtsams te gsum gsum gtor bar byas te/ dri dang/ me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ mar ma dang/ mchod yon rnams kyang thog ma/

dang thamar dbul bar bya'o// de la dang po ri zhig maN+Dal rnams byed du gzhug par bya'o// de nas spyan drang ngo// de nas dmatshig bstanamo// de nas mchod mon yang phul te dri la sogs pas legs par mchod la gtor
ma dbul lo// de nas gshegs su gsol lo// de la sngags dang phyag rgya ni 'di yin te/ shar phyogs su kha bltas te yas brgyang gi gom pa sa 'dug cing lag pa g.yon pas rdo rje bstan la g.yas pa dku'i

phyogs su bzhag ste g.yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyus spyan drang ngo// de'i mdzub mo lcags kyu dang bral ba ni brgyabyin gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// g.yon brkyang gi gom pas 'dug la spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las
mdzubamo brgyang bani gshegags sugasol ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nas de'i sngagasani/ namo badzes dashi shi badzapA Nirak+Sha rak+Sha swAhA/ me'i phyogs su ba ltas te lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo

zlum po'i rnam par bkug ste gung mo bsgreng ba'i gas gsum par btsugs la mthe bong lag mthil du bzhag pa ni ma lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// spyan drang ba'i phyag rgyu las mthe bong mdzub mo'i gzhogs

la bstan pa ni ma lha'i dam tshig gi phyagarlu'o// phyagargya de nyid lag pa'i dbus su mngon du phyogs te gcig tu sgyur ba ni gshigs su gsol ba'i phyagargya'o// de'i sngagasan/ ak+Sha ye hi/ o hoka pA la dz+wa la

[【]la has pa'i kha ti la bi rU pak+Shasuny+tsa/ gshin rjeral ltas te lag pa mdun du phyogs par byas lanang du rdo rdzobasdams pa'i dbus su mthe bong gnyis dang phyi ru ming med gnyis sbyang zhing bsgrung ste rgya nang dubazung ba

mig shanarje spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// srin lag gnyis kyang phyi rol du gzhibs te bsgrengs pa snying khar bzung ba ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// nyid las srin lagasbyar ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o// de'i

sngags ni/ ya mA ya swAhA/ bden bral du bltas te mnyam pa'i gom pas 'jug la lag pa g.yas ba 'i khu tshur bcangs pa mdzub mo dang gung mo bkug ste bzung zhing gri'i rnam par bzhag la/ lag pa g.yon pa lta bur

phyogs su g.yon pa'i ma dzub mo bkug nas bzhag pa ni bden bral spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid lag pa g.yon pa sta zur phyogs su gnas pa ral gri'i phyag rgyani bden bral gyi dam tshig gi phugargya'o/

spyan drang ba'i phugargyalas mdzub mo brkyang ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o// de'i sngags ni/ sarba b+hU ta b+ha yaM ka raku ru ku ru swAhA/ chu lha'i phyogs su mnyam pa'i gom pas 'dug la lag pa g.yas pa'i/

khu tshur bcangs nas mtho bong dang mdzub mo gcig tu sbyar te g.yon pa'i khu tshur snying khar bzhag g.yon pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyus lcan drang ba ni chu bdag spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgyu de nyed g.yon pa'i

ma jung mo khu tshur la sbyar te bzung ba zhags pa'i phyag rgya chub dag gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// sman drang ba'i phyag rgya las 'dzub mo brkyang ba zhigshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o// de'i sngags ni/ tI tIsu Da ti'i

sha khi te li bi rU pAk+Sha sa rlung lha'i phyogs su bltas te 'dug pa g.yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs to gung mo bsgrung ba'i tshigs gsum par mdzub mo bkug pa'i tshu mo btsugs la mngon du phyogs te brkyang ngo// lag

pa g.yas pa'i ng de bzhin du byas te sa zur logs su bzhagacing mthe bos bskul ba ni rlung lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgyu'o// de nyidamathe bong snga ma bzhin du bzhag pa ni rlung lha'i ram tshig gi phyag rgya'o// spyan drang ba'i

phyag rgya las mthebebaskyung ba nigshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o// sngags ni/ o sas 'kha khu kha sASha ku be ral mngon du bltas te 'dug nas lag nga gnyis khasdur rdo rjabacing ba nang du byas la mthe'u

chu gnyis gshibs tobarkyang/ de'i rgyab tu srin lag gnyis so sor bzhag nas gung mo dag bsgreng brdo'i mdud pa bya ba ni ku bo ra sa na drang ba'i phyag rgyu'o// phyag rgya de nyid kyis gung mo gnyis nang du
rdo rje gung mo bcing ba'i sbyor bas bzhag pa ni ku be ra'i dam tshig gi phyagargya'o// sman drang ba'i phyag rgya las gung mo gnyis brkyang ban gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o// de'i sngags ni//

oku ba rA ya swA hA/ dbang ldan gyi phyogs su bltas te 'dug la lag pa dag gcig tu sbyar te thal mo sbyar ba bya ste/ srin lag dang mthe'u chung lag mthil du rdo rje bcing ba byas te mthe bod thung dag gzhan la

brtenacing nang du bkug ste bsnol la// gung mo gshibs te bsgreng ba'i rgyab tu mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje'i rnam par bzhag la de nyid bkug ste steng du phan tshun sen mo sprad par bya ba ni dbang ldan spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// de

nyid kyi mdzub mo sngar bzhin rdo rje'i rnam par bzung ba ni dbang ldan gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// spyan drar ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o// sngags ni/ judzungashi ba

sAhA/ g.yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas 'dug lag pa thal mo khong stod du sbyar te bzhag la snying du bltas te mdzub mo gnyis kyi lcags kyunatshangs pa la sogs pa sbyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid kyi mdzub mo

gnyis snga ma ltar bzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rkya'o// de rnams kyi sngags ni/ u radz+ho brash+tsa NasAhA/ mUr+ya gra ha a d+hI pa

ta ye swA hA/ o tsan+d+ra nak+Sha tra a d+hi pa ta ye swAhu/ mnyam pa'i gom pa 'i gnas pas 'dug la lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar ba sor mo'i rtse mo rnams bar mtshams med par dzanatshunasbyar ton thebeng zlum por byas//

la 'og tu bltas tes 'i lha mo la sogs pa mdzub mo lcags kyus spyan drang ba ni 'og gi lha spyan drung ba'i phyag rgya'o// spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las sdur bzhin du mdzub mo dag bzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o//

mdzub mo dag bskyung ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o// sngags rnams ni/ a d+ho pri thi phyi sAhA/ a su rany+tsasAhA/ nA gany+tses/ de nas rang gi sngags kyis thams cad la 'thor 'thung phul la//
bdag dang slob ma'i tshogs su bcas pa la bgegs chod par mdzod cig/ las kyi dngos grub kyang bdag 'a stsolatsagaces brjod la thamasacad gshegs su gsolaso////yang na dpungabazang

gached du gsungs pa 'i tshigs bcad rnams kyis gtor ma dbul to/ lha dang lha min gnod sbyin lto 'phya grul// nam mkha' lding dang 'dab bzongalus sprul lo// dri rba srin po gden gyi tshogs rnams dang// gang du
sa la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can// bu smad bcas shi g.yog 'khor bcas pa la// bdag gi pus mo sa stangs 'dir btsugs nas// thal mo sbyar na khyod la gsol 'debs kyis// gsan nas ban gdags

slad du 'di lce dacig/ 'byung po gang dag rir ba stong gnas dang// dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yi gnas rnams dang// shar nub ri dang nyi zla'i khyim gnas dang// ri bo kun la gang dag gnas pa dang// chubo kun

dang chu bo'i mdo rnams dang// rinachen gnas na lhag par gnas pa dang// mtsho dang rdzing bu stongakachu ngogs dang// g.ya'o chu sil ma can dang khron par gnas// grong dang phyugs lhas grong khyer stong pa dang// khasong/
dang ni lha yi khang par yang// gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten gnas dag dang// dka' thub gnas dang glang chen bres dang ni// rgyal po'i dkor khang dag na gang gnas dang// lam srang
bzhi mdo dag dang sum mdo dang// gang dag lam po che dang shing gcig drung// dur khrod mun po nags tshal chen mo dang// the nga ge dred dang gcan gzan gnas dag dang// 'brog chen 'jigs su rung bar
gang gnas dang// gang dag gling mchog dgan gnas pa dang// lcan po dur khrod dag na gang gnas rnams// dgyes shi mgu bas 'phrang ba byag pa dri/ bdug pa gtor ma mar me bstod pa 'dis// gus
'bul snoms mdzod gso la mdzoda'athung mdzod cig/ las 'odi rnams kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// de ltar gdon la mchod byas nas// rtse gcig yid kyis phyogs skyongamachod par bya// dbang po

rgyu rdo rjecan gyi lha tshogs 'khor dang bcas// gtor ma rgyud 'phags 'di dag bzhes su gsol// ma dang gshin rje ban bral srin po'i bdag/ chub dag rlung bdag nor gyi bdag po dang// dbang ldan lha sku 'byung po'i

bdag po dang// stong gi nyi zla tshangs pa chen po dang// lha rnams kun dang sa yi klu rnams gang// de yi lha dang gsang ba'i tshogs 'dus rnams// dpung bcas sde bcas bu dang bshes gnyen bcas// rang gi
bo'i tshogs shing mnyes pa rnams// so sor soso'i thugs dgongs gcig mdzad nas// rang rang phyogs su legs par byon nas ni// rang gi bu snyad mdza' bshes gnyen 'dun dang// nang mi dmag dang
dpung bcas thabs cigatu// ma tog dri dang byug pa mar me dang/ don la zas gtor ma 'di dag bzhes nas kyang// gsol mdzod snyoms mdzod legs par bzumadzod cig/ las 'di rnams kyi 'bras du

mchis par mdzod// de la 'di ni phyi dang nang thams cad du gtor ma rab tu dbul ba'i sngags te/ a ka ro mu khaM sarbad+hamatsho adunutapanan tuta/ ces pa'o// de nas nye reg bya ste shar sgor mngon par phyog
te gnas pa la/ las thams cad pa'i thab khung gi dbus su dpal 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi sngags brjod cing/ me tog dmar po ngas par bkod la sbyin
sreg gi cho gas dpal rdo rje[%]mdzad kyi sngags kyis pa'i mar gyis mag zhugs brgya rtsa brgyad dbul lo// dpal rnam par snanga mdzad la sogs pa'i sngags rdo rje'abebs pa khro bo'i mthar thug par
yang sreg blugs bdun bdun slar yang ngo// de nas jilta ba bzhin du thab khung gi rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams me tog khe nas spyan drangs la// rnam par snang mdzad lasogs pa'i sngags kyis
bris pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang gi gnas su dgod do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas la/ bdag ming che ge zhes bgyi ba'i// rdo rjeslob dpon dka' thub che// sems can kun
la phan pa'i phyir// slob ma rnams mi gzhug par bgyi// 'dir yang dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa la snod dang snod ma yin pa brtag par mi bya ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sems
[zo] ]khyad/ can kha cig na sdig pa chen po bgyid pa de rdo rje[%]mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di mthong sa zhugs nas n gnas ong thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'adas nor dang/ bza'
ba dang/ btung ba dang/ 'dod pa'i yon tan thamasacad la chags pa dang/ dam tshig las mi 'da' ba dang/ sngar spyod pa la sogs pa 'dod cingam nus pa'i sems can dgamachis te/ de dag kyang 'dir ji ltar

bya bar 'dod pa bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das sems can kha cig ni gar dad klu dang/ gad mo dang/ rtsang mo dang/ kha zas la spyod pa la dga' ba/

nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po chos nyid khong du ma chud pas lha'i rigs dang dkyil 'khor gzhan du 'jug par 'gyuragyi/ de bzhin du rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor ru ba thams cad
yang dag par rdzogs par 'gyur ba bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang/ mgu ba dang/ rangs pa rnams 'byung bar mdzad pa de ni bslab pa'i gnas la 'jigs shaji ska gnas ma 'jug pa dag kyang mchis te/ ngan
song gi dkyil 'khor lam du ji ltar gnas pa'i bde ba'i bdag nyid kyi gnas skabs can de dag kyang dga' ba dang/ mgu ba dam pa dang/ bde ba dang/ yid bde ba myong bar bgyi ba dang/ ngan song gi rgyud
thams cad du 'jug par kha bltas pa'i lam las bzlog par bgyi ba'i slad du rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug tu rung ngo// bcom ldan 'das chos ldan gyi sems can de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi tshul khrims dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ shes rab dam pa 'grub pa'i thabs kyis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tshol ban/ bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa la sogs pa dang/ sa rnams la 'bad
pas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba dag kyang mchis te/ de dag kyang rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid du zhugs ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa nyid thams cad kyang rnyed par dka' ba'ang ma lag
na/ dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci 'tshal zhes gsol bar bya'o// de nas slob ma gzhug par bya'o// de la bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yongs su bzung ba'i dge bsnyen nam/ dge sbyong ngam/ dge slong
gi sdom pa yongs su bzung zhing slob dpon du dbang bskur bar 'os pa/ slob dpon gyi zhabs dug la phyag byas te 'di skad ces brjod de/ bdag gi ston pa dga' chen khyod// byang chub chen po 'tshul
bstan pa/ mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo// dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol// byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol// skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol// zhes pa'o// de nas slob ma 'a rdo rje
gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i gos dmar po stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang/ rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sgo skyong bzhi bzlas pa'i gdongagayogs bcing bar byas 'a phyag bzhi byed du gzhug go/ yang
lag na me tog thogs pa'i slob mas slob dpon la phyag byas la/ lag na me tog thogs pa nyid kyis gshegs pa dang/ rjes su yi rang ba dang/ bskul ba dang/ gsol ba gdab pa byas la 'di skad ces brjod
@#// do gtso bo bdag la sdom pa stsol// thub pa'i nyimam lus pa'i// sangs rgyas rnams bdag la dgongs// bdag mingachag zhes bgyi ba// slobadapen dbang du gnas pa la// sangs rgyas
rol mo 'byung ba yi// phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dunacan// thar pa chen be'i grong khyer mchog/ gsang ba chen por 'jug par bgyi'o// gsang ba thams cad rigs bsdus pa// slob dpon bdag ni 'jug nga mdzod//

phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur ba// skal ba chen po bdag la stsol// mtshan rnams rjes su gsol btab pa// dpi khyad rnams dang yang dag ldan// sangs rgyas sku ni yid 'ong ba// slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol//

dbang bskur ba ni rmad byung tshe// sems can kun gyi don bgyid phyir// bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon gyur// slob dpon chen po bdag la gsol// nga nas slob dpon gyi rigs thams cad la gsol ba gdab pa rab ho//
chags bu 'di nyid ni// byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin b// gsang ba yini 'khor lo 'dir// 'jug cing byang chub sdom pa 'tshal// de nas slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces brjod de// sangs rgyas tshes dang dge

'dunate[：]dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song/ 'di ni sangs rgyas rig dag pa'i// dam tshig sdom pa brtan por gyur// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang// blo gros chen po khyod kyis rung// khyanub sems gang de rdo rje//

la shes rab dril bu zhes bshad do/ slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar gyis// tham sangs rgyas kun dngam nyam// 'din rdo tsharigs dag pa'i// sdom pa dam tshig yin par gsungs// rin chen rigs nabasdus pa ni// nyin

tshe gsum dngamatshamegasum// zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams// spyin pa rnam bzhi rab sbyin bya// phyid zhusang ba theg pa gsum// dmatshes khyod kyis gzung ba bya// 'anipad+ma'i rigs dag pa'i// dmatshig sdom pa yin par

gsungs// las chen rigs ni bsdus pa la// sdom pa gsum po yang dag ldan// mchod pa las kyang ci nus bzhin// yang dag nyid du nges gzung gyis// de las gzhan pa bzhi po yang/ 'di dag pas pham par mi bshad// mi spang dor bar

yang mi bya/ rtsaba'i ltung bar 'di bshad do//nyin mo gsum dang mtshan gsum du// nyin re zhing brjod par bya// gangatshe nyams na rnal 'byor pa// ltung ba sbom po dag tu 'gyur// khyod kyis srog chags gsadag bya// ma byin par yang g blang ngo

dod ba leg par mi spyod cing// brdzun yang skya bar mi bya'o//phung krol kun gyi rtsa ba gi chad ni pa tung ba rnam par yang// sems can gdul phyi mo gtogs pa// bya bam yin thamasumang sbyang// dam pa'i drung du gnas bya zhing/ rnal 'byor

pa rnams bsnyen bkur bya// lus kyi las ni rnam pa gsum// dag gi rnam pa bzhi rnams dang// yod kyi rnam pa gsum dag ni// mi nus pas na rjes su bskyang// theg pa dman la dga' mi bya// sems can don la rgyab phyogs min// 'khor

dag kyang yongs sbyang// rtag tu ma na'adus michags// lha dang lha min gsab pa// khyodakyis brnyas par mi bya zhing// phyagarlu bzhon pa mtshon chadang// mtshan ma 'gem par yang mi bya// 'di dag dam tshig ces bshad do//de dag mi

blo gros khyod kyi bsrung bar bya// des kyang 'di skad brjod par bya// slob dpon khyod ni bdag la gson// gtso bo ji ltar bka' bsgo ba// de ltar bdagan bgyid par mtshal//jaltar dus gsum mgon po rnams// byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i/

dazhes pa nas sems can mya ngan 'das la 'gong nyes bya ba'i bar du brjod pa 'bya'og gang zhig sdom pa mi 'dzin pa de la gzhug pa tsam skya zhes bya zhing/ deng khyod bya ba la sogs pa brjod par mi bya rgyu/slob dpon/

du dbang bskur kha 'ami bya'o// de nas/ osadzra yo ga ci t+taMudapa da yam// zhes pa 'dis byang chub sems niban med// dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi//de yi snying khar sAng posan// rdo rjerab tu gzhag par bya/sur rta sam ya/

badzrasid+d+hiya thu su khaM/zhes pa 'dis so//de nas rdo rna mdzad du byin gyis brlabs la dri dang me tog la sogs pas mchod de me tog gi 'phreng bgadags shing/ gdon gnas bos byugs la yon gyi mtshog bzung ste phyi rol na gnas

pa la bum pa'i chus dbang bskur la/o gi badzrasam ya tshulaM/zhes pa 'dase khro bo rir tirang nyid bcings la slob ma 'ching du gzhug go rdo rje bsdams pa nang byas 'a// mthe bong rdo rje dam po yis// yid kyis rnga bas dga'

byabs/ khro bo de yin te ridran//nas de nyid kyi mthe bong dag gis me tog gi 'phreng ba 'dzin du bcug la snying po 'dis gzhug par bya ste/badzrasam yaM pra ti thu mi zhes pa'o//shar gyi skor yang rdo rje lcags kyus de dgugacing/ lton

zhags pas gzhug go/ nub tu lcags sgrog gis bcing shing/ byang du rdoNa'abebs pas dbab bo//yar shar gyisogs re bzhin du bcug la 'di skad ces brjod ngo deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sogs kyi

rang nas ka byed sa rdo rje'i ye shesabs par byasebs gdagis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur/dngos grub gzhan rnams lta ci skyes khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams kyi mdun

sbya bar mkhye'o//khyod dam tshig nyams par gyur tare/ de nas rdo rjeslob dpon rang nyid khro bo ti na ti kha gyen du blta ba dang bcas pas bcings la/rdo rje slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag ste 'di skad cesasate/ 'di ni

[“]khyod kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje yin te/ gal te khyed 'ga' zhig la smras na spyi bo 'gems par 'gyur ro/de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang/ mna'i snying po lan cig bzlas pa'i ru rdo rjeslob ma de 'thung du

gzhug go/de la mna'i snying po 'di yin te rdorjesems dpa' deng khyod kyi//snying la yang deg zhugs par mdzod//gal te tshul 'di smras nani//de ma thag tu dral togshegs//badzra ud ka wa?/zhes bya'o//de nas slob ma la 'di

nas sbya'o/de nas brtsams nas khyod kyi phugan rdo rdzong yin gyis/ sa 'di gyis shig ces gang bsgo ba de bya dgos so//khyod ya dbam spangs par dus kyi bya ba byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re shes pa'o/de'i rjes la rang gi

snying khar yi ge a rdo'i 'od zer gyi 'phreng ba dang ldan par bsam mo//de nas slobama'i snying ba dang/ mdzod spu dang mgrin pa dang/ spyi bo rnams su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'bar ba dang/ rin po che

dang pad+ma dang/ sna tshogs rdo rje bsams te/o DA hi/ zhes pa 'di dag gis ge rims bzhin du'o//sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgyas rad dung slob ma'isnying khar phye la/rang gi snying kha'i yi ge yaM las yi ge phyung la//slob ma'ising

khang gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su zlos bcug la lus thams cad gang bar bsam mo//'di skad ces brjod do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang byin gyis rlobs la/ rdo rje sems dpa' dag la dbab tu gsol

zhes smyos shig/denas myur du dogrub dpon gyis khro bo to rin hi'i bcings la 'di skad brjod par bya ste/ 'disnyi dam tshig rdo rje yin//rdo rjesams dpa' zhes byar grags/rdo rje ye shes bla named//khyod la de

nyid 'bab gyur cig/badzra A be sha ang/zhes pa btsudang/ nyi shu dang/ sumacudang/bzhi bcu dang lnga bcudang jug cu dang/ bdun cu dang/brgyudanu dang dgu bcu dang/lan brgyar brjod de nges par 'bab par 'gyur ro/dunas rdo rje'i khu tshur

bcings la sems m rdo rjema'i phyag rgya pAl bar bya zhing 'di dag brjod de/on m+b+ha nisum+b+ha hU~M/grot+tagriny+tsahUM/gra pa ya grong ya hUM/A ya ho b+ha ga bAn badzarA dza hU~M phadaa[www]thabcu dang/ nyi shu dang/ sum cu dang/ bzhi bcudang/ lnga bcu

dang drug cu dang/ bdun cudang/ brgyad cu dang/ dgu bcudang lan brgyar brjod par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rdo rje rlung gi dkyil 'khor la rdo dzihU~Mgi rnam pa'i 'od zer gyi mdog dmar po 'bar ba gang bzhin par bsam mo// slan

yang gal te 'bab par ma gyur na/ de'i dril bu dang bcas pas rdo rje'ababs pa'i dumatshig gi phyag rgya bcings 'a nang pa g.yon pas de'i rkang pa mnan la stong ginam mkha'i phyogs su rnam par snang mdzad dpal rdo rje hUM

mdzad kyi steng du de nyid la dbab pa'i phyir khro bo hU~M gi rnam pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis mnan bzhin pa dang 'og nas kyang rdo rjerlung gi dkyil 'khor dang/ hU~Mgi rnam pas gdeg bzhin pa dang/ de bzhin du shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su

bzhugs pa'i mibaskyod pa la sogs pa rnams kyis/ hUM tuMhit+taa// zhes bya ba rang gis bon gyi 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis yang dag par 'babs par mdzad par bsam zhing de la dbab ste/hU~Mbadzra A be sha ya a/ zhes

rnam pa brgyar brjod par bya'o// gal te sdig pa mang ba nyid kyis la bab par ma gyur na/ de'i tshe sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgyas de'i sdig pa rnams yang dang ya da du dral bar bya'o// yama'i 'jag ma rnams kyi ma//

rab 'bar rdo rje khro bo yi// mnyam par bzhag pas dbul ba yis// de yi sdig pa thams cad na// til gyi spyanasrug des nges sreg/ oM sarba pA paM da han badzra ya swAhA/ zhes bya ba dang/ lag pa g.yas pa'i

mthil du til nag po las sdig pa'i gzugs brnyanabyus la/ yi ge hU~Mdabus su bsams te/ mdzub mo dang mthe bod dag gis sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas sbyin sreg gi thab khung las 'byung ba'i 'bar ba'i 'phreng

ba kun tu 'khrugs pa'i rdo rje rnams kyis de'i lus la sdig pa srog bzhin par bsams la/ de nas yang rdo rdzobabs pa de kho na bzhin du bcings la dbab par bste/ nges nga za 'bebs par 'gyur ro// de lta bu s
kyang gang la bab bar ma gyur pa de la dbang bskur bar mi bya'o// babs na skad cig ma de'ir de'i mngon par shes pa lnga la sogs par rdzogs par 'gyur ro// des yang dag par babs par shes nas yang/ ob

satu su saM grahati/ zhes pa la sogs pa'i rgyu brjod la/ khrobo'i khu tshur dang re bzhin gshegs pa rdo ma'i phyag rgya dral bar bya'o// de phabs na rdo rjesems dpa' khro ba'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o// de'i slob dngos

gyis rdo rje khu tshur khro bo'i phyag rgyas bcingabar bya'o// de bzhin du ji srid du gyur na de'i rdo rje bshad pa'i phyag rgyabacing ngo// de'i tsha rdo rjechos khro bo'i phyag rgya bcing ngo// de lta bu s nye bar byon cing dgongs par 'gyur ro//
de nas de'i lce la rdo bsams te/ bru badzra/ zhes pa brjod do// dmas thams cad skyabar 'gyur/nag 'phrang ba de dkyil 'khor chen por der te/ pra titsa/ zhes bya'o//

donas gang du babs pa de 'dis 'grub bo// de nas= o pra ti thots+tshahU~M inaM satra mahA ba la/ zhes bya bas 'phreng bde nyid kyi mgo bor bcing ngo// de nas/ o/ de ring rdorjesams dpa' ring// khyod kyi yig ni 'byed par
brtson rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med// thams cad mig ni bya bar 'gyur// habadzra pa bya/ zhes pa bas gdong g.yogs dgrol lo// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po'i rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams te srid rnam par

snang mdzad kyi mthar thug par bstamano// de nas tiSh+Tha badzra/ zhes pa la sogs pas slob ma'i snying khar gzhug pa'i phyag rgya dgrol lo// de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor du 'am/ phyi rol du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor

shar sgo la mngon par phyogs pa legs par brisal/ slob ma dpal rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi phyag rgya sems ma rdo rjem la sogs pas kyang byin gyis brlabs la/ phyag rgya chen po de la bzhag ste dbang bskur ro// dri
dang me tog la sogs pas mchod de mchod yon dbul/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan la sogs pa dang/ dung dang/ rol mo la sogs pa'i sgra bsgrags pa dang/ de nas bkra shis kyi tshigs bcad
rnams kyis mngon par dga' bsadang po re zhig chu'i dbang bskur ba dang/ rtsod pa na dang/ dar dpyangs dang/ rdorjod ng/ bdag po dang/ ming gis dbang bskur ba dag gis dbang bskur la/ yang ma rtog la
sogs pa dang/ sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa brgyad kyi mchod do// slob ma rnams kyis rdo rje thal mo sbyar bas slob dpon ba rab du btung la/ yon gyi mchog thub la ma tog la sogs pa'i

dbang bskur ba'ang gzung bar bya'o// slob dpon gyis dbang bskur ba ni dpal rdo rje mdzad kyi phyagargyus de kho na bzhin du ji ltar nges par bstan pa'i gnas su bzhag la/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis de'i sa

la dpal rdo rje mdzad la sogs pa bkod deslar yang/ oM badzra a d+hipa tits+tsaM a b+hi Shiny+tsami dra b+homeb+ha ba laH hU~M baM ho/ hU~MphaT/ byis pa 'di rnam par rgyal ba'i bum ba la brgyartsa brgyad dam stong yongs su bzlog

pa byas la// de nas o badz+dza a b+hi Tiny+tsa/ zhes pa 'di brjod cing rdo rjekhu tshur gyis rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa nas nubrusanas nu'idabang bskur ba sbyin// 'di yang brjod de/ 'din khyod kyi dmyal ba'i

chu/ dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed// dam tshig bsrungun dngos grub ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyus 'grub bo// rdo rjedril bu'i phyag rgya yang// dkyil 'khor can mnan mislu// skye bo 'dus pas gnas pa na// rgod dang

ma dad pa la min// de nas cho ga thams cad nyams su blangs la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas legs par bstod de tshigs bcad lngas rjes su gnang ba byin nas// gzengs bstod pa dang lung bstan pas slob ma tham

cad lung bstan no// de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba 'byung ste/ slob dpon durab ng bskur bar 'os pa dkyil 'khor thams cad du bcug pa de ltar mdzod cig/ 'di yi las kyi dngos grub na// ji ltar bded pa'i
[j]ba/ 'bya// dngos grub kyang// tha ma 'bring dang mchog rnams ni// ma lus nges par 'thob par 'gyur// mchog gi sa rnams bgegs med 'grub// dngos grub phran tshegs slar ci zhig/
sangs rgyas nyid kyang sems can 'di// rdo rjesams nying rnyed mi dka'// gang la dngos grub nges 'byung dang// gang la sdig pa gdon chen dang// bgegs dang log 'dren rnams dang yang// 'chi bdag dang ni
bdud sde rnams/ 'jigs pa sna tshogs bstan bcos no// dngos grub 'a9sa 'joms de dag ni// bdag nyid chen po de la ni// mi 'byung skyo bar mi 'gyur ro// sbyin sreg las kyi tshog yin// nges par

dngos grub myur rab 'byung// lha rnams kyang 'i char mnyes shing// skad cig gis kyang rab rnyed 'gyur// yams dang nyer 'tsho skyon la sogs// ches lci nges par red du 'gyur// de yi yul du nad dang gdon//
rigs la sogs pa mi 'byung zhing// mu geca co che rnams dang// pa rol dmag tshogs nyams par 'gyur// lha dang klu rnams spro chen gyis// bde bar yang na skyed bar 'gyur// rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams
dang// 'jig rten skyong ba rgyu skar bcas// gnod sbyin rnams dang gza' la sogs// rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams kyis skyong// de nas brgya byin 'a sogs lhas// yang dang yang du phyag btsal nas// rin
chen gdugs sogs mchokaM rnams ni// rnam pa sna tshogs mchod byas te// phyag na rdo rje rgyalo dbong la// dag pa'i bsam pas yang dag bstod// sangs rgyas kun pas sngar sangs rgyas// mi sa dram kun

bcom pa// rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// rdo rjero rje rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje'i skus sku che ba// phyagan rdo rje phyag 'tshal 'dud// rdo rje yan lag rdo rja mchog/ rdo rje'abar ba cher 'bar ba// rdo rje shugs te/ shugasache ba// rdo rje

mtshon chardo rjeche// phugan rdo rje phug chen po// rdo dzamada'aste rab 'bigs po// rdo rje rnon po rnon po che// rlaba'i chab rgya mtsho che// rdo rje bad+ma byang chub che// byang chub sangs rgyas rang byung ba// rdo rje rgyatshan rgya chen che//

rdo rje glu ma rnam spyod ba// rdo rje rgya ste gnod sbyin che// rdo rjepad+ma rnam sbyong ba// rdo rje khro bo gtum po che// rdo rje dgra sdang 'joms pa'i gtso// rdo rje 'jigs byed srung ba che// rdo rje lcags kyu don med byed// rdo rje ro

las ri las che// rdo rje srin po za ba po// rdo rje gnod sbyin gnod spyin tshe// rdo rje gdon te gdon gyi mchog/ 'jigs rung sgrag byed ma rungs pa// drag po 'jigs byed rngam byed pa/ sgrub dka' sgrub pa leg/

pa ste/ rdo rje legs pa dgyes mdzad pa// rdo rje dga' ba dga' ba che// dga' ba'i rdo rje dbang byed pa// rdo rje gzi brjid gzi brjid che// 'bar 'od gshin rjegathar byed pa// rdo rje drag po drag po ma/
'od 'brug pan 'thug pa sta// nam mkha' dang na mnyam pa yi// re ba thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa// rdo rjidabang bskur rin chen mchog/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan yon tan mtsho// rdo dza ye shes yo shas che//
rig pa [S]ba'i tshogs kyis mchod// ha la ha la nag pe che// sgra che rnam par sgrog pa po// rdo rje'adod pa 'dod pa che// snyigs ma'i rnyog ma 'joms pa po// dus kyi g.yo ba gcod pa'i mchog/ zhal[E]
ni lcags kyi glog 'phro ma// rdo rjem ste rab tu gtum// gtum pa'i rab snang 'joms pa po// khyim stong gi 'od zer kal// sbyan dmar 'jigs par mdzad pa po// khro bo du ma'i 'od
'phro ba/ phyag ni du ma'i mtshon cha bskya// du ma'i zhal te sku yang steng// 'khyil cing sku yang 'khyil ba lags// thugs ches bdag nyid sku ma mda'// rnam par rtog pa ma lus spangs// ma rig

'joms pa tshangs pa ste// 'dod chags zhe sdang dri mthar mdzad// sgyu ma khyab 'jug rdo rje can// mdung can rtse gsum 'chang 'phrog byed// 'dod chags zhe sdang gtinugache// srid dang srid min rnam sbyong
ba zhi zhing dul la dag pache// sangs rgyas sas rgyas rab rtogasa mdzad// sangs rgyas bdag nyid sangs rgyas sku// rdo rje lags skyes rdo rje sems// kun ngu bzang po cher bzang ba// mtshan rnams

kun gyis mtshan pa po// khams kun bdag nyid khyab pa po// thamasacang rdo rje'i bdag nyid gtsang// gang gis 'di bris klog pa dang// rtag tu don ni 'chad byed dam// dran nam nyan par byed kyang rung// phyag na

rdordzaanyam par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ brgyaphyin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i 'khor dang bcas pa'i lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri bro dang gnod spyin

dang / srin po la sogs pa phan pa dang bde ba thob pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa lam ngon par dga' ko// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs

su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po 'i brtag pa phyogs gcig pa rdzogs so///rgya gar gyi mkhan po blam sdebatsun chen po re ngen dra de ba'i zhabs dang/ bla ma paNachen skyes bu chen po ma Ni ka shi na'i/

zhal snga nas gus par mnyan te/ chag lo tsa bshAkya'i dge slong chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ spre'u lo dbyug gu zla ba'i mar ngo'i tshes bcu gsum la/ gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thangapo

char dbu btsugs nas/ smin drug zla ba'i yar ngo'i tshes bcu gnyis kyi snga dro'i bar zhag bco lngar 'gro ba'i tshe dpal 'dren gyi lha'i sdings su tshang bar bgyis so// dpal ldan rgyung rgyal ngan song sbyong ba yi// brtag pa
phyogs gcig star grags kha che nas// chos rgyal sku drin paNachen sgra bsgyur mchog/ skyes chen rnams kyis legs par dar bar mdzad// 'di ni dpal ldan kun dga' snying po dang// rje btsun 'jigs med/
'byung gnas smras pa yi// man ngag la brten rgya gar bil po na// yongs grogs bla ma'i drin las kho bos bsgyur// sgra gzhung bla ma'i gsung bzhin du// gus bsgyur nongs pa mkhas chen rnams// bzod
mdzad de dges 'gro ba kun// 'gro mgon thub chen nyid gyur cig/ bkra shis par gyur cig/ @#// rgyagar skad du/ saM ka pa pra tiSh+Thab d+hi tanA/ bod skad du/ rab tu
gnas pa mdor bsdus pa'i cho ga'i rgyud/ dpal rdo rjesems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig rdo rje byin gyis
pa @#// rdzob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// brdungs pa dang/ bris pa dang/ 'bur du byas pa la sogs pa'i rab tu gnas pa'i tsheg gsungs pa/ slob dpon de nyid
bcu shes shing/ mtshan nyid kun dang yang dag ldan// phyag rgya sngags dang tshog shes// las rnams kun la mkhas pas so// sku gzugs mtshan nyid ldan pa ste// zhi ba la sogs ro yis ldan// tshad kyis
tshad la phab cing bzang// de 'drarab tu gnas par 'gyur// yang thog mchod rten sogs gnas dang// khyim dang lha yi gnas rnams su// sangs rgyas la sogs 'ba gnas ni// cho ga dag dang ldan pas
bya cho ga dman pas ma byas// rab gnas rtag par bkram ngeshis// 'jig rten 'dirayad sdug bsngal la// 'jig rten pha rol 'jigs pa che// de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis// dngos grub
'dod pas nan tan bya// chog bdag nyid nus pa yis// brtag pa las gsus tshul legs pos// de byas bsod nams che ba ni// mthong dang mi mthong rnams su skye// sku gzugs sngags kyi
mtshan nyid kyis// de la byin rlabs 'jug par 'gyur// gang du sku gzugs rdzogs pa la// byin ma brlabs par rang gnas na// de la bkra mi shis 'gyur zhing// de sring mchod par de mi 'os// dpal
g+ha na skyes bu la la zhig/ rig pa'i mtshan nyid spyad pan// 'jig rten kun gyis mchodami byed// de de bzhin du gzugs brnyan de// rab gnas ma byas gzugs brnyan la// gang gis mchod cing phyag byed/
pa// dmatshig bral zhing sngags dman pas// sbyin sreg thal ba 'bras med mtshungs// de bzhin du yang sngags gnas pas// chos ldan machod pa byed pa gang// de yi las kyi rnam smin gyis// sku bzhu/
ni mchod par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcomo ldan 'das chos thams cad rab tu mi gnas pa lags na/ ji ltar na rgyal ba rnams kyis rab tu gnas pa 'phags// ma
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kun ni rab tu zhugs// rab tu gnas pa gdan 'ang med// kun tu mkha' ltar gnas pa la// cig shes kyisani rab tu brtagasaM// 'jig rten kun rdzob
la brtan nas// rab tu gnas pa rab tu brtags// dam pa'i don du dpyad pa na// gang zhig gang gi gang du brlab// gzod ma nas zhi sku med pa// 'dras ji ltar rab tu gnas// dang po'i las can sems can
rnams rtogs pa'i rgyu ru bshad par zad// dang por re zhig yongs su brtag pa'i gnas yongs su spyas pa dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ blar dang/ ba dan bsgreng ba rnams su mchog tu gsol ba 'debs
bas/ gsol ba btab pa'i bam sos dang me tog la sogs pa dang ldan pas/ tshes dang rgyaskar shis pa la slob dpon 'degs par mnyam par bzhag pas rab tu gnas pa'i sar 'khod de/ sangs rgyas
dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa rigs lnga dang rab tu 'brel ba yin la/ de bzhin du rab tu 'brelaba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs sa yos su bzung zhing rdul tshon gyi las dang/ thig gdab pa dang/
[Z. ]@#/// gsol ba gdab pa la sogs pa byas la// rtsa ba'i sngags sam rgyud kyi dgongs pas sa'i gter du nor bu 'ag sor gdub bcugal/ de nas lha'i khang par rang gi slob ma bcugaste/

sa rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i skur bltas la/ lha la mngon par phyogs te phyag 'tshal zhing/ jiltar 'byor pa'i ma tog thal mo dang// dri chu gtsang mas chog bzhi ba/
la ting nge 'dzin la legs gnas pas/ zhabs bsil me tog spos sogs ldan/ rnam par mi rtog sems kyis// mchod yon rnams ni phul byas la// mnyam par bzhag pas sngags 'di yis// lan
gsum bar du brjod par bya'o/ a sa ma ya[W]/ layaho/ sa ma ya hU~M/ ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad ni// dga' ldan dun gnas bzhi/ lha mo sgyu 'phrul lhums zhugs ltar// de bzhin gzugs brnyana'adi

khugs shige 'di ru mgon po rtag bzhugs nas// byang chub sems ni bskyud pa dang// 'di zhes bya ba'i donaslad du// bdag gi 'byor pa nyid kyis na/ tso'abyor pa yi mchod pa rnams// me tog la sogs 'di bzhes
shoge/ bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la// rjes su brtse bas dgongs su gsol// kun gyis 'di la byin brlabs shing/ de nyin du ni bzhugs par rigs// sa gzugasasta gon legs byas la// den
brtag pa mnyam par brtsam// slob masmyung bar gnas pa yis// de ltar thams cad dpar bas la// sngags pasamachod pa'i tshog sogs// bla ma yis ni go bsgo ba// ma 'tshogs pa kun bsgrub

bar bya/ mchod yon 'bras bu chen por 'gyur// de nas sngags pas snyan gsan dbab// gdan la bstim byas machod yon dang// mchod pa sos dngame tog dang//de bzhin du niyar me dang// sngags dang ldan pas dbul bar

byang sku gzugs mdun du phyogs byas la// na bza' ser pos g.yogs bya zhing// de nas sngags pas 'du bya ba// khyad par du ni bdug par bya//denas grub phyir de la de la lan cig gtor bya ba// de lus de la

sngags 'di'i// mdang de nas tshul ni// oM sarbapA paM da han badzra ya swAhA/zhes byabs so//den/ rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'// don bzhin du ni bsgom bya ste//denas gsum gnas rnams su bstom//o hU~M A/

yi ge gsum//e yig spyi bor bstem bya zhing// snying khar tsA gi yigar 'gyur// ngag gi phyogs su A/yag go/ sku gsung thugasanibasgrub par bya// yang na gang gi sa bon gang yin pa// de yi thugs kar ded god

do phyag rgya sngags kyis ngob bskul zhing// ci rigs par n sAnaM gsan dbab// gser ram dngul lam 'angs ma 'am// rdo dang de bzhin shing dang ni// yang na shing lo'i 'dab ma rnams// mchod yon du ni gyur bar bya//

de bgan bum pa gser la sogs// zangs ma'i snod kyi mchod ye nan// mchod yon snod la rab tu shis// gal te nus pas ma rnyed na// ltar red bas kun tu bya// de nas de yi til mar sogs// dur ba'i phon gyi pir

gyis sbyang// bkra shis rdza la sogs pa'i sgras// na chung rnams kyis de bzhin brjod// til mar la sogs pa'i sngags ni// oM sarba ta tha ga ta kA ya bi sho d+ha ni swAhA/ bum pa lnga 'am yang na brgyad//
tsan dan la sogs rnams kyis byugs// sna tshogs dri chus dgang ba dang// 'khor lo byas la mngon par bsngags// bu mos bkal ba'i srad bu 'am// yang na gso ma'i skung pa 'ang

ka dung/ tshon chen po yis bsgyur byas la// de la sngags kyis dkri bar bya// sman lnga rin chen lnga dang ni// me tog 'bras bur ldan pa ste// sku gsum pa dang yungs kar ldan// bum pa mngon par bsngags par byang gtsug

tor rnam rgyal zhes bya ba/ gzi brjid gzhan gyis ma brje dang// bkra shis khri rnams sngags kyis ni// khrus kyi ched du mngon par bsngags// 'jam pa'i til mar dag dang na// u dum ba ra'i lcagam bzang//

'khar ba'i snod kyind dag tu// bkod la rab tu dbul bar bya// drilnga yis ni de nas byugs// sa bon ldan gtor bar bya// slob ma tshogs dang bcas pa yi// sngags kyi gtsang spras bkru bar bya// bkra shis zhes

bya yid 'ong ba'i// blo dang ldan pas tshigs bcad brjod// rig ma spyanam jing zhin du// chog bzhin du mngon dbang bskur// sngags ni/ ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni// lha yi chu ni dag pa yis// de bzhin gsheg
kun khrus gsol ltar// de bzhin bdag gis khrus gsol lo// zhes bya ba la sogs pas so// e sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka ta sa ma ya shrIhU~M/ lugs ma lan dngos su bkra// ri mo rnams ni mi long 'a'o//
dag byed las ni sngon du bsgo// dur ba yis ni mod par bya// ras sam lag pa dag gis ni// blo dang ldan pas sku lus phyi// gur kum mar dang bcas pa bsku// shes bzang dag kyang sku la

gsol blo dang ldan pas sngags 'di yis// dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhugs su gsol// oM d+hu badzra bA sa se sAhA/pod badzugarje swAhA/oM badzra A ba ra Na ba su paNasAhA/ blo ldan gyis rang dmatshig bstsal//
phyag rgya sngags kyis dbang bskur la// ji ltar 'os par mngon dbang bskur// oM hU~M oM rdzi khaM/ de ltar rtsod pa na bsring ba dus la bzhugs su gsol te/ brtag pa las gsungs pa'i tshul gyis so/ man
gyi phyogs ni ma nub cing// yo ba min zhing drang ba yis// de ltar sku gzugs mdzes par dgod// de ltar min na skyon 'byung 'gyur/ che tog sogs dang de bzhin dri// mar me na bza' sogs sbyor gang// de
kun sngags dang ldan pa yis// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// oM badza pur+ya AhUM/ zhes bya ba 'di dag la sogs pas so// mchogagi me tog 'di dag ni// chu dang thung lus ng ba'i skyes mchog tu da
pas khyed la 'bul// ming de bar na bar ba'o// lhan cig skyes dang sbyar las byung// mchog gi bdug pa 'di dag ni// bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyis// ci bde bar ni bzhes su gso'i
lhan cig skyes dang sbyar las byung// mchog tu gyur pa'i dri 'ong ni// mArtog gi dad pas 'bul lags kyis// ci bde bar ni se sor bzhes// mun pa 'joms byed snang ba'i mchog/ mar dang til gyi

mar me 'di//yang dag ye shes spyan dbye phyir//dad pasu bdag gis 'bul bar bgyi bza' dang bca' ba phun sum tshogs kha dog dri ro rnams dang ldan//thams cad ldan ng lha yi bshes//bdag gis dngul gyis so sor
dbazhes de la sogs pa gang yang rung// cung zad 'byer sku gzugs la// de dag thams cad 'di nyid kyis//rim pa yis ni dbul bar bya// sngags kyi gtsang snga nu ba//der ni gsar gyi rang bzhin

gyi thur mas spyan ni dbye bar bya// zhal zas der dbul blo ldan pas// oM tsak+khatsakaHsa man+ta tsagyur ba sho d+hani sahA/o d+hi byi a ni sa mA d+hi d+hun pra Nam swAhA/ de ltar byas te de nas yang//slob ma rab tu bcug byas la//
khyod kyis dra la gong gsol ba'i// sku gzugs dgan khyad par du// ji ltar gsuphros par rab gnas par// de dag don ni ngas byas te// de rnams don ni grub thin gyis// ci bde bar ni mchod par byos// de
nas dam tshig dbang bskur bas// khyod la byas kyis srog blugs ni// steng ngam yang na de yi phyed// mdor gsum btags la 'bru rnams kyis// 'o ma can gyi bud shing la// sregs khung gru bzhir sreg

blugs bya de nyid mar dang 'o ma yis// lhag pa'i rtswa ru phul byas pas// bdag dang slong ma thams cad ni// zhi dang rgyas pa 'phel bar bya//o badzra A yu zheswAhA/A gtsAhani pang ga la dI ka de ded hidA pa

ya a ngan tsa me kA ts+tsaM ku ru swAhA/o padzra pu ye swAhA/de ltar byas la 'bad pa yis/// khri yi stong du bzhugs par bya// sku gzugs kyi ni sum 'gyuracha'i tshad tsam du ni rab tu bsgrags/dao supa ti badzen/
me tog spos sogs sngon 'gro bas// phyogs skyong rnams kyang mched par bya//o in+d+ha ya pAhA/zhes bya ba dbang ldan la thug gi bar du rol mo'i sgra la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de/gshegs su gsol
bar bya pa// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de yi sras//tshangs sogs lha yi tshogs rnams dang// gang dag chog ma tshang bas// de dag bzod pa mdzad par rigs// kun tu 'i dang rgyas pa na/yon bdag tshe 'a rub
mdzad ms/ sangs rgyas yul dugshegs nas ni// sur yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol// sa dang chu dang a rlung gi/ lha rnams kun gyi sku gzugs la/ khas 'kha brgya ru srung gnas mdzod// dgyes shing yi da
bzang 'gyurang yis// slob dpon bla mar bcas pa yi// bu dang tsha bo bsrung mdzad nas// rang gnas dge thor gshegs su gsol// dpyid zla ra ba'am dpyid zla 'bring// dgun dang dpyid kyi tha chung/
dbyar zla ngo bzhin dbyar 'bring po// nyi ma byang du gnas pa yi// dkar bo phyogs kyi gnyis pa 'am// rim bzhin de ltar gsum pa 'am// gang tshog za' dang rjesamathunan// nag po'i phyogs la'ang
brtsams par bya// gang tshe thams cad mthun gyur na// mi rnams yun du 'phel bar byed// bco lnga de bzhin brgyad pa dang// bcu gsum pa yang de bzhin no// gnam stong dang yid bzhin du// bcu

bzhi pa la 'dra byung min// thams cad du ni nusnyad dang//snar mkhre bzhin de bzhin to//lag pa snubs dang smonadangan/rgyal dang nusmad de bzhin no//khrums sbyang dag kyang de bzhin du rgyu skar 'di rnams thams cad du// skye dgu

'phel zhing de yi ni// rab tu gnas pa mchog tu byed// ya da la 'dod pa su yang rung// dngos grub mi bzhis stor bar 'gyur// lung 'a sa shes pa'i yang dag pa// khrums sam ya nga na gro bzhin gyis// lag gis
skal bzang snarams ni// gzhan dag las ni rgyal bar byed// mgo yis zhi ba zhi bar ston// chu stod kyisan bu dag gson// rtag par dngos grub khrums smad kyis// rgyal gyis rtag

thA par tsharing 'gyur//smon gyis ma reg tu bde bar byeng/ lha mtshams kyis mchog star 'gyur// phur bu lag dang nga las dras/ zla ba'i gza'asogs shes bya//'di rnams bzang ldan la byas na// rab tu gnas pa mchogatu dge/ gsum

pa drug pa bas pa la// bcu dang bcu gcig la zla ba// gnyis pa bzhi pa de nga zhin brgyad// bcu dang bcu gcig rnams la 'ag/ gnyis dang bdun dang de bzhin dgu// de bzhin phur bu bcu gcig pa// dus sbyor bzhi pa 'a
brten nas// de la lhag par gnas par bya// drug bdun bcu pa dor ba yi// pa wa sangs nying dge ba yin// de ltar gza' rnams thams cad kyis// stobs ldan mi ldan de shes bya// gang tshe zhi ba'i gza'
rnams dang// shing rnams zhi ba dge ba yin// dang po lnga pa gsum de bzhin// nor rnams 'joms pa spang bar bya// rjes su mthun par byed pa pos// skad cig de la yes grub cing//ji ltar gsungs bzhin

kun byas na/rab tu gnas pa mchog 'gyur zhing 'khor los sgyur rgya' dbang phyugan thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/gza' dang rgyu skar 'dir med de//bgegs dang log par 'dren pa'i ngamed gza' rnams thams cad rjes

mthun phyir/bgegs dang rgyu skar lha rnams nying/ de na sgrub par khyon gnas shing gazugs brnyan mchong rten la sogs kyis//dngos grub gzhi ster bar mdzad//yid kyis nyung thang gang bsams pa// skye dang skye ba 'grub par 1

[52]]'gyur rgyan rnams ma lus pa yis ni// phyi nas bzo bo rnams la mchod// gang dag de la grogs byed pa// gzhan dag kyang ni mchod par bya/ de nas de dag thams cad la// dga' bas 'di skad brjod pa re bya// ji
ltar gsungs pa'i mchod pa rnams// bdag la mthunapa'i nus pa med// de phyir khyod la bdag bzod bsel// sngags kyi gtsang sbra'i bza' bya dag/ gzugs brnyan dag la bzhin bya ste// bder gshegs lhag ma 'di

ngag ni bros shing sdig pa byang bar 'gyur// zhes bya bas so// glang po rta glang nga ja nor// yon gyi dam pa dbul bar bya// de nas de la nan tan gyis// longs spyod g.yo ba dbul bar bya// gal te lha nying dgyes 'dong na/

bam gus pas dgyas bya zhing/ de ltar rnam pa thams cad du// bla ma yang dag mnyes par bya// de nas gang dag brtul zhugs can// dge slong dge bsnyan ge slong ma// mchog tu grub pas mchod byas la// ji ltar 'os pa'i yon

yang dbul// dung ngas rol mo sgra la sogs// bzang ba'i glu dang gara rnams kyis// gnyen dang rigs brgyud 'khor rnams kyis// rol mo chen po mtshan mo dbul// de ltar thams cad phul zin nas//gang rung mchod sbyin

kyil 'khor la//phul lam dbul bar byed pa rnams// slope dpon la ni dbul bya yi// bzo bolan mi sbyor zhing//dge slong rnams la'ang sbyin mi bya// slob dpon mchog gi lha yin te//nor rnams thams cad de la dbul// de nas
dkyil 'khor rgyugs byas te// ba yi lci bas byugs byas shing// rdulatshon chu bor rang dor ro// de yis yang dag legs par 'gyur// rab tu gnas pa mdor bsdus ba'i rgyud rdzogs so//
bya@#// dur khrod ngag dang nyamapa yi// khyim dang srin po'i gnas rnams su// mngon spyod kyi ni las bya ba// thab khung tha ma bar ma mchog/ phung dang gsum mam// khru dgu pa ni byas pa las//

stags bu de yi tshad brtsegs te// gru gsum pa 'am mdung rtse 'dra// lu gas gol phu dug gisan/ bskrus pas thab khunganag por bya// dbus su rdo rje rtse dgu nga// nag po shin tu 'bar ba bri/ mu can sta dume

gsum dang// rgyagram pa yi rdo rjes mtshan// de yi phyi rol mu khyud la// dbyug pa dang ni dgra sta dang// ngal gro shin tu 'bar ba bri// de yi phyi rol keng rus te// bde gshegs la sogs phubasdus mtshan// dud sprin/

mngog 'dru drang srong mchog/ ra yi stong po zhugs rtsa gsum dang// gzar bu 'phradabu ri'i par ldan// de lta'i ma lha sman drangs nas// lhorab ltas khros pa'i ams kyis bsregs/ shin tugadugasid tsha gar

b+hU bcas= srog shing yam shing byas nas kyang// sha dang khrag dang lcags phu dang// dus phu dug dang sku tshe dang// drichen dri tshul sogs pa'i// rdzas rnams kun la dug gis ni// bsgos pas lan grangs 'bum/
bsregs nas// de yi longs spyod 'byor pa dang// gnyen dang 'khor dang brana rnams dang/ bu dang chung mar bcas pa rnams// pas desrog dang bral nas mi/ sdug bsngal mi bzad myong bar 'gyur/ mngon/
spyodakyi las rdzogs so/// rgyagar gyi mkhan po shAn+ti gan+d+ha dang/ lo tsab ban+d+he dza ya rak+Shi tas bsgyur ba'o/
